1b2(dkon brtsegs):
1b3(dkon brtsegs): spya du/  / 
2a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang ngo // 
2a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'athams ca rdal phyag 'tshal lo// 
2a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ba com ldan 'das
2a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol/ dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge
2b1(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa dgra bcom pa sha stag dang / 'jam
2b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / saing+ge'i tog la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong la/ byang chub sems dang
2b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams/ pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu/ ga dang / mthu chen thob dang // 
2b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa brtsegs dang // gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan
2b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu mi sgul dang / don rab sems dang / legs par bsam pa sems dang / sems dpa' ba dang / 
3a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi blo gros dang / sems bzang po dang / nor bu brtsegs dang / ri 'joms
3a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / lag na rin po che dang / sems dpa' rin po che dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag
3a3(dkon brtsegs): ba teg dang / rtag tu lag pa rkyang dang / rtag tu lag brtson dang / sems can sgrol dang / brtson
3a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mos dang / ji skad smras po de bzhin byed pa la gnas pa dang smon lam 'phags pa dang
3a5(dkon brtsegs): lag na sgron ma dang / sems mnyam pa dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms
3a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam
3b1(dkon brtsegs): par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 
3b2(dkon brtsegs): khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro grub dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 
3b3(dkon brtsegs): dpol dang / snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang / seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas mngo nu bar bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / spobs
3b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs med dang / spobs pa bzhi/ de pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / nyi zla'i 'od zer
3b5(dkon brtsegs): mog mog bor byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs med dang / blo gros dpe med dang / rtag tu bzhad dgas dbang po dang / nor bun bu dang / sgrib
3b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bud med rnam bsgyur go cha dang / rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par snang byed dang / mis byin dang
3b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra skad zab mo dang / de dog la sogs pa byang
4a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang
4a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs gcig go/ lha'i bu
4a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sogs
4a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems da pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i// bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs
4a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig go/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po skye gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po lhun po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang bang
4a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang // 
4a7(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
4b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs gcig go/ de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
4b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma dag dang thabs gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du/ 
4b3(dkon brtsegs): mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dag pa gcig pu dben pa na 'dug pa/ nang du yang
4b4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jog la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sre dmas med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas 'jam dpal
4b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting 'dzin de las lang so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ngas ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu
4b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzin de las langs nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ 
4b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/ 'di lta ste dper na// u dum pa ra'i me te go brgya
4b8(dkon brtsegs): la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de bzhin du gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba gsal ba/ brtag tu med pa/ rtog ge dang bral ba/ zab pa shes par/ 
5a1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas
5a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med pa na ni chos mnyan pa yang med do// chos mnyan pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa yang med pas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams
5a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig
5a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags che ba/ zhe sdang che ba/ gti mug che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral ba/ mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa// glan
5a6(dkon brtsegs): ba blun pa/ mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang bral ba sha stag yin pas/ ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas shes rab kyi mag
5a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyamo// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhi
5a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe 'jam
5b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri ma med par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge
5b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la/ shararo phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mnyam pa/ 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od
5b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ yongasu dag pa'i 'od ni rdzu blos khyab par gyur to// 'od de dang snang ba des/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag dang / ri'i rtse mo
5b4(dkon brtsegs): dang shing ljon pa dang / ri dang / 'khor yug dang / bting ba zung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gongs dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad snang
5b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen pos gsal bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i/ 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gar+b+ha 'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa
5b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur bdag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i 'od 'di lta bu yid du 'chi ba/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig
5b7(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'byung ba 'di/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags// rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag cig sems dang ba dang / lus sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing / sems
5b8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang kun du mi 'byung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin
6a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur bde dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs
6a2(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / na mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / mi 'am tsa'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgra
6a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi'i sgra dang / ma ma yin pa'i sgra dang / bya'i sgra dang / ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to// rlung gi sgra dang / chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho chen
6a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i shugs kyi sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag pa ngar gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing thams cad zhi ba dang / rab
6a5(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi bar gyur to// / yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de da/ ga la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan/ gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 
6a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye zhing / des sangs rgyas
6a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthu lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
6a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag thams cad kyis gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas/ gsung gi phrin las brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tso lta ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin gsung ni
6b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis gsung gi phrin las smra bungs gcig tu bsdus pa de su bu des bsnyen bkur bde dag la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung brjod pa des/ sangs rgyas
6b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing thams cad kun du gang por gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang ma bkrol bar sgra grag par gyur
6b3(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra de dag las mi brtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung zhing stong pa nyid kyi sgo mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags
6b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / chos dkyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / de yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgrad pa/ 
6b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang shes rab kyi sgra dang / nges pa'i sgra dang phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba
6b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu
6b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / nyan thos nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los
6b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongasu 'grub pa las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta
7a1(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gtam dris pas khyed la ci zhig byas thong shig/ 'od 'di ni ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rngu ba dang / ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs pa
7a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs spyad ba byas pa yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
7a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'od 'di ni byams pa dang / 
7a4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms thams cad kyis yod su bsgos pas yongasu tshim par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ skal ba 'am/ skal ba las
7a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i mthar phyin par sgrub ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de lta mod kyi/ 'on// nga legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang khyed la
7a6(dkon brtsegs): bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas sa ldan 'ang de ga pa da kyade dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / byang chub sems dang / 
7a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi
7a8(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
7b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes pa de snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mi gus
7b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dbang po rtul ba/ ngo tsha shes pa/ khrel yod pa dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
7b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ pa zhes bya bas cheg she baches brtson 'grus che ba/ byang chub
7b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams yang dag par ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzeng bstod pa/ byang
7b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi migo byed pa/ chos thams cad
7b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ chag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs thob pa/ byang chub sems/ 
8a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i yon+tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu 'grub par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
8a2(dkon brtsegs): zag rnams kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhu bar 'gyur
8a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag
8a4(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'od 'di bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal
8a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen pa/ kur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom// ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur
8a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de ting 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba dri med bkad pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur
8a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de ting 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/ 'di ltar rnam par dag pa/ 
8a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzad lag so// bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 
8b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang ga'i klung gi bye
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grang med pas kyi mi khyab pa dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgag
8b3(dkon brtsegs): la bder song ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon
8b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ma thos pa yon+dan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang snang ba 'di lta bu dang 'bar ba 'di dag ga wa mchis/ su'i 'o du lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
8b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di ska da ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rte/ na gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan
8b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa'
8b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bgyi'o// de skad ces bka'
8b8(dkon brtsegs): sul pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
9a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / nu ba dang / zhu blag bgyi ba dang / byang chub
9a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
9a3(dkon brtsegs): dag de'i dus la bab par shes na/ dngas shig/ de nas de'i modo la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag
9a4(dkon brtsegs): skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ 'di lta ste dper na mi ste/ rabs po che'i log pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brgya dpa las bskum pa tsam la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mi snang
9a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags par gyur/ to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing bcom ldan 'das de
9a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhag so// la la dag ni phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me tog ud pa
9a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / skya snar dang / d+ha nus re dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bA ra shi ka dang / bA ra shi ka chen po dang / man dar
9a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / zla mdog dang / zla mdog chen po dang / zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang / 
9b1(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi char dag dang / phreng ba'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba
9b2(dkon brtsegs): der lhag so// byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing bcom ldan 'das de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhag so// byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams sgra
9b4(dkon brtsegs): skad kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par grwa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
9b5(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der lhag so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rte/ na gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mthus sto
9b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar
9b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med/ zhe sdang gis ma yin// gti mug gis ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin// 
9b8(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ yongasu gdungs pas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// de nas
10a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
10a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos
10a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
10a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i sti dang po dag la dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'dug par gyur to// 
10a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar smad du byung ba de dang / me tog gi char dang / spos kyi char dang / phye ma'i char de dag dang / sil
10a6(dkon brtsegs): snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur
10a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mthong / 'khor phal po che'i lha dang // klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
10a8(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyan mde dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'odasu/ 
10b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
10b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal// mi yi dam pa stobs bcu yon+tan brgya dag nges bsags pa// bsam
10b3(dkon brtsegs): yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po// sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad// bde gshegs
10b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis// bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stob das dang ldan pa// yon+tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the
10b5(dkon brtsegs): tsetsam gsal du gsol// sems can sdug bsngal gzi gas nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang // skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis bsnyes// sras
10b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sras mo btsun mo'i rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang // sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tshom gsal du gsol// khyod kyis sngon chad phyibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung
10b7(dkon brtsegs): srul/ gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang // thub pas zhal zas gtsang nan de bzhin phro brang dkor yang srul// sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs
10b8(dkon brtsegs): khyed la na// stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten cing thugs la legs dgongs pas// rdul bral sku lus btubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa mi mnga' zhing // gsungs shes
11a1(dkon brtsegs): nus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi// yon+tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu bar 'tshal// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab bkrugs
11a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs shing kun dkrigs la// bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgya dag srid pa 'dir srung ba// dpa' lam rab/ 
11a3(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'// spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyes/ 
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang sems can rnam par bshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtse na// shin tu dri ma ma mchis bsam bsgom bdag gi the tsam khum// khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa
11a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab snying rje/ byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten// khyod kyis yonan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin
11a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ rdul bral khyod kyi sku lus dum bu dus bur bcad cing ni// srang la bcal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag grol ma lus
11a7(dkon brtsegs): bar sku kun ril gyis btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcig ma btang / rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tsom gcad du gsol// lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo
11a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yos zhing dgung ni rdeb gyur la// lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cig/ mkha' la gnas shing rgyu'i dgung zla dogs lhung gyur kyang // rgyal ba grags pa
11b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung // de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshig su gcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
11b2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags// 
11b3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig byas thong shig/ 
11b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la/ 
11b5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs shing bslad par 'gyur ro// gsol pabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo ma bo sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du
11b6(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung de'i phyir leg
11b7(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom
11b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
12a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis snang bar byas nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
12a2(dkon brtsegs): dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskul te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag
12a3(dkon brtsegs): gis da bzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ nga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la ta la srid tsam na pad+ma dag la 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
12a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag
12a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char// 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la sil snyan 'bum phrag ma/ po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/ btso
12a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mthus/ me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char
12a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na
12a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so// 
12b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying chen po gang dang byams pa chen po gang dang phan par 'dod pa gang dang / spyod pa/ 
12b2(dkon brtsegs): gang la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grub dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang la gnas pa des
12b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' gang la spyod pa'i bsam pa de la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes
12b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta/ dpar mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzig
12b5(dkon brtsegs): pa kho nar zad do// 'od srung rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
12b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang re shig mi mthong na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de skad ces bka' stsol ba dang / bcom ldan
12b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang / spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na/ 
12b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' tshes bcu dang
13a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'ju/ 
13a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba dang / snying rje chen po yong su rdzogs pa'i byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
13a3(dkon brtsegs): la lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yongasu tshol ba dang / lus dang srog kyang yongs su
13a4(dkon brtsegs): gtong na dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te// bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang / tshegs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing / tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin
13a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ga tu med pa yongasu rdzogs par byed cing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag
13a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bkod nas/ phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang byang chub
13a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ro// de skad
13a8(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa
13b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang ma bskyed pa'i legs par gsung ba gsung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom
13b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de/ 
13b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te/ ting 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na
13b4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med dro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces
13b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub/ sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i// slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa deg kyis/ 
13b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar bka' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'od srung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'od kyi bar du khyod re shig sdod cig dang
13b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de lta mod kyi khyod nyid tingange 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis
13b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas par rtogs shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de
14a1(dkon brtsegs): dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs
14a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang 'gro ba yang ma shes de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes / ci byed pa dang / ci sten pa dag kyang thams cad kyi
14a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du ma shes ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par
14a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so// bde bar ga gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lag so// bcom ldan 'das
14a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na thob par de ltar zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de/ lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams
14a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
14a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal bar bgyid pa de ni/ go cha legs par
14a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chol ba lags pas ting 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang yongasu btang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'di ni nyan thos pa
14b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes/ 
14b2(dkon brtsegs): rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ci lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan sha ri'i bu byang chub sems
14b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma yang shes par mi nus so// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di
14b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag blta bar bya'o snyam// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang
14b5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting 'dzin bzhi khri la snyom/ nyes par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi 'ong ba/  dang / 'gro ba yang ma shes/ 'greng ba yang ma mthong
14b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chag pa yang ma mthong // 'dug pa yang ma mthong nyal ba ye nga ma mthong ste de dag blta bar ma nuso// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
14b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan te/ bdag zhi
14b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting 'dzin rnams thob pa lag pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdags te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i skabs gcig tu gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
15a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur la/ der mi la la zhig skyes nas des ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te/ bdag ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma
15a2(dkon brtsegs): thag tu mdun du mchis nas/ su ga las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis
15a3(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnams thob pa la re shig bskal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gis rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du ya
15a4(dkon brtsegs): grags par mi 'gyur na/ des ting 'dzin de las slongs dpalta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis la/ gas na/ bcom ldan das na nyon mongs pa ma mchis par
15a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing ye shes de lta dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs
15a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ de dag gi gnas kyang ma 'tshal lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes de lta bu tshol ba na/ sems can re re'i slad du bskal
15a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg par gyur kyang spo bar bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yod
15a8(dkon brtsegs): su btang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni/ bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod
15b1(dkon brtsegs): cing / de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongasu spong bar mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag
15b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshigs de skad smras pa leg so leg so// rab 'byor gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur du zin na/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ 
15b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sbed byed du 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'a
15b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi semadas can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pra bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde ba
15b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mang lagaso// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nan gyis dper byas te/ gal te/ sen de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang / shA ri'i
15b6(dkon brtsegs): bu dang 'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba de'i lta bu'i shes pa ma bar gyur la/ rab 'byor nyan thos chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir/ bskal pa bye ba
15b7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang
15b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu rna
16a1(dkon brtsegs): las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas 'di nyid na 'dug pa'i
16a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyis/ bdag gis lho 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal
16a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas pad+ma shing rta'i 'bang lo tsam 'dab ma ni gser/ sdong bu ni dngul/ snying po ni rin po
16a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyi snying po/ ze ba ni bai dUR+Ya las byas pa/ bye ba khrag khrog 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul cing / pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta
16a5(dkon brtsegs): bu rnga skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpal dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa// gzi brjid dang ldan pa// 'od gsal ba dag pa'i pad+ma'i snying
16a6(dkon brtsegs): po dag gi dbus na dkyil mo dkrung gis 'dug pa'i lus gzugs dag kyang mngon par sprul to// de nas pad+ma de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'jab
16a7(dkon brtsegs): bral dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen
16a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang
16b1(dkon brtsegs): mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang / de bzhin du snong gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i nyi'i ther
16b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bum nas 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bgyi 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams cad du 'dong zhing sgra sgrogs par byed/ dbyangs brjod par byed/ 
16b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bskul bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ga rgyas de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe/ tshig su gcad pa 'ad dag smras so// 
16b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams// 'jig rten du ni lan dga' 'byung // u dum pa ra'i me tog ltar// sangs rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ de ni
16b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dir byung ste// sdug bsngal thams cad zad bye/ da pa'i// chos ni yang dag de ston mdzad// lha yi'/ dod pa yid dga' la// ji srid yun rings spyad byas la// 
16b6(dkon brtsegs): gang du tshor ba myed gyur pa'i// ngan song rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur// ji srid 'dod pa rnams bsten pa// sred pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel// khams gsum 'khor ba'i srog chags la// 
16b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang // khom pa dam pa snyed nas ni// gang dag bdag med mi rtogs pa// de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas
16b8(dkon brtsegs): blta ba'i phyir deng la// chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'das 'og tu// phyi dus 'gyod par ma byed cig/ mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing // 'jig chen 'dung
17a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhags pa yi// bag med spyod par byed rnams la// thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur// da ni 'di skad smra bar bya// bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang / 
17a2(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos// gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi skyab
17a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan med/ dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin// skyebs pa shAkya seng gi yis// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye bar spyad mdzad nas// ye shes dam pa brnyes
17a4(dkon brtsegs): nas ni// gang la sems can mi dmigs shing // srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i// chos mchog zhi zab mo dang // mthong bar dka' ba rab tu ston// rtag
17a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni de bzhin du// chad pa'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing / mtshan ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos// srog chag/ sa rnams la ston par mdzad// gang la 'jig rten mi gnas
17a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i/ stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa byed pa ma yin pa'i// yang dag mtha' ni rab tu ston// rtags med mtshan ma yod min zhing // skye med 'byung ba med pa dang // 'ong ba med
17a7(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gro med pa'i// chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad// zag med 'byung ba yod min zhing // rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med dang // bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa// ston dang rlom pa'i sems mi
17a8(dkon brtsegs): mnga' sems can gang yang skye med cing // 'ga' yang 'chi ba yod ma yin// mya ngan las 'das pa'ang gang yang med/ sems can 'byung ba'ang yed ma yin// skad kyis chos rnams bstan
17b1(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang // skad la brten pa yod min zhing // yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i chos// mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad// gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing // chu dang me yang mi dmigs la// sar yang rtog pa med
17b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos// spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni// stong zhing phung po lnga po dag/ dngos po med pa stong par mdzad// mig dang rna ba
17b3(dkon brtsegs): sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang // stong po de yang dmigasu med// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba// de dag rnam par rtog/ 
17b4(dkon brtsegs): pas bskyed// rtog pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin// de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni// srog chags rnams la chos ston gyis// gang drag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa// de dag rnam 'dren du gshegs/ 
17b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum/ gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigasu pa cad po de dag gis chos bstan pas// 'dod pa ni spyod pa dang / 
17b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam pa ga ge/ lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes
17b7(dkon brtsegs): thob po// lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyi 'bumo ni byang chub tu sems skyeso// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
17b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag gis/ lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag las lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skad
18a1(dkon brtsegs): / cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
18a2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa gral der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'kho
18a3(dkon brtsegs): de/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu tA dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mnad ra ba dang / man dra ba chen po dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dag gis de bzhin gra she gros pA la mngon par
18a4(dkon brtsegs): gtor to// steng gi bar snang la yang lha'i glud dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to// de'i tshe yang glingade chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
18a5(dkon brtsegs): gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam
18a6(dkon brtsegs): yang med pa de snyed kyi lha'i bu dag 'das par gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to// de nas
18a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang / lha'i bu dri med dang / lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lnga bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang
18a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'jam dopal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der dong
18b1(dkon brtsegs): ste lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ me tog man da ra ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab po// me tog ma nad
18b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i char de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa'i gan su me tog gi phung po 'phang du dngago tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
18b3(dkon brtsegs): pas byin gyis brlabs/ ci lta bu byin gyis brlabs na/ 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis bye rlabs byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
18b4(dkon brtsegs): khamos 'di'i steng gi bar snang la me tog gis dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to// me tog gi 'od des stong ga sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
18b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di khyab par gyur to// de nis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste smon lam las byung ba'i stan la 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu blo gros
18b6(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis
18b7(dkon brtsegs): la gtugs so// // bam po gnyis pa// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar bdag su dang lhan cig/ 
18b8(dkon brtsegs): tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang / shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang / gnas pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spos pa med pa'i
19a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi rnams dang / brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / brtan du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang / bden
19a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / mi phyed pa'i gzhi rnams dang / stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshan ma med
19a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzhi rnams dang / smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams
19a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / dor ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi gzhi
19a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhi rnams dang / ya shes yongasu rdzogs pa 'thob pa'i gzhi rnams dang / khams ga/ sum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos
19a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi dmigs pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang / seng ge'i gzhi rnams dang / dpa'i'i gzhi rnams dang / gzhi med pa'i gzhi
19a7(dkon brtsegs): dag bstan pa na snod du gyur pa ni su yod snyam mo// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par
19a8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ zab mo lo bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo// 
19b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das
19b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 
19b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jom dpal gal te khyod gsung bar mi mdzad/ brjod par mi mdzad/ 'don par yang mi mdzad/ yi ge yang mi brjod// sgra yang mi gsan pa lta na/ bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o// 'jam
19b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod nyan par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi bye/ dad / sems par mi byed/ rig par mi byed/ rnam par
19b5(dkon brtsegs): rig par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ gtong bar mi byed cing thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lta na/ kho bos kyang de bzhin du bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
19b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste/ gang gis ming brjod cing / ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
19b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal lha'i bu 'di dag ni khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyis/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag chos kyi bka' mchid gsungs shig/ 'jam dpal gyis
19b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo na nyin par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/ 'dzin par 'dod po rnams la yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur
20a1(dkon brtsegs): la sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang la ngang 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod/ 
20a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o// bdag ni nyan pa'o// 'di ni bshad par bya'o snyam du sems pas/ de ni chags pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu
20a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / sems can du dmigs pa dang / chos su dmigs pa'o// lha'i bu gong la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yong su dag pas chos ston par
20a4(dkon brtsegs): byed de// rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi da byed/ rlom sems mi byedo// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa med cing rnam
20a5(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par mi byed// rlom sems mi byed// sem/ so par mi byed pa dang / chos smra bar dmigs pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed rlom semasu mi byed sems
20a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa dang / chos su dmigaso pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed rlom sems mi byed sems par mi byed pa ste/ lha'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam por nyan pa
20a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci nas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad du bstan pa bshad pa legaso legaso// 'jam
20a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu ci rung rnam par ma rtog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ 
20b1(dkon brtsegs): do/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags las ldog go// zhe sdang las ldog go// gti mug las ldog go// sred pa las ldog
20b2(dkon brtsegs): go/ ma rig pa las ldog go// 'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bar las ldog go// rgyu las ldog go// lta ba las ldog go// ming las ldeg go// gzugs las ldog go/ 
20b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams las ldog go// gzugs kyi khams las ldog go// gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go// nyan thos kyi spyod pa las ldog go// rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las ldog/ 
20b4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa las ldog go// 'dzin pa las ldog go// dmatshan ma las ldog go// dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go// chad paralha las ldog go// rtag par lta ba las ldog go/ 
20b5(dkon brtsegs): blang ba las ldog go// dor ba las ldog go// bdag tu'adu shes pa las ldog go// sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go// srog tu 'du shes pa las ldog go// gang zag tu 'du shes
20b6(dkon brtsegs): pa las ldog go// yid la byed pa dag las ldog go// tshogs pa dag las ldog go// phyin ci log dag las ldog go/ 'jig tshogs las ldog go// 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ldeg/ 
20b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go// sgrib pa dag las ldog go// phung po lngar 'dzin pa las ldog go// phyi dang nang gi skye mched thams cad
20b8(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go// khams rnams las ldog go// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa las ldog go// chos su 'du shes pa las ldog go// dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las ldog go// bdag sangs rgyas
21a1(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur ro// bdag chos ston par 'gyur ro// bdag sems can grol bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro// bdag ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// snyam pa'i
21a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes de dag las ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed do// dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi
21a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog
21a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed cing rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/ lha'i bu de/ da ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las
21a5(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog go// stong pa nyid las mi ldog go/ mtshan ma med pa las mi ldog go// smon pa med pa las mi
21a6(dkon brtsegs): ldog go// de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go// chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go// yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go// mnyab nyid las mi ldog go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ces byang chub sems
21a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa des na ldog pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pa de/ ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on
21a8(dkon brtsegs): te ma mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa yang ma lags ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa zhig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag las ldo
21b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na gang
21b2(dkon brtsegs): las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / legs pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed/ yongs su
21b3(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes byas te/ de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/ med par yang bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa dang med pa lnga
21b4(dkon brtsegs): ldog par gyur na/ de ni skyon du gyur pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na rtag par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog par gyur na chad par 'gyur
21b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa dang chad pa'i/ phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtag pa'i phyir yang
21b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o// zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs su shes par zad kyi/ de la na chad pa yang med
21b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa yang med de/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blogs rab
21b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhub dang nu drug bgyi ba'i
22a1(dkon brtsegs): slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bas
22a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs zin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
22a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de mi gda'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
22a4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du de skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bas/ blangs zin te/ de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so zhes ga/ sung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam
22a5(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ kho bo'i mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal na mkha'i khams lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
22a6(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir na mkha' ji lta bu yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lta bu yin pas/ nam mkha' dang
22a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod na/ mtha' 'di khong du chud par bya zhing cung zad kyang rnam par
22a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag par mi bya'o// de na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi pa cha mnyam pa/ shin tu 'byes pa/ mdzes pa so+o/ blta na sdug pa sum khri/ 
22b1(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsam shing las byung bas gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing / khri stan re re la yang byang chub sem/ 
22b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ ci lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i
22b3(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs pas// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par spyod pi pad+ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong
22b4(dkon brtsegs): ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar
22b5(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// dai nas pad+ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' smra/ la ba gang dag yin pa de dag dang khang pa brtsegs pa dag na
22b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs mthun par tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gang ga'i bye snyed bsam gyis
22b7(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'o// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa btsal mdzad pas// de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags// thub pa mtshan gyis yongasu smras
22b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// sku mchog srid pa gsum na lhang nge ste// 'dren pa gang la ming dang srog dang no// gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston// rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod dang
23a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten// khyod kyis shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'// ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis
23a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i// 'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dun 'gyur zhing // stong pa nyid la mos par bgyid pa yi// mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur// gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang // gang dag
23a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag/ de dag gis ni mtshan med stong pa'i chos// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu sgoms// 'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni// skye dang 'chi ba dmigs
23a4(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis shing // 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te// chos rnams thams cad na mkha' ji bzhin no// ci ltar mi da yis sgyu ma bstan gyur pa// snang yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis
23a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar// de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang // rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan// gang zag la las gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin
23a6(dkon brtsegs): byas dang // 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa// bzod pa de ni sprin las khyad par 'phags// byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpo' yis// skal pa bya ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// me tog/ 
23a7(dkon brtsegs): spros dang de bzhin zas skom dag/ phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bso// gang gis gang la ming dang srog dang ni// gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag/ thos nas de la 'od gsal bzod
23a8(dkon brtsegs): thob pa// de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags// gang la ming dang gang zag 'du shes mchis// skal ba bye ba mang por zas skom dang // shing rta pung chung khri stan sbyin bgyid kyang // des ni 'gro ba
23b1(dkon brtsegs): grol bar mi thob bo// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang // de dag gis kyang sems can ma bkrol ba// mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi// chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam
23b2(dkon brtsegs): par grol// sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang // de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob pa dka'// mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par bka' bas na// rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis/ 
23b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing // khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob 'gyur la// bde gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rnal 'byor spyod// sgral
23b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chel zhing 'dug par ma byed par// chos thos gyur nas rtswa dag tu nan tan gyis// khyed kyis rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas bsten la// des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos// 
23b5(dkon brtsegs): chos smra'i dge ba shes gang yin bsten gyis la// sdig pa'i grogs la lan dga' 'ang ma bsten cig/ sems can kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la// sems can de la nam yang
23b6(dkon brtsegs): ma rlom shig/ tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyis la// rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod// g.yel ba med par shing drung bsten gyis la// bskus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig/ 
23b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min// mtshan nyid cig cing smig rgyu dra ba yi// dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes gyis la// myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par bgyis// phung po lnga rnams sgyu
23b8(dkon brtsegs): ma bzhin du ltos// nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi yi drug/ de dag grong stong 'dri bar gsungs pas na// de la nam yang bsten par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid// gti mug pa
24a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed// rtog pa de yang ma byung 'byung med par// de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnam su 'gyur// de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigasu bcad pa de dag smras pa na/ 
24a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong sum
24a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge snyen bdun stong dang / 
24a4(dkon brtsegs): dge snyen ma stong dang / lha'i bu nyi khri bdun stong bang chos rnams/ ngal chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
24a5(dkon brtsegs): thob po// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 
24a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
24a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyis khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs pad+ma dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa
24a8(dkon brtsegs): dang 'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags// de skad ces gsol pa
24b1(dkon brtsegs): dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu snang ngo // 
24b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bsgrub pa/ 
24b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu zhing zhu blag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe
24b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'di na mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
24b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod re shig sdod cig dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de/ de'u re bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / bdud kyi gan sa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 
24b6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
24b7(dkon brtsegs): par bzhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong / 
24b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mog mog por gyur to// bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khog par gyur nas
25a1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa 'khar ba la brten cing 'gro bar gyur to// de dag gi lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gdugasal 'khogs par gyur pa dang / rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang rnyings shing / 
25a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jig la mun pa mun nag tu gyur par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing bsngangs la yi chad cing sgyid lug ste/ spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas 'di snyam du rnam par
25a3(dkon brtsegs): rtog ste/ gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin/ bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhing med pa 'am/ gcig
25a4(dkon brtsegs): tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo// bdud de dag gis rnam par rtog da pa de lta bu de skyes ma thag tu de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/ bdud
25a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mdun du bkod do// de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa/ 
25a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba de da ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/ khyed la 'che ba gang
25a7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis ma skrag shig lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis sgra de yang thos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming
25a8(dkon brtsegs): yang thos nas yang rgya cher bsdangs shing skrag ste/ bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag
25b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu skyobs shig/ grog po dag yongasu skyobs shig/ de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// glog po dgu ma 'jigs shig/ khyed cag deng la bcom
25b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par
25b3(dkon brtsegs): grus rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad do// de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshogs de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'khor bdud sdig can 'bum
25b4(dkon brtsegs): brag ther 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing / gtugs la 'khogs shing lag pa 'khar ba la brten de bzhin du 'dong zhing skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ bcom
25b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lha gas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgra skad
25b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di dag las yongasu bskyab tu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag bskyab du gsol// bcom ldan
25b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis mtshan yongasu bsgrags pa ni mi mngon lags kyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de lta ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam
25b8(dkon brtsegs): dngal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos na bdag cag 'jigs shing sngangs la skrag par gyur te/ 'chi 'pho ba snyam du 'tshal cing ma mchis par 'gyur ba snyam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan
26a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdud sdig can dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ 
26a2(dkon brtsegs): bas yongasu smin pa dang / rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don bas pa dang / byed du 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don ma mdzad mi mdzad pas
26a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming yongs su bsgrags de ltar/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongasu bsgrags pas ni khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par
26a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdi/ dag can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ang sa bdag cag 'di lta bu'i lus 'khogs pa 'dis nyam thag
26a5(dkon brtsegs): cing ngo tsha lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag cag/ gis kha dog rgyas par gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tsha/ la lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 
26a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma 'ongs kyi bar du re shig 'di nyid du sdod cig dang / des khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal
26a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzin de las langs te stan las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang / klu dang / 
26a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phyechen po 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan 'bum phrag ming po dag rab tu gsil zhing / me tog ud pa la dang / 
26b1(dkon brtsegs): dadrA dang / ku mu d+ha dang / bad+ma dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'debs pa shastag gis yong su bskor cing bdun du bad te/ bkod pa chen po dang / rnam par rjeb chen pos bcom ldan 'das gal bde so / 
26b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
26b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam/ 'jam
26b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyoms par 'jugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa
26b5(dkon brtsegs): gang las thos/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ni ji srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa
26b6(dkon brtsegs): de thos shing / bdag gis ting 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i che na/ btsam ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed par yang ma gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
26b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gang las ting 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus skal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
26b8(dkon brtsegs): yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab bgrangs ma mchis pa'i sang ches grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa de'i ci de'i dus de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mardza ra pa'i dri zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
27a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/ de ting 'dzin bsgrubs pa de gsung bar gyu/ 
27a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las bdag gis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
27a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal bsgrubs pa de dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i
27a4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de thob ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags rnam par 'jigs cing 'dod chags kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / 
27a5(dkon brtsegs): sdasngang rnam par 'jig cing zhe sdang gi sems rnam par 'jig pa/ bgyid pa dang / gti mug rnam par 'jig cing gti mug/ gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / phrag dog rnam
27a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig cing phrag dog gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal rnam par 'jig cing nga rgyal gyi sems rnam par jig par bgyid pa dang / 'chab pa rnam par 'jig cing 'chab
27a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / khro bo rnam par 'jig cing khro bo'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / yongasu gdung ba rnam par 'jig cing yongasu gdung ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par
27a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / 'du shes rnam par 'jig cing 'du shes kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / lta ba rnam par 'jig cing lta ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / rtog pa rnam par 'jig ci
27b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / len pa rnam par 'jig cing len pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa rnam par 'jig cing 'dzin pa'i sems rnam par 'jig pa
27b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par 'jig cing mtshan ma'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / srid pa rnam par 'jig cing srid pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / rtag pa rnam par
27b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig cing rtag pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / chad pa rnam par 'jig cing chad pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / phung po rnam par 'jig cing phung po'i sems rnam pa
27b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par bgyid pa dang / khams rnam par 'jig cing khams kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang / skye mched/ dam par 'jig cing skye mched kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyod pa
27b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams gsum pa rnam par 'jig cing khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ste// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu po de dag
27b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de thob ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa
27b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yo ma mchis pa dang / zab pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob bo// bcom ldan
27b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ slu ba ma mchis pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis dam 'cha' ba dang / 'du shes kyi dbang gi spyod yul
28a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ti 'dzin de thob bo// bcom ldan 'das
28a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la brten pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba dang / sbyangs pa dang tshul khrims
28a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'du 'dzi ma mchis par spyod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang / 
28a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob ste/ 8/ gzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims ma ral pa dang / tshul khrims mi bsten pa dang / tshul
28a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims nag nog ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chu ba sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
