52b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'on ci khyod tshangs par mi spyod lags sam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshangs par mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo ni tshang
52b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin la spyod pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir kho bo tshangs par mi spyod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni 'di lta ste thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pas bstan pa lags te/ 
52b4(dkon brtsegs): leg so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bdagal te kho bo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par gyur na ni de ltar na thogs par yang 'gyur ro// de ci'i
52b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ ci tsam du bdag gi yod pa dang / ji tsam du ba ngag gi mngon par zhen pa yod pa de tsam du thogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 
52b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bre gas rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smos so// lha'i bu gal te khyod sems can thams cad srog dang bral bar byed cing mtshon cha yang thogs par mi byed/ ral gri ma yin/ 
52b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin/ dbyug pa yang thog par mi byed pa de ltar na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal
52b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can sems can zhes bya ba ni yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can sems can zhes bgyi ba ni 'di lta ste ming tsam dang / 'dzin pa'i 'du
53a1(dkon brtsegs): shes tsam lagaso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de lta bas na bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// sems can du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsang par/ 
53a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// srog tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// ming du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
53a3(dkon brtsegs): ces dgum par bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyi mtshon gyi gsad par bya ste/ shes rab kyi mtshon des kyang / ci nas kyang 'dzin pa med pa dang / gcod pa med pa de ltar gzung bar bya/ 
53a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing / de ltar gsad par bya'o// lha'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar gang gis bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes gsad pa des/ sems cad thams
53a5(dkon brtsegs): cad gsad pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod mi dge ba bcu'i la
53a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te 'jug cing / nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de lta na/ kho bo
53a7(dkon brtsegs): dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nag po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa nyid gang
53a8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa des/ de mnyam par nyid yin pas/ mnyam pa nyid du 'jug par de ltan khobo khyed dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod do// lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nag po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa
53b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid gang yin snyam lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bya ba ma mchis pa dang / lhag par bya ba mi bgyid pa lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs shes bya ba gang yin snyam/ 
53b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos
53b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyis sgrib par nus sam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas/ de skad ces gal te khyod nag po'i
53b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de lta na ba'i dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod nga nis ston to// 'jam dpa
53b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod gsang pa dang phra phyir byung ba de'i mgo la mo tshon gyis 'debs par byed pa de sa
53b6(dkon brtsegs): na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs// de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gsad pa gsad pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ 
53b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'dod chags ni gsad pa zhes bya'o// zhe sdang dang / gti mug ni gsad pa zhes bya'o// nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / 'chab pa dang / phrag dog dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / ser sna dang / 
53b8(dkon brtsegs): lhag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma dang / nye bar len pa dang / 'du shes dang / tsher ba ni gsad pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de dag ni gsad pa yin par gsungs so// lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod
54a1(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed de/ zhi bar byed/ rab tu zhi par byed pa de la ni stong par snang bas mi sdug pa la 'jug par mi byed par sems 'di dag la skyes/ gang du
54a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ yul gang la chags par 'gyur/ gang gis chags par 'gyur zhes 'dod chags kyi sems de nyid kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la so sar rtog par byed de/ de de ltar sa sor rtog par byed pa na/ 
54a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyang mi dmigs/ gang la chags par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis chags par 'gyur ba de yang mi dmigs so// gang gi tshe mi dmigs pa de'i tshe ma len to// gang gi tshe ma
54a4(dkon brtsegs): len pa de'i tshe mi 'dor ro// gang gi tshe mi 'dor ba de'i tshe mi 'dzin mi spang ste de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / khro bo dang
54a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa dang / phrag dog dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / ser sna dang / lhag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma dang / nye bar len pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i sems
54a6(dkon brtsegs): la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ lha'i bu gang gsad pa de lta bu skyes ma thag tu gsod par byed pa de ni gsad pa dang po phyir byung ba de'i mgo la mtshon gyis 'debs pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir kho bo ni de las
54a7(dkon brtsegs): bsams nas de skad ces ston to// 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed
54a8(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyes par mi byed/ dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyed dang 'tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las dgongs te de skad ston// 
54b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings lagaso// 'jam dpal gyi/ 
54b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyes par byar nus snyam mam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lag so// 'jam dpal gyis
54b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dong do zhes ston to// lha'i bu chos chos shes
54b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos shes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos nyid lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
54b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos nyid mnyes par byar nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal
54b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces/ gal te khyod chos mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// zhes ston to// lha'i bu
54b7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni 'dus ma bgyis gyis rab tu phye ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das
54b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'dus ma bgyis lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dus ma byas mnyes par nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa
55a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces gal te khyod dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na/ 
55a2(dkon brtsegs): kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to// lha'i gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas su dmigs pa de ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed do// gang chos su dmigs pa de ni chos
55a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byed do// gang dge 'dun du dmigs pa de ni dge 'dun mnyes par byed do// lha'i bu gang sangs rgya su mi dmigs pa dang / chos su mi dmigs pa dang / dge 'dun du mi
55a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa des ni sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byasades ni chos mnyes par ma byas/ des ni dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa kho na yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
55a5(dkon brtsegs): des de dag ma dmigs pas na/ des mnyes par ma byas pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang dag sangs rgyas la chags pa dang / chos la chags pa dang / dge 'dun la
55a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par byas/ chos mnyes par byas/ dge 'dun mnyes par byas pa yin no// gang dag gis sangs rgyas ma dmigs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas la chags
55a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// gang dag gis chos ma dmigs pa de dag ni chos la chags pa med pas de dag gis chos mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// / 
55a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis dge 'dun ma dmigs pa de dag ni dge 'dun la chags pa med pas de dag gis dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// lha'i bu mnyes par ma byas pa mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ba de ni
55b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas yin no// de ni kun tu sbyar ba dang bral ba'i gnas yin no// don rnam par bshig pa'i gnas yin no// de ni sems dang bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni mabyung bar
55b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin/ de ni rnam par nges pa'i gnas yin/ de ni yid byung bar ma byas pa'i gnas yin pas de'i phyir mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas de
55b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces/ gal te khyod sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas
55b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// / 'jam dpal 'di ltar ji tsam du zab mo'i gnas dag ston par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag gis khyod la
55b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa bzo bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod byas pa bzo bar ma byed cig/ lha'i bus smra sa pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci bgyis pa mi bzo bar bgyi'am/ 
55b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu khyod byas pa mi bzo bar byos la byas pa bzo bar ma byed cig/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod bgyis pa mi bzo lags sam/ 
55b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni byas pa mi bzo ba yin gyis byas pa bzo ba ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston
55b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byis pa rnams ni rnam pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag byed pas na/ byis pa rnams ni gzhan dang gzhan dag gis byed pa po ste/ gang gi phyir lta ba'i rnam pa gzhan
56a1(dkon brtsegs): // dang gzhan dag byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa bzo ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bu yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dag ni bya ba'am mi bya ba gang yang mi byed de/ gang gi tshe mi byed pa de'i phyi
56a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni byas pa mi bzo ba zhes bya'o// ji skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ lhag par byed pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid
56a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyang mnga' la gzhan len par yang mi byed/ bya ba gzhan yang mi byed pas mnyam pa nyid yin no zhes gsungs pas na/ de'i phyir byas pa mi bzo ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
56a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod bzod pa 'am/ 'on te chos nyid dam/ gang la gnas te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lho'i bu bzod pa la yang ma yin/ chos nyid la yang ma yin/ 
56a5(dkon brtsegs): no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na khyod gang las gnas te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gang la gnas pa la'o// lha'i bus
56a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gang la gnas// 'jam dbul gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus ni de bzhin nyid gang la gnas pa de la gnaso// lha'i bu gzhan
56a7(dkon brtsegs): yang de skad ces khyod bzed pa 'am/ 'on te chos nyid dam/ gang la gnas te de skad ston ces zer ba ni/ lha'i bu bzod pa zhes bya ba ni ming ste/ ming la ni gnas par mi nus so// chos
56a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rtog pa med pa ste/ de la yang gnas med do// lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad gang la gnas te ston par byed pa de bzhin nyid la zhugs
56b1(dkon brtsegs): te ston par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te ston la/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin
56b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su med pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
56b3(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi na/ ji tsam gyis na dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni/ 
56b4(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi chags/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi chags pa de ni dge sbyong
56b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes kho bo smra zhing / lha'i bu gang mig las mi 'ja garna ba las mi mdzas sna l+la mi mdzag lce las mi 'dzag/ lus la sa mi 'dzag/ yid las mi 'dzag pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes
56b6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo smra la/ lha'i bu gang la gnas med cing gnas par gdags pa med pa dang / kun du gan med cing kun du gnas par gdags pa med pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir dang / lha'i bu
56b7(dkon brtsegs): gang las kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro la/ rma med cing rma dang bral ba de ni bram ze yin no zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir ro// gang dag dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang brag/ 
56b8(dkon brtsegs): ze zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba'i tshig de bstan pa de ni de yin no// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa lnga zhig 'dus par gyur pa de dag
57a1(dkon brtsegs): da dung bzod pa thob pa ma yin pas gnas shing snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gnas shing rnam par ldang bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon pa gsad pa dang / 
57a2(dkon brtsegs): ma gsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsad pa'i sngon gyi gnas rje su dran cing / de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa de'i las kyi lhag ma yod pas/ de dag sems yongasu gdung ba des chos
57a3(dkon brtsegs): zab mo dag la mi bzod cing / bdag nyid la brten te rnam par rtog pa kho nar byed de/ de dag gis 'di lta ste chos la bzod pa ma thob pas kun nas ldang ba de rnam par gnon par mi nus// 
57a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jam dpal ga/ zhon nur gyur pa'i sems bsdu bar mdzad do// de nas
57a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas lag pa g.yas bas ral gri blangs te legs par bdar nas bcom ldan 'das
57a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logasu brgyugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal nga ni gsad zin cing leg par gsad zin gyis thong
57a7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal skyes bu gang zag gis gang gi tshe bsad do snyam pa'i sems bskyed par byed pa'i sems skyes pas/ yun ring po nas bsad pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang
57a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lnga dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can name/ srog gam/ gang zag gam/ shod las skyes sam/ 
57b1(dkon brtsegs): shed bu ni 'ga' yang med do// 'di la pha yang med/ ma yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ chos kyang med/ dge 'dun yang med do// 'di la gang mtshams med pa byed par 'gyur ba yang 'ga' yang / 
57b2(dkon brtsegs): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni mkhas pa mdzangs pa yid bzhungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa bsngags pa zab mo la bzod pa/ sangs rgyas bye
57b3(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byis pa/ chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ ci lta ba bzhin du chos ston
57b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa lo gus pa dang bcas pa yin na// de mtshon rnon po thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der rgyug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa yang/ 
57b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces 'jam dpal nga ni bsad zin cing legs par ga/ sad zin gyis theng shig ces gsungs pa'i phyir te/ gal te 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba dang
57b6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / pha zhes bya ba dang / ma zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba'i chos ther zugs tu gnas pa 'ga' zhig yongasu 'grub par 'gyur na ni mtshams med par 'dzin pa de la nges
57b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba yang yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gis phyir chos de dag ni medo la/ log pa yang dag pa ma yin par bzung ba/ stong pa sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir/ 'di la gang byed par
57b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la byed par 'gyur ba'i byed pa 'ga' yang med do snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gis de ltar shes pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ 
58a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ mngon par 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dir/ 
58a2(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod do// chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste// yong su rtog pa kun nas bskyed// 'di la grub pa ma mchis te// chos 'di thams cad stong pa lags// bdag tu 'du shes rmongs pa// 
58a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams// log par yongasu rtog par bgyi// sngon gyi mthar ni mi zad pa'i// sug las bgyis pa de yang dran// tshe rabs snga ma rnams su ni// pha ma sbyin gnas bkum gyur cing // dge slong dgra
58a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom bkum pa yi// sug las shin tu mi bzad bgyis// sug las de yi rnam smin gyis// sdug bsngal tshe la rab myong gyur zhing // 'gyod pa skyes par gyur pa ni// chos thos
58a5(dkon brtsegs): bas na rnam dag 'gyur// grags chen zug rngu 'byin pa yi/ sa// bdag cag 'gyod pa bsal mdzad pas// gang la nyon mongs ma mchis pa'i// chos dbyings rjesu rtog
58a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa ste// thub pa thabs kyi mkhyen pa mnga'// thabs des sems can thams cad kyi// 'gyod pa dag ni rnam par bsal// chos rnams
58a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong pas na// 'di la sangs rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun mi dmigs 'di lta ni// pha ma ma mchis dgra bcom min// 'di la 'gum pa ma mchis te// 'gum pa 'ga'
58a8(dkon brtsegs): yang mchis ma lags// mnyam nyid ci bzhin 'byung ba ste// de ni chos rnams mtshan nyid lags// 'jam dbyangs shes rab chen po pa// chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis// mtshon cha
58b1(dkon brtsegs): rnon po thogs nas ni// sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs// sangs rgyas ci bzhin mtshon de bzhin// de dag gnyis ga mtshan nyid gcig/ mi skye 'byung ba ma mchis te// 'di la 'gun
58b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ga' ma mchis// mtshon thogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rnam pa drug tu rab ga yos shing / sa chen po g.yos pa
58b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi
58b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur ba dag gis nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis dadog sa chen po g.yos pa 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
58b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi ma jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgabacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
58b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba chos ston to// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ 
58b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dug pa des/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir shes rab kyi ral gri'i mtshan rnon po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
58b8(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de ga la ba de log su brgyugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te/ ci nas kyang sems can dngag tu med pa mig rnam par dag pa dang / 
59a1(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol ba dang / bzod pa skyes pa dang / byang chub la zhugs par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang 'khor de na/ 
59a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can las dang po pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnam par rtog pa mngo ba gang dga'akhod pa de dag gis mtshan de mi mthong zhing / chos bstan pa de yang mi thos pa de ltar byin gyis brlab so// de nas
59a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ston pa dkrongs pa'i phyir brtul ba'i las mi bzad pa mngon par 'das byas pa de khyod
59a4(dkon brtsegs): la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras dab/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de ba zhin te/ kho bas las mi bzad pa de lta bu ni byes no// de gang dun
59a5(dkon brtsegs): par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar mod kyi sgyu ma'i skyes bu las gang du/ ma par smin par 'gyur ba der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par
59a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ chos thams cad kyang me rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de
59a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa nyid la dris/ khyod ci ltar bzod pa de ltar ston cig/ btsun pa mtshon dmigasu yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
59a8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa las dmigasu yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rnam par smin pa dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
59b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshon yang med/ las kyang med/ rnam par smin pa yang med na/ 'o na las de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus
59b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi bsams pa des bstan pa ltar ni/ las de ni gang du yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad las med pa/ rnam par smin pa
59b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
59b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ci nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas dkyi zhing dag tu mchi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de da dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar thugs rtse bas spro bar
59b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad du gsol// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ sa byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smra/ so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag rje rang rang gi sangs
59b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gos phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu bltas so// bltas pa na phyogs bcu kun gyi rang
59b7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra bsnyen pa yang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug
59b8(dkon brtsegs): cing / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dri ba la ches ston pa dang / de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de snyed dang / lha'i bu 'dus pa de snyed kyang
60a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas kyang mi g.yol/ thams cad du yang de bzhin nye bar sten pa na/ 
60a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar to// ngo mtshar to snyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste
60a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyum shin tu bslabs de phyir stan las kyang mi g.yo la gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la legs
60a4(dkon brtsegs): par bslabs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la sa sa rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du de bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de skad du sprul pa dag sprul par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
60a5(dkon brtsegs): lha ste chos 'di sgyu ma lta bur rig pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nu ragyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam
60a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni lan
60a7(dkon brtsegs): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ 
60a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni 'dra ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
60b1(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin lags te/ de ni stong pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni smon pa ma mchis pa ci lta ba de
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni chos kyi dbyings ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de ltar
60b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba lags so// de ni mnyam pa nyid ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni rnam par grol ba ci lta de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni dben pa ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// / 
60b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nuragyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i
60b5(dkon brtsegs): dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod par 'gyur zhing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam du grags ra 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab
60b6(dkon brtsegs): tu gsol// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing / shing ljon pa
60b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs dag tu rgyas la lhags par 'gyur to// rdzing bu dag nas kyang pad+ma mang po rab tu 'thon par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
60b8(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// lha bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgul
61a1(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs te/ steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i char dag
61a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsal zhing lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag kyang bsgrags nas thams cad kyi thal mo sbya btud de/ kha mthun par tshigs 'di skad
61a3(dkon brtsegs): ces/ a la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/ no a la la chos/ 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba yang mthong ngo // sems can gang dag gis
61a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// 8/ gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par mi
61a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa za kha mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras so// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di
61a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snga ltas byung ba 'di dag byung ba las na/ 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
61a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir snga ltas byung ba 'di dag yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
61a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
61b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshogs des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod pa/ 
61b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma mchis pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa dang / srog ma mchis pa dang / gang zag
61b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mangs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bden dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos
61b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshigs gang gis 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / zhe sdang ma
61b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / gti mug ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ma mchis pa dang / lta ba ma mchis pa dang / srid pa ma
61b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / srid pa yongasasu 'tshal ba ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / lus su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / sems ma mchis pa dang / sems su gdags pa ma mchis pa
61b7(dkon brtsegs): dang dran pa ma mchis pa dang / dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis padang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag ma mchis pa dang / gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / nye bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa
61b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa dang / 'du byed ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / mig ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis par
62a1(dkon brtsegs): / rnab ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / snam mchis pa dang / dri ma mchis pa dang / lde ma mchis pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / reg byas
62a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / yid ma mchis pa dang / chos ma mchis pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs kyi khams ma mchis dang / gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams ma mchis
62a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / chad pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom
62a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du zhugs dab ma mchis pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / lan
62a5(dkon brtsegs): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa phyir mi 'ong ba mi mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / dag bcom pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma/ 
62a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis/ 
62a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / mi 'jig pa rnams ma mchis pa dang / ye shes ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma
62a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon sum du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 
62b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang / rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gram ma mchis pa dang / pha rol ma mchis pa dang / tshu rol ma mchis pa dang // 
62b2(dkon brtsegs): thar pa ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / ming du gdags pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshogs des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par
62b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar ma grol/ mi sbyor/ mi grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam
62b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
62b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang / ma bkrol/ yongasu mya ngan las ma bzlas/ de da/ ga gis sems can 'ga' yang ma brnyes/ ma shig/ chos
62b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang ma bskyed/ ma bkag/ rnam par ma bshig/ ma bskyod pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can
62b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang grol bar mi 'gyur/ yongasu mya ngan las zlog par mi 'gyur/ de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang brnyes par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ chos 'ga' bskyed par mi
62b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'gog par mi 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur/ bskyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
63a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ga' yang mi 'grol// yongs mya ngan las mi bzlo/ de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi brnyes/ mi 'jig/ chos 'ga' yang mi bskyed/ mi 'gog/ 
63a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi 'jig/ mi bskyod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshogs des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyad par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden/ 
63a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshigs gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la chung zad kyang ma smras ma brjod/ ma bshad ma stan/ ma brtags/ ma bsgrags/ ma bsnyad ma smos ma bzlas shing / chos bstan pa 'di la
63a4(dkon brtsegs): yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod la chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang ma mnyan/ 'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 2/ sha yang rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden na
63a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di la tshul
63a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims ma mchis pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nas ma mchis pa dang / shes rab ma mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi dpang
63a7(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshogs des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya
63a8(dkon brtsegs): tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa stsol bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims bsrung bar mi bgyid
63b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa bsgrubs par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus rlom par mi bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom par mi bgyid/ shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/ byang chub don du gnyer bar mi bgyid/ yang dag/ 
63b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/ byang chub thob par mi bgyid/ spobs rnams thob par mi bgyid/ mi 'jigs pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ dbang po rnams thob par mi bgyid/ so so yang dag par
63b3(dkon brtsegs): rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi bgyid/ sems can grol bar mi bgyid/ smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grang ri ma 'ongs pa'i
63b4(dkon brtsegs): dus lnga rgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par gyur cig/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom
63b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byims pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du de/ gas cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen
63b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di
63b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur na ma legs kyis thong shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
63b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la de ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grang
64a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa bzhis bstan te/ thams cad du yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas
64a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhus so// byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis rnam grangs 'di thos nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das
64a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis skal pa grangs med pa phrag 'bum 'das pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi yon+dan
64a4(dkon brtsegs): phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// tshe das kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can gang dga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
64a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes so// de'i nyis bsgyur ste/ kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob po// de'i nyis bsgyur snyed ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri
64a6(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / ji ltar
64a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
64a8(dkon brtsegs): rten yid rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lha'i bu blo gros rab
64b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+ha dang / prang nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas
64b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po bzhi she lo ko stong nyis brgya/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya se ha pa ri brid tsA nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
64b3(dkon brtsegs): seng ges zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
64b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga pa nu ra dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug sa te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs
64b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig go/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// rgya/ la ba gang zags mtshungs pa med// rgyal po ma skyes/ dgra yi bus// seng ge zhes ni grags pa cig/ tshong dpon bu
64b6(dkon brtsegs): mo lnga brgya yis// mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu// rgyal po'i khab nas de byung nas// rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po yis// gser las byas pa'i gdugs thogs te// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gan song
64b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lnga brgya po'i gdugs de dag/ tshang bar thub pa che la phul// kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs// rdzogs sas rgyas kyi mthu yis ni// de dag mi
64b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs skyes gyur nas// seng ges thal mo sbyar byas te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhus pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang // de ni 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// gang gis mdzes par
65a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lags// gang gis brdzus te skye bar 'gyur// skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa chen po lung bstan gsol// de dag lha bsam ye shes kyis// mkhyen nas
65a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas lung bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang shes// khyod kyis dris pa de bstan te// bzod pa yis ni mdzes par 'gyur// tshangs par spyad pas brdzus te skye// chos kyi sbyin
65a3(dkon brtsegs): pas skye ba dran// gzhon nu de ltar shes par bgyis// gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang // gser 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing // de mthong sems
65a4(dkon brtsegs): can dga' bar 'gyur// sbyin pa kun gyi mtshan du 'gyur// byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang // sems can kun la sems mnyam pas// rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/ 
65a5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur// gang gis ting 'dzin skye 'gyur lags// bzung ba'i tshogs tu gang gis 'gyur// / thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// chos la bzod pas
65a6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs rnams thob// sems bsgoms pas ni ting 'dzin skye// kyal pa'i tshig rnams spang byas na// gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// dran dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pas/ 
65a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar blo gros ldan// ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur ba lags// skyes bu dam pa mkhas cis 'gyur// g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur// don la sems pa blo gros ldan// gus dang
65a8(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur// chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa mkhas// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// las gang gis na skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du// 
65b1(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba zhu ba ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis chos kyi sbyin pa la// nam yang bar chad mi byed pa// de ni des na myur rab tu// 'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur// gang gis mi khom spong bar/ 
65b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gang gis bzang 'gror mchi 'gyur legs// skye ba kun tu skye ba na// bag mchis par ni ji ltar 'gyur// dad pas mi khom spong bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyis ni bza
65b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gror 'gro// stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na// rtag tu bag dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ji ltar las rnamadas par 'gyur// ji ltar bdud kyi snyis mi
65b4(dkon brtsegs): thogs// ji ltar chos kyis phongs 'gyur spong // rnam dpar grol bas las rnams ngag/ brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur// ci smras de bzhin byed pas ni// 
65b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis phongs pa spong bar 'gyur// ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang // tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams
65b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gang gis dga'// bden par smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs// ngag rtsub spangs sgra snyan 'gyur// kyal pa'i tshogs dang phra ma rnams// spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar
65b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe rings 'gyur ba lags// bro nang nyung bar ji ltar 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa gang gis na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur// gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur// mi 'tshe bas
65b8(dkon brtsegs): ni nang nyung 'gyur// mi mthun pa dag sdums byas na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur// don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags// gang gi longs spyod 'ams mi 'gyur// gang dang / 
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gang du skye ba der// dbang cher grags par ji ltar 'gyur// chags pa med pas don rnams 'grub// ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel// gang dang gang du skye ba dang / 
66a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog med pas dbang cher grags// ji ltar lha yi mig thob 'gyur// lha yi rna ba ji ltar thob// sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag/ 'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur// mar mo byin pas/ 
66a3(dkon brtsegs): mig thob 'gyur// rol mo'i sgra yi rna ba dag/ 'chi 'pho skye shes ye shes kyis// de bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur// 'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi// zag pa gang gis bas par 'gyur// / 
66a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs snga dran ci 'gyur lags// rdzu 'phrul ci yis thob pa dar 'gyur// gzhon pa byin pas rdzu 'phrul thob// / dran pa bsgoms pas rjesu dran// mtha' gnyis rab tu spang
66a5(dkon brtsegs): bya na/ zag pa zad par reg par 'gyur// gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs// tso nas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs // gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur// gang gis phyog
66a6(dkon brtsegs): bcur lha der gda'// smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing // bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// 'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas// phyogs bcur lhang nge snang bar 'gyur// chos
66a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni// chos gang gis ni 'thob par 'gyur// gang dang gang du skye ba der// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba 'thob// sems can thams cad thar bya'i phyir/ 
66a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub don du sems btud pa// de nas chos rnams bsdu ba'ang thob// des ni dga' ba'ong 'thob par 'gyur// bslab pa ci 'drar bslabs pa dang // sems ni ci 'drar bsgoms pa yis// 
66b1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i// ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad la// mnyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang // mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas
66b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar 'gyur// skye ba kun du byang chub sems// rmi lam na yang sems de ni// 'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe// smros ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur// grong dang
66b3(dkon brtsegs): grol khyer rnams su 'am// gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su// byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud// de na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar yang // ji lta stobs ni cha
66b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur dang // rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang // bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs 'gyur// 'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing // skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni// gang dang gang du
66b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bar yang // des na stobs ni cher 'gyur te// rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang // bdud rnams bye bas mi tshug so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de// 'jig rten
66b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon gyi mngon sum du// lung bstan pa 'di thos nas su// seng ge yid ni dga' bar 'gyur// song ge grogs dang lhan cig tu// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras te// spyod pa brtan pa 'di la ni// 
66b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag rjesu bslab par bgyi// de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de// stong gsum po yang g.yos gyur nas/ ma pham pas ni sangs rgyas la// ji zhig slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// thub chen lung
66b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan gsol zhes zhus// de skad zhu ba zhus pa dang // ma pham pa la sangs rgyas kyis// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// gang gis phyir ni 'dzum mdzad pa// ma pham nga las 'dir nyon cig/ sangs rgyas
67a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya bcu dang // gzhan yang khrag khrig phrag bcu la// byang chub don du 'dus nas ni// mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mchod// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog
67a2(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams// nga yis yongasu smin par byas// snang ba chen zhes bya ba yis// bskal pa chen por 'gyur te// de dag skal pa gcig de la// rnam par/ 
67a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren par 'gyur ba ste// ye shes rtog gi rgyal mtshan zhes// 'jig rten 'dren pa rnam su 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar// de dag gi yang de 'drar 'byung rgya byams pa nas ni bzung na su// 
67a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa sum brgya tshang bar ni// de yi bar du dus kun du// rtag tu sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur// 'di dag byang chub dathob pa yi// ming ni gang su thos pa rnams// de dag thams
67a5(dkon brtsegs): cad 'jig rten du// kun mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gru ra// gang zhig lung bstan 'di thos nas// mos pa bskyed par byed pa ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na/ 
67a6(dkon brtsegs): de dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med// gang gis skal pa drug stong du// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas// byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas// 
67a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug na// sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis// grangs dang char yang mi phod do// chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na ni// 'jig rten mgon pa// 
67a8(dkon brtsegs): mthu yis ni// lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs// stong gsum po yang g.yos par gyur// seng ge grogs dang bcas pa yis// mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas// nyin bdun par du mchod pas
67b1(dkon brtsegs): te bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin 'thob// zang mi shes kyi gzungs kyang 'thob// sems can rnams kyi don byed de// sangs rgyas chos la 'dzud par byed// chos kyi
67b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sems can bye ba phrag brgyad bcu byang chub mchog la zhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/ seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang
67b3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
67b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs stong phrag brgya pa las// 'phags pa seng ges zhus dpa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bdun pa dgas so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pod na shi la dang
67b5(dkon brtsegs): mu ne war ma dang / nu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bri sbyar cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcis ni sa gtan la phab pa'o// 
67b6(dkon brtsegs): sho lo ka drug cu pa'o// 6/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha ra ha s+yo pA ya kau sha l+ya dz+nyA nod ta ra bo d+hi satwa/ pa raM brid ts+tsha pa ri brte nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas
67b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
67b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
68a1(dkon brtsegs): slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri drug stong thad kyang mngon par shes pa mngon par dren
68a2(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ yon+tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
68a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma red kyi dus kyi tshe// nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas ring po ma lon par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas
68a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'bres pa/ 
68a5(dkon brtsegs): yong su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byung ba yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du
68a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ldang sa la gtsugs
68a7(dkon brtsegs): te bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas nub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
68a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig nu lags so// de skad ces
68b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs// 
68b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
68b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhwa' 'bral mkhas pakri thabs la
68b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thab sa la mkhas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
68b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi skye bo mang po la
68b6(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
68b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shre ba rjes yongasu bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
68b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yongasu dri bar se
69a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod leg so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
69a2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
69a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni zan kham cig tsam yang sems
69a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la sbyin par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / da' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gis tshe dud 'gro'i skye
69a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas su gyur pa la zan kham cig tsam sbyin par byed nam de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa sems kyis sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
69a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasasu rdzogs par bya bar yong su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// de rgyu gnyis kyis ni sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ gnyis gang
69a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa
69a8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan gyis dge bo'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa la rjesu yid rang por byed cing
69b1(dkon brtsegs): rjesu yi rang nas kyang sems can thams cad la yong su sngo zhing bta ste yongasu sngo bar byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i/ 
69b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed la// len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub
69b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu dag na me tog
69b4(dkon brtsegs): gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gir ma byas shing yongasu ma bzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag
69b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing yongasu bsdu/ sa nas// sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad la gtong bar
69b6(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ yongs su btang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bar byed do// phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang me tog phreng dang
69b7(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongasu bzung ba bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab pa'i ngad de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas
69b8(dkon brtsegs): pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed
70a1(dkon brtsegs): do 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang
70a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// 
70a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong
70a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba gang ji snyed pa dag la byang chub sems dang da'athabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te chags par byed
70a5(dkon brtsegs): cing / 'di ltar sems can de dag gi bsdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag
70a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang byed do// phyogs bcu kun gyi khams dag na/ sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag la byang chub sems
70a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thabs la mkhas pas de dag yang dag par bsdus te/ rje su yi rang bar byed cing rje su yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams
70a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob
70b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
70b2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di ltar so sor rtog pa
70b3(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par 'byung ba dang / tshul khrims gcig pa dang / tingange 'dzin gcig pa dang / shes rab gcig pa dang
70b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang / ye shes gci/ dag pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes sor sor rtag pa
70b5(dkon brtsegs): byed do// des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar she/ sa par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ 
70b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang // bla mar byas pa dang / ri mor byas pa dang / mchod pa bso pa
70b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bsnyon bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar
70b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongasu bzung nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
71a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe blo brtul bar gyur na yang de bag
71a2(dkon brtsegs): du gsod par mi byed cing / zhum par mi byed par/ de tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang mi 'jug par mi byed cing // de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ tshig
71a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa de ni/ gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yin no zhes sor sor rtogs par byed do// des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs
71a4(dkon brtsegs): gcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas/ zhum pa med dpa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/ rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang / grags pa 'dod pa me pas/ grong
71a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul la/ ra dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye mngo bo la tshogs bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcang ba de rgya cher
71a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par byed cing / 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pas byed de/ sems can gang su dag khri bdag / tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na
71a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lom 'debs par yang byed do// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa des sems can thams
71a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kun dga'o ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis spobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs
71b1(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgyal brgya lam na dbul por gyur na yang / des tha na
71b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi las kyang bya ste/ kha zas nal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do// phul nas kyang de 'di ltar
71b3(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen pos byin na sbyin pa yang rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na/ 'di ltar bdag gi sbyin par byed pa'i chos 'di
71b4(dkon brtsegs): ni chung mod kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis semadas kyis byin pas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
71b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa des kha zas nal ze gang tsam pode sbyin par byed cing // bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'di lta ste dper na
71b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji blta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur
71b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing lag na rin po che 'grub par gyur cig ces yongasu bsngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa des// byang chub kyi seMs dang 'bral ba'i
71b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ lag na rin po/ 
72a1(dkon brtsegs): / che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
72a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / na gyi meg pa dang rnas rgyas kyi pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur kyang de dag
72a3(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bar mi byed cing / gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/ bdag la de lta ma yin
72a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mthong na yang de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rtog par bye//  de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'// las nges par byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
72a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams yin la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams laso nges par 'byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnam sa yin no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing / de 'di ltar
72a6(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog par byed de/ 'di dag la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin tu mchog shin tu gtso bo yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin no// 'di dag ni bdag gi
72a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nor gyi phung po la yongs su spyod par byed pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/ 'di dag la phrag dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do// des
72a8(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsams pas sems bskyed pa des// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la bsnyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing
72b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun tu 'dzin par mdzad pa lta bu'i rjesu chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems
72b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol
72b3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni
72b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe slongs mo ba mthong ba na de thams cad mkhye ngan pa nyid la dmigs te/ sor sna'i sems tshar ga cod par byed cing gtong ba chen po yang spel bar byed la// sbyin
72b5(dkon brtsegs): no snyam pa'i sems kyang bskyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par
72b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed cing sbyin pa byin nas/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
72b7(dkon brtsegs): 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i sems
72b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / le lo med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// bza' ba dang // 
73a1(dkon brtsegs): bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par grub par byed cing rtsol bar byed pa dang / lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang
73a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// sbyin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig
73a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// 
73a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa sbyin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol/ bar byed de/ sus byin su la byin/ ci zhig byin// / 'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur zhes nyid kyi
73a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing / des de lta ra yongasu btsal nas kyang gang gis byin pa dang / gang la byin pa dang / ci zhig byin pa dang / de'i rnam par
73a6(dkon brtsegs): smin pa myong bar byed pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yang yin pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po thabs lo mkhas pa sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
73a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas/ sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams
73b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin par bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ 
73b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi thabs la mkhas pas de ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
73b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa chung ngu yang chen por byed la/ chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang / 
73b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gzhan
73b5(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la ma khas pa ni gal te rgya la rgya lam na/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngam/ sems kun du rmongs pas nyes pa byung
73b6(dkon brtsegs): na yang / 'di ltar so sor slob ste/ gal te bdag phung po dang / khams dang skye mched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni de ltar na bdag gis yongs su
73b7(dkon brtsegs): gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis 'di ltar go cha dgo bar bya te/ bdag sems can rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba
73b8(dkon brtsegs): la bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya/ sems skrag par mi bya/ yongasu gdung bar mi bya zhing / ci lta ci ltar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta lta de ltar sems can yongasu smin
74a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / nyes pa 'di yang chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing / phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang / bdag gi sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i
74a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed do// rigs kyi bu yongasu brtag pa nye bar bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung
74a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
74a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad sa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang / bcas po
74a5(dkon brtsegs): legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig sa kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar ba'i bslab pa la slob par byed pa na/ skal pa 'bum gyi bar du
74a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu za bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
74a7(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtse ba'i nyes pa lci ba zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa
74a8(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i skal pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya
74b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshegs ma spangs kyi bar du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal pa med cing / sangs rgyas
74b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis thob par 'gyur ba'i skal pa med de de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
74b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'on
74b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dge slong gi nyes dab byung ba mthong na/ bcab par mi bya bar tshangs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
74b5(dkon brtsegs): smros shig ces bka' stsal lags pas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mtsho ban
74b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po zhes bgyi ba/ khri'i steng na bud med cig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de dag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs
74b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lagaso// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa
74b8(dkon brtsegs): drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te
75a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam
75a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ kun dga' bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
75a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/ 
75a4(dkon brtsegs): gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso dal to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gci chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongasu glengs pa gang lam
75a5(dkon brtsegs): nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom lda na 'das kyis bdag gis nongs pa la nongs par ba sha gas pa gang lags pa de/ nongs pa la nongs par yongasu
75a6(dkon brtsegs): bzung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod theg chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam/ 
75a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cig/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa
75a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon du bya ba la bar tshad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa
75b1(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
75b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog gsum po'o gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog
75b3(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis
75b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pi'i rigs kyi bu 'am ri gas kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i yoD+yan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang ngag
75b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang dgi mgur spyod par byed pa mthong na/ kun dag / bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang po lnga dang ldan zhing gnas pa yin par
75b6(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang gis phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa las nyon cig
75b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tsho rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis
75b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel par gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed
76a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong nas/ gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur te gal te byang chub sems
76a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig khri ga cig gi steng ni 'dug par gyur na bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu semos bskyed par bya'o// 
76a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang snga dro'i
76a4(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung ba zed thogs nas gnyen yod kyi grong khyer chen po rab sod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong
76a5(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba ni sring mo de/ 'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas/ nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang
76a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis// des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do// 'khod ma
76a7(dkon brtsegs): thag tu des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad// de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin// 'dod la sred pa spangs byas na// mi mchog
76a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur// kun dga' bo de nas sring mo des tshigasu bcad pa de thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dgo' ba skyes te/ khri de las babs nas byang chub sems dpa'
76b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag/ sman chad don du gnyer mi bgyid/ 
76b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod la sred pa spang bgyis nas// mi mchog sangs rgyas 'grub gyur cig/ bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nings pa de ni khyod la chags// srog chags kun la
76b3(dkon brtsegs): sman slad du// bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa bskyed// kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos thabs la mkhas pa des/ sring mo de bla na med pa
76b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yas par bstan/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du ba cug/ yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs
76b5(dkon brtsegs): te song ngo // kun dga' bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/ kun dga' bo nga ni sring mo de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te/ 
76b6(dkon brtsegs): skal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang brel ba zhes
76b7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des byang chub 'thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang sems can mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa
76b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to// kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na log par ltung ba'i chos su
77a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
77a2(dkon brtsegs): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / snying
77a3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag gi 'di snyam du/ gal te byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa
77a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas skal pa 'bum gyi bar du se mas can dmyal ba chen por bsreg par 'gyur yang / 
77a5(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni na nges pa 'byung ba de dang / sems can dmyal ba'i/ sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi/ sems
77a6(dkon brtsegs): can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu btang ba la ni ma lags so snyam du sems lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshegs can rab mchog rgyal po
77a7(dkon brtsegs): la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legaso legs so// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de ltar bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang yang ldan par mi 'gyur la/ 
77a8(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngos mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na skal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs
77b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa rgya che ba dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang chos pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skur ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ 
77b2(dkon brtsegs): des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags mdab dag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'odas pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar bzhugs
77b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ de grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gos bram ze'i khyi'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa de mthong nas/ de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kun nas/ 
77b4(dkon brtsegs): bkris pa'i sems kyi bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu rgyug sa te rkang pa la gtug so// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo/ 
77b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci 'dod// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// dra ma ze'i khye'u kho mo ni khyod 'tshalo// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don du
