77b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba ma yin gyi kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'gum par
77b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lagaso/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas/ deng btul zhugs gzhig pa 'di ni
77b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no// snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs te bor nas gom la bdun bor ba dang / de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par gyur nas/ 'di ltar
78a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig ste sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa de bzod par bya
78a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing / bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chag sA mo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste lag pa g.yos
78a3(dkon brtsegs): pas bu mo de bzung nas/ de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang mo longs shig dang / kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de/ 
78a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon par byung ste/ tshangs pa 'i gnas pa bzhi skyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma tha ngag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// rigs
78a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khyi'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci
78a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to// shAkya'i bu mo so 'tshe ma ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to// rigs kyi bungs snying rje
78a7(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang skal ba khrir 'khor ba bsnyil zhing spangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gi
78a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos// de nas bcom ldan 'das
78b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gal te dge sbyong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi budag
78b2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin par gyur na ni// dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ 
78b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar 'gyur
78b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ de dgon pa'i phugacig la gnas// de dang ha cang ya dang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshon dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po pa
78b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar rgyu lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyiradage slong dri med gnas pa'i phug du zhugs te/ phug de nas
78b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir byung ba dang / drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du/ e ma
78b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyams nas tha ba dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyed par gyur to// de nas dge slong dri me kyi drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sem na
78b8(dkon brtsegs): ste shes nas/ de'i tshe steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' lo ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi bstan
79a1(dkon brtsegs): // bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi/ 
79a2(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la yan lag lngas laH te nyes pa la nyes pa la nye bar bshag so// rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de'i tshe stong gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni drang
79a3(dkon brtsegs): srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces
79a4(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur pa de bzhin zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis da dang the tshoms za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i
79a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi
79a6(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko kA li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des
79a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams can kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o// / 
79a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na smad 'tshang ma sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par longs pa ni de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir/ skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag
79b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid yongasu btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang / ji srid du skyes bu de las 'dod pa don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad srid par mi byed pa de lta de ltar de gnas par byed do// 
79b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu de la mi lta mi sems par spong bar byed cing / de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang
79b3(dkon brtsegs): chub seMng 'thabs la mkhas pa ya thab la la tra pa des sems can 'di dag yongasu smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/ rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi bsaM ba ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor ba byed
79b4(dkon brtsegs): cing de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sri bar byed do// sems can rnams kyi dog pa la dga' bas bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong par byed kyi yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no// 
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa/ ra gyur pa dag ste/ 'di dag gis phyir yongasu nyam/ sa par byed mi nus par shes nas ni de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i
79b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te/ 'gro zhing de de dang 'brel pa'i sems la gnas par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa
79b7(dkon brtsegs): ben rnams ni kha dog yongasu nyams pa med kyang / myu gu 'byung ba'i skal pa ni med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / 
79b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu gdungs na de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang / 
80a1(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yong su nyams par yang mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu
80a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung pa ni me tog thams cad las dri snom zhing ro myong bar byed kyang / gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom par mi byed/ 
80a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sred pa bskyed par mi byed/ de dag las dri dang / mdab ma dang / sdong bu dang / me tog 'brog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
80a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i dang rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyo par byed kyang / de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par
80a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi byed// gnas kyi sred pa bskyod pa sa ma byed la bdag kyang smras par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smras pa ra mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nya ba
80a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srid bu gtsog la gzan ma btags te/ mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro// de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des gang
80a7(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe mtsho chen po nas mchil ba de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
80a8(dkon brtsegs): smon pa ma med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bsgoms pa'i sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam chen
80b1(dkon brtsegs): por 'jug par byed kyang / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa des/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// 
80b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu rig sngags sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba ni rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe
80b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rigs sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad nas/ gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs/ 
80b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe la 'dod pa'i yon+dan lnga po dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing de dag
80b5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dri bar gnas par byed kyang / de gang gi tshe 'dod pa/ de'i tshe na shes rab kyi sngags dang gsang sngags kyi ston sa bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs
80b6(dkon brtsegs): par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/ de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
80b7(dkon brtsegs): na 'bong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa gcig thogs te/ 'gron po mang po sgrol bar byed pa de na sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gis shes
80b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje che ba dang / brnyas pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces gzhu yang med/ ral gri yang med
81a1(dkon brtsegs): dong ba yang med/ 'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'dro ba 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/ 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar bar byed mi nus na/ 'gron po thams cad
81a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgral ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya bar lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dpo/ 
81a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'brog dgon par song ste/ chom rkun pa'i tshogs lpags par gyur pa na/ mda' gzhu thogs te/ go cha sra ba bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te/ chom kun pa rnams la 'debs par byed
81a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral de nas yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa
81a5(dkon brtsegs): yang sen yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba
81a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod par de ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dag pa dang snying rje bskyed par
81a7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ sems can thams cad bsgral pa lta ci smos shing / bdud kyi sde pham pa
81a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyis legs par/ 
81b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu zin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/ shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa dra ba thams cad dral zhing rab tu gtubs nas/ shes rab dang ldan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud
81b2(dkon brtsegs): med dang bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yong su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do// gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
81b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du
81b4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mtsho ga ces bya ba phyug chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pa des/ dge slong de'i skad thos nas bsod
81b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pa/ la ba dor song ngo // de nas bu mo dpal yon gyi mchog gi sa byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu 'dod
81b6(dkon brtsegs): chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis dpe byad las byad bzhin dang / sgra skad dang / kha dog gi mtshan ma bzung ba dang / de 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang / 
81b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongasu gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongasu gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas/ lus rdul
81b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas/ 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong na/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i// 
82a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa 'das sde 'ad chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/ yung mam zhig na de ladran pa 'dis bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la chags par/ 
82a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu mdzums de gang min/ tsimig cag la chags sa pa/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ gal pa med pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems pa mang ge/ 'dus byas pa ma pa bdun pa/ 
82a3(dkon brtsegs): man/ seMn don nga bzhin gyis snang pa'i phyir te/ sems par mi byed/ tshar bar ma byed do// nab dang /  dang / kye dang / lum dang / yad ngo do// lpags pa dang / ma
82a4(dkon brtsegs): gamang de ste/ de napa mams nam na gi 'i mas par bdags nan dang / rnag pachags par 'gyur ba'ang/ snang bar 'gyur ba
82a5(dkon brtsegs): bas pa gsangs/ rnamams pasang sa skyes par gnas mi skye 'i mas la babad pa za par gyur / de dag pa dang sa ga ba da kyis sbe ga pa mang sa ma / 
82a6(dkon brtsegs): mdu napa gas te/  na song / gang kyi rten pa lan 'du gar ba byas nas rnam pa byo sa la pa byed kyi lagal bdang / tsam thas sas ga
82a7(dkon brtsegs): sa~M // bam pa gnyis pa/ bam ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen bdag byed cing ge par sde las dang pa'i rgyal ba gang chags pa med pa
82b1(dkon brtsegs): ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang
82b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong bar mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub ses
82b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la brten te/ chos thams cad yongs su brtsal bas/ bdud kyi sde btul cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// de
82b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud mA kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa 'i lus thob cing / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal
82b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma thag tu de la rin po che/ sna bdun las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dpag tshad pa cu gnyis pa yang byung bar gyur/ de'i rim gro byed pa'i bsnyen
82b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye bar gnas par gyur to/ de'i mod la des bdag gis las ci zhig byas shing bsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur
82b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las/ de na bdag gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la
82b8(dkon brtsegs): bltas pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus brjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing / bdag lo 'byor
83a1(dkon brtsegs): ba pag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes dran pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to// de nas lnga'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te// 
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la phyag byas shing
83a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod cing / bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhing mi rig
83a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro ba ra bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu des 'khor lnga
83a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me terga/ phreng dang / byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sede'i sems dang chen dga' byed ga la ba der seng
83a6(dkon brtsegs): nas kha dog shin tu 'phags pa shin du 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom/ 
83a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / byang chub sems dpa'
83a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo bug
83b1(dkon brtsegs): bug por sbyar nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab// byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab// bde
83b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab// grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur// tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog rje
83b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// mdzes shing thog mar phyug chung gyur pa lags// pha ma'i glo bar 'chi zhing rab tu byams// sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa// mthu chen dga' byed ces bgyi gang
83b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa// bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis// skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas// bdag chags sems
83b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsod snyoms thogs nas ni// de bzhin gshig/ sa pa'i sras po gang lags pa// dga' byed mthu chen go la mchis par mchis// mthong ma thag tu
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'dod chags dang // ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te// gal te ji ltar bsams bzhin ma mjal na// srog la mi lta 'gum pa'i dus bgyi snyam// tshul
83b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas// de la bka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang // bsod snyoms stsol ba'i rdo yang ma thog nas// rtul byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur/ 
83b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phror gyur pa'i tshe// skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te// shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas// bdag gis 'od gsal skyes pa 'di nyid thob/ 
84a1(dkon brtsegs): rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi// gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing // bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha'i bu mo ni// khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba 'a/ 
84a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gyur// bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni// sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba// rjesu dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid// chags bcas sems kyi
84a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin 'di 'dra ste// dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la// chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas// sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po des// ngan
84a4(dkon brtsegs): bu gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas// chags bcas se mas kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na// gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te// gang la bde ra gshegs mkhyen
84a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jug 'gyur ba// de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lag/ sa// ngan bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang / 
84a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed spyad par bgyi// bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la// chos kyi mchod pa mchog gi mchod par bgyi/ 
84a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur// bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni// bdag la rtog pa bud med
84a8(dkon brtsegs): lus bsgyur nas// de kun 'jigs med skyes pa thob 'gyur bar// byang chub spyod mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi// lus rdul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni// bu mo'i pha mcho nges 'debs byed
84b1(dkon brtsegs): cing dge sbyong de yis byad sdem byas snyam ste// ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod// sangs rgyas mthu yis lha yi bu de ni// song nas pha ma dag la tshig smras pa// dge
84b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed// yun ring sdug bsngal 'grub par ma byed cig/ bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin te// sum cu rtsa gsum bskal pa mnyam gyur cing // des ni bud med
84b3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyang spang byas te// de ni lha yi bu mo 'ad gsal gyur// bde bar gshegs pas spyan sngar khyed deng la// khro ba'i sems kyis nyes pa 'di shogs shig/ sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma
84b4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnasagazhan med// 'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas// pha ma gnyis kyi sangs rgyas sgra thos nas// 
84b5(dkon brtsegs): nye du'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te// shAkya thu ba pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur// mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// khro ba'i sems kyis nyes pa
84b6(dkon brtsegs): bshags byas nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te// bod gshegs rang 'byung la ni zhu zhus pas// ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun
84b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mchod pa lags// zhus pa de yi lan ni stsal du gsol// thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags// rgyal bas de dag bsam pa dag mkhyen nas// 'jig rten
84b8(dkon brtsegs): mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa// de yis brtan par byang chub sems bskyed cig/ bu mo'i pha dang ma dang nye du ni/ 
85a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas// skyes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos nas// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed// 
85a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyasapas kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' ji skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yis to// shes rab thabs la mkhos
85a3(dkon brtsegs): po'ang de bzhin no// dga' byed smon lam yang dang yang 'debs pa// bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas// de dag myur
85a4(dkon brtsegs): du skyes bu 'jigs med shog/ bud med gcig min ga/ nyis dang gsum min te// bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ma dang po rnams// gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa
85a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad shi 'phos skyes par gyur// kun dag/ 'a 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni// sems can ga/ zhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis dpa'
85a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing // sems par gyur pa'i yon de 'dra ltos// lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// des ni sangs
85a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas// rgyal ba blta na mdzes shes bya bar 'gyur// lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag mi mchog rnamasu 'byung 'gyur bas// gang la dang byas
85a8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba bas ma yas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed// gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde byin na// gang dag gus byed de la ci smras pa// grags chen sman gyi rgyal po lnga
85b1(dkon brtsegs): bru yaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la su snang bskyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis/ 
85b2(dkon brtsegs): ste dper bgyi na/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan
85b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang la la dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad 'di lta ste gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can
85b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sengs dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa la/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la
85b5(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na ya dang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lag
85b6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'dra bar 'dzin lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
85b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi na/ sman gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes shes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs
85b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis thebs pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang
86a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
86a2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ji skad
86a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin te/ legs so legs so// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
86a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyi gnas dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ sems
86a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod pa'i khams na/ yang kun tu gda' ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par
86a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yang
86a7(dkon brtsegs): kun du bskyed par bgyid la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
86a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo mtsho ro lags te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chags
86b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad bsrung bar bgyid cing / 'di lta ste gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang / de dag la chags par yang mi
86b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
86b3(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te/ dpe 'ga' zhig brjod par spobs lags so// bde bar gshegs po spobs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chen po
86b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs par gyis shig/ 'od srung chen pos gsol dpa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper ba gyi na 'brog dgon pa chen po zhog mchis par gyur la/ 
86b5(dkon brtsegs): 'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang srid pa'i rtse mo dang ma/ nyam pa'i re ba mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dge na ba chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhig
86b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang cha ba sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer
86b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa/ gtsang ba lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos kun du ltam pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis pa gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de yang tsho ba
86b8(dkon brtsegs): sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / gang dag grong khyer chen po der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni dga' ba dang mgu ba ma mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po dan
87a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba zhig kyang mchis shing / de'i g.yas g.yon na/ khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po dag kyang ma
87a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur la/ de nas 'brog dgon pa chen po de'i dbus nas sems can mkhas pa zhi ba/ glo ba bzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don du gyur par 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba/ 
87a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'tshal ba/ grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ gcig cig byung bar gyur nas/ de 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di skad ces
87a4(dkon brtsegs): kye grogs po dag kho ba ni khyed kyi yongs su skyob pa yin to// 'brog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang mi ring ba na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ 
87a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/ gang dag der zhugs pa/ ra gyur pa de ni rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba med par 'gyu/ ro zhing / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye ba dang / 
87a6(dkon brtsegs): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par yang 'gyur bas/ sems can shes pa dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg/ grong khyer chen po der ding ngo zhes
87a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/ de na sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag
87a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing rjesu bstan pa de yang 'tshal la bdag cag 'di na gnas bzhin du grong khyer de na mchis pa'i yo n+dan de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur cig ces mchis
87b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// sems can rgya chen po la mos pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi'o zhes mchi lags so// sems can bsod
87b2(dkon brtsegs): nams chung ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid cing / skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de'i slad bzhin du mchi bar mi bgyi lags te/ de nas skyes
87b3(dkon brtsegs): bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba dang / des shul de yang mthong bar gyur des mtho gang tsam gyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba de yang mthong bar 'gyur
87b4(dkon brtsegs): shul de'i g.yas g.yon na/ khru 'bum tsam mchis pa/ gra yang sa chen po de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/ des grayas g.yon gyi g.yang sa chen po de dag rtsig pa dang / spang
87b5(dkon brtsegs): leb kyis bkum ste/ rka lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de/ las 'da' bar bgyid la/ g.yas g.yos so su yang mi blta bar smad bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing
87b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang slar yang mi blta la/ skye zhing yid byung ba yang ma mchis par shul der mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer
87b7(dkon brtsegs): de mthong bar yang 'gyur la/ ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba
87b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las
88a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par bgyid pa zhig mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la 'brog dgon pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni 'khor
88a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dgon pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i rab zhes bgyi ba de ni rig pa dang / srid pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po der
88a3(dkon brtsegs): yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas lag so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de la ya chab sgo ni gcig cig
88a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis par gyur cing zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ba dgrod pa gcig pa'i shul po lta bar bgyi lags so// skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba bzhin
88a5(dkon brtsegs): du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta bar bgyi lag so// sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'thung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las
88a6(dkon brtsegs): mig yo lo// grong khyer gyi yonan yang 'tshal ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can rgya chen po la mas pa tshig 'dis
88a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lags so// zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag bsdu bar
88a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lags so// sems can bsod nims chung ngu sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang kun du rgyu de dag gi tshig sa
88b1(dkon brtsegs): dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa blta bar/ 
88b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lags so// mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba bzhin du ni chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lagaso// de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa
88b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ser rnams lta bar bgyi lags so// g.yas g.yon gyi g.yang sa de dag rtsigs pa dang spang leb kyis bkum
88b4(dkon brtsegs): ste zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lag so// rka lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyi
88b5(dkon brtsegs): la zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnam sa sdud cing yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid pa dag blta bar bgyi
88b6(dkon brtsegs): la gso// slad bzhin phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang blta bar bgyi la/ de bzhin du
88b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can sdig pa la mngon par zhen pa yongasasu nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun tu spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'phya ba dang smod par bgyid pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi
88b8(dkon brtsegs): lag so// slar yang mi lta la zhes bgyi ba don bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa'i tshig bla dag so// g.yas g.yon du yang mi lta bar zhes bgyi ba
89a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyer chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni thams cad/ 
89a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi tshig bla dgas lags so// ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen pa thaMd
89a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i tshigs bla dgas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yon+d+ran mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / ye shes nges par rtog par bgyid pa
89a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jig
89a5(dkon brtsegs): su rung ba thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi/ ba de ni/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa mam/ chis shing the tsom dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs bla dgas
89a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so// grong khyer der zhugs na/ rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bro nad dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par yang bgyid ces bgyi ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshigs
89a8(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dang ldan lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems
89b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung legs sa
89b2(dkon brtsegs): legs so// 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba bskyed pa ni yang khyod legs te/ 'od srung khyod kyis dpe brjod pa des lha / 
89b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi skye rgu las sreg chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
89b4(dkon brtsegs): ni thabs la mkhas pa legs par bslabs pa yon+dan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gis
89b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan la gnod pa/ ra 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mi byed cing / tshig gang gos bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig
89b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa bcom ldan
89b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad
89b8(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
90a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ma mdzad kyi gsung rab la 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo rerig mthong bas la ba la ci zhig bya byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas// dge sgyu
90a2(dkon brtsegs): reg la byang chub ga la yod ces gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa de ci las dgongs te/ gsungs lags/ de skad ces gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
90a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshadapa
90a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par dbye bas khyod ci bya thong shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ darigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 
90a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can ma/ ngasu smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa 'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs
90a6(dkon brtsegs): bar rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// ji ltar byang chub sems
90a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad du/ thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa gang yi
90a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag las phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
90b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bar der/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrug pa med pa dang rtse med pa dang brjed pa med pa dang sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par/ 
90b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab nyams pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na zhag bdun gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
90b3(dkon brtsegs): bar yang 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa brgyas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
90b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa stong gis kyang byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// 'dod na pa skal ba 'bum gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs
90b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod na bsams bzhin du srid pa lan cing 'gro bar yang
90b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de ni thabs la mkhas pa dang shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
90b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing / 'dod na phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang yid yongasu skyo ba med par gnas par byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
90b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no// rig kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug la byang chub sems dpa' yang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
91a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi/ de'i lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sems g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nyan thos ni bdag nyid yongasu mya ngan las 'da'
91a2(dkon brtsegs): ba kho nar shes par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing
91a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongasu smin par byed la/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa na snying rje chen po bskyed par yang byed de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
91a4(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sem ngas dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug bzhin du bla nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
91a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang byed nus/ mos kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems/ te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i
91a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su mdzeg par mi nus la/ lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab par nus so snyam nas// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'dzam+bu'i
91a7(dkon brtsegs): gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi
91a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas shi 'phos nas ma'i mngal du ma zhugs shing / mngal gyi dri mas ma reg pa kho nar de'i ska cig de nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus
91b1(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ de la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du 'di lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du nem nur dang / 
91b2(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis dang the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tsom skye bar gyur na/ nyon mongs pa yongasasu zad par bya ba'i phyir chos nyan par mi byed/ shes par
91b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pas/ byang chub sems dpas mngal na gnas pa bstan pa'i rgyu de yin rkyen de yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' mngal
91b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas su zhugs so snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin da dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga'
91b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyi gnas na gnas bzhin du de snyoms par zhugs shing / yongs su bsten nas/ ting nge 'dzin las ma langs bzhin du dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid nas byang chub kyi snying po
91b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug mod kyi/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de na de ma mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs so snyam du shes par zad do// byang chub sems dpa' ni dga'
91b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa'i bya ba thams cad kun du ston par byed de// de dag
91b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni kun spyod pa gtsang ba yin pas/ phyir
92a1(dkon brtsegs): mngal gyi gnas su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' glang po che thal dkar
92a2(dkon brtsegs): du bsgyur te/ mi mngar du 'jug pa ston par byed ce na/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dgas yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad
92a3(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pa yin pas na/ des ni ci nas kyang lha'am/ mi gzhan gang la yang med pa de lta bu kho nar mngal du 'jug par bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i
92a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dgur ma yin zhen / sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/ kye ma gzhon nu 'di
92a5(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i dus yongasu ma rdzogs pas dbang po ma/ tshangs par gyur to snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dgagi the tsom gcad pa dang / mngal gyi dus dang dbang po yongasu
92a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas kyi dgur ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang
92a7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe byang chub
92a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i longs spyod rin po che bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas/ lha'i bu sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bzhi 'bum gyis
92b1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan rtol te/ 
92b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed ce na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa yin gyi/ brdzus te skyes pa ma yin
92b3(dkon brtsegs): no snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag the tsom gcad pa'i phyir ma'i mtshan rtol te mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun du bstan to// byung ma thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lus la yang rma med
92b4(dkon brtsegs): cing sgros med la/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i bde ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing sngon nam
92b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma myong ba ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thab sa mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin zhe na/ byang chub
92b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / dben pa la dga' ba dang / kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / grong du btsas na lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin
92b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / me tog dag gis shin tu 'phags pa'i mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i
92b8(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyang rgyags pa dang bag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin pa'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin no// ci'i phyir byang
93a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyis shing blag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste/ bang mal ma byed par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas shes na/ sems can gang dag 'dis
93a2(dkon brtsegs): du yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ci lta bur bud med gzhan dag bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg cing byang chub sems dpa' btsas so snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag the tshom gcad pa dang bde bar
93a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis shing blag sha'i yal ga le bzung ste/ bang ma la ma bcas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas so// ci'i
93a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing skye gnas nas kyang ma yin lus kyi phyogs gzhan dag
93a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni kun smra/ dpa gtsang ma dang / 'jig rten gsum thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems
93a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ des ni ji ltar sems can dman pa gzhan dag bzhin du ma'i mngal du brten cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / bcas pa ma yin pa de ltar skye ba bstan pa
93a7(dkon brtsegs): bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing / byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma
93a8(dkon brtsegs): thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi mtshan yang rma med cing sgos med par gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu/ 
93b1(dkon brtsegs): lha dbang po brgya byin gyis bzung la mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ab bas lha rnamam 'dun par byas pas/ lha'i dbang
93b2(dkon brtsegs): bai brgya byin gyis po dag gis byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu gos rin po ches go zung bar bya'o zhes sngon sman lam btab pa'i phyir/ de na byang chung sems dpa' la mchod pa'i la
93b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa med de/ des byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas po yin na/ ci'i byor byang chu ba sems dpa'i bcos ma thag tu mongasam bzung bar/ 
93b4(dkon brtsegs): gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpe'i ni ji ltar gzhan sus kyang sngon ma bstan pa de lta bus
93b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi ba rkyen 'grus chen po dang / sgyo/ budam pa'i rtsal gdon mi ra bar kun du bstan par bya/ dgos pa dang / gom pa bdun por rabs sems ca
93b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gidon gom pa drug gis kyang michog la/ brgyad ni lhag par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun
93b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs lo mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun
93b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dar ba no// tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chib mthar byung bar bya'o nis brjod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi
94a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dbang che bar grags pa dag 'dus par gyur te 'khor la/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa de dag 'di snyam du// 
94a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni ches bla ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de lta ma yin no snyam du sems shing 'dud par mi byed/ rab tu 'dud par mi byed/ phyag 'tshal bar mi byed/ rab
94a3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pas na/ des na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu 'di dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod
94a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang log par ltung ba der 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dang sa tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin no// 
94a5(dkon brtsegs): nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba mthar 'byung bar/ bya'o zhes smras te/ tshig gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong
94a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar gyur nas lha'i bu gang dag der ma lhags pa de dag kyang sgra de thos nas lhags par gyur cing / de nas lha'i bu de dag dang brgya byin
94a7(dkon brtsegs): dang tshangs pa dag yid byung ba skyes shing ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas thal mo dug phug por sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'dud
94a8(dkon brtsegs): cing phyag 'tshal bar byed de// gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar
94b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras pa'i rgyu de yin rkyen ni de yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshig de ni yang dag pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// 
94b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gad mo tshar rgod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag/ 
94b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni bodag/ gti mug dang lhan cig skyes pa rgod pa'i gad mo yang med/ rta gang du rgod po yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// 
94b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bdag dang lhan cig/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las bdag gis ni byang chub thob par gyur gyi/ sems can 'di dag ni le lo'i
94b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis 'khor ba'i thabs por gnas par gyur pa/ sa/ kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rje
94b6(dkon brtsegs): bgrod par bya ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pa yin no zhes de ltar snying rje chen po bskyed na/ sems cad de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa
94b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig la bdag cag ni dman pa dang bag med pa yin par rig nas/ de dag de bdag la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i phyir de'i byang chub
94b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gad mo tshar rgod par byed de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dri med par btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang / 
95a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu de ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag mchod pa'i las byed pa yang yin la/ 'jig rten na yang khyi'u
95a2(dkon brtsegs): dag btsas ma thag tu gdon mi za bar khrus byed pa dag yod pas/ byang chub sems dpas kyang 'jig rten shes pa'i rjes su gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya dgos pas na don gyi dbang de
95a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gis khru bar byed/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang
95a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag tu kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar ci'i phyir grong du 'jug ce na// dbang po rnams yongasu smin pa kun tu bstan pa dang / btsun
95a5(dkon brtsegs): mo'i 'khor gyi bya ba kun tu bstan pa dang / dga' bo dang rtsed mo dag kun du bstan nas kyang / gling chen po bzhi la mi blta bar spangs te mngon par 'byung ba kun
95a6(dkon brtsegs): du bstan par bya ba dang / 'di ltar sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gi rjesu slob pa na/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / longs spyod dang / 'khor rgya chen po dag spangs
95a7(dkon brtsegs): te rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying po mi 'gro bar/ 
95a8(dkon brtsegs): grong du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas
95b1(dkon brtsegs): nas zhag bdun lon na yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ce na/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa med de/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas dus las
95b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe na lho'i mig rnam par dag pas yum lha
95b3(dkon brtsegs): mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe la so sor brtags na/ byang chub sems dpas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe'i lhag ma ni zla ba bcu dang zhag bdun las ma las par shes nas/ de'i 'og tu byed
95b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas shi 'a dpos te ma'i mngal du zhugs pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar yum lha mo sgyu
95b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' btsos pa'i nyes pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas
95b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / bstan bcos dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs/ 
95b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / skar ma'i dpyad dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dag legs par bslabs na/ 'jig rten dang rjesu mthun par bya ba'i
95b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas dang po nyid nas gang la legs par bslab par ma byas pa'i bzo 'am/ gsang sngags sam/ rigs sngags sam/ bstan bcos sa/ 
96a1(dkon brtsegs): sro gar ram/ glu'am rol mo sgra'am/ gzhang gad dam/ 'jo sgeg gam/ dga' ba'am/ rtsed mo kun tu bstan par bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong
96a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni btsas ma thag kho nar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas
96a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon shin tu legs par bslabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa'i dbang gi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub
96a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang /  chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma la btsun mo dang sras dang g.yog 'khor len par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang
96a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i gnas skabs na skyes bu dam pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byeng
96a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pas btsun mo dang / sras dang / bu'i 'khor gdon mi za bar bstan par bya dgos te/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa'
96a7(dkon brtsegs): ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin gyi za ma'i rigs shig yin no snyam du sems par gyur na/ de dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / logs par ltung bar
96a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang / 'di lta ste sras sgra gcan zin kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma blangs so// gang dag 'di/ 
96b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sras sgra gcan zin ni yab dang yum gyi mer mer po las skyes pa yin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra gcan zin 'di ni sngon 'di skad du bdag srid pa tha ma pa'i bur
96b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na sgra gcan zin ni lha nas shi 'phos nas 'dir brdzus te skyes pa yin gyi/ pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shAkya'i bu mo
96b3(dkon brtsegs): sa 'tshe ma yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis blangs pa yin te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa ni bdag gi
96b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim thab du gyur la/ bdag kyang khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro// de'i tshe nadabyang chub sems dpas kyang 'di skad ces bzang mo ngani
96b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngakhyod kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur ces ud bo la'i phyir khas blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga
96b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de ni mi slu ba yin pa na/ byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pas ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang / 
96b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yog 'khor gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan pa bya dgos te 'di ltar shAkya bu mo sa 'tshe mas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / lha'i mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa
96b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di skad du kye ma bdag kyang yo nan gyi chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
97a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom byang chub kyi sems bstan par bskyed du gzhugs pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas
97a2(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshom blangs so// gzhan yang sems can gang dag 'dod pa dang / bran dang / chung ma dang / las kyi mtha' dang / khang khyim dang / nor rdzas kyi 'du 'dzis
97a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas yongs su 'dzin pa spangs te/ rab tu 'byung bar mi nus pa'i sems can de dag la 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / longs spyod dang // nor rdzas dang / chung ma la mi ltar bar kun du bstan
97a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa'atshe ma blangs nas/ khang khyim dang / nor rdzas dang / chung ma dang / 'khor rnams la mi lta bar spangs te mngon
97a5(dkon brtsegs): par byung na/ sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du gzhon nu na thams cad grub pa 'di yang de ltar btsun mo dnganor rdzas dang / 'khor dang / longs spyod rgya chen po dag la
97a6(dkon brtsegs): mi lta bar spangs te rab tu byung na de'i phyir/ bdag cag kyang ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar mi bya snyam du sems par bya ba'i phyir ro// / bam po gsum pa gzhan yang byang chub
97a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bud med gzhon nu bsnyen bkur ma gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yongasu smin par byas shing / yid gcugs par gyur pa de
97a8(dkon brtsegs): dag gis 'di skad ces bdag cag khyod srid po tha mo par gyur pa'i bar tshun chad kyi btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ de dag gis dkar po'i chos rgya cher smin par bya ba'i
97b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams blangs te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas pas/ bud med bzhi khri nyis stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
97b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su smin par byas so// lhag ma rnams ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos can du byas te/ rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpas 'khor rnams blangs so// 
97b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bud med gang 'dod chags kyi yongasu gdungs pa chen pos yongs su gdung bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar
97b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu shes par bya ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyi chu zhang dang / kha dog dang / da/ byibs ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sprul pa mngon par sprul nas/ 
97b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa de dang / bud mod de dag lhan cig dga' ba dang rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ de dag so so nas 'di ste ma du bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig dga' ba dang / 
97b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsi ba dang mga' mgur spyod par byed do snyam du sems par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i gnas pas gnas par byed do// sprul pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod rje
97b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar blta
97b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// shAkya'i bu 'dun pa dang rta bsngags ldan gnyis kyang de gnyis kyi sngon gyi smon lam nyid yin par blta bar bya ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par
98a1(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'o// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam+bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas pas lha bye ba phrag bdun bcu
98a2(dkon brtsegs): brtul ba dang / yab dang yum dag yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab che ba nyid gdon mi
98a3(dkon brtsegs): za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib mas ma btang ba nyid kyang kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma
98a4(dkon brtsegs): la bsam gtan byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / 
98a5(dkon brtsegs): cod mo thams cad don du mi gnyer bar ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung zhe na/ rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / nye du rnams kyis 'di
98a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni nye du rnams mi 'dod pa ma yin gyi/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po'i skyon chag/ 
98a7(dkon brtsegs): pas gnas pa ma yin par rig nas/ mngon par byung ba yin no zhes shes par 'gyur ba kun du bstan par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi
98a8(dkon brtsegs): pas 'jigs pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang rtsed mo don du mi gnyer bar yang bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ste/ de yang byang chu
98b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam byed kyi dus kyi tshe mngon par byung la nyin mo ma yin zhe na/ sems can rnams gang la gnas na/ 
98b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dkar po'i chos don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus ni bde ba rgya chen po ji snyed pa yang yongs su/ 
98b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs te/ nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe na ma dris mi ltos par mngon par 'byung bar bya ba dang / bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa dag kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs yong
98b4(dkon brtsegs): su nyams par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems da pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas skye bo rnams ni lha rnams kyis gnyin
98b5(dkon brtsegs): log par byas te mngon par byung zhe na/ skye bo rnams ni lha rnam sa kyis gnyid log par byas pas lha rnams kyis nyes par kun tu bstan pa'i phyir te byang chub sems
98b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la nye du rnams dang / skye bo rnams tha ba dang zhe sdang go sems bskyed par gyur na/ de dag la yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung
98b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur gyi/ de dag gis skye bo rnams lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas shing / lha rnams kyis sgo phye ste bar snang la khyer bas/ de ni byang chub sems dpes ma nyes so zhes shes
98b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa rgya chen po thob par 'gyur bas don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir/ skye bo rnams gnyid log par byas nas mngon par byung ste/ de yang / 
99a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rta dang rgyun rnams shAkya'i bu 'dun pa la phyir bskur zhe na/ 'di lnga ste chog
99a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gzhan dag 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' ni dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar rab tu byung bas na gser dang dngul dag don du gnyer ba ma
99a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes brjod par bya ba dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas phyi ma'i skye bo dag rjes slob du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gang dag bstan pa 'di la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyu
99a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gis ni nga'i rjesu bslabs shing / dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la sten nas rab tu 'byung bar bya ste/ rab tu 'byung bas ni dang ni
99a5(dkon brtsegs): kho na nas 'tsho ba la ltos shing rab tu 'byung bar mi bya'o zhe sa bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems da pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bdag nyid kyis ral gris skra bregs te rab tu byung zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te skra 'dreg par bzod pa'i
99a7(dkon brtsegs): lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de nyid
99a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung ba don du gnyer bas nas dad pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kun tu bstan pa dang / bdag nyid kyis skra bregs te rab tu byung na rgyal po zas gtsang yang sus nga yi bu'i skra bregs pa
99b1(dkon brtsegs): chad pas bcad do zhes mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis rang gi ral gris skra bregs so zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas/ cang mi zer bar
99b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/ 
99b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa yang nyon cig/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pas sems can
99b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dag la nges par skyo bar bya zhing 'dun par bya ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
99b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung / rab la tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong / bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka'
99b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa de yang byang chub sema'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldem po ngag yin par blta bar bya ste/ las kyi bsgrib pa de'i rgyus byang/ 
99b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad do// byang chub sems dpas ci las bsams te tshig de skad ces smras she na/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
99b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng de la/ ne'u ldangs bram ze'i rigs shing sAl chen po lta bu'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
100a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa lnga zhig yod pa de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas byang chub kyi sems de dag brjed par gyur
100a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de'i tshe na rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag mu stegs can gyi brtul zhugs spyod par gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs mi spyod pa dang / mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags la brtson cing sangs rgyas
100a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsang sngags la mi brtson pa dang / mu stegs can la mos shing mu stegs can gyi dbang gis byang chub ni bdag cag la yod de/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas yin no zhes bdag nyid ston pa
100a4(dkon brtsegs): yin par khas 'che bar byed do// bram ze'i khye'u 'od nadar phreng gis rigs kyi bu de dag snod yin par rig nas de thabs la mkhas pas/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po
100a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag rim gyis mu stegs can de dag gi drung nas phyir bzlog par 'dod pas/ des thabs la mkhas pas rdza mkhan bum byed la tshogs 'di skad ces/ 
100a6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe bram ze'i
100a7(dkon brtsegs): khye'u 'od zer phreng des phyogs gzhan zhig tu bram ze'i rogs shing sa la chen po lta bu wa lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nas rdza mkhan bum byed des phyogs de ga la ba der song ste/ 
100a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sngag pa brjod ning sngags pa brjod nas/ bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'od
100b1(dkon brtsegs): zer phreng tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng 'di snyam du sems
100b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ kye bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa yin pas/ gal te bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang
100b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag yongasu dogs par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
100b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sgra ngan sngar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do snyam nus/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de sngar dam bcas pa de nyid
100b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bsrung bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu / na pa'i rgyu mthun thabs la mkhas pas tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong momo re 'thong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub
100b6(dkon brtsegs): ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so// 'di ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 
100b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' li ni byang chub kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyang
100b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ byang chub ni nang du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni phyi rol tu yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 
101a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni nang dang phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de ltar chos thams cad ma skyes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub ni gtan stong pa
101a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin pas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa des tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci
101a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par bka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na bram ze'i khyi'u 'od
101a4(dkon brtsegs): zer phreng de ne'u ltangs lnga po de dag dang chu 'gram zhig na 'kho dad par gyur pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu sa rigs kyi bu de dag 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyiraro/ 
101a5(dkon brtsegs): rdza mkhan bud med chu 'gram de ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'od zer phreng tshur shog/ sangs rgyas bcom
101a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la blta ba dang / 
101a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng gis smras pa/ dge sbyong sgre bo mthong bas kho ba la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka
101a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo rag la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng de de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / byig bya ba dang / bsnyen
101b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba'i phyir/ 'gror ma btub ba dang / de nas rdza mkhan bum byed des bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gi thor to nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
101b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la bderang khrid de song ngo // bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng yongasu bskor te yid dun par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs
101b3(dkon brtsegs): pab dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes pa lnga po de dag cher
101b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun par gyur nasa'adi snyam du 'di ltar bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la
101b5(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongasu rdzogs par bya/ ba'i phyir/ rdza mkhan bum byed 'dis thor to nas bzung
101b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du yang bdag nyid kyi srog yongasu btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de ni ci 'dra ba
101b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag gis 'dun par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung
101b8(dkon brtsegs): la blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi thad du dong ngo // de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ma thag tu sngon gyi
102a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul bas dad pa thob par gyur to// de dag gis dad pa thob nas bram ze'i khri'u 'od zer phreng la smras pa/ ston pa'i yan+tan 'di lta bu dag
102a2(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis sngan chad kho bo cag la ma smras so zhes spros so// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu lnga po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
102a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpal dang gzi brjid kyang mthong / spobs pa yang thos/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa yang thos nas lhag pa'i bsams pas bla na
102a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems pa skyed do// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa do dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
102a5(dkon brtsegs): srung gis/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'isde snod kyi rnam grangs phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gzug
102a6(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i tshig chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de lta de ltar yang dag par bstan par mdzad de/ des rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rigs kyi
102a7(dkon brtsegs): bu de ltar nang ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' bas/ khyed cag la gal te bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng des/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
102a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing / mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na no/ des na rigs kyi bu de dag
102b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i gnas dang skabs kyang med na/ dad pa thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// 
102b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes lung ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng
102b3(dkon brtsegs): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pas tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par
102b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras par zad kyi/ rigs kyi bu phyir mi lto dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas la nem nur
102b5(dkon brtsegs): med cing / byang chub la yang som nyi med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang som nyi med de/ de yang byang chu ba sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs
102b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongasu smin par byas shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des kyang / ngas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad par
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ sems can mi shes par spyod pa gzhan dag gis ni dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la/ lkog nas tshig rtsub po smras la/ de dag gis shes kyang rung
102b8(dkon brtsegs): mi shes kyang rung / shes pa dang ldan yang rung shes pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste brjod par gyur na/ de dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log pa/ 
103a1(dkon brtsegs): ltung bar 'gyur bas na/ sems can de dag la las kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas las de kun tu ston par zad kyi byang chub sems dpa
103a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do// gzhan yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la tshig rtsub po smras nas/ bdag la ni thar pa'i skal
103a3(dkon brtsegs): ba med do snyam nas/ 'gyod pa la gnas shing phyin chad rtsol bar mi byed pa'i sems can de dag gi 'gyod pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir yang las de kun tu bstan to// de dag 'di
103a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsu
103a5(dkon brtsegs): rab la 'di skad ces/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la ma da ces smras kyang / de la rnam par grol ba'i skal ba lnga/ 
103a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ bdag cag mi shes pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing de dag sdig pa'i las kyi nyes pa de yang 'chags la/ gzhan dag kyang mngon par 'du mi byed
103a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mu stegs can dag gdul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa kun tu bstan gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyus ni ma yin
