128b7(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'khrul 'khor de ni las kyi dbang gis 'jug ste/ las de yang gzugs can ma yin zhing rnam par shes pa las mngon par
128b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa'o// de bzhin du lus kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di yang rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus sna tshogs la 'jug pa yin no// rnam pa/ 
129a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus bskyed par byed pa'i phyir byed pa po yang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus kyi khams la brten pa'i phyir mi zad pa
129a2(dkon brtsegs): yang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i phyir blo phun sum tshogs pa yang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra ba
129a3(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni dri nga ba dag dang mi gtsang ba dag dang / ro dag la yang 'bab ste/ 'od kyang de dag la dri des gos par mi 'gyur la/ nyi ma yang dri nga ba bor te ya/ 
129a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang phyis dang / snyag sdig za ba'i khyi dang phag gi skye dganas dag tu yang skye ba yongasu 'dzin te/ 'on kyang
129a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod pa ngan pa de dag gis gro ba med do// bzang skyong gzhan yang rnam par / sa pa'i khams 'di ni lus yongasu btang nas dge ba dang mi
129a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rjesu 'jug ste/ de yang ji lta zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis lus 'dir bor nas bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa yongs su
129a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to// dper na rlung gi khams drag gi phrag nas byung nas shing tsam pa ka dang phrad de spos shin du dri zhim pa khyer nas/ yang dri nga ba dang mi gtsang ba dang ro'i dri yang khyer
129a8(dkon brtsegs): te 'gro la/ bzang skyong de las gang ches shas che ba de'i dri dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar rlung gi khams de dri rnam pa gnyi kyir te 'gro yang rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can mo
129b1(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ dri de gnyis kyang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus las 'phos te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba khyer nas 'pho te/ de ltar na de'i 'bo ba
129b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so// dper na rmi lam na mis dngos po thams cad shes kyang lus de mal na 'dug par mi shes pa de bzhin du/ bsod nas su nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams rmi lam rmi ba
129b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lkog ma'i ming pa rnams nas kyang mi 'byung bu ga rnams nas kyang ma yin te/ de ni khong bu dang gseb rnams mi chol
129b4(dkon brtsegs): lo/ de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cedas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ba gag gi sgo
129b5(dkon brtsegs): nga'am/ ngang pa'i sgo nga ma phrugs pa shun pa ma rdol bar sgong nga'i nang nas bye'u phrug rnams 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur/ ba lags/ ji ltar na bu gam brtol bar rnam par shes pa
129b6(dkon brtsegs): 'pho bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper na til 'bru tsam pa ka'i me tog gis bsgos nas legs par brdungs te btsir ba las til mar byung ba ni tsan
129b7(dkon brtsegs): paM ka'i til mar zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na dri des kyang til 'bra ma brtol bzhin du dri zhim pos bsgos te 'phos te 'gro yang / dri des snam gyi ro myong bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 
129b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bru'i rkyen dang me tog dang phrad pas til mar dri dang 'dris pa'i dngos por 'gyur te/ 'on kyang til gyi 'bru de la me tog gi dri de gseb nas 'gro ba ni med la/ de'i rkyen gyis dri de 'phro
130a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gro ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang me tog gi dri bzhin du stong pa'i kun pa ma brtol bar 'ab zhing 'groste/ de'i 'pho ba yang de bzhin
130a2(dkon brtsegs): du blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang de'i 'pho bo ni nyi ma dang / me shel dang / bsreng bya dang 'dra bar yang blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang sa bon 'bri ba dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs gang
130a3(dkon brtsegs): dus bon btob na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams gcig pa kho na las sa bon des la brten cing sdong bu dang la ma sngon par 'grub pa/ 
130a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog dkar po 'am/ sngon po 'am/ dmar por swA dpa'am/ kha dag sna tshogs sam/ smin pa'/ tha dad par 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa
130a5(dkon brtsegs): khams chos kyi khams gcig pu 'di las srid par smri ba thams cad du lus sngosangs sam/ dkar ba'am/ ser ba 'am/ khra bo 'am/ dmar po 'am/ rang bzhin gyis
130a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyen por skye bar 'gyur ro// bzang skyong gzhan yang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongasu btang nas sa bon du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid rkang lag dang ldan par shes
130a7(dkon brtsegs): so// 'on kyang de la yan lag dang nying lag ni med do// de yang sa'i khams yongasu btang nas chos kyi khams yongasu 'dzin te/ chos kyi khams de yang dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan no// 
130a8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa de yang spyod yul gyis stabs dang ldan no// chos kyi khams dran pa dang mtshung 'a dza len pa'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa yin te/ rnam par shes pa ma gtogs par yang chos kyi
130b1(dkon brtsegs): khams mi dmigs la/ chos kyi khams ma gtogs par yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med do// rlung gi khams ni rnam par shes pa de'i rje su 'jug go// gzhan yang lha'i khams 'di lta
130b2(dkon brtsegs): ste dran pa'i khams dang / tshor ba'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa rnams kyang rjes su 'jug go// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom
130b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de gzugs can lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong 'di la nang gi gzugs dang phyi rol gyi gzu gas yod de/ de la nang gi gzugs gang zhe na/ zin pa'i mig gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// 
130b5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi ga zugs so// rna ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzu gas so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi
130b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs so// sna gang yin de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugaso// lce gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugaso// lce'i rnam par shes/ 
130b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// lus gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// bzang skyong
130b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na mi dmus long zhig nub mo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pa na/ lha'i gzugs rkang lag mnyam shing mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dag mthong la/ des de dag mthong nas mchog tu
131a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba bskyed de/ gnyid log pa las sang pa dang gzugs de dag ma mthong sa// de nas langs nas 'di skad du khyad tsun cig 'dang mtsham mo bdag gi rmi lam du
131a2(dkon brtsegs): med kyi gzugs mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dang / bskyed mod tshal mi stong gis gang ba mthong ste/ der bdag gis mi lus shin tu gzhon sha can lag pa glang po che mchog gi sna ltar
131a3(dkon brtsegs): ring ba/ thul gong yangs shing rgyas la/ brang yangs shing 'khregs pa dag mthong ngo // zhes smra zhing mi de dag gi lus kyi rgyan mdzes pa gang yin pade dag bzlas la/ de nas dmus
131a4(dkon brtsegs): long des mi de dag nyid kyi gzugs rnams ma mthong na/ dbazang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dmus long des rmi lam du gzugs ji ltar mthong / bzang skyong
131a5(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag bka' stsal du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzang skyong de bas na nang gi mig
131a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang ldan pas rmi lam du gzugs rnams mthong gi sha'i mig gis ni me yin no// ji ltar mi gnyid kyis log 'i rmi lam du yud tsam zhig dran par 'byung ba bzhin du shi ba'i dran
131a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nang gi gzugs de yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// bzang skyong gzhan yang mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de sa bon gyi khams bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro ba/ 
131a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad par bya ste/ dper na sa bon gyi khams sa gzhi la btab na/ khams bzhi po dag sdud par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang dran pa rab tu 'dzin cing
131b1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba yongasu 'dzin to// dge ba dang / mi dge ba yang rjes su bzung nas/ lus yongs su btang ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de dge ba
131b2(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'gyur/ bzang skyong dper na nor bu rin po pad+ma rAg ni 'od nag po 'am/ dkar po 'dzin te/ 'od kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du nor bu rin po che de la 'byung zhing
131b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i rang bzhin nyid nor bu rin po che las snang bar 'gyur te/ gnas gang dang gang du 'phos pa de dang der kha dog dag snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs
131b4(dkon brtsegs): su bzung nas 'pho zhing 'gro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na lus 'di la rnam par shes
131b5(dkon brtsegs): brtogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong rnam par shes pa 'di bsags pa'am spungs par yang mi dmigs
131b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di skye zhing 'gag pa'i phyir ro// bzang skyong dper na sa bon las ni myu gu 'byung mod kyi sa bon rul pa las myu gu 'byung
131b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur la/ sa bon ma nyams pa las kyang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur lte/ myu gu yang 'grub par 'gyur na bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ myu gu de'i sa bon sdong bu
131b8(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ lo ma 'am/ sbugs gang na gnas/ sa bon ni shing gi rtse mo na yang mi gnas so// de bzhin du lus 'di la rnam par shes pa gang na yang mi gnas te/ mig la yang / 
132a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ rna ba la yang ma yin/ sna'i dbang po la gnas pa yang ma yin no// sa bon gyi myu gu skye ba gang yin pa de ni sems pa chung ba yin no// 
132a2(dkon brtsegs): mngal du skye ba de ni tshor ba chung ba yin no// dper na myu gu 'byung zhing dus tshigs dang ldan pa na me tog rnams 'grub ste/ me tog grub na 'bras bu 'grub pa yod pa de zhin du rnam par shes
132a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khamos 'dis lus 'grub par 'gyur ro// lus grub pa na yan lag dang nying lag gang la yang rnam par shes pa mi gnas la/ rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye bar mi 'gyur
132a4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ dper na shing yongasu smin pa las sa bon 'byung la/ yongs su ma smin pa las ma yin pa de bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lus las rnam par shes pa 'di snang bar 'gyur/ 
132a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ srid pas bsdams ba/ dran pas yongs su bzung ba/ dge ba la da migs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ mi dge ba la mi dmig
132a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ rlung gi khams kyis yongasu zin pa shes pas mngon par brlan pa rkyen la mngon du phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa pha ma phrad pa na skye bar 'gyur ro// dper na me
132a7(dkon brtsegs): long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa la bzhin gzugs rnyan snang yang / bzhin med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung la/ me long med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung ste/ 
132a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bzhin dang me long phrad pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs brnyan yin la/ de la tshor ba dang rab tu shes pa yang med/ lus ga/ 
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du bskyod pa de dang de nyid du gzugs brnyan 'pho zhing / ji lta bur lus smra ba dang / 'bod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bskum pa dang / bskyang bar byed pa de bzhin du gzhan
132b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gzugs brnyan yang 'gyur bar snang ngo // bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems gang gi dbang gis gzugs brnyan de dmigs par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gis gsol po/ mi'i dbang gis
132b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan gda' ste/ de yang me long gi rkyen gyi gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan gda' la/ gzhan gyi mdog ci 'dra ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / dbang po tshang ba de nyid kyi
132b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan 'byung lag so// bzang skyong ji ltar lu sa kyi dbang dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen gyi rgyu dan gyis gzugs brnyan 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du
132b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis lus 'di tshor ba myong zhing 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / yid la bye dpa'agrub par byed do// de la me long gang yin pa de ni pho ma
132b6(dkon brtsegs): phrad pa lta bur blta'o// ji ltar lus snang na gzugs brnyan mi snang ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin yod pa spangs nas/ yang chu'i nang du
132b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su btang ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin 'phangs nas phung po gzhan thob par gyur to// de per
132b8(dkon brtsegs): na sa bon gyi khams chung ngu zin kyang shing n+ya gro ta dang / u dum pa ral sogs pa'i shing gi phung po chen po bskyed nas yang shing de yongasu btang ste/ shi she yun gzhin 'dzin las
133a1(dkon brtsegs): bon gyi khams yongasu btang ba na/ dus bzlog par 'gyur bas shing de'i khams kyi bcud med par 'gyur ro// khams kyi bcud rnams med par gyur bas ni
133a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phra zhing mi gsal ba 'dis kyang lus rnams bskyed nas// yang yongasu btang ste/ lus gzhan dag sgrub par byed
133a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na nas dang / til dang / gro dang / mon sran gre'u dang / mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i sa bon cung zad gang na yod pa der cung zad sems pa lta bur gnas par 'gyur ba de
133a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang se mas can gyi ris gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der sem sa pa yongasu bzung zhing / 'tsho ba chung ngu dang / bsod nam/ 
133a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bsod nams ma yin pa rje su bzung nas/ 'dzu garten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho'o// dper na bung ba rol sred pas yun ring du me tog la gnas te/ long
133a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad nas me tog yongasu btang ste me tog gzhan du 'pho la/ bung ba de yang me tog dri mi zhim pa longs spyad nas/ dri zhim par 'gro bar byed do// me tog gang dang gang la 'byar ba de
133a7(dkon brtsegs): dang de la chags shing ro yang myong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i lus blangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu longs spyad nas/ phyir yang
133a8(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du lus blangs te/ des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myong nas yang phung po lnga po gzhan dag len to// de la rnam par shes
133b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di ji ltar blta zhe na/ dper na gur gum gyi sa bon nam/ leb rgan dri'i sa bon rnams rang bzhin gyis dkar la de dag gi khong na myu gu ya mi snang / me tog kyang mi/ 
133b2(dkon brtsegs): snang / kha dog kyang mi snang yang sa bon de so'i khams la btab na/ chu'i khams kyis yongs su brlan nas myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed de/ myu gu mngon par 'grub na/ 
133b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ sngon po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang kha dog de yang sa bon gyi khong na mi gnas la/ sa bon med na yang kha dog dang myu gu 'byung
133b4(dkon brtsegs): babar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongasu btang nas/ mi'i sha n+ya gas can yin la/ sha snag gu'i dbang po 'byung ba'i
133b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dang ldan pa ma yin te/ de lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang ldan zhing / sgra dang / dri dang / ro nga/ chos kyi skye mched rab tu shes pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur
133b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di snyam du gang bdag gis las byas pa de nyid ni bdag yin no snyam du yang shes so// lus de yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa yin te/ dper na dar gyi srin
133b7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lus las skud pa'i rgyud byung bas khyim byas la de nyid de'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus bskyed nas dar gyi srin bu bzhi
133b8(dkon brtsegs): du bdag nyid yang lus yongs su btang nas med par 'gyur ro// dper na pad+ma tshuro nang nas skyes te lha'i dri dang / kha dog mngon par 'grub kyang / pad+ma dkar po de la chu'i khams
134a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dmigs la/ de'i nang du mi snang bar gyur nas/ gang dus bon gnas pa der / kha dog dang dri dang / ro rnams gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
134a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang du 'pho zhing 'gro ba der dbang po dag gi spyod yul rnams 'pho bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang / sems pa dang / chos kyi khams rnams kyang der 'pho// 
134a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che gang du 'gro ba der longs spyod thams cad 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma dang 'brel pa'i 'od zer rnams nyi
134a4(dkon brtsegs): ma gang dang gang du 'gro de dang de nyid du 'od zer rnams kyang / rjesu 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i kham sa 'di dag gang du 'pho ba de dang de nyid du tshor ba dang / 'du
134a5(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / chos kyi khams rnams kyang 'pho zhing 'gro'o/ gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang nas/ dngos po thams cad kyi phrad pa yongasu bzung
134a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sha med pa dang / rus pa med pa'i lus 'grub par byed do// de'i lus len pa'i rgyu ni gzugs yin no// dbang po'i dngos po rnams ni tshor bas myong ngo // dran pa ni lha'i lta bas
134a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongasu len to// dper na rgya shug dang / 'bra go dang / a mra dang / nyo ti dang / so'u dang / bil ba dang / ka bide ta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni/ 
134a8(dkon brtsegs): ro du mar 'grub ste/ tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha'i ro dang / bska ba la sogs pa'i ro re rer rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ la la ni ro tsha bar 'gyur/ la la ni sgra/ 
134b1(dkon brtsegs): la la ni dngar ro// 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho ba der ro yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho
134b2(dkon brtsegs): bde dang der tshor ba 'pho bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang dran pa yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis ni lus
134b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang nas/ bdag gis lu zhi yongs su btang ngo snyam du rab tu shes so// de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o// dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// 
134b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te/ de bas/ 
134b5(dkon brtsegs): na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus 'di bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// dper na rlung gi khams grang
134b6(dkon brtsegs): bar yang 'gyur zhingache bar yang 'gyur la/ dri zhim po yang ldan zhing / dri nga bar yang ldan ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad ni rlung gi khams kyi rkyen las byung yang / rlung gi khams
134b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang gzugs can ma yin la len pa'i rgyus snang ste/ ji ltar rlung gi khams kyis shing g.yo ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i reg pa len pa'i rkyen byed pa las rlung gi khams she
134b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te/ gzugs len pa'i rkyen dang / 'dod pa len pa'i rkyen dang / lta ba len pa'i rkyen dang / 
135a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa len pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis lus dang kha dog skye zhing 'grub
135a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas rna rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
135a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das gzugs ji ltar lta bar bgyi/ len pa ni ji lta bu lags/ las len pa ni ji lta bu lags// lta ba len pa ni ji ltar lta bu lags/ 
135a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len/ ji ltar lta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba 'byor pa legaso legaso// mkhas
135a5(dkon brtsegs): pas ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar shes so// zla ba la byor pa 'di na kha dog bzang po 'am kha dog ngan pa yang rung ste/ de ni sha kham tshad dang / cha dang rgyus pa dang / mgo bo dang / glad pa dang / 
135a6(dkon brtsegs): rus pa dang / rkang pa dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / lto dang / glo ba dang / phyi sa dang / gcin dang / lgang pa dang / po ba dang / long ka
135a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / mkhris pa dang // bad kan dang / dar snabs dang / skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / spu dang / lpags pas g.yogs
135a8(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu gyur pa/ mi sdug pa dang / mi gtsang ba mang po la brten pa'o// gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyur byas pa/ 
135b1(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par 'grub ste/ de yang pha ma phrad pa'i rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur ste ga de bas na gzugs len pa'i rgyu zhes bshad do// zla ba 'byor pa lus kyi sra ba nyid gang yin pa
135b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni sa'i khams so// gsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams so// dro ba nyid dang smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni me'i kham so// g.yo bo nyid dang / skum pa dang / bskyang
135b3(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams so// lus de'i rab tu shes pa dang / ro'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / reg pa'i khams dang / dran pa gang yin pa de ni rnam
135b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la cho dang dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes
135b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dis gzugs kyi khams ji ltar yongasu gtong bar 'a gyur/ lus las rnam par shes pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus yongasu gting nas 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag
135b6(dkon brtsegs): gi khog pa yin no snyam du ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba 'byor pa 'dir lus 'di gnas par gyur nas dus log par gyur nas/ khams rnams
135b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gto gyur te/ dper na 'o ma dang chu bsres te lhan cig tu bzhag pa me dang phrad na/ 'o ma yang logro shig tu 'gyur zhing chu yang logs shig tu 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i snum gyi khams gang
135b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin no// zlab 'byor pa de bzhin du mi shi ba'i khag pa yang logs shig tu 'gyur/ khams rnams kyang log shig tu 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa yang long/ 
136a1(dkon brtsegs): shig tu yang 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa de yang khams kyi rten yongasu blangs nas/ chos kyi khams yongasu len to// dran pa ni chos kyi khams dang / 'brel bar/ 
136a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ dran pa chos kyi khams dang 'brel ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba blangs nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na dge ba chen po zhes bya ba'i sman mar de ni sman ro che ba
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan cha'i ro dang / bska ba'i ro'i mthu dang / rnam par smin pa du ma blangs nas lus kyi nang du 'gro'o// dge ba'i sman mar gyi ro'i mthu dang / rnam par smin pa de
136a4(dkon brtsegs): nang du song bas/ lus la kha dog dang dri dang ro skyed par byed cing / de mar gyi khams yongasu btang nas/ lus la 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus
136a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu btang nas/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongasu blangs shi nga chos kyi khams yongasu blangs nas rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi khams gang yin pa de ni lus
136a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'o// sman rnams phrad pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams phrad pa lta bu'o// sman rnams kyi kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa lta bu'o// 'pho bag
136a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni shi ba'i rnam par shes pa 'pho ba lta bur blta bar bya'o// mi'i kha dog rgyas pa dang / mdog bzang zhing bde bar smin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba lta bur bstan to// dge ba chen po'i
136a8(dkon brtsegs): sman mar des mdog ngan cing skya bor 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba lta bur bstan to// dge ba chen po'i sman mar rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du ni rnam par shes pa'i khams blta bar bya'o// 
136b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar dge ba chen po'i sman mar gyis sman rnams kyi kha dog 'jug par byed cing / ro dang / dri 'jug par byed kyang / mar de la skang lag dang mig med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis
136b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongasu btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su len cing / tshor ba yongasu len te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongasu len to// zla ba 'byor pa mi shi 'phos pa
136b3(dkon brtsegs): des kyang lha'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmya ba bcu drug kyang mthong ngo // bdag nyid kyi lus rkang lag mnyam pa yang mthong ste/ 
136b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no snyam du yang shos so// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i dran pas lha'i ltas khang pa ba rtsegs pa rnam par bkra zhing shing gel pa dang / 'khri shing dang / 
136b5(dkon brtsegs): ldum bu sna tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ gser ba tsem gsar pa'i mdog ltar smra ba spras pa rnam par dbye ba byas pa dag mthong ngo // des ltas de mthong nas
136b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ de dga' ba skyes pa des bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa de ni rta la zhon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste/ 
136b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na g.yul ngor chas pa na/ dmag ma'i nang na mi tsi la ma rag par chas pa sgra las bzung ste/ myur ba myur bar zhon pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang dge ba la dmigs pa dang
136b8(dkon brtsegs): 'brel cing dbugs rgyu ba rgod pas chos kyi khams yongs su blangs shing skye mched 'gags te/ lus bor nas lha'i gnas 'og min man chad tshangs pa'i bar du yongs su len par
137a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas sman chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
137a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol/ rnam par shes pa lus las 'pho ba de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen da ltar khyod kyis nga la ji
137a3(dkon brtsegs): skad bskul ba de bzhin te/ leg so legs so// dri ba 'di ni mchog tu zab bo// dri ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par bya ba yin te/ rnam par shes pa de ston pa ni de
137a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan med do//  nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu
137a5(dkon brtsegs): sman chen ni zab mo'i zhu ba zhu ba la mkhas pa lags te/ blo zhib cing 'dzangs la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin
137a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni bcom ldan 'as rnam par gzigs la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// bzang skyong rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i
137a7(dkon brtsegs): bar du gzhan mu stegs can du gyur nas 'di snyam du rtog ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di su'i yon/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
137a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ci lta bu zhig yin snyam mo// bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba khong du chud de/ ngas 'di'i the tshom bsal bar bya'o// de nas tshong dpon bzang skyong gis sla/ 
137b1(dkon brtsegs): chen la 'di skad ces smras so// sman chen legaso legs so// khyod ni shes rab rgya che zhing yangs la chos zab mo zhu ba la mkhas so// sman chen bcom ldan 'das ye shes la
137b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa blo dag pa'i rtse bar gyur pa la bskul cig/ zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni byis pa ste yul sred pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la lan 'ga' yang ma bskul bskul ba ma
137b3(dkon brtsegs): byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' la/ dam pa'i chos dang phrad pa yang shin tu rnyed par dkas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zab pa zab pa'i gnas rnams bcom
137b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la bskul cig/ de nas sman chen gyis bco ma ldan 'das kyi zhal ston ka'i dus kyi me tog pad+ma'i tshe dal ltar rgyas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sman chen dad pa
137b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'tshol ba lags na bde bar gshegs pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ bskal pa'i
137b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar ma thub par yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gshegs pa zhig tu gyur nas/ de'i srid na sems can 'di dag gis las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma 'tshal to// 
137b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba ni yongasu 'khyam par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen ngas tshigasu bcad pa phyed kyi don gyi phyir yang brag gi rtse mo nas rang gi lus bor te
137b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba rnam pa brgya stong du ma nyamasu myong ngo // sman chen khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la lan gdab po// de skad ces bka' stsal nA// bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad
138a1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen sgyu ma mkhan gyi mi'i rang
138a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang yang yin pa dang / mi'i grib mchu'i nang du 'byung ba gsal ba yin zhing / mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang yin pa dang / mig dang na mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / srid pa'i rang bzhin ga
138a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa bzhin no// sman chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ snying du sngags pa'i mi mthong ba na mig gi dbang
138a4(dkon brtsegs): bopo 'pho ba dang / ji ltar mis me long la rang gi bzhin gyi/ gzugs brnyan mthong la/ me long gud du phyung na rang gi bzhan gyi gzugs brnyan mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ 
138a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'phos na/ rang gi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams des mthong ngo // dper na mi dmus long gis nyin
138a6(dkon brtsegs): 'char ba 'am/ nyi ma gang na 'dag pa yang mi mthong la mtshan mo yang zla ba 'char ba dang / nub pa mi mthong ba de bzhin du rnamasar shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus la mi snang ngo // sman
138a7(dkon brtsegs): chen 'on kyang lus la sred pa dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin te/ de yang lus 'di'i khams rnams dang / skye mched rnam/ 
138a8(dkon brtsegs): dang phung po rnams 'phrad par byed pa yin no// de la gzugs can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ mig dang rna ba dang sna dang ro dang sgra rnams so// tshor ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba dang
138b1(dkon brtsegs): yid rnams ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i dngos po ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no// sman chen ji ltar mi'i lce'i thor tos ro kha ba dang tsha ba dang sbyar ba dang dang rab dang lan tsha'i ro
138b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bska ba tsher te de'i lce de yang gzugs can yin la/ ro'i dngos po yang gzugs can yin no// de bzhin du lus 'di la yang rus pa dang rkang dang / sha dang / khrag ni gzugs can
138b3(dkon brtsegs): yin la tshor ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs can ma yin te gang gis rnam par smin pa dang / bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa'o// de nas bzang skyong // 
138b4(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bco ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang bsod nams ma lags pa myong
138b5(dkon brtsegs): bde gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig/ bden pa ma mthong bar ni/ rnam par shes pa 'di mi mthong ste/ de ni lag mthil
138b6(dkon brtsegs): duskyu ru ra gzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de ni mgo la yang mi gnas te mig las kyang skye ba mthong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snye
138b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang gzugs can ma yin par thugs su chud de 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i phyir/ rnam pa
138b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams 'di dpes bstan to// bzang skyong 'di na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig ste/ dper na mi la la
139a1(dkon brtsegs): skes byed dam/ brjed byed dam dri za'i gdon rnams lha'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ bzang skyong 'di jisnyam du sems/ ci mi de'i bong na 'dug pa'i sem byed dam// 
139a2(dkon brtsegs): za 'am/ lha de snang ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// mi de'i nang ngam slad rol na yang gdon mi gda' ste gdon de dag ni gzugs ma mchis pa lags so// bzang skyong
139a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin tu dri zhim pa dang / spos dang gdug pa dang / me tog phreng byin pa len pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pas kyang lus blangs
139a4(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/ tshong dpon nyid/ ma/ lha nyid byed du 'jug ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes dpa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams myang ba yin gdon de
139a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog phreng ba byin pas rangs par 'gyur zhing mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug nyid la dag
139a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / lus de yang tshim par 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no// bzang skyong dper na srul po'i gdon mi sdug cing gzugs mi snang ba
139a7(dkon brtsegs): memi'i lus la gnas te/ mi gtsang ba dang / rul pa dang / ldan ljin dang / gtor khung nas 'bab pa dang / gtor ma 'dod cing de yang gtor ma des dga' bar 'gyur la mi de yang
139a8(dkon brtsegs): gdon gyi dbang gis dring zhing mi gtsang ba las byung ba'i kha zas bcig bal chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin
139b1(dkon brtsegs): par nye bar 'gro ba'i las kyis skye gnas ngan par bskyed de dbul po 'am/ yi dgas ngan pa 'am/ ldan ljin za ba dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par
139b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba yang yin no// dper na lha'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
139b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin pa 'di yang bsod nams gzugs can ma yin pas yongs su bzung nas lha'i lus rnams bskyed par byed do// dper na srul po'i gdon gzugs med pa
139b4(dkon brtsegs): mi la gnas shing phyi sa dang / ljan ljin za bar byed pa de debazhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang bsod// nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis
139b5(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nas ma yin par nye bar 'gro bar yang lta'o// bzang skyong de bas
139b6(dkon brtsegs): no khyod kyis gdan gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams lta bur blta'o// gdon gyi longs spyod bzang po dang ngan pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba dang // 
139b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba lta bur lta'o// mi gang yin pa de ni lus lta bur lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni
139b8(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i rgyu ji ltar lta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di na phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de/ dper na rtsub stan las kyang brten/ rtsub
140a1(dkon brtsegs): shing las kyang brten// de skyed pa mi'i rtsol ba las kyang brten te/ me 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di len pa'i rgyu skyes pa dang / bud med
140a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rkyen gyis sgra dang / reg pa dang / ro dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// dper na me tog las 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang me tog de
140a3(dkon brtsegs): la yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/ 'bras bur grub pa la yang me tog mi dmigs pa de bzhin du lus 'di las rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ 'on kyang lus de la yang rnam par shes pa mi snang
140a4(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par shes pa ldog pas kyang / lus kyi rus pa dang / rkang dang / mer mer po dang / mi gtsang ba rnams rnam para'a'ajig par 'gyur ro// dper na sa ben de me tog gi kha dog
140a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dri dang / ro 'debs pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i kham sa 'dis kyang / lus yongasu btang nas dge ba dang / mi dge ba btab cing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed
140a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang btab nas/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o// dper na skyes pa dang / bud med gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis phrad nas/ dga' bas brlan te/ bud med la shin tu dam por 'khyud nas/ nyon mongs
140a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'byin par byed de/ de gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa med par gyur nas yang bral bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ der nyon mongs pa phyung nas/ 'dod
140a8(dkon brtsegs): chags med par gyur te/ yang gcig la gcig 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas dga' ba bskyed de/ chags pa 'phel bar
140b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// dper na lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyi gzugs mthong nas/ skyes pa'i 'dod chags bskyed la yang phrad pa las dral na/ phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes/ 
140b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'dis lus yongasu blangs nas yang bor te gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro// 'di la pham phrad pa dang dri za nye bar gnas pa dang / las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par
140b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lus 'grub par byed de/ las de dag kyang gzugs can ma yin la/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen gyi ngo bo de yang gzugs can ma yin no// len pa'i skyon las 'dod pa 'byung ste/ 
140b4(dkon brtsegs): de bas na 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// gzugs kyi 'dod pa len pas na/ de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// sman chen gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs
140b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa de gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / 
140b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par bde ba bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o// de'i mchog tu 'dzin pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
140b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i len pa ni srid pa ste/ lha dang mir skyo zhing skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa bskyed pa ste/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i yongasasu smin par byed do// phung po rnam
140b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa bon yang brlan par byed do// las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyang sdud par byed do// rnam par shes pa yang sbyor bar byed do// nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang bsreg par byed de/ 
141a1(dkon brtsegs): de bas na 'di ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyi
141a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis ji ltar lha'i nang du lus yongasu len pa lags/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar na len pa lags/ bcom
141a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'das chos kyi khams yongasu blangs nas/ lha'i lta ba bskyed de/ de'i lta ba de yang sha'i
141a4(dkon brtsegs): mig la brten pa ma yin no// de'i lta bas mthong ba gang yin pa de ni len pa zhes bya ste/ de bas na lta ba'i le na pa zhes bya'o// de'i lha'i lta ba bsod nams la dmigs
141a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa des/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste/ der lha rnam sa lnga'i rtse ba dag gis rtse ba mthong nas// de der chags pa
141a6(dkon brtsegs): skye'o// 'di snyam du yang sems te/ bdag ni der 'gro'o snyam mo// des der chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa srid pa rab tu shes so// dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de yang des
141a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongasu len pa'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bas gso snyam mo// 
141a8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shos pa kha dog de la chags nas/ ci'i slad du mi gnas/ 
141b1(dkon brtsegs): khog pa de nyid ci'i slad du mi brten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na/ mi la la'i skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ skra dang kha spu de mthong nas/ mi de 'dis
141b2(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ skra 'di dag ni dri zhim zhing gnag pa yin gyis/ 'di dag ni phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam na sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems// ci skra de dag phyir skye bar
141b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis khog pa
141b4(dkon brtsegs): bor nas phyir yang khog pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gi nas med do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// / 
141b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams cha phra zhing mi mngon pa 'disaglang po che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de cing / rdo rje ltar sra ba'i khog pa yang ji ltar rtol bar
141b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa'i mi dang / glang po che'i rgyal po yang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na/ rlung gi khams
141b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i ri phrag na gan pa de yang ri phrag de nas byung ste/ ri rab dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i ri'i rtse mo rnyil bar byed cing / dgyes par byed na sman tshin 'di ji snya
141b8(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ri de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu/ sman chen gyis gsol pa/ rlung gi khams ni snyi zhing lus ma mchis par lta bar bgyi'o// bcom
142a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de de bzhin te/ ji ltar rlung gi khams snyi zhing lus med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang zhan cing lus med mod/ 
142a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lus chen po dag dang chung ngu dag bskyed par byed de/ sbrang bu'i yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin to// glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no// dper na mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba 'am/ 
142a3(dkon brtsegs): khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus len pa'i rgyu des na gzugs chung ngu dang / chen po rnams 'grub par byed do// 
142a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sgo na chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci las de'i gzugs can zhig lags som// ngan
142a5(dkon brtsegs): te gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ rang bzhin/ ji lta bu la gas/ rkyen ni ji lta bu dag las blta bar bgyibacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di la
142a6(dkon brtsegs): las rnams kyi spyod yul ni lha'i bde ba dag dang 'byor pa dag dang / lha'i kha zas thob pa yin te/ dper na mi dbul po gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyam pa las/ der gcig gis ni chu
142a7(dkon brtsegs): bsil ba rnyed la/ gcig ni skom ste shi na/ chud la la zhig gis snyim pas chu bcus te/ mi de la byin pa yang med/ la la zhig gis mi tsog shos de la bkag pa med kyis/ bsod
142a8(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi mthu 'ba' zhig gis cig gis ni chu rnyed la/ gcig gis ni ma rnyed pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de dag blta bar bya'o// zla ba yar gyi ngo dang / mar
142b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin du lta bar bya'o// dper shing tog rlon pa yongasu smin pa na/ kha dog gzhan du 'gyur te/ kha dog de dag dang yongs su smin pa yang
142b2(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lus 'di yang bsod nams kyi dbang gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gser 'byor pa dag tu rgyan nye bar ston to// lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan
142b3(dkon brtsegs): dag nye bar ston te/ dbang phyug gi rgyan gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi dper bstan to// dper na sa bon sa la btab na/ shing gi rtse mor snang bar 'gyur la/ sa bon de yang sdong bu nas sdong / 
142b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med cing / shing gi nang na yang sa bon de mi dmigs la/ mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis ngas bon de blangs te/ shing gi rtse mor bzhag par yang med
142b5(dkon brtsegs): cing sa bon rtsa ba nas 'pho ba yang mi dmigs ba de bzhin du las dge ba dang / mi dge ba lus la gnas pa rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo // dper na sa bon
142b6(dkon brtsegs): las me tog 'grub pa na/ sa bon gyi nang na yang me tog mi snang zhing / me tog gis nang na yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/ sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer med pa/ 
142b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du lus las kyang las 'byung / las las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi/ lus kyi nang na las mi snang / las kyi nang na yang lus mi snang ngo // dper na me tog yo
142b8(dkon brtsegs): su smin pa ni/ 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ lus smin na las rnams dmigs so// dper na gang na sa bon gnas der me tog 'byung bar snang ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di
143a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der las dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste/ las de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par smin pa yang gzugs
143a2(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin no// dper na mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa 'byung la/ mi de nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ grib ma de yang mi de'i lus dang 'brel ba ma yin/ 
143a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di la dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'brel par 'dug ste/ lus gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams
143a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brang bar 'gyur te/ lus kyi dbang gis las rnams de'i'adrang ba ma yin la/ lus med na yang las rnams deskye bar mi 'gyur ro// dper na sman tsha ba dang / kha ba dang
143a5(dkon brtsegs): bska pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus la bkru sman pa tang na/ nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / lha'i mdog rgyas pa yang lus la snang bar 'gyur ba de/ 
143a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sman tsha ba dang / kha ba rnams kyis lus kyi mngag gzhon shar 'dug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing 'di snyam du mi 'dis ni/ sman zos gor ma chags go snyam du shes
143a7(dkon brtsegs): pabar 'gyur mod kyi/ sman de dag gi ro dang / smin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ ro dang sbyin pa gzugs can ma yin pa yang mi'i mdog rgyas pa las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhi
143a8(dkon brtsegs): du dge ba'i las 'di ying gzugs can ma yin te/ de las lus 'grub nas kha zas dang nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod dang / gos kyi bye brag gi dbang gi rkang lags
143b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam zhing / mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te/ nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul 'byor par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no// rigs dang longs spyod rgyas shing
143b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa las nyams pa dang / nye bar spyad pa dang bral zhing gzhan la re ba dang / kha zas ngan par za zhing mal stan ngan pa dang / gzugs ngan cing mi sdug pa'i lus can gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge
143b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dper na me long gi dbang gi bzhan gyi mdog sdug pa 'am mi sdug pa snang la me long gi gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs ma yin pa de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge
143b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa 'di rnams dang / mi rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sman chen
143b5(dkon brtsegs): las rnams ni de ltar blta bar bya'o// de ltar na las 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis dab
143b6(dkon brtsegs): po rnams ji ltar 'bebs/ lus chen po yang ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di lta ste dper na rngon pa nags thibs po'i nang du so
143b7(dkon brtsegs): nas gzhu shin tu bkang ste/ dug mangs spos kyi glang po che bong tshed che ba la/ bsnun la dug de yang khrag dang phrad na yan lag dang / nying lag rnamasu 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ dbang po'i spyod yul
143b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dir la gnad rnams snun cing khrag gis khog sgyur te/ yan lig dang / nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la/ phyir yang lus bor nas/ dug de lus phyir byung
144a1(dkon brtsegs): na sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ dug de dang glang po che'i khog pa de'i tshad ji tsam/ gsol pa/ ri rab dang / sungs 'bru bzhin lag so// bka' stsal pa/ 
144a2(dkon brtsegs): dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongasu spong zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la khams rnams kyang yongasu gtongango // de ltar na rnam pa/ 
144a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do// sman chen gzhan yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'iji ltar lus chen po yang su 'dzin par bgyid ces zer ba ni/ ji lta/ 
144a4(dkon brtsegs): kho lag che zhing rags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa debazhin te/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'phangs du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ de yang klu'i rgyal
144a5(dkon brtsegs): po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis kyis gsum khris yongasu bkris te/ klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bas rgya mtsho btung bar mi rung bar 'gyur zhing de gnyis
144a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbugs kyis ri rab kyang g.yo bar byed de// de gnyis ji ltar dug che la spro ba che zhing yangs pa bzhin du nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o// sman chen 'di ji skad du sem/ 
144a7(dkon brtsegs): dedag gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhon no// snang bu'i yang gzhan no snyam na de ltar ltab myi ste/ sman chen 'di ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid snang bu'i yang yin la/ de nyid de dag gi yang yin// 
144a8(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ dug bdas na ba dang / ha la ha la'i thogs pa chung ngu yang klu'i rgyal po dga' dang / nye dga' la sogs pa de dag gis zos na/ de dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di
144b1(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ dga'o dang nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / bdas na pa dang / ha la ha la'i dug gi thigs pa gang yin pa de'i nang na/ ches mang ba gang yin/ gsol pa/ 
144b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dga'o dang nye dga' gnyis kyi dug ches mang bar lta bar bgyi ste/ bdas na ba dang / ha la ha la'i dug ni de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
144b3(dkon brtsegs): sman chen de bzhin du lus chen po glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chung zhing mi gsal la gzugs can ma yin par lta bar bya'o// rnam pa
144b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de yang las kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par byed de/ dper na shing n+ya gro da'i sa bon tu dang du las/ shing gi rgyal po mtho zhing rgyo che la/ yal
144b5(dkon brtsegs): gdang / yal ga phre'u brgyad stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di ji snyam sems/ sa bon de'i tshad ni ji tsam shing de'i tshad ni ji
144b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru'i nang dang / bar snang bzhin te/ khyad che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du sa bon de'i nang
144b7(dkon brtsegs): na yang shing mi snang la/ sa bon med na yang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/ ji ltar sa bon phra mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa cha phra ba las gzugs chen po 'gru/ 
144b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ lus la yang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs la/ rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye ba mi dmigs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
145a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des lus nyam chung ba rnams ji ltar
145a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na/ mi dbul po la la zhig gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rinapa rnyed nas des yid bzhin gyi
145a3(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che de blangs nas/ lha'i gnas dang / skyed mos tshal dang / skyed 'tshal dang / zhing dang / ra ba dang / sgo khang dang / shing gel pa dang / 'khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor
145a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / khang pa me tog gis gtor ba dang / rdzas dang / yo bya du dag sprul na/ sman chen de dag thams cad ni mi brtan zhing nyams chung la myur du 'gyes shing / 
145a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de ma de'i lag nas stor nas/ de'i bde ba'i long spyod/ de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid bzhin gyi
145a6(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis kyang mi phyed la de'i yo byad de dag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po rang bzhin lta bu yin la lus
145a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni snying po med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams zhan pa de ji ltar gzugs 'khrang zhing sra ba phye ste 'pho zhing mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
145a8(dkon brtsegs): stsal ba/ sman chen dper na/ chu'i rgyun shin tu 'jam pa ri'i gseb na 'dug pas ri de nyid brtol khyung na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems// de'i nang na ches sra ba gang yin/ gsol ga
145b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis 'khrang la rdo rje ltar brtan zhing sra ba lags la/ chab ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing reg na bde ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rna
145b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan pas lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can gyi ris na sems can shi 'phos te/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye
145b3(dkon brtsegs): ba len pa lags// ji ltar sems can dmyal rnamasu skye ba yongasu len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ sems can de shi 'phos na
145b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed kyis yongasu zin nas lus yongasu btang nas/ rnam par shes pa des mi'i lta ba yongasu spangs te/ lha'i lta ba thob par
145b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de lha'i lta ba des 'dod po ni spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad mthong ngo // lus de yang 'dor bar mthong ngo // lha
145b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzas kyi lha'i gnas dang / dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshal dang / me tog gi rna rgyan dang / shing ku she sh+ya dang / ko ka na da dang / gzhal med khang dang / tshal stug po dang / lha'i bu mo rtsi bas
145b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba yang mthong // rtag tu me tog rgyas shing rnam par bkra bar byas pa'i lha'i longs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang / se mo do dang / gdub zlum dang / gdub le ba dang
145b8(dkon brtsegs): dpung rgyan spa zhing smras pas brgyan pa de dag kyang des mthong // lha gzhon nu dang lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing / yid rab tu dga' ba yang des mthong ngo // de dag mthong nas kun tu chags pa bskyed
146a1(dkon brtsegs): de de der kun tu chags pas dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// de snying dga' bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par
146a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'di ltar shin gyi don pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur zhing lta ba phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ro// sna yang yo bar mi 'gyur/ de kha yang gnam par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du de'i mig u
146a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la sngon po'i med pa ma 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i gnad rnams kyang chad par mi 'gyur/ de'i khrag kyang zag par mi 'gyur/ phyi sa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de spu zing zhes byed pa/ 
146a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ de'i sen mo rnams kyang nag pom 'gyur/ lag pa ya rang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur/ rkang lag kyang g.yod rabar mi byed/ rkang lag 'khums bzhin du 'chi ba
146a5(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro// sman chen de 'chi ba'i du/ sa kyi tshe lha'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar/ khang pa brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong gis brgyan pa
146a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ lha'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang / lnga'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i phreng ba shin du zhim pa dag mthong ngo // lha gzhon nu rgyan dang gser gyi
146a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan gyis mdzes par byas shing lus brgyan pa dag kyang mthong ngo // des lha'i gzhon nu dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// de yid dga'
146a8(dkon brtsegs): khog pa la ltas gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ se me tog kun dadang / ku mu da ltar dkar bar snang ngo // mig ha cang yang mi 'dzums/ haM cang yang mi 'byed do// sgra snyan pa dag kyang 'byung ngo // de'i
146b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur ro// shi ba'i khog pa yang hacang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/ ha cang grang bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams kyang smre sngags chen po 'dun
146b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do// de nyi ma 'chir ba'i dus kyi tshe 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// phyogs kyang mun par snang bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs shin tu dri zhim zhing shin
146b3(dkon brtsegs): du yongasu dag pa tsher bar 'gyur ro// de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur/ der lta ba yang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dad pa
146b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur/ gnyen sdug pa dag mthong na gzhig nas phyira'o ngas pa 'am/ ring mo zhig tu gud na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin du mgul nas mkhyud cing yid rab tu dga' ste/ 
146b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du srid par skyes pa thams cad kyi tshul ni 'di yin gyis/ dang dang bral ba'i phyir gdung ba ma byed par thong shig/ ces des gnyen de dag yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa/ 
146b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// sman chen gal te sems can bsod nam su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbyin pa la sred cing yud tsam re re la tshigs bcad dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / gtam sna ma/ 
146b7(dkon brtsegs): dong/ gtan tshigs sna tshogs brjod cing smra la/ de'i tshigs ga nyid la yang sred par mi 'gyur zhing gnyid kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro na/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas tshe'i 'du byed 'dor
146b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyu ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha da mo lhan cig tu khri gcig gi steng na 'dug la/ lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa de'i lag pa/ lha'i lag pa'i steng du bzhag cing
147a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag byung ste/ lha mo des me tog byung ba dag mthong nas/ lha de la 'di skad du/ lnga gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus lab / 
147a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dgyes par mdzod cig ces zer ro// des kyang me tog rnams lag par mnye zhing phur bar byed do// des me tog de dag mnyes pas sems can de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 
147a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par shes pa des kyang / dbang po rnams bor zhing dbang po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste/ khams rnams yongasu btang nas/ khams kyi don yongasu blangs te/ mi gas
147a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzugs can ma yin la/ rta zhon pa lta bu dang / nyi ma dang / me shel dang / bsreg bya lta bu dang / chu la zla raba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sbubs kyi nang gi rlung ltar
147a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba la dmigs pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o// de yang de'i tshe me tog la rten nas/ phra ma khri gcig la 'dug cing phrad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag/ 
147a6(dkon brtsegs): gi nang du 'dres par 'gyur ro// yang der bdud rtsi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha gzhon nu rna cha rngub kor dri ma med cing 'gul ba dang
147a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma lags
147a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gi gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/ rkyen rnams la yang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen
147b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang / ri dang nags tshal la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin
147b2(dkon brtsegs): du rnam par shes pa 'di yang rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams 'grub par byed do// sman chen gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun phrad de/ gcig la tsog drul cing gcub/ 
147b3(dkon brtsegs): pa las me 'grub par 'gyur te/ me de yang shing gi nang na mi snang la/ shing med na yang me 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ me de yang rkyen gyi dbang gis shing las 'grub par 'gyu/ rkyen med
147b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'byung ngo // gzugs kyi dbang gis kyang shing gi nang na me mi snang la/ shing ma togs pa yang me ming mi/ gso// sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa de yang pha ma'i
147b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis 'jug ste/ rnam par shes pa yang lus kyi na ngan mi dmigs la/ lus med par yang rnam par shes pa mi 'byung // sman chen dper na me ma byung bar gzug
147b6(dkon brtsegs): dang dro ba dang / kha dog gsal bar mi snang ngo // sman chen de bzhin du lus ma grub par rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams mi snang ngo // sman chen
147b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bar snang zhing / gzi brjid kyis lam mer 'dug kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis nyi ma'i gzugs gnag gam/ ser ram/ dkar ram
147b8(dkon brtsegs): dmar ser du mi mthong ngo // sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / smon pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg pa'i rnam pa dag gis rtogs par 'gyur gyi// lus la
148a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa gnag pa 'am/ dkar ba 'am/ gzugs su snang bar mis mi mthong ngo // dper na nyi ma tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / dro bo dang / phyir yang 'char ba dag / 
148a2(dkon brtsegs): gis rtags las snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rtags dag gis blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
148a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i rtags ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du byed kyi rtags dang / tshor ba'i rtags dang / 'du shes kyi rtags dang / 
148a4(dkon brtsegs): sems pa dang / mya ngan dang / gdung ba dang / yid mi bde ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rtags su blta'o// gzhan yod rnam par shes pa'i bag chags 'di ltar dge bar nye bar 'gro
148a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems dang / mi dge bar 'gro ba'i sems las blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom lda na 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
148a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus las byung ste myur du skye ba yongasu len pa lags/ rnam par shes pa lus las byung nas ma skyes shing yongasu ma bzung ba des ji ltar lus gzhan la gnas par
148a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ rnam par shes pa 'di ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na mi la la lag pa ring zhing thur du rkyang la g.yul gyi go cha gyon te/ lha'i rtsa
148a8(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa la zhon nas g.yul du 'gro ste/ de g.yul ngo der song nas/ mdung dang / ral gri dang / mda' dag gis snying myos te/ g.yul ngor rta'i mchog de
148b1(dkon brtsegs): las sa la lhung la/ de yang lus kyis 'bong rtsal yongasu sbyangs pa zhig ste/ myur ba myur bar sa las rta'i rgyab tu 'god par byed na/ ji ltar mi de lhung na rta la zhon pa dang / mgong che
148b2(dkon brtsegs): bas ji ltar rta nye bar gnas pa la rta la 'gong ba na/ rta 'gro bzhin du mgong pa chen po 'gong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la yang blta bar bya'o// ji ltar mi pha rol gyi dmigs
148b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis 'jigs shing skrag nas rta zhon te 'bros pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'dis thog ma shi 'phos nas lha'i dmigs pas yongasu zin cing / lha dang lha mo'i khri steng na 'dug pa
148b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ shin tu myur bar skye ba yongasu len to// sman chen gzhan yang dang po shi 'phos nas da dung ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar lta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis
148b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de ni/ dper na mo'i grib ma chu'i steng du bab pa gzu gsu yang snang mod kyi/ de gzugasu gtogs par yang blta bar mi bya'o// sman chen dper na rkang lag mnyam
148b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dro ba 'am/ grang ba 'am/ lus ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing / lus de la ni sha'i dum bu lta bu yang med do// grib ma de la ni khams kyis
148b7(dkon brtsegs): glags pa yang med do// ma'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung ba de las ni sdug bsngal ba'i sgra 'am/ bde ba'i sgra 'byung ba yang med do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'dra
148b8(dkon brtsegs): nas lus kyi khog pa bor te/ gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro// sman chen de ltar na rnam par shes pa bsod nam su nye bar 'gro ba ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongasu len par 'gyuraro// 
149a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar skye ba
149a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye ba yongasu len pa de nyon
149a3(dkon brtsegs): cig/ sman chen 'di la sems can las mi dge bas yongasu zin pa de na/ sems can gyi ris nas 'chi 'pho ste/ shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni nga nyid yin te/ sems can dmyal ba 'di na
149a4(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos so// 'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no snyam/ du dran pa skye'o// shi 'phos pa de'i lus de ni tha ma la/ pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 
149a5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag skyes pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo // dang po shi 'phos pa de mya ngan gyis g.yengs nas sem sa can dmyal ba sna tshogs snang ba mthong ngo // rnam par shes
149a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang po shi 'phos pa de'i las sems can dmyal ba dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ phyogs kha gcig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa bzhi khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas de der chags pa bskyed
149a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de chags par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus 'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i rnam par shes pa de las kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin tu rul cing mchog tu
149a8(dkon brtsegs): dri mi zhim pa mnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su lon te/ dper na mi gtsang ba dang / ldan ljin mnam po'i rkyen gyis srin bu skye ba dang / dper na zho dang / sbrang ci dang / chang mnam por
149b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen de bzhin du sems can rnams/ sems can dmyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bzang skyong gis thal
149b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi kha dog gi rnam pa ji lta bu lags/ lus kyi rnam pa ni ji lta
149b3(dkon brtsegs): bur 'grub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong der khrag gi nang na skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu klung rgal du/ 
149b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sprin sngon po 'i kha dog ltar 'gyur ro// ba tsho can gyi chu klung dgi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sha gzi gur 'byung bar
149b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gzhin nu ba dgur rim gro byas pa ltar gzhan sha can du 'gyur/ bzang skyong de na de dag lus bong che bar 'gyur to// mgo ba
149b6(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par khru brgyad par 'gyur ro// sen ma ring zhing kha spu yod la spun por 'gyur zhing rkang lag mi sdug par 'gyur te/ gal te 'jam+bu'i gling ba'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa ra
149b7(dkon brtsegs): mi la ltar 'gro na/ mthong ma thag tu 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzang skyong gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi/ de dag la
149b8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do// de skad ces bka stsa nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag kha zas ci
150a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshalabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sman chen sems can dmyal bde na de yongasu 'khyam la/ shin tu rgyang ring ba nas zangs dang ra gan dmar
150a2(dkon brtsegs): por snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshigs brjod par byed de/ kha zas 'dod pa khyed tshur sheg ces zer ro// de dag kun nas 'phungs te/ snyim pa
150a3(dkon brtsegs): bzed nas zangs dang ra ga na skol ba ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ snyim po bzed cing zangs dang ra gan skol ba'i kha zas de dag 'dod pas kha gdangs te/ zangs dang ra
150a4(dkon brtsegs): gan za bar byed do// de dag zangs dang ra gan rab tu 'bar rab des/ su ru rur rab tu 'bar zhing khog pa 'bar ba ra 'gyur ro// sman chen de dag kha zas 'dra bas bslus
150a5(dkon brtsegs): nas sdug bsngal shin tu che ba myong bar 'gyur ro// sman chen sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rus pa'i lus dag la gnas par
150a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / rus pa'i tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur to// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag rnam par shes pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur
150a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag bru ba tsha bas gzir bzhin du de na kha zas kyi bya ba yang med do// de na lha'i skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa brgya phrag mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa dag dang / gsong mo sngon po yangs
150a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa phyogs dag kyang yod par mthong ngo // de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag mthong nas yid rab tu dga' ste/ 'di skad du grogs po dag bskyed mos tshal 'di na reg na bde ba'i se
150b1(dkon brtsegs): bu ldang ba yod kyis tshur sheg ces zer te de dag 'dus nas/ myur ba myur bar bskyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'gro'o// de dag de'i nang du song nas yud tsam zhig bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed do// 
150b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi shing de dag las byung ba'i me tog de dag dang / lo ma de dag ral grir 'gyur te/ ral gri de dag gis yan lag bcod cing gshegs par byed de/ de dag ral gris
150b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad nas nyams thag pa'i sgra che kho 'byin par byed cing phyogs phyogs su 'byer ro// de dag 'byer na yang rang gi las las byung ba'i gshen rje'i mi lag na sog le dang / tho ba
150b4(dkon brtsegs): thogs shing so dang bzhin bsgyur la/ sgra 'baro zhing lu des 'bar po'i phreng bas g.yogaso la mtshon cha bza sa pa dag phyi bzhin du sgra 'byin cing 'di skad du khyed cag
150b5(dkon brtsegs): sdod cig dgar 'bros/ khyed rang gi las kyi bsgrub sa pa'i tshal 'di nyams su myong bar gyis shig ce zer te/ sman chen dper na sems can dmyal po pa'i sem
150b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen gzhan yang zhag bdun lon nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis las nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ bung ba me tog
150b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'pho ba bzhin du dngos po sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal po rnams su skye ba yongasu len to// de yang dang zo shi 'phos nas dbang med par khrid
150b8(dkon brtsegs): de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas mun pa mun nag chen por zhugs te/ mi rgod kyis khrod po bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hudad ni bdag 'je m+bu'i gleng rnam
151a1(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba bor te gnyen sdug pa yongasu spangs nas/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu mngon du gnas par gyur cing 'dug cig/ da ni mtho ris kyi lam mi mthong snyam mo// 
151a2(dkon brtsegs): der yang dar gyi srin bu rgyud gcig gis bkris pa bzhin du shin tu myur bar skye ba yongasu len te/ de yang bdag nyid kyi mgul nas zhags pas btags par shes so// bzang / 
151a3(dkon brtsegs): skyong de ltar na sems can dmyal bar sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing de ltar na de dag la rgyu'i bye brag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzang skyong spu zing zhes byed na/ 
151a4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ngo // rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen gyis kyang 'dis dad du dam pa'i chos mnyan pa 'dis na bdag 'khor ba na
151a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i tshe log par ltung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig/ bdag sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye ba yongs su len par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo
151a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag zhu ba zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong khyod
151a7(dkon brtsegs): ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ bzang skyong gis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bsags pa ni gang lags/ spungs pa ni gang lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ 
151a8(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'di la khams phrad pa'i phyir/ khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub par byed de/ shes rab dang / 
151b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / yid dang / ma rig pa dang / khams dang / spyod yul dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni bsags pa zhes bya so// de la spungs pa ni khams drug po nyid
151b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched kyi spyod yul drug dang / khams kyi rang bzhin gsum dang // skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis dang / skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang // spu dang / lpags
151b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sha dang / rnago dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / snabs dang / tshi lo dang / chu ser dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / yan lag dang / nying lag tshogs la spungs/ 
151b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// dper na 'bru spungs pa bzhin te/ nas/ dang / til dang / gro dang / mon srin sde'u mang po la spungs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du lus kyi yan lag dang
151b5(dkon brtsegs): nying log tu gtogs pa tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o// khams drug po de dag gang zhe na/ de la sa' khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
151b6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o// skye mched drug gang zhe na/ 'di la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
151b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ces bya'o// skye mched kyi spyod yul drug gang zhe na/ 'di la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos skye mched ces bya ba ste/ de dag ni spyod
151b8(dkon brtsegs): yul drug yin no// de la khams kyi rang bzhin gsum gang zhe na/ 'di la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya'o// de lo de dag nyid kun nas ldang ba gsum
152a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan rnams so// de la skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims dang / dad pa dang / 
152a2(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba dang / nor dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting 'dzin dge ba dang / mi dge ba zhes bya'o// de la phung po zhes bya ba'i don gang zhe na/ 'di la tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
152a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po rnams so// de la tshor ba ni myong ba'o// 'du shes ni shes pa'o// bde ba/ 
152a4(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal ni 'du byed rnams so// blta ba dang / danyan pa dang / snom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / regabya rnams rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste/ dngos po thad
152a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khongasu gtig pas ni lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang / len pa dang mthun pa ma yin no// de la 'pho ba ni/ sa bya ba ni tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / 
152a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag gi las kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa des phung po rnams yongasu btang nas/ yang srid par mi skye zhing phyir mi ldog
152a7(dkon brtsegs): pas na shin tu bde bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ 'phos pa de'i phyir yang 'pho ba can ma yin pa de lta bu ni de'i 'pho bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas bzang skyong dang sman tshon gyis
152a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can rnams tshim par bgyi
152b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa'i chos kyi tshogs 'di legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos pa ma yin te/ 
152b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas rig pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni bka' ba spyad pa brgya stong du mas bsgrubs pa ste/ 'di ni ngas ji skad bstan pa de la
152b3(dkon brtsegs): na bzhin no// chos kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang bar byed pa yon+dan gyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i mdzod/ sems can rnams kyi
152b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud 'dul bar byed pa/ 'dul ba ston pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam/ de ston par 'gyur ba de ni mi ma yin pa/ rnams bsrung bar byed do// lha dang lha ma yin dang lto phye
152b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams phyag bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub por byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang
152b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de la ni mtshan gyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chu dang / 
152b7(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phan chad ma dad pa rnams la bshad par mi bya'o// klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu pa rnams / 
152b8(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin/ gcer bu pa'i nyan thos rnams la ma yin/ gnas gzhan la zhugs pa la bshad par mi bya'o// ma dris par yang bshad par mi bya'o// de bas na gal te la la
153a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa byas par 'gyur ro// dge slong ma/ khyim na gnas pa gang la las 'du rdzogs pa de ni drug bya ba'i gnas
153a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du gus pa bskyed par bya zhing / 'di ni mdzod 'dzin pa yin no// snyam du bzung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
153a3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhags shig/ shad cig/ gzhan dag la yung rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun
153a4(dkon brtsegs): dge' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tse lags 'di sa gzung
153a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun ga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par shes pa 'phro ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ bzang skyong
153a6(dkon brtsegs): gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde 'di gan
153a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ gang zhig rab tu bag yod par// chos 'dul 'di la spyod gyur pa// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
153a8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu sman chen dang // tshong dpon bzang skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dong / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
153b1(dkon brtsegs): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs spyong phrag brgya pa las tshong dpon bzang
153b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong gis nus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ni mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+he dang / na chen gyi yi tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur
153b3(dkon brtsegs): zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam pa gnyis po bod skad du/ bu mo rnam dag dang bas zhus pa le'u bzhi bcu pa// bam pa dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / 
153b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon
153b5(dkon brtsegs): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'a/ dun chen po lnga brgya dang / byang chub sems dang / 'i sems dpa' chen po brgya stong dang thabs cig tu zhug/ 
153b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ thams cad kyang shes par bya ba rnams rab tu shes pa/ gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom pa/ 
153b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brnyed pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' lam 'dzin
153b8(dkon brtsegs): dang rnga byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos phye/ 
154a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mdzes bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i drul/ 
154a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang / byang chub sems
154a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin chen yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / gzhan yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa dang thabs
154a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig go// gzhan yang sems dpa' zla med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa drug cu po de dag dang yang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang skyes
154a5(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa/ gtso bor gyur pa drug cu dang yang thabs gcig ge/ gzhan yang dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri 'khor de nyid
154a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'dus par gyur pa dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i mdzod ces bya ba'i seng ge'i gdan la 'khor brgya steng tshad med pa dag gis yongasu bsko
154a7(dkon brtsegs): nas bzhugs pas/ nyi ma lta bur 'od zer gyis ni kun du snang bar mdzad/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis khyad pa du 'phags ri'i rgyal po ri rab
154a8(dkon brtsegs): lta bur shin tu mthong zhing phal las ni mngon par 'phags por gyur/ sgron ma chen po lta bur 'od zer dag ni rab tu 'bar/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar phan tshun du ni gzigs par
