154b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ltar bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar ni chos ston par mdzad/ rgyal po sgra gcan zin lta 'khor mang po rnams ni zil gyis mnan/ mtshan dang dpe byad
154b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dag gis ni sku rab tu brgyan/ gzi byin dang mthu stobs dag ni rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad nges pa'i don mchog la 'god cing khong du chud par mdzad pa/ 
154b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ tshangs pa sgra dbyings stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bsgrags nas/ 'khor mang po'i dbus chos ston par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po gsal
154b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyi bu mo rnam dag dang pa zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma byed pa bzhin sdug cing mdzes la/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg
154b5(dkon brtsegs): bo chen po bsgoms pa zhig yod pa de bu mo gzhon nu ma lnga brgya sa yongasu bskor te/ so so nas gser gyi phreng ba thogs nas grong khyer mnyan yod nos byung ste rmya
154b6(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs ga
154b7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod nas tshigasu btsod de mngon par bstod pa/ yun ring bsod nas rnam dag phrin la sogs// yon+tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shing // mang po ded mos dga'
154b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad pas na// de slad thub mchog khyed la bdag phyag 'tshal// gzi byin lam me ya mtshan rab ston cing // rin chen 'byung gnas chos sgo ston par mdzad// skra yi/ 
155a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'dom gang rtags gsal bas// blo chen gsal ba'i rdzing la bdag phyag 'tshal// yortan ljon shing bsod nams bsag ma 'tshal// mi mchog khyod sa
155a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags// smon lam chen po tshul khrims yongs rdzogs pas// de slad mchod 'os gtso la bdag phyag 'tshal// chos mchog rab gnas rtag par
155a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing dben// 'jig rten kun la thugs snyoms bu gcig bzhin// mkhyen pa dag gis spyod rnams rab mkhyen pas// 'dren mkhan bzhin du mnyam pa'i shul yang sto/ 
155a4(dkon brtsegs): rab brtan brtson 'grus ldan par mchis 'gyur na// byams dang thugs rjes sems can sman mdzad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang lags pa// de bzhi
155a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bkas ni ba sha du gsol// ji ltarab brtan stobs ni thob gyur nas/ 'khor bar gnas kyang bdud dpung pham bgyid lags// ji ltar ma
155a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos ni thob 'gyur zhing // ji ltar sems can yongasu smin bgyid lags// ji ltar bgyis na sa gzhi na mkha' dang // rlung dang me chu ji ltar bzhin du 'gyur// ji
155a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches thob nas chos gnas shing // ri rab seng ge rgyal ba bzhin du 'gyur// ji ltar byams dang sems ni yongs spangs nas// sems gtsang drang la g.yo sgyu ma mchis
155a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur 'ji ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan rnam grol skye 'gyur zhing // shes rab nyon mongs mun pa rab bcom zhing // rtag par
155b1(dkon brtsegs): zathab chen la ni gnas pa dang // ting 'dzin gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis shing // tshad med bzhi dang mngon shes lnga la gnas// ji ltar sangs rgyas spyan sngar gnas gyur nas/ 
155b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par rdzus te skye zhing tshe rabs dran// sbyangs pas brtsod pa ma mchis dgon gnas nas// sems ni rab btul nyon mongs zhi bgyid dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing byang chub lam
155b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms dang // bdud rtsi 'gog thob bdud dpung 'joms pa dang // bde stsol chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i yang dag lam ni bkas bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan
155b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba la bka' stsal pa/ byang churab sems dpa' gang stobs rnams pa brgyad dang ldan pa/ ra gyur na/ 'khor ba nas kyang rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor
155b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing yongs su ngal ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems kyi 'dun pa'i stobs te/ gam/ sgyu med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni mos pa'i stobs te/ 
155b6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa rnams sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni sbyor ba'i stobs te/ rtag tu dge ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni mngon par yid ches pa'i stobs te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa
155b7(dkon brtsegs): dge la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyis stobs te/ theg pa dma' ba rnams yongasu mi tshol ba'i phyir ro// drug pa ni byams pa chen po'i stobs
155b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ las kyis sems can la gnod par mi byed pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni snying rje chen po'i stobs te/ gnod pa rnams dang du len pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni dge ba'i gshes gnyen/ 
156a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs te/ dus dus su sa par byed pa'i phyir ro// bu mo 'di ni stobs rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs brgyad po'ang
156a2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan par gyur na rab tu bstan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bso/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang mngon par zhen cing chags pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig/ 
156a3(dkon brtsegs): su bcad te bka' stsal ba/ sems bdun dpa'o gang yin pa// g.yo sgyu dag ni spyod byed cing // rtag par drang po spyod pas na// yang dag byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// mos pa'i
156a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs ni gang yin pa// nyes pa mang po spong byed cing / dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pas ni// yang dag brtson la gnas par 'gyur// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs gyur pa
156a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu legs par rab brtan nas// brtson 'grus brtan par gyur paso na// sems can rnams/ ni bde bar byed// mngon par yid ches stobs dbang gi
156a6(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam smin rig pas na// sangs rgyas ye shes yid ches shig/ 'jig rten yongasu sdud par 'gyur// byang chub sems stobs gang yin des// theg pa dman pa sla
156a7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing // sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas// chos nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur// byams chen stobs kyi dbang gis na// sems can snyoms par lta byed cing // 
156a8(dkon brtsegs): byams sdang dag ni med pas na// zhe sdang gnod pa bskyed mi 'gyur// snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni// sems can dang du len byed cing // 'khor ba dag la zhen sde
156b1(dkon brtsegs): tsang yongs su skyo zhing ngag pa med// dge ba'i ba shes gnyen stobs kyis mi// drug par phan tshun rgyud med cing // sems ni bying bar mi 'gyur bas// byang chub la ni gnas par
156b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur rang ba'o gang yini de dag gis// stobs brgyad 'di dag thob gyur nas// byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni// bdu dpung mang po bcom par 'gyur// gzhan ba byang chub sems dpa'
156b3(dkon brtsegs): chas rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// bad+mad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis bdag mngapa/ 
156b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// gnyis pa ni ches thams cad mnyam par gyur ste/ chos thams cad rab tu dben pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni zhing thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong
156b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi kham su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// bzhi pa n+da shes pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid stong pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni spyod pa thams cad mnyam
156b6(dkon brtsegs): pabar gyur pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// drug pa ni theg pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ 'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni sems mnyam
156b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa ste/ sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni rnams mnyam par gyur pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i thogs ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni chos rnam pa brgya
156b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can rang bzhin bdag med pas// skra gcig tsam yang dmigs
157a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// mnyam pa nyid la gang gnas pa// de lta bur ni bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad mnyam pas na// rang bzhin rtag par stong zhing dben/ 
157a2(dkon brtsegs): yi ge tha dad phye bar zad// chos rnams rang bzhin bye brag med// phyogs bcu zhing rnams thams cad kun// mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs pas// de yi rang bzhin na mkha' 'dra// sangs
157a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing ni rtag tu mnyam// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa kun// chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na// ye shes mtha' yas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas kun kyang de bzhin no// 
157a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rang bzhin rgyu rkyen rnams// thams cad kun kyang mnyam pa dang // de yi spyod pa rab shes pas// ci rigs par ni go bar byed// sems can ji snyed tha dad pa// sgyu 'phrul
157a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bur rab tu rtogs// phyi nang gnyi ga len med pas// rang bzhin rtag tu rnam par dag/ theg pa sna tshog/ nyes rab bshad kyang // 'dus ma byas su rab tu mnyam// 
157a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas thabs ni rab mkhyen pas// rnam par phye ste thegs gsum bshad// nyon mongs bdud la rab gnas kyang // nyon mongs dngos po ci yang med// lha dang phung po 'chi bdag
157a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud// spyod yul thams cad stong pa yin// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na byams sdang rnams yongasu spong bar byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ byam
157a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan po dang // snying rje dang ldan pa dang / rtag par phan 'dog por byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos la ma chags pa dang / rang gi lus la chagaso ba med pa dang / rtag tu ting 'dzin
157b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi sems bsgom pa dang / lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'di dag ni mngon par bsgrub par nus na byas sdang yongs
157b2(dkon brtsegs): spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byams sems go cha rab bgos nas// thams cad kun la snying ba rtse zhing // mnyams pa'i sems
157b3(dkon brtsegs): la gang gnas pa// byams sdang sems ni skye mi 'gyur// blo ldan phan 'dogs spyod pas na// rtag par gzhan la bde ba gtong // rnyen pa thob kying rang mi mthong // brnyas shing smad kyang
157b4(dkon brtsegs): kho na 'dzin med// rlung brgyad kyis ni mi skyed pas// byams sdang dag ni mi skye zhing // bdag ga gal te gzhan sa/ nga rung // byams dang 'du shes yongs mi bskyed// 'du
157b5(dkon brtsegs): shes dag ni rab spangs nas// spyod yul dag pa zhen pa // / rtag par rang gi lus rtogs pas// lus sre gdag la phang ba med// mkhas rnams sdug bsngal bang/ 
157b6(dkon brtsegs): yis/ g.yos par mi 'gyur na mkha' bzhin// nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na// bdag dang bdag gi gnyi ga spong // spyod 'dzin rtag par sa 'dra bas// byams sdang dag
157b7(dkon brtsegs): na yong mi skye// gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar mi 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang // sems
157b8(dkon brtsegs): can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing mchod par byed pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir dang / 
158a1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa yongasu gnyer ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dang // chos khyad par can dag la zhum pa'i phyir dang / 
158a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la so sor rtogs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor lam ni gang bsgom
158a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dge sbyong skyon phan dri ma med// bar snang zla ba rnam dag bzhin// sdug bsngal sems can sgrol bar byed// yon+dan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// 'khor bso yongasu ngal mi 'gyur// 
158a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rang bzhin rtogs byed cing // rab brtan pa rtson 'grus spyod par byed// sangs rgyas zhing ni tshad med du// sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas// de phyir
158a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu gang ldan pa// 'khor bas yongasu ngal ni 'gyur// 'jig rten dpag med tshad med dang / bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // dkon mchog gsum gyi
158a6(dkon brtsegs): gdung mi bcod// chos rgyal nyid du mngon 'chang rgya// tshul khrims dam par gang bsrung ba// 'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa// rmi lam
158a7(dkon brtsegs): sprin dang glog ltar shes// chos las gang zhig rnam grol ba// 'khor bas yongasu ngal mi 'gyur// byang chub la ni rab gnas shing // dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde// 
158a8(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyi pha rol gang yin pa// 'khor bas yongasu ngal mi 'gyur// rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yang // bar snang zla bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon+tan gang mos pa// 
158b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas yongasu ngal mi 'gyur// 'khor ba mu mtha' med 'gyur kyang // rtag par yang dag mtha' la gnas// yul tsam shes rab rjes 'thun pa// 'khor ba dag gis ngas/ 
158b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// gzhan yang bu mo tshes brgyad dang ldan na sems kyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems chu dang mtshungs par
158b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems me dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems rlung dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems na mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 
158b4(dkon brtsegs): sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dong / sems rnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir// sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs por 'gyur ba'i
158b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir te/ 'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam da / brgyad ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems ni sa dang mchung
158b6(dkon brtsegs): pas na// thams cad khur du khyer bar byed// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung // 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med// sems ni chu dang mtshungs pas na// dri ma mi gtsang 'khru byed
158b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rdu 'jig rten rnams ni gso bdang // nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar byed// sems ni me dang mtshungs pas na// nyon mongs dag ni bsreg byed cing // sgron ma chen po snang ba
158b8(dkon brtsegs): yin// gsal bar mi byed gang yang med// sems ni rlung dang mtshungs pas na// gnas pa med cing rten med par// tshul khrims thos pa dri yis ni// dus gsum kun du khyad pa
159a1(dkon brtsegs): byed// sems ni namakha' mtshungs pas na// lta ba spong zhing rnam par dag/ thams cad kun tu 'jug byed kyang // bdud kyi rjes su 'brang mi byed// sems ni
159a2(dkon brtsegs): chos dbyings mtshungs pas na// bde ba nyid du rab gnas shing // 'phel ba med cing 'grib med par// rtag par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug/ nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi// rnam par gro
159a3(dkon brtsegs): ba thob gyur kyang // 'ching ba dag kyang yod min la// grol ba dag kyang yod pa min// 'khor ba dag ni mya ngan 'das// 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med// rab dbyen nyer zhi gnas nas ni
159a4(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed// gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 
159a5(dkon brtsegs): dang po ni sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ ci brda/ ga ba rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro// gnyi sa boni tshul khrims 'byung gnas gyur pa yin te/ 
159a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni bzod pa 'byung gan su gyur pa yin te/ zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni brtson 'grus 'byung gan su gyur pa yin te/ le lo med/ 
159a7(dkon brtsegs): cing nur ba med pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni bsam gtan 'byung gan su gyur pa yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// drug pa ni shes rab 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ 
159a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsrung zhing mang du thos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'byung gnas gyur pa yin te/ rnam par grol bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba/ 
159b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// brgyad pa ni mngon par shes pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rtag par mnyam par bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig
159b2(dkon brtsegs): su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag par sbyin pa gang gtong ba// 'dod chags gdung ba spong bas nas// 'bras bu rnam smin mi re bar// sangs rgyas byang chub bsngo bar byed// khrims ldan
159b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa che ba'i phyir// bcad cing btubs kyang khong khro med// rtse gcig bde chen gnyer byed cing // bag chags spangs pas 'gog mngon med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'gru/ 
159b4(dkon brtsegs): can skal mang sems can ched du ni// sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rten rgyu// brtson 'grus rtobs ni 'phel bar byed// bsam gtan dag ni gang bsgom pa
159b5(dkon brtsegs): spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing // bsam gtan pha rol byin gyur kyang // bsam gtan rje su yong mi skye// shes rab chen po mtshungs med pas// mthar lha rnams
159b6(dkon brtsegs): ni spong byed cing // 'jig rten stong dben rig pas na// gti mug mun pa ma lus sel// nyer ni tshangs gnas gang bsgom pa// ngan song rnams ni spangs pas na// rtag pa
159b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur// don gyi phan pa nan tan bsgom// mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgyu ba// sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur chos kyang nyan// rang bzhin mas par
159b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pas// chos bshad sems can zlos par byed// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i slob pa thob par
160a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ chos la bla mar byed pa'i phyir dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la rim gro byed pa'i phyir dang / chos yongasu gnyer bul
160a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / ji skad thos pa bzhin du yang dag par bstan par byed pa'i phyir dang / chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed
160a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i phyir dang / chos smra ba dag la mkhan po bzhin du gus pas sri zhu byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa spangs par bskul bar byed pa'i phyir ste/ 'di
160a4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos brgyad dang ldan na/ gzu dngas dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa phun sum chog sa pa thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
160a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi sa yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig rtag tu chos gnyer ba// mkhan po dge/ bshes rim gro byed// sdigs pa'i grogs po spong bas
160a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ mi zad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur// mang thos yongasu skyo med par// rab brtson chos ni gnyer bar byed// ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pa// rnyed pa dag la re tshel med
160a7(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa rnam dag gang thob pa// 'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na// chos sbyin pa la rab mos shing // ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed// chos spyod mngon par zhen med cing // gzung
160a8(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhig thob 'gyur ba// khrims srung rang lus lta bas ni// gzhan gyi nyes skyon yong mi tshol// byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing // dus min tshigs ni mi smra bas// thogs/ 
160b1(dkon brtsegs): med spobs pa thob 'gyur nas// spro tshig pha rol phyin pa ston// chos ni legs par smra ba la// mkhan po bzhin du gus par byed// skyon 'cha ba nyes pa spong bskul bas// mi zad/ 
160b2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin rgya mtsho thob// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 
160b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ srog la bab par gyur na gzhon gyi nyes pa mi brjod pa dang / sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar bskul pa dang / thams cad byang chub kyi
160b4(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'god pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas pad+mo'i gdan la 'jog pa dang / sems can mya ngan
160b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dag gi mya ngan sel bar byed pa dang / khengs shi/ ngang rgyal byed pa dag gi mdun du rtag par bdag nyid// dman par byed pa dang / gang la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin
160b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te sdug bsngal gzir gyur kyang // nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi smra// rtag par dkon mchog gang bsngags
160b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa gnyer bskul nas// rtag tu tshangs par gang spyod pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar
160b8(dkon brtsegs): brdzus te skye// gser gyis sangs rgyas gzugs brgyan te// rin chen bad+ma gdan la bzhag/ sems can mya ngan gang sel ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te sku/ 
161a1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal byed pa de dag la// slong ma bzhin du bdag dman zhing // gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye// gzhan yang
161a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo tshwas brgyad dang ldan par gyur no/ sbyangs pa'i yon+tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rtag par dgon pa na gnas pa la mos par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / 
161a3(dkon brtsegs): cho ga shes pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge bas bdag nyid gso bar byed pa dang / rtag par 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'khor ba'i// 
161a4(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs mthong bas sems la rtag par skyo ba dang / rtag par mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par lta ba dang / dad pa shin du brtan zhing gzhan
161a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pas// chos dga' dge mang
161a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid gso// rtag par 'phags rigs bsgrub la mos// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag/ sbyang ba dag la rtag mos par// bse ru gcig ltar grogs kyang med/ 
161a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces// blo yis rab dang brtson 'grus gnas// chos mthong gzhan gyi rjes mi 'brang // rtag par dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags// 
161a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pas zag bsrings gdung ba med// rtsod sgra nyes dmigs mang ba med// nye ba shes yongasu bsngags gcod pa// des na dgon par gnas la mos// gzhan yang bu mo bya/ 
161b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni chos brnyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhugs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mngon par yid che
161b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'du bya bo med par rab tu shes pa dang / nang the tshom dang sem nyis med pa dang / skye ba med par rab tu brjod pa dang
161b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs mkhas pas chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
161b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal ba/ stong pa mtshan ma med dang smon med pa// rnam thar gsum thob bdud dbu dang rab tu 'joms// 'dus byas dus min mtshan nyid gnyis
161b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ skyon med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa// de dag pa dud dpung rab tu pham par byed// skye ba med dang 'gag ni/ 
161b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang // phung po khams la bdag med sgyu ma 'dra// chos la ngo bo nyid med ngas rtogs shing // de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jigs thabs mkhas paso// chos rnams bdud kyi las
161b7(dkon brtsegs): shes gang 'byed pa// rnam rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyi ga rab spyod cing // yod dang stong la gnas pa med pa ni// de ltar chos mchog gang zhig
161b8(dkon brtsegs): sgom byed pa// thabs mkhas gzugs lus mdzes pa thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub dang nam yang
162a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i ltabs log par lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas log par
162a2(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i sems can la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying rje bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs
162a3(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba rnams yongasu bzlog pa dang / yang dag pa'i tshe bas log par 'tshe ba'i sems can rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i
162a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis log pa'i ting 'dzin la/ gnas pa dag bslang nas gong du rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin/ 
162a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshogasu bcad de/ bka' stsal pa/ yang dag lta dang gang ldan pa/ log lta de dag smin par byed// rtag par yang dag rtsol
162a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas// log sems dag la brtse bar byed// rnam dag yang dag ngag gis ni// log smra rnam pa brtse ba byed// yang dag los mtha' gnas pa yis// log pa'i las can
162a7(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed// rtag par yang dag rtsal bsgoms nas// log brtson dag ni spong mi byed// yang dag 'tsho ba rjes mthun pas// log 'tsho gang yin sdud par byed// blo ldan yang dag/ 
162a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa yis// log par yid byed brtse bar sems// yang dag ting 'dzin rtag gnas nas// log pa'i ting 'dzin sdud par byed// bla med yang dag lam brgyad kyis// chu bong
162b1(dkon brtsegs): las bde bar sgrol// rgyun phyogs ded pa zlos byed pas// de ni byang chub lam chen yin// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams// rtswa yi gzings bzhin bdag nyid zlos// byang chu
162b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' kun zlos pas// dper na gru chen 'dren mkhan 'dra// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud rtsi'i lam mngon du byed par
162b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ brtsod pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / thegs pa'i sems legs par rab tu srung bar byed pa dang / rtag par kho na nyid kyi don la lta bar byed
162b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chu kyi sems rab tu gnas nas rjesu dran pa dru dag sgom par byed pa dang / nan tan brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgoms par byed pa dang / dge
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bsags nas sems can yongs su smin par byed ba dang / snying rje chen po la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos yongasu sdud par byed pa dang // mi skye ba'i chos
162b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob nas phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag par rtsod med spyod bsgrubs na/ 
162b7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong che yi chos la gnas// zhe sdang nyes pa yongs spangs nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsogs par byed// yang dag don ni rab lta bas// mi zad spobs rnams thob par byed// 
162b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems la rab gnas nas// rtag par dran med rjes su dran// pha rol phyin pa thams cad kun// rab brtson bsgrubs pas log pa med// thabs mkhas stobs rnams/ 
163a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pas na// des ni sems can bskol bar byed// chos kyi mnga' bdag nor gyis ni// brje sems thams cad kun sbyin pas// myur du mi skye bzod thob nas
163a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// gal te de ltar spyod nus na// sangs rgyas chos ni thob mi dka'// ring por mi thogs bdud brtul nas// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// 
163a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo des chos de lta bu thos nas dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos rnam pa du dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi
163a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po las ldog par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan dadas kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo chos brgyad dang lnga ngan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// 
163a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog mi byed pa dang // ser sna mi byed pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / khong khro ba med padang / bden par smra ba dang / ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang / 'ad
163a6(dkon brtsegs): chags spangs pa dang / log par lta ba rnams spangs pa gang yin pa ste/ bu mo chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs na/ myur du bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// / 
163a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lag gzhan la phrag dog mi byed cing // ser sna spangs nas chos mos pa// g.yo sgyu dag ni mi spyod cing // bud med lus/ 
163a8(dkon brtsegs): la skyo ba dang // byams sems zhe sdang rab spangs nas// rtag par bden tshig smra ba dang // 'dod gsal nga gi rtsub spangs nas ni// yang dag lta la gnas par bya// gang gis bud
163b1(dkon brtsegs): lus skyonas// 'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na// myur du bud med lus spangs nas// skyes pa'i lus bzang len par 'gyur// gzhan yang bu ma chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na
163b2(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la bla mar byed cing chos la shin tu mos pa dang // tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang mang du thos pa dang / 
163b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med dang khyim gyi dngos po dag la yon zhen cing chags pa med pa dang / bslab pa'i dngos pa
163b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blangs pa rnams 'jig par byed pa dang / srog chags thams cad la log pa'i bsam pa mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos
163b5(dkon brtsegs): po la yongasu skyo bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems sa kyis skyes bu chen po'i chos la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i khyim gyi 'tsho chis rnams la sgyu ma dang
163b6(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam lta bur lta ba gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas rab gus chos la mos// tshul khrims mang thos bla/ 
163b7(dkon brtsegs): mar byed// 'dod chags sred sems mi skyed na// bud med dngos po myur du spong // khrims srung ngo tsha khrel yod ldan// gzhan la mi bden bsam mi khyab// byang chub sems la rab gnas
163b8(dkon brtsegs): naso// theg pa gzhan la mos byed na// des ni myur ba kho nar yang // mi gtsang bud med dngos po spong // bsam pa mchog gi sems skyo nas// thams cad sgyu mo lta bu dang // chos rnams ra/ 
164a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gas me dang // rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong dben skye// nan tan yang dag chos bsgoms na// myur daskyes pa'i lus tha gyur// de nas bu mo rnam dag pa gser
164a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi phreng ba thogs pa des dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser yang dag pa'i gzhal mod khong dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu gyur nas/ gzhal med pa
164a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nang du sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa sha stag mngon par byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang so so nas lus kyi rgyan rnams bkrol
164a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser gyi gzhal med khang dang //  na po mo gur dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bkod pa
164a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to// de nas bu mo balnga brgya po deng ga gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong ba dang / skad mthun par tshig su bcad de smras pa/ bcom ldan mi mchog
164a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags pas nas// thugs rje sems can rnams la sman par mdzad// bdag cag deng ni byang chub sems bskyed nas// mos pa rjes mthun rab tu dul la gnas// bcom ldan
164a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa bde bar rab stsal pas// bdag cag mi mchog la ni mchod par bgyi// chos thos dbang gis rdul rnams rab spangs pas// bdag cag the tshom nom nur yongs ma mchis/ 
164a8(dkon brtsegs): des na bud med nyon mongs yongs spangs nas// nyon mong gtan bcos bdud ni pham par bgyis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba tshad med rnams// bdag cag dga' bas rtag tu mchod
164b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal// sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus rab gnas nas// bzod dang bsam gtan sems ni rab tu bgyid// thabs dang shes rab sems ni yongs bsdus nas// byang chub mchog
164b2(dkon brtsegs): lam gang lags mngon du bgyi// lha mi'i khor ni tshad med sman btags nas// thams cad theg chen sems ni bskyed par bskul// bdag cag seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog par 'gyur// bdag cag
164b3(dkon brtsegs): lha mi'i ston pa bgyid par mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni na mdzum pa mdzad pa na 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po
164b4(dkon brtsegs): do/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / dngul dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal/ gyi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/ dpag
164b5(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba sa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tu thim par
164b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di lta bu bstan par
164b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o khyod kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba 'di mthong ngam/ kun dga' sa gsol pa/ mthong lag so// bcom ldan
164b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o bu mo rnam dge dang ba la sogs pa bumo lnga brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas tshe zad pa dang / bud med kyi lus spangs nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i risu skyes te/ 
165a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bum pa dang / bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bkur bsti dang / rim gro dang mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ bu mo rnam nga/ 
165a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ba bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'od ces bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
165a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i ming ni rtag tu snang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni dga' ldan gyi lha bzhin du tshe lo stong phrag bcu/ 
165a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' zhig gi 'khor ched med dpag tu med pa dag gis
165a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor byeng par 'gyur ro// bu mo brgya po 'di dag tu'akhor de dag gi nang na gtso bo mchog byed par 'gyurar ro ji ltar da ltar nga'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa'
165a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal la sogs pa drug cu po drug gtso bor gyur pa bzhin no// kun dga' bud med gang la la zhig gos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yongasu 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ 
165a7(dkon brtsegs): khaton du don par byed na bud med kyi lus 'di gtugs nas phyis yang len par mi 'gyur shing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang tsho sa
165a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bu mo rnam dag dang ba la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i
165b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' nas mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa
165b2(dkon brtsegs): las/ rnam dag dang bas zhus pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so// // lo tsA ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya nag gi dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab
165b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya mai tri ya/ pi tsA pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byis pas zhus pa'i le'u
165b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gcig pa sangs rgyal byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag de'atshalo// 'di skad bdag gos thos pa dus gcig na/ 
165b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yul brgen chu srin byis pa bsod pa lta bu'i ri 'jig su rung ba'i nags ri dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
165b6(dkon brtsegs): po mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa// gnas gtan nyan thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang / 
165b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang
165b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ri dgas mgo dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klu 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byin pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang
166a1(dkon brtsegs): / ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa blo gros rab bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo 'ungag
166a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ri rgyal dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga'o dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dpa na pa sgra gcan zin dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya tsam
166a3(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa khri dang yang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
166a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo gros phreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bstan dang / blo gros yang ba dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang
166a5(dkon brtsegs): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / tog dpal dang / 'jam dpal dang / mngon paras pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa dang / dmigs pa med pa
166a6(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dang / dad ldan dang / rin po che'i tog dang / dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / sgra dbyangs snyan dang / zhing rnam par spyod dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / spobs
166a7(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po dpal dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can dmyal ba skems dang / ngan song spong dang / rin chen ze bo can dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
166a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams
166b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos drag pa
166b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btude nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal
166b3(dkon brtsegs): te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig
166b4(dkon brtsegs): zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams dpal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa dri ba lung
166b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs te/ sa byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris/ bde dang de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o// de nas
166b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na ngan song thams cad
166b7(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchi bar mi 'gyur la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad
166b8(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba
167a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa tshe rabs dran pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ste/ byams pa khyod skye bo mang
167a2(dkon brtsegs): po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / byang chub
167a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo da ltar gyi dang ma 'ongs pa rnams yongasu bzung ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar
167a4(dkon brtsegs): sems pa leg so leg so// byams pa de'i phyir leg ngas par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ 
167a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems
167a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
167a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya ste/ chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos gcig po de dang ldan
167a8(dkon brtsegs): na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lags tu mi 'gro la// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa
167b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
167b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zhi gnas yongasu tshol ba dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis po de dang ldan
167b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa
167b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum dang da ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grog ris po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa
167b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs tshang rgya ste/ gsu/ ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste snying rje chen po thob pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi chos nges par sems pa dang / des kyang
167b6(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ 
167b7(dkon brtsegs): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ngan song
167b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
168a1(dkon brtsegs): lha ste tshul khrims la gnas pa yin/ chos thams cad la som nyis med pa yin/ dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin/ yang dag par zhugs shing la
168a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par blangs pa las mi g.yo ba yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro
168a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na/ ngan song
168a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs dpa'i byang chub mngon par 'a chung rgya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di
168a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'khru la ba mi tshol ba dang / bdag la rtog pa dang / cha sa lo mngon par dga' ba dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs
168a6(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na// ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med
168a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos drug dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i
168a8(dkon brtsegs): lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bskam pa med pa yin/ sdang ba med pa yin/ rmongs pa
168b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ dris ma thag tu yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du lan ljon pa yin/ bsnyen par dka' ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ba yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' tshas
168b2(dkon brtsegs): drug po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
168b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
168b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bdun gang zhe/ na/ 'di lta ste dran pa la mkhas pa yin/ chos la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ dga'
168b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thob pa yin/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ ting 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyis ra tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems
168b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
168b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med
168b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yang dag par lta ba can yin/ yang dag par rtog pa can yin/ yang dag pa'i
169a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' can yin/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' can yin/ yang dag pa'i 'tshe lan yin/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i dran pa can yin/ yang dag
169a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin can yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla
169a3(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i
169a4(dkon brtsegs): grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog das par 'tshang rgya ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste byams pa
169a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa dag la dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog ba dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes
169a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang rab tu dang ste/ sems can gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod
169a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ tingange 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnaso// dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang / 
169a8(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa/ gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pas bsaM
169b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnaso// bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang
169b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnaso// rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du
169b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha' mtha' yas so snyams nas/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched las bsgrubs te/ 
169b4(dkon brtsegs): gnaso// rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' la des skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mthum so snyam nas rlom shes mtha' yas skye
169b5(dkon brtsegs): mched las bsgrubs te gnaso// rnam pa thams ca/ du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag/ par 'das te/ ni yang med no/ sbyin nas ci yang med pa'i skye
169b6(dkon brtsegs): mched bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnaso// 
169b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas te/ byams pa byang chub/ 
169b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon/ 
170a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i
170a2(dkon brtsegs): lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ 
170a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ thabs kyis 'gro ba'i ti 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par snang byed kyi ting 'dzin dang ldan/ 
170a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ kun nas snang ba'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ kun du gsal ba'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rin chen zla ba'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ zla ba'i smon
170a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin te/ 
170a6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
170a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang
170a8(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes te/ stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar
170b1(dkon brtsegs): babatud te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshog su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stong ngo // sngon chad sbyin pa sbyin mdzad pa// sdug pa'i bu dang zas sgom dang // mgo dang mig kyang
170b2(dkon brtsegs): btang mdzad de// sangs rgyas sbyin kun pha rol phyin// g.yag rnga bzhin du yun rings nas// khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams bsrung // khrims kyis khyed 'dra ma mchis te// sangs
170b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas khrims legs pha rol phyin// bzod pa'i stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas// byis pas nongs par bgyis pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan// sangs rgyas bzod
170b4(dkon brtsegs): legs pha rol phyin// brtson 'grus stobs ni skyed mdzad nas// zhi bde bla na med pa brnyes// brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs dang ldan// sangs rgyas brtson le/ 
170b5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin// sdig pa thams cad bsreg mdzad nas// 'dren pa skyes chen bsam gtan dges// bsam gtan stobs kyi stobs dang ldan// sangs rgyas bsam
170b6(dkon brtsegs): legs pha rol phyin// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin stong // ngo bo nyid kyis gang mi skye// shes rab kyis ni pha rol gshegs// sangs rgyas shes legs pha rol phyin// 
170b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen chen byang chub shing drung du// sder bcas bdud ni khyod kyis btul// don gyi mchog kyang brnyes par gyur// sangs rgyas bdud kyi tshogs ngan 'joms// skyes chen
170b8(dkon brtsegs): wa ra na ser ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// mu stegs tshogs ngan skrag par mdzad// sangs rgyas mu stegs can tshegs 'joms// shes rab chen po bla na med/ 
171a1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas blang ba yod ma mchis// dkon mchog chos de ston par mdzad// 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od mdzad lags// sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims stobs/ 
171a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod brtson khyod dang 'dra ma mchis// kun gyi pha rol phyin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas yonan mang po 'phags// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas// 
171a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'ad drag gis mngon par bskyod nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dog 'os 'di
171a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'di ltar shin
171a5(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / 'altar tshigs dang yi ge mtshung ba'i chos ston pa dang 'di ltar zab mo'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar
171a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par 'brel pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / dran pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o de de bzhin no// 
171a7(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis
171a8(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa nas/ rjes su tshig gis bar gyis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' byams pas ni da ltar nga tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa dag
171b1(dkon brtsegs): gis bstod par ma zad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'o sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bcur tshang bar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsa
171b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
171b3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya ba gzugs bzang
171b4(dkon brtsegs): pab mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyes mos tshal du' gro ste grong bar du phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
171b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba/ sa rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa mdzes pa/ dad par bya ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi/ 
171b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi mchog brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi dam pa brnyes pa/ dbang po bsrungs pa/ glang po che dbang po thul ba lta bu/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/ 
171b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu po dag gis sku rnam par spras pa/ shing sa la'i rgyal po me tog
171b8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgyas pa 'dra ba// ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhi ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba/ shing n+ya gro/ 
172a1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar chu zheng gab pa/ 'od 'bar ba'i skus dpal chen pos 'bar ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to// de sem
172a2(dkon brtsegs): dad nas 'di snyam du sems te/ a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di rnam par spras shing / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / mtshan rnams kyis ni 'bar zhing laM
172a3(dkon brtsegs): me lhan ne lhung nge ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// a la la bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lus 'di 'dra ba dang ldan
172a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur cig/ kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang mtshan rnams kyis 'di ltar 'bar zhing lam me ldan ne lhang nge bar gyur cig ces des smon lam de skad
172a5(dkon brtsegs): btab nas/ sa la nyal te 'di snyam du bsams so// gal te bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu/ 'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/ kha dog dang / gzi brjid
172a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpal dang / mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lam mo lhan ne lcang nger 'gyur zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs bdag gi lus la reg par gyur cig snyam mo// kun dga'o
172a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gi lhag pa'i bas
172a8(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ga la ba der gshegs te/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa
172b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ro// kun dga'o ngo nas de bzhin
172b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des snam logasu gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gi sna bram ze'i khye'u bzang
172b3(dkon brtsegs): dag de'i lus la rkang pas ma rdzi shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas de nyid kyi tshe bram ze'i khye'u
172b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang dag gis lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa ma / na sum du bya ba'i shes pa thob bopo// rdzu 'phrul yang mngon
172b5(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub so// de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam pa ra rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa dag gis kyang mngon par bstod// phyog
172b6(dkon brtsegs): dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu bskor te bstsal bgyis kyang // 'jig rten dag na mi dbang khyod 'dra yong ma mchis// 'gro ba kun na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags// rnam par
172b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rang byung khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dper na bar snang la ni nyi ma lhan ne ltar// phyong phyogs mtshams kun gyi 'jig rten khams rnams na// 'jig rten 'di dag tham cad 'od
172b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis lham mer gyur// sangs rgyas yon+tan gzi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// ji ltar seng ge nags khrod dag na sgra sgrogs pa// wa tshogs phal chen thams cad zil gyis gan+d+ha
173a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid// de ltar mi yings pa mthu chen mnga' ba yang // mu stegs can mang 'dus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon// bde bar gshegs pa smin mtshams par
173a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzod spu dkar// dngul dang kha ba'i tshogs bzhin mtha' yas gzi brjid can// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad snang bar bgyis// 'jig rten kun na sangs rgyas khyod ni mi mnyam
173a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam/ skyes bu khyu mchog zhabs la lnga yi 'khor lo mnga'// gsal zhing mdzes la rtsibs stong tshang zhing mu khyud 'khor// de dag gis ni ri dang nags bcas sa 'di rnams// rab tu
173a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo bgyid thub pa gang zag mtshungs ma mchis// nyon mongs shas chen dor bar bgyi ba thams cad bor/ 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam ni rab tu brnyes// nor
173a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun dang ldan zhing yon+dan rnams kyis phyug/ bas ma pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i nor rnams bkod pa ma dzes// sa dang mtshungs shing sbyin pa'i gnas gyur mtshungs
173a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// yon+dan kun la mnga' brnyes tshul khrims rnam dag pa// ji ltar na mkha' lag pa mi thogs mi chags ltar// 'jig rten dag na khyod la rjes tshogs khro mi mnga'// brjod
173a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zad kyis btugs pa don dang chos rnams kun// snying po ma mchis pa dang gsob dang gsog tu mkhyen// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dag ni gang rnams la// rlom sems 'gyur ba'i
173a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can srog dang dngos ma brnyes// khams dang spyod pa dag la sbyor dang bsam pa mkhyen// rmad du byung dang rnam par 'byed mdzad sgron mar gyur// chu bo chen pos ded pa'i 'gro ba
173b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs gyur nas// sngon chad brtson 'grus stobs brtan mthu ni bskyed par mdzad// skye ba spangs shes nyon mongs zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan// thugs rgya chen po skye dang rga shi mtha'/ 
173b2(dkon brtsegs): mar 'byin// na mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par chags pa mi mnga' rgyu// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos 'jig rten gsum na rgyu// bdag nyid chen po shes rab kyis ni snang bar mdzad// 
173b3(dkon brtsegs): mun pa mun nag gyur pa thams cad rnam par sel// 'dod chags rdul zhi mdzad cing zhe sdang gti mug gi/ dri ma sna tshogs mun bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun dga'o de tshun chad
173b4(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i rdzu 'phrul rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu nyams par ma gyur to// kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag
173b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dog shing yid gnyis za 'am the tsom za na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
173b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol
173b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mngon par shes pa de la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'os 'di skad ces
173b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di gal te yun ring po srid nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags na/ ci'i slad du myur
174a1(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ sa ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
174a2(dkon brtsegs): bopo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkod pa dang / yongasu bzung ba ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sems can bkod
174a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can yongasu bzung ba dang / nong bkod pa dang / zhing yongasu bzung ba dang / gnyis po 'di dag yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe zhing bkod pa rnam par spangs shing yongasu bzung pa yongasu bzung ngo // kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub
174a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ngas ni sems can bkod pa rnam par spungs so/ sems can yong du bzung / zhing bkod pa yang rnam par sbyangs shing yongs
174a6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba yang yongasu bzung ngo // kun dag 'ongs mngon par shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs pa nas bskal pa bzhi bcu
174a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis lon pa'i 'og tu ngas gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ kun dga' bskol ba babang po 'di das nas bskal pa bzhi ban du bzhi ni/ 
174a8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya ba'i rig pa las/ kun dag 'ongs brtson 'grus 'bar bar byas pas myur du blan med pa yang / 
174b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga'o ngas brtson 'grus brlabs po ches myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
174b2(dkon brtsegs): bar sangs rgyas so// kun dga'o chos bcu po 'di dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ docu gang zhe na/ bdog pa phang
174b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongasu btong ba dang / chung ma phangs pa yongasu btang ba dang / bu phangs pa yongasu btang ba dang / mgo phangs pa yongasu btang ba dang / mig phangs pa yongasu bta
174b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rgyal srid 'phangs pa yongasu btang ba dang / long spyod phangs pa yongasu btang ba dang / khrag byang nges pa yongasu btang ba dang / rus pa dang rkang phangs pa ya/ 
174b5(dkon brtsegs): su btang ba dang / yan lag phangs pa yongasu btang ba/ pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i// byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun/ 
174b6(dkon brtsegs): dga'o chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga'o gzhan yang ngas chos bcus myur du
174b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kun dga'o nga tshul khrims kyi yon+dan gyi chos la gnas te myur du bla na
174b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo nga bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
175a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dag 'ong brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
175a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// kun dag 'ong bsam gtan gyi yon+dan la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
175a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ kun dga'ong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga'o ngas sem
175a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yongasu ma btang bas myur du blo na med pa la dang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs/ da sangs rgyas so// kun dag 'ong thabs mkhas pa
175a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang na ba mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// kun dga' nga sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas myur
175a6(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// kun dag 'ongs stong pa nyid kyi chos rtogs pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
175a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga'ongs mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos rtogs pas myur du bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
175a8(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so// kun dga' tshes bcu po de dag gling myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// kun dgar/ 
175b1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa brtsub pa ji lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/ gal te khyod kyis shesu zin na/ kun dag
175b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod spobs par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'o sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa lta ni sdugs
175b3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal ba'i bu 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar du/ 
175b4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / gnod pas nyen cing sdug bsngal la/ nad tshabs chen pos btab pa'i mi zhig mthong ngo // ma thong nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur te/ mi dag la ba der
175b5(dkon brtsegs): song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye mi khyod sdug pa sngal lam/ des smras pa lha bdag ni nad kyi/ btab bo// des smras pa/ kye mi khyod kyi nad cis zhi
175b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ khyod la ci sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag lnga khyod kyis lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i khrag gcig 'thung du thob pa lta na bdag
175b7(dkon brtsegs): gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// kun dga'o de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa des mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang gi lus phug nas khrag gzags te mi de la btung bar byin no// kun
175b8(dkon brtsegs): dga'o mi des de 'thungs ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to// kun dga'o rgyal po gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pas rang gi lus phug ste/ khrag thams cad gzags kyang 'gyod
176a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems gcig kyang med do// kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid
176a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis za 'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe no/ nga nyid de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga'o rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i
176a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po na tshad bzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongasu tshol zhing ngas sngon sems can rnams la wa byin pa ni tshad med do// kun dga'o sngon byung ba
176a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ce bya ba gzu gas bzong ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgya
176a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ste grong bar du phyin pa dang / skya rbab kyi/ nad kyis btab pa'i mi gnod pas nyen po/ sdug bsngal
176a6(dkon brtsegs): ba nad tshabs chen po zhig mthong ngo // des de mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur te/ mi de ge la ba der song nas 'di skad ces smraso// kye ci zhig gis mi khyod kyis nad 'di zhi bar gyur/ khyod
176a7(dkon brtsegs): la ci zhig sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smraso// gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par gyur pa'i rkang zhig thob pa lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bu/ 
176a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu me tog de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rang gi lus brdungs nas rkang brus te de'i lus la bskuso// kun dag 'ongs bskus ma thag tu/ 
176b1(dkon brtsegs): mang nadang sos par gyur to// kun dga' rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog gis rang gi lus brdungs te rkang gzugs kyang sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to// kun dag 'a de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bugan/ 
176b2(dkon brtsegs): nu me tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis za 'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu ma to// 
176b3(dkon brtsegs): ces bya bar gyur to// kun dga'o rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad bzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu tshol zhing / ngas sngon sems can rnam
176b4(dkon brtsegs): la rkang byin pa ni tshad med do// kun dga'o sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po zla ba 'od ces bya ba gzugs dbazang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i
176b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan pa rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po 'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong byung phyin pa dang / mi mig med pa long ba
176b6(dkon brtsegs): dbul po bkren pa/ slongs mo byed pa zhig mthong / mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur to// de nas mi de rgyal po zla 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha khyod ni/ 
176b7(dkon brtsegs): skyed do// lha khyod dgyeso// bdag ni sdug bsngalo// long ngo mig ma mchiso// dbul po bkren no// slongs mo pa'o// mgon ma mchis so// kun dga'o de nas rgyal po zla 'od
176b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi de yang mthong nga tshig kyang thos nas dus te mchi ma zag bzhin du de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye mi khyod la ci dgos/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhon pa dang / rgyan dang
177a1(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che sna tshogs sbyin par bya 'am/ khyod la gang dgos pa de smos shigs/ mi des smras pa/ bdag la mig 'tshal na
177a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la mig stsal du gsol// kun dga'o de nas rgyal po zla 'od des rang gi mig kyang phyung ste mo de la sbyin no// kun dga'o zla 'od kyis rang gi mig phyung ste/ mi de la byin yang de'i sems la 'gyod pa
177a3(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur to// kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhon zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis za 'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
177a4(dkon brtsegs): nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar gyur to// kun dga'o ri'i rgyal po ri rab la ni tshad bzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongasu tshol
177a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing ngas sems can rnams la mig byin pa ni ches ma/ nga ste tshad med do// kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
177a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa na/ theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so// kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems
177a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lag pa yongasu btang ba ma byas/ rkang pa yongasu btang ba ma byas/ chung ma phangs pa yongasu btang ba ma byas/ bu
177a8(dkon brtsegs): phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ grong dang / grongs rdal dong / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor phangs pa yongasu btang ba ma byas te/ kun dga'
177b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshen thabs mkhas pas yongasu zin pas/ theg pa 'de ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde bas blam
177b2(dkon brtsegs): mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'os 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
177b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas thabs mkhas pa gang la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ de skad ces
177b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa/ kun dga'o la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga'o 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon
177b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nyin len pa/ sum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu ga/ zar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo
177b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar nas sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du byas te tshigs 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang / 
177b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog bgyid cing // mtho ris lam ni rab ston la// rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshalo// sems
177b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang du gyur pas na// bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nasu// bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi// bdag la rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod
178a1(dkon brtsegs): nams tshogs ni skyes pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa
178a2(dkon brtsegs): gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i yi rang bas// de la bdag ni yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// bsod nams kun la yid rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal
178a3(dkon brtsegs): lo/ bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gis phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/ mtshang rgya bgyid par bskul
178a4(dkon brtsegs): mar 'debs// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud brtul nas// srog chags kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig/ 
178a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnga chen po sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal sems can thar pa gyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du
178a6(dkon brtsegs): bying gyur cig/ srid pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'chi ba kun gyis bcings bdag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigasu gsol// sems kyi dri mar bgyis pa la// sangs rgyas
178a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni smon mi mdzad// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa// 
178a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag rje su bdag slob cing // byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas// bla med
178b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub reg gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang // rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis// rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i chos 'di rtogs par shog/ sangs rgya/ 
178b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po ltar// sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis// bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa ni// 
178b3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun la bde slad du// ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pa// bdag gis longs spyod lhun grub shog/ dngos
178b4(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad rnam 'jigs pas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med pas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i
178b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa 'am yang na chu 'am me// rlung gi kham sa ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa'am khro ba ma mchis pa
178b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// brtan po le li ma mchis shang // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtson
178b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sgyu ma lta bu'i tong 'dzin dang // dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang // rdo rje ltar bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog
178b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang // rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsdu/ 
179a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa dang / 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing / 
179a2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis// pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs nas// sa bcu po la rab tu gnas// kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gang la gnas nas
179a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas/ theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no// 
179a4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya/ rnams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung
179a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang gti mug chung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi/ ma dang ldan par gyur la/ phyis pa po dag blon med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
179a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar zhing rnam par sbyangs so// kun dga'o dus de dang tshed de 'byung ba yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dag 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / 
179a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug chung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lom dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar gyur te/ de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa smon lam gyi dbang gis bla na med
179a8(dkon brtsegs): pab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kun dga'o ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas
179b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ sems can 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang / zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang / gti mug gi shas che ba dang / 'dod chags bdo ba dang / zhe sdang bdo ba dang / gti mug bdo ba dang / chos
179b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin chags shing zhen pa dang / chags pa yang bas zil gyis non pa dang / chos log pa yongasu zin pa dang / pha la lan pa dang / ma la laca ba dang / spun la zhu ba dang / ming sring la
179b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khu ba dang / khyo shug la 'khu ba dang / nye du la 'khu ba dang / 'phags pa la 'khu ba dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la 'khu ba dang / bdag la 'khu ba dang / mi la 'khu ba dang / mi dri ma can
179b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dmu rgod dang / mi cang shes ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag pa par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar smon lam
179b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu sbyangs te/ dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas na/ kun dga'o ngas snying rje che ba mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen/ po dang ldan pas nga da ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang
179b6(dkon brtsegs): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'khor rnamasu zhugs te chos ston pa dang / nga la kha ngan zer zhing gshe rgyab ste/ tshogs par mi 'byung ba rtsub pa rlang pos sma
179b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// kun dga'o nga la chad pa smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro// rtag par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro// 'khor 'dod pa mang po zhes kyang gleng ngo // khyim gyi nang du zhugs na yang
179b8(dkon brtsegs): nga la sas kyang 'thor ro// dug dang bsres pa'i kha zas kyang byin no// me'i phung po yang nye bar bsgrub so// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas su gyur kyang mdzes ldan ma dang zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i
180a1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pas ngal bskur ba yang btag/ kun dga' nga ni sring rje chen po mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas daltar sems can de lta bu de dgas
180a2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun dga'os 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston par mdzadas
180a3(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba khur chen po bsnams pa dka' ba mdzad pa lagaso// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
180a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'ol 'di skad ces bka stsal to// kun dga'o de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kun dag 'od bzhin gshegs pa
