180a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdul ba 'dul ba khur chen po bsnams pa/ dge ba'i cha sa thams cad dang ldan pa gang dag sems can de lta bu dag
180a6(dkon brtsegs): la chos ston pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snying rje chen pos yongasu zin pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun/ 
180a7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'os 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog gi gnas 'di thos nas spu zing zhes bgyid pa
180a8(dkon brtsegs): ni ngo mtshar lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o de'i phyir chos
180b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs ji ldan gyi sman lam yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya bar yang rung shig+sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang zung shig/ byang chub kyi dag
180b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dkar dang / byung
180b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byams pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya po dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rte
180b4(dkon brtsegs): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog bdags pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa la
180b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ste 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rjen mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo nub ban+d+ha
180b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / bam po gcig dang sho lo ka 'bum/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai trai la ba/ 
180b7(dkon brtsegs): ri prits+tsha/ d+harma aSh+Ta nA ma ma hA ya na sutra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
180b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyos brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
181a1(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yong su bskor cing mdus
181a2(dkon brtsegs): du bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo
181a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
181a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye no/ de bzhin
181a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
181a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
181a7(dkon brtsegs): la ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
181a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ bla na med pa
181b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldogs pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongasu mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud phyir rgal ba bcom
181b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad kyang na kyi / ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas/ 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba dang / yongasu mi skyo
181b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhon gyi kho na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
181b4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams/ 
181b5(dkon brtsegs): pa legs so// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don/ 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so// byams ba de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas
181b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
181b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur
181b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi nyams la yongasu mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi man
182a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongasu mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes
182a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis myur du bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182a3(dkon brtsegs): po ni bas mo pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin/ byams pa phun sum
182a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yin/ snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin/ thabs la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ngan pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no// byams pa ji ltar na/ 
182a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bsdu/ 
182a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang yag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla
182a7(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ dge 'dun gyis sngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
182a8(dkon brtsegs): la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
182b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par
182b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshigs dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba spangs pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba
182b3(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ni dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams dang / phongs dpa dang / slong ba rnams la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams gtong
182b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sbyin bdag tu gyur pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub
182b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yong su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par
182b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu sngo bar byed de/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin no// byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems
183a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byam
183a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 
183a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnod sems med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems
183a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i yid kyi los dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa de da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na
183a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la ma khas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni kun rdzob kyi don la mkhas pa
183a6(dkon brtsegs): yin dam pa'i don la mkhas pa yin/ gnyi ga'i don la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin no// byams pa ji lta/ 
183a7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 
183a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang / 
183b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa
183b2(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byu
183b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'byung 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags
183b4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam pa ra shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas
183b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gags/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas
183b6(dkon brtsegs): len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas sreg pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas ska ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
183b7(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gags par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur snyam pa ste/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub/ 
183b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag dang ldan na// blan
184a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldogs pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / mi nyams la yongasu mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ro// bdud phyir rgol ba
184a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongasu mi skyo ba'i
184a3(dkon brtsegs): yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na mo las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
184a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ste mas dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma
184a5(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par bsto/ do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos
184a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// / sho lo ka brgyad cu rtsa gsum mchis
184a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi dra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 
184a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kA sh+ya ba ba ri brta nA ma mo hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgya
184b1(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad sto
184b2(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa khri drug stong thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
184b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gcig gis thog po sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
184b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste chos dang chos smra ba la mi gus pa yin/ chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud/ byed pa yin/ chos 'dod pa'i gang zag rnams la chos
184b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar chad byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed/ rnam par 'khrug pa byed de mi ston cing rab tu 'chab pa yin/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdag la stod cing gzhan la smad pa yin te/ 'od
184b7(dkon brtsegs): srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongasu nyams par gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba la gus pa med pa yin// chos la ser sna byed pa
184b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / chos la slob dpon dpe 'khyud byed pa yin/ chos 'dod rnams la bgegs ni byed gyur cing // 'dun pa bzlog la de bzhin rnams 'khrug byed// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i/ 
185a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni yang mi ston// le lo can te bdag bstod rtag tu brtson// gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par dga'// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi/ 
185a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab nyams par 'gyur ba rgyal bas gsungs// chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spang byas la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni bya
185a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshos dang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang / 
185a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig su bcad pa la mi re bar ji ltar thos pa dang // ji ltar/ khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/ mang du thos pa las shes
185a5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byung bar rig nas/ mgo 'am gos la me 'bar ba/ bzhin du thos pa yongasu tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa yin/ nan tan snying por byed
185a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig lhur len pa ma yin te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba
185a7(dkon brtsegs): la gus dang bcas pa yin/ zang zing med cing rnyed dang bkur bsti la// re ba med cing tshigs gcad mi sems par// ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la ston// thos las shes
185a8(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byung bar des rig nas// mgo la 'bar bzhin rtag tu thos pa tshol// de ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin// chos bzung nas ni nan tan bya phyir gnas// mkhas de nan tan snying po
185b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin// tshigs lhur mi len smra ba lhur mi len// mkhas pas chos bzhi 'di dag bsten byas na// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'
185b2(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na// byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste slob dpon dang bla ma dang sbyin gnas la slu ba dang / gzhan 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar
185b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjed pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang / sgyu
185b4(dkon brtsegs): dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos debazhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro// 
185b5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sbyin gnas bla mas bsgo bzhi na mi byed dang // gzhan dag la yang the tshom nyer bstsu ba dang // sems can gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/ 
185b6(dkon brtsegs): de la bsngags min mi snyan spro ba dang // sgra dang g.yo dang rgyan la dor byed pas// gzhan la brten gyi bsam pas ma yin pa// chos bzhi 'di dag kun tu bsten byas na/ 
185b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byang chub sems mchog nyams par 'gyur// de lta bas na chos 'di sten byed na// byang chub mchog lnga de ni ring bar 'gyur// de las bzlog pa bsten par byed na ni// 
185b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog rab bsngags pa reg par 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/ 
186a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro// gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste srog gi phyir ram/ tha na gzhad rgad kyi phyir yang
186a2(dkon brtsegs): brdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing / de dag gi/ 
186a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa/ nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can gang rnams yongasasu smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
186a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ 'od srung chos bzhi bro de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams ca du du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du gyur te/ byang chub
186a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bor ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang brdzun ni go ma smra zhing // rtag tu don dang ldan pa'i tshi ga rnams smra/ 
186a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu dang g.yo ni rtag tu rnam spangs te// lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta// sems can dag pa byang chub gang zhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems/ 
186a7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas kyang // de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod par byed// sems can gang dag yongasu smin byed pa// bla med ye shes yang dag 'dzin du 'jug
186a8(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams// byang chub sems ni nams kyang brjed mi 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba
186b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongasu zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba/ 
186b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bstil lhag par zhen pas khyim la lwa ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par ldang zhing bskur ba 'debs pa dang / ma thos pa dang ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spong ba ste/ 
186b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa dge ba'i skyes shing byung ba rnams yongasu zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
186b4(dkon brtsegs): ce bya ste/ nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten rgyang ban tshol// rnyed kyi phyir ni mi la sbyor bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la ldang // de dag bsngags min kun
186b5(dkon brtsegs): du smra bar byed// de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa spong bar byed/ chos 'di dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni// dge ba'i chos kyis
186b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyang bsring rnam par spang // 'di dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste// gnams ring bas shin
186b7(dkon brtsegs): tu ring bar 'gyur// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'di ltar pha rol tu
186b8(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas legs par thos pa tshol gyi nyes par thos pa mi tshol te/ sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa'i sems khyi
187a1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba yin// chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin te/ log pas 'tshe ba thams cad yongasu spangs shing 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan dag/ 
187a2(dkon brtsegs): gi ltung ba 'byung ba dang / ma byung ba mi gling zhing gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi tshol ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la/ sangs rgyas
187a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis ni mi shre
187a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum mo zhes byas nas ma spong ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos de bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ khyad par du 'gro bas yongasu mi
187a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin rnams dang / thabs la mkhas dang byang chub sde snod brtson// nga rgyal
187a6(dkon brtsegs): med pas khyi 'dra'i sems kyis// sems can kun lo nga rgyal bcag pa yin// chos dang mthun pa'i rnyed pas chog sems shing // 'tshe ba yong dag 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas// 
187a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing // gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do// gang de'i blos ni zab mo mi rtogs pa// de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ba ste// bde
187a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas pas// rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so// chos bzhi sa rigs kyi gyur pa ni// ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog
187b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams mi 'gyur// chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dkar// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni gya rgya can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag
187b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas yongasu spangs par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom za ba dang / sems can rnams la nga rgyal
187b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
187b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshogs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag
187b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni som nyid yid/ gnyis byed// sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro ba ste/ 
187b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed// rgyal ba la ni nams kyang dang mi byed// mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la// bsngags pa min dang brjod mIH snyan brjod// gya gyu
187b7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi sems bzhi rnam par spang // byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems ca can bsten// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/ 
187b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ba rnams mi 'chab cing brjod de rnam pa 'byed pa dang / 'chab pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin/ de'i bden pa'i tshigs gang gis rgyas srid
188a1(dkon brtsegs): stor pa 'am/ nor yal ba 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi 'khyud cing gzhan nas gzhan du bsgyur ba'i tshig mi smra ba yin/ gzhan gyi
188a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa bya ba skur pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / smod pa dang / ba shung ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa dang / bsod pa dang / 'ching bar byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la
188a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi nyes par sems shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston pas gzhan dag la mi 'khrug cing khong du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bsam
188a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i ngasangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dad pa ste/ 'od srung rabazhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i man
188a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ltung ba byung / ba 'chab par mi byed kyi// brjod cing rnam par 'bye/ da de nyes pa 'dor// nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir
188a6(dkon brtsegs): yang / 'du shes bsgyur te brdzun pa'i tshig mi smra// skur dang smod dang bshung dang gsod pa dang // 'ching ba byed dang gaurar bcug pa la// bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug mi
188a7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ las ni bdag gir bya bas kho na mi 'dzin// de ni bder gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang // dad la gnas shing bsam pa dang ldan pa// 'di dag drang ba'i mtshan du sangs
188a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gsungs// sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsten par bya// 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste thos pa la gtses pa
188b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba'i chos gnas shing / chos kyi rje su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa la nan tan du ma byed pa yin// rjes su bstan pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i cho sa gnas shing / slob dpon dang
188b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa kun spyod de// dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang
188b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pas rgod par gnas pa/ 
188b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin// rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba bsten// 'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu med// dam bcas
188b5(dkon brtsegs): nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yi// kha zas rnams la de/ ni rtag tu za// byang chub sems dpa' cang shesabab dag/ mthong bar gyur na gus par mi byed cing / 
188b6(dkon brtsegs): dmu rgod dag ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'ang rgyal bcag mi bsten// 'di dag dmu rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis
188b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spang // 'od srung bzhi po 'od dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste legs par thos pa nyan cing de la nan tan du byed de/ don la rton
188b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshig 'brul mi rton pa yin// gdams pa de rje su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin cing / bka' blo bde la legs par byed pa'i las byed cing / bla ma la sri zhu bya ba tshor phyin pa yin/ 
189a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ting 'dzin las ma nyams te cang shes pas za za pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes mthong na gus pa dang bcu ldi'i sa dang bcud de la gan
189a2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'bab de la bab cing / de'i yon+tan 'dod pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang mnyan de ni legs par nan tan/ 
189a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas// rjesu bstan pa mthun par 'dzin byed cing // chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar bla ma bsten// tshul khrims ting 'dzin la rtag
189a4(dkon brtsegs): goganas shing // tshul khrims bsdams nas de ni bza' ba za// gus dang bcas shing zhe sar bcas pa yin// de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon+dan 'dod// rgyal sras
189a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag cang shes thob gyur ba// de dag la ni rtag tu ga' bas blta// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni// bder gshegs sras po cang shes thob
189a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can yongasu smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub
189a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems
189a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos rnams la brnyas shing
189b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can kun du sdud pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o// de la 'di skad ces
189b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste yongs min ma byas rnams la yid mi bston// snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad// rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman// byang chub sems dpa' mchog
189b3(dkon brtsegs): gis bshad mi bya// yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon+dan ldan// dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya// tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs mi bsdu// sdig pa
189b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams yongasu spang bar bya// 'khrul pa'i chos bzhi 'di dag shes gyur nas// byang chub sems dpas rgyang bsring rnam par spang // 'di dag bsten na byang chub 'tshang
189b5(dkon brtsegs): mi rgya// de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spangs// 'od/ srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste// / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la
189b6(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa dang // sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pa dang // sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can
189b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya// sangs
189b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin du 'jug/ rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni bstan par bya// sems can kun la dang ba'i semasu bya// yang dag sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas/ 
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad pa bya// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab sngags te// rgyal sgras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bsten// 'od srung bzhi pa
190a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongasu spang bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs
190a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don nyung shing bya ba nyung ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang / gang la brten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud
190a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi chos kun mi bsdud pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongasu
190a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyan thos gang dag bdag phan brtson pa dang // gang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod// rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing // 
190a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi don du 'du 'dzi rnam par spong // byis pa gang ga 'jig rten rgyang phan klog/ ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed// gang la brten nas zang zing kun sdud kyi// chos 'di nan
190a7(dkon brtsegs): yang sdud par mi byed pa// chos bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab spangs nas// dge ba'i gshes gnyen bzhi la brten par bya// 'di dag
190a8(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen ngan dang grogs ngan du// rgyal bas gsung te thag bsring yongasu spang // 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bzhi gang zhe na// 
190b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir spong ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / thos pa'i shes rab ston pa'i phyir/ chos smra pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes
190b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ston pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston
190b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// de la 'di ska
190b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ byang chub yongasu ston phyir len pa po// sbyin byed rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/ chos sngon slub thos dang shes rab byed// dge ba'i bshes ga
190b5(dkon brtsegs): yin par bde gshegs gsungs// gang dag rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin 'jug pa// de dag dge ru yin pas bshes gnyen gsungs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi la ni
190b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes// rgyal bas sngags pa'i bzhi po 'di dag ni// bde gshegs sras kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te// 'di dag bsten
190b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rtag tu bag yod na// bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rnyed pa
190b8(dkon brtsegs): dadang bkur sti don du gnyer gyi chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshig su bcad pa don du gnyer gyis yo nan don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi sem
191a1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi sdug bsngal gsal bdon du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben pa don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chu/ 
191a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos 'don min// brjod pa don gnyer yon+dan don gnyer min// bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer
191a3(dkon brtsegs): byed cing // sems can sdug bsngags bsal ba don mi gnyer// 'khor tshegs don du gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod// bde la chags kyi yon+dan ma chags pa// bzhi po de dag bcos par
191a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas yongasu spab/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon+tan te/ bzhi gang
191a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid la yang mos la las kyi rna ma par smin pa yang yid ches pa dang / de bdag med pa/ ra yang bzod la sems can thams cad la yang snying rje che
191a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas la sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang / de sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la yang mi
191a7(dkon brtsegs): re ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon+dan no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang // 
191a8(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang yid ches so// bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang // sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed// de yi bsam pa rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas
191b1(dkon brtsegs): de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin// yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang // las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen
191b2(dkon brtsegs): po rnyed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyan pa dang / chos smra ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyi lta ba dang / 
191b3(dkon brtsegs): bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// tshe rabs kun
191b4(dkon brtsegs): tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// pha rol phyin pa drug po de rnams kyang nyan// chos smra ba la sems ni rab tu dang // mthong na rtag tu gus pa skyed par byed// rtag tu
191b5(dkon brtsegs): bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas// de ni de nyid la yang rtag tu dga'// bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sra sa rnams kyi// gten chen yin par ba bar gshegs
191b6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsungs// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba
191b7(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can thams cad la khong khrod ba'i sems med pa dang / 'khor gyur pa thams cad rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
191b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems ni yong su gtong mi byed// sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spong / 
192a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed// sems can tshogs la brnyas pa yongs mi byed// bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni// bdud las
192a2(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i cho su gsungs// 'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa// gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
192a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul 'chos pa med par dgon par gnas pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs par rab med pa'i bsdu ba'i
192a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhi po dang / sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongasu tshol ba dang / tho ba dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
192a5(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/ 'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge bar rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
192a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong // rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams la byed// dam chos yongasu brtsal ba btsam byas nas// lus dang srog kyang
192a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gtong bar byed// dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mi nyung ba// yang dag sgrub phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong // dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar
192a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gsungs// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o// gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zang zing med pa'i sems kyis
192b1(dkon brtsegs): chos sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang / nyams chung ba rnams la bzod pas bsten/ 
192b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis// chos kyi sbyin
192b3(dkon brtsegs): byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags// tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che// gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed 'jug/ nyams chung rnams la bzod pas dang du len// 
192b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dge chos sdud par gsungs pa ste/ 'di dag ba sten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na// byang chub sems dpas de dag rtag tu bsten// 'od srung chos bzhi 'di dag
192b5(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag
192b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa dang sgron ma sbyin pa dang / tha na 'dris pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i
192b7(dkon brtsegs): bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed dang / dam chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyin byed
192b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin tha na 'dris la sbyin byed cing // mkhas pa ma rigs las rnam par 'byed// 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par
193a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa ste/ 
193a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa// sdig pa'i bzhi
193a3(dkon brtsegs): bcu po rnam spangs nas// mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na// 'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can dam pa gang dag tshes tshul 'di// 'dzin
193a4(dkon brtsegs): dam klog gam rab tu ston byed pa// de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsung // de yi tshad ni rgyu/ la ba rnams brjod do// gang gis zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed
193a5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas// gang gis 'di la sa tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad klog/ bsod nams 'a yi grangasu 'ang mi phod do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa
193a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang / snyoms par spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la/ 
193a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 
193a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang / bdag ci ri zhes yongasu 'jal zhing
193b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi shes pa la mi slong ba dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / bcos ma ma yin par byams pa dang / 'dza' ba dang mi mdza' ba sems snyoms pa
193b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rnga mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan du mdza' ba dang / tshig ran cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba dang / khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sems
193b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la snying rje chen po yongasu ma bcad pa dang / yid yongasu mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul
193b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la skyon du lta zhing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la ni ga she bor bsgo ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongasu sbyong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la
193b5(dkon brtsegs): mi ra ba'i gtong ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang // 
193b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par bsal ba'i bsam gtan dang / thabs la mkhas pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi/ 
193b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la gnyisu med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang // 
193b8(dkon brtsegs): gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa
194a1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po la phan yon du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu sung zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas/ 
194a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang / sgrub pa dang log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang / gcig tu chad
194a3(dkon brtsegs): par smra ba dang bden pa gcesu byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
194a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can kun la phan dang bde bya/ ba'o// lhag pa'i bsam la mos par byed pa yin/ kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems sgrol zhing // ri 'am mi ri/ 
194a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bdag la dpog/ smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgya'o med// bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byam sa// mdza' dang mi mdza' rnam la sems kyang snyoms/ 
194a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug par du// sems can rnams la gtan du rab tu mdza'// 'dzum pa'i gzhin gyi 'jam por smra bar byed// khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med// 
194a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag la snying rje yongs ma bcad// dam chos yongasu tshul ba skye ba med// thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi 'khrul skyon lta// gzhan la gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med// spyod la
194a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam gsum sems ni rab tu sbyor// gtong ba rnam par smin la re ba med// tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro bar gnas ma yin// sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro spangs// 
194b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba yang dag bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang // gzugs med khams spangs pa yi bsam gtan dang // thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang // bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin tha
194b2(dkon brtsegs): dang khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byams pa dang // gus par byas te ngas chos nyan dang // gus par byas te dgon gzhi gnas pa dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang
194b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman la dga' bar mi byed cing // theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed pa dang // sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu bsten pa dang // tshangs pa
194b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa bzhi la skems pa dang // mngon shes rnam lngas rtag/ tu rtson pa dang // ye shes rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang // / sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang // sgrub dang mi ldan
194b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mi gtong dang // gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang // bde la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang / byang chub sems ni sngon du btang nas su// rgyal bas bsngag
194b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos ni sgom par byed// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis chos// 'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis bsten par bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang yin de dag ni/ 
194b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// 'od srung dpe nye bar dgod pa bstan pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yon+tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe
194b8(dkon brtsegs): nyebar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do// 'od srung
195a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te 'gyur ba med cing lan
195a2(dkon brtsegs): du phan 'dogs par re ba med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tshe// lan la mi re 'gyur ba med pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas/ 
195a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyasu// ma gyur par du skye bo kun gyi 'tsho// lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med// bu dang dgra la'ang yid kyis mtshungs par sems// byang chub
195a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog rab rtag par yongasu 'tshel// 'od srung 'di lta ste dpe ran chu'i khams ni rtsa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad skyed par byedado// 'od srung de bzhin du
195a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa// sems can tham sa cad la byams pas khyab par byas te/ gnas pa ya nga sems can thams cad la dkar po'i chos thams cad bsgo
195a6(dkon brtsegs): do 'di la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu ni rtsa dang gel pa dang // nags tshal sman dang 'bru yi rnam pa bskyed// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bsam dag pa// sems can mtha' yas
195a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pas khyab par byed// sna tshogs chos la khyab byas rims gyis// dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par rgya gyur zhing / dpung bcas sde dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas// rim gyis rgyal ba'i
195a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na me'i khams ni lo thog thams cad yong su smin par byed// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can
195b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi dkar po'i chos thams cad yongasu smin par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na me ni nA dang sman rnams dang // lo thog thams cad yongasu smin par byed// de bzhin bde
195b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs sras kyi shes rab kyang // skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos smin byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rlung gi khams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// 'od srung de bzhin
195b3(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rlung ni sangs rgyas
195b4(dkon brtsegs): dgong pa bzhin// rnam par sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par bsgrub// de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang // bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam
195b5(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na bdud sdig can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'dod pa na ste dpa'i lha thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa 'am yod
195b6(dkon brtsegs): su zad par mi nuso// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang bdud thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa 'am yongasu zad par bya bar mi nuso// 'od srung
195b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang dkar po'i chos thams cad
195b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis rdzogs shing rgyas par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang ngol// skye zhing yongasu gang 'gyur 'bri mi 'gyur// de bzhin bsam dag byang / 
196a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' yang // dkar po'i chos kyis rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las lan gcig byung ba'i 'od zer nas/ 
196a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can thams cad snang bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lan gcig phyung ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la shes pa
196a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na nyi las la no gcig phyung ba yi// 'od zer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byed// de bzhin rgyal sras ye shes 'od zer gyis// sems can
196a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la shes rab snang bar byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste nga ra ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni gang las gar 'gro ba mas cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gror// 'od srung de
196a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang tshul khrims dang / bslob pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon+dan dang / yo byang sbyangs pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / ye shes la gnas pa
196a6(dkon brtsegs): yang gang los gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ral pa can// 'jigs pa med par gang du 'dod par 'gro
196a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos dang ye shes gnas pa dga' mgur 'gro/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ba glang glang po che shin tu dul ba ni khal thams cad khyer
196a8(dkon brtsegs): bas yongasu skye ba med do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phus lnga'i khur khyer bas yongasu skyo ba med do// 
196b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rab dul stobs ldan glang po che// khal rnams khyer yang yongasu skyo ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sem rab dul// sems can khur gyis skyo bar 'gyu
196b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma chu las skyes kyang chus mi gos so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'/ 'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gas
196b3(dkon brtsegs): so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na pad+ma chu las skyes gyur kyang // chu 'am rdzab kyis gso ba med pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten skyes// 'jig rten chos
196b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis nam yang gos pa med// 'od srung 'di lta ste dperan shing ljon pa yal ge gcad pa ni// rtsa ba ma snad na skar yang sa las skye bo// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
196b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa nyon mongs pa'i yal ga bcad pa ya/ nga snying rje chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun du / rab ma nyams na slar yang khams gsum du skye'o// de la
196b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing ljon yal ga bcad pa ni// rtsa ba brtan par ma snang slar yang skye// de bzhin rtsa ba kun sbyor ma spangs na// thabs kyis gsal yang slar yang skye bar 'gyur/ 
196b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tha dad pa nas klung chen po'i chu'i phung po rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa ni 'di lta ste lan tsha'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin
196b8(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo tha dad pa nas bsags pa byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa thams cad kyang 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// 
197a1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na tha dad phyogs kyi chu klung rnams dang // rgya mtsho cher 'bab ro gcig 'gyur ba bzhin// tha dad sgo nas dge ba bsags byas pa// 
197a2(dkon brtsegs): chub bsngos pa rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri rab la gnas so// 'od srung de ban
197a3(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la gan so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams dang // sum
197a4(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs ri rab gnas// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dgar gnas te/ thams cad/ khyen nyid thob nas chos rnams ston// 'od srung 'di lta
197a5(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na blon pos yongasu zin pa'i rgyal po rnams ni rmya pi'i byer tshad byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sa mas dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa'i
197a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na blon po ldan pa'i rgyal po rnams// bya ba thams cad rtag tu byed pa ltar// thabs
197a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang // sangs rgyas don rnams rtag tu byon pa yin// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sprin med cing nam thang ba'i na mkha' la ni char 'bab pa'i
197a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu medo// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba la yang dam pa'i chos kyi char dbab pa'i rgyu med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sprin med nam thang na mkha
197b1(dkon brtsegs): la 'char 'bab rgyu ni nams kyang mi dmig so// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thos nyung la// chos ston nam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sprin chen po
197b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo thag thams cad la mngon par 'bab pa// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang mang du thos pa'i chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i chos kyi cha
197b3(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can thams cad la mngon par 'bab po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na smon chen glog dang bcas pa las// char pa 'bab pas lo thog ngoms par byed// de bzhin byang chu
197b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dam chos kyis// sprin byung chos rgyu sems can tshim par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'kho ra los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du byung ba der rin po che sna
197b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun yang 'byung ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang du 'byung ba der byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun ba'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang 'byung // de la 'di ska
197b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang byung ba// der ni de yi rin chen sna bdun 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' gang du 'byung gyur pa// der ni byang chub yan lag bdun po 'byung
197b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na gang nor bu rin po che bI daR+Ya 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de na kar sha pa ni brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do// 'od srung de bzhin du gang na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung
197b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo yod pa de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na gang du nor bu rin chen 'byung // der ni kar sha pa ni mang 'byung ltar
198a1(dkon brtsegs): gang du rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems 'byung ba// der ni nyan thos mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i cha
198a2(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs pa rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongasu spyod pa rnams ni mtshungs par gnaso// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'i sbyor ba yang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba zad
198a3(dkon brtsegs): le mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na 'dres pa'i tshal gnas lha rnams kyi// longs spyod rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pa yin// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems
198a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang // sems can rnams la rtag tu legs par sbyor/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sngags dang sman gyis yongasu zin pa'i dug gi 'chi bar byed mi nuso// 'od srung de bzhin du ye/ 
198a5(dkon brtsegs): shes dang thabs mkhas pas yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nuso// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sngags
198a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongasu zin pa'i dug/ skye bo rnams la nyes pa byed mi nus// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can// nyon mongs rnams kyis log ltung byed mi nus// 'od srung 'di lta ste
198a7(dkon brtsegs): dper na grong khyer chen po rnams kyi lung gang yin pa de ni bu ram shing gi zhing dag dang / rgun 'brum gyi zhing dag la phan pa yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyon
198a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par 'gyur ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lung // de ni bu ram shing gi
198b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing la phan// de bzhin byang chub sems kyi nyon mongs lung // de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phan par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'phong rtsalam bslangs pa las mtshon thabs slob pa de bzhin du byung
198b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba las dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / dpyod po dang / don 'dzin pa'i shes par blta'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na som btang ba'i snod rnams la ni
198b3(dkon brtsegs): rdza mkhan gyis me chen po btang dgoso// 'od srung de bzhin du shes rab ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la yang byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi me chen po btang dgos par blta'o// 
198b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od sung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'dod pas tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor bar bya'o// 'od srung de la
198b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'a'i tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor ba ga/ nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la ya de dag par so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srung dbu ma'i chos rnam
198b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang zhe na/ 'od srung gang bdag mod par so sor rtog pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med
198b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shed las skyes pa med pa dang / shed bu med par rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam
198b8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang gzugs la rtag par yang so sor mi tog mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / 'od srung de bzhin du chos dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
199a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa la gang rtag pa yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog
199a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang sa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi dag par yang so so ma rtog pa dang / de bzhin du
199a3(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag par yang so sor mi stog pa ste/ 'od srung
199a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par sor sor rtog/ ba zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnam sa la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang mig gi skye mched la
199a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag par so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yi da kyi skye mched rnams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag
199a6(dkon brtsegs): par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// mi rtag ces bya ba de ni ma
199a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis/ mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i
199a8(dkon brtsegs): lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung bdag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// bdag med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis// mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa/ 
199b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa / 
199b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'od srung sems yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig/ sems yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyiso// 'od srung gang na sems med pa dang / sem pa med pa dang / yid
199b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa 'di ni 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten/ 
199b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas
199b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad kyang de bzhin// 'od srung kun nas nyon/ mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig/ rnam par byang / zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis// mtha' de gnyis khas mi
199b6(dkon brtsegs): cing mi brjod mi smra ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung yod ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go/ med ces bya ba 'di na
199b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' gnyis// de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam
199b8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig go// mya ngan 'das pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis kyi dbus gang
200a1(dkon brtsegs): // yin pa de ni dpyang du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par ma/ 
200a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gang yang ngas khyed rnams la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming samams kyi rkyen
200a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye
200a4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig
200a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs
200a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tsher ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags tha phred pa 'gag/ sreg
200a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gogs pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
200a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur// zhes bstan pa de la 'od srung rig pa dang ma
200b1(dkon brtsegs): rig pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyi su dper med do// 'od srung 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'du byed rnams
200b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'du byed rnams 'gag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs 'gag pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug
200b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa 'gag pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba 'gag pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa 'gags pa dang / len pa dang / len pa 'gag pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa
200b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba 'gag pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi 'gag pa de dag gnyis ma yin shing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de// 'od srung 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dgra
200b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams
200b6(dkon brtsegs): stong par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid stong pa dang / gang mtshan ma med pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed/ chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / gang smon pa med pas chos rnams
200b7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid smon pa med pa dang / gang mngon par 'du byed pa med pas chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa med par mi byed/ chos rnams nyid mngon par 'du byed
200b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / gang ma skyes pas chos rnams ma skyes par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ma skyes pa dang / gang ma byung bas chos rnams ma byung bar mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ma byung ba
201a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang ngo bo nyid med pas chos rnams nga ba nyid med par mimyed de/ chos rnams nyid ngo bo nyid med par gang dag de ltar sa sor rtog pa de ni 'od srung dbu ma'i las chos rnams
201a2(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// yang 'od srung gang zag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ma yin gyi stong pa nyid stong pa'o// 'od srung sngon gyi mtha' stong pa// phyi ma'i mtha
201a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa/ da ltar byung ba stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la rton par bya ba'i gang zag la ma yin no// 'od srung gang dag stong pa nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rton pa de dag ni/ ngas gsung
201a4(dkon brtsegs): rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyam zhes bshad do// 'od srung gang zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam la gnas pa bla'i// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin// 
201a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'a/ byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srung gang stong pa nyi de kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do// 'od/ 
201a6(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di lta ste dper na mi nad pa zhig yod la/ sman pas de la sman btang nas sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyed/ sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de nad
201a7(dkon brtsegs): de las thar par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur legs te/ gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas/ sman lto na mchis pa nyid ma byung na/ mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshab
201a8(dkon brtsegs): che bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srung gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba
201b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sman pas nad ni gsal ba'i phyir// mi zhig la ni bkru sman btang ba las// nad rnams bskyod nas 'khrus pa
201b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur na// de yi gzhi las nad ni sos mi 'gyur// de bzhin lta ba thibs por gnas pa las// 'byung ba'i mchog ni stong pa nyid yin na// gang zhig stong pa kho nar lta gyur pa// de
201b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gsor mi rung zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig na mkha' 'jigs skrag nas brang rdung zhing du ste na mkha' 'di sol nam ces de skad zer na/ 'od srung 'di ji
201b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ na mkha' de bsal bar nus sam/ gso dal ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thog lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// 'od srung de bzhin du
201b5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag stong pa nyid kyis skrag rab tu skrag na// de dag gi sems 'khrugs pa chen por 'a/ gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung / 
201b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni stong pa nyid la spyod la de nyid kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na na mkhas 'jigs pa nyen pa'i phyir// blun po nam mkha' 'di ni sol zhes zer// nam mkha'
201b7(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar nus pa mo yin yang // rmo dra pas byis pa dag ni 'di skad smra// de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig/ stong pa nyid kyis skrag cing sems 'khrugs pas// byis pa de dag
201b8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid spyod pa// stong pa nyid ni gang du'ang gzhig mi nus// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ri mo mkhan zhig bdag nyid kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig bris
202a1(dkon brtsegs): nas de 'jigs skrag ste/ kha srub tu 'gyel nas brgyal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'od srung byis pasas skye bo rnams kyang bdag nyid kyis byis pa'i gzugs dang sbyang
202a2(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis 'khor ba ni 'khor yang / chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rim mkhan zhig gis// gnod sbyin 'jig
202a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzugs byas nas// de yi 'jigs te kha sbub tu// 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa ltar// byis pa so so'i skye ba kun// bdag nyid kyis ni byis pa yi// gzugs sprul sogs rmongs gyur/ 
202a4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'a'agro ba drug tu 'khyams par 'gyur// 'odi srung 'di lha ste dper na/ mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu ma sprul bsku dal nas sprul 'dis sgyu ma mkhan de nyid zos pa de bzhin du 'o srung
202a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang gang yid la byed pa/ dethams cad de la ga sog tu snang ngo // gseb dang / slong pa dang / snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste
202a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis mngon sprul pa// sgyu ma byas pa de yid zos ltar// rnal 'byor pas ni yid la gang byed pa// de la de dag gsog dang gsob tu snang // 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na shing gci
202a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis drud pa de las me byung ste// byung nas shing de gnyis bsreg pa de bzhin du 'od srung yang dag par so sor rtog pa yod na// 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po skye ste/ de skyes pas yang dag
202a8(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa de nyid bsreg par byed// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drung pa las// me byung bas ni de nyid bsreg par byed// de bzhin shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang / 
202b1(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa de nyid bsreg par byed// 'od srung dper na mar me bus na mun pa mun gnag thams cad med par 'gyur yang / mun pa mun nag de gang nas kyang 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs dang / 
202b2(dkon brtsegs): lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogasu yang 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba med do// yang 'od srung mar me de 'di snyam du bdag gis mun pa mun nag bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang mar me la brten nas
202b3(dkon brtsegs): mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de la mar me gang yin pa dang / mun pa mun nag gang yin pa de gnyi ka stong pa ste/ bzung du med cing byed pa med do// 'od srung de bzhin du ye shes skyes na mi/ 
202b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa med par 'gyur yang mi shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba dam 'gro ba med// shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogasu yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// yang 'od srung ye she
202b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mi shes pas bas lo snyam du mi se mas mod kyi// 'on kyang ye shes la brten nas mi shre/ pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de la ye shes gang yin pa dang / 
202b6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ka stong pa ste gzung du med cing byed pa med do// de la 'di skad ces pa ste/ dper na sgron mas mun pa mun nag kun// med par gyur kyang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med// de bzhin
202b7(dkon brtsegs): shes byung mi shes med gyur kyang // de ni gang nas 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med// sgron mas mun pa bsal snyam mi sems kyang // snang ba byung nas mun pa med par gyur// stong pa gzung med nam
202b8(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i me tog 'dra// de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyi ka stong // 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na khyim 'am/ khang pa 'am/ khang phran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang lan 'ga' yang mar me ma bus
203a1(dkon brtsegs): ba der mi la la zhig gis mar me bus na// 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mun pa mun nag de 'di lta du bdag ni lo 'bum du bsag pa yin te/ bdag 'di nas mi 'gro'o snyam/ 
203a2(dkon brtsegs): du sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi sems lags te// mar me bus na mun pa mun nag la mi mchi ba'i mthu ma mchis kyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar ma mchis par 'gyur lagaso// 
203a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa yang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i so sor rtog pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// 
203a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung mar me zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang bo'i tshig bla dag so// 'od srung mun pa mun nag ces bya ba de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla
203a5(dkon brtsegs): dgas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis// ring zhig lon nas mar me bus bya/ sa na// de la mun pa bdag gnas rin lon gyis// 'di nas
203a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro snyam du sems pa med// mar me phyung nas mun pa mun nag la// med par mi 'gyur ba yi nus med// mar me bsten nas mun pa med par 'gyur// gnyis ka stong pa rlom sems ci yang
203a7(dkon brtsegs): med/ de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes sten// mi shes nyon mongs bsags pa med par 'gyur// ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang // de dag lan 'ga' tsam yang 'grogs pa med
203a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mi shes med bya mi sems kyang // ye shes bstan nas mi shes med par 'gyur// gnyis ka gzung med namakha'i me tog bzhin// de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ka stong // 'od srung 'di sa/ 
203b1(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na nam mkha' la ni sa bon rnams mi skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung mi 'byung // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
203b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na nam mkha' las sa bon skye ba ni// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar med// de bzhin 'dus ma byas las sangs rgyas chos// skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper
203b3(dkon brtsegs): na lud kyi gang ba'i sa la ni sa bon thams cad skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud kyis gang ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// 
203b4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lud bcas mtshan dang dbacas pa la// sa bon skye yi dgon gdung rnams na min// de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras rnams kyi/ 
203b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'brog dgon pa dgon gdung rnams na ni pad+ma mi skye'o// 'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems/ 
203b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skyes de ni ma byung mi 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na pad+ma chu rdzing rnams na skye// dgon gdung dag na nams kyang skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin 'dus ma byas las
203b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos// skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na lung yod pa'i 'dam rdzab nas pad+ma skyes// 'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab log pa nyid du de
203b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lung bcas 'dam rdzab chu las ni// pad+ma skye ye thang las nam yang min/ 
204a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mar sar gyis yongasu gang bar
204a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgya mtsho bzhi po mar sar gyis// yongs gang gtsang zhing kun nas/ 
204a3(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras// dge ba'i klung gis rtag tu gang bar blta// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig gis skra tshal pa brgyar bshags pa'i
204a4(dkon brtsegs): rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu'i thigs pa gcig bla ngas pa de bzhin du 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mdo na par 'du byas par blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya
204a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na chu yi phung po de la ni// skra tshal brgya yi rtse mo 'i thigs blangs pa// de bzhin nyan thos rnams kyis de/ byas pa'i// dge ba dag dang ldan par lta bdu/ 'od srung 'di lta ste
204a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i nang gi na mkha' bzhin du nyan thos kyi 'dus ma byas par lta bar mi bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa yis/ 
204a7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi na mkha' de ni chung ba yin// nyan thos 'dus ma byas pa shes pa yang // de bzhin chung shing shin du chung bar blta// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i khams
204a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas shes par blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na// na mkha'i khams ni sgrib pa med par 'dug
204b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes 'dus byas pa// 'gro ba kun gyi mchog kyang de ltar lta// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i btsun mo ngas pa skyes pa dbul
204b2(dkon brtsegs): po dang nyal nas phyis de las bu byung bar 'gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ de rgyal po'i bu zhes bya 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
204b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams chos rnams chos kyi dbyings las skyes mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dbang bskur bar 'os shes mi bya'o// de la 'di skad
204b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po'i btsun me yid 'ong ma// skyes pa dbul po dang ni nyal gyur te// de phyir de la bu byung gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po'i bu min dbang bskur min// de bzhin
204b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos 'dod chags bral gyur pa// de dag nga bu dbang / bskur 'os ma yin// 'di ltar de dag bdag la phan phyi/ ra brtson// bdag gzhan gnyi ga'i don byed sangs rgyas
204b6(dkon brtsegs): sras// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba nas dbang bskur ba/ bran mo ngan pa dang nyal ba de las de'i bu byung na/ 'od srung de bran mo ngan pa las byung du zin kyang de la rgyal po'i sras
204b7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mthu ma thob du zin kyang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
204b8(dkon brtsegs): sras shes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba bran mo dang // nyal bar gyur pa de las du byung ba// bran mo las ni byung bar gyur kyang de// rgyal po'i sras
205a1(dkon brtsegs): shes 'jig rten zer ba ltar// byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa// srid pa gsum na 'khor zhing mthu chung ste// sbyin dang thabs kyis sems can mi 'dul ya
205a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag pa rgyal ba'i sras shes bya// / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la bu gzhon nu stobs che zhing mgyogs
205a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shugs dang ldan pa mthu rnyed pa stong yod par gyur la/ de dag gang yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang mi ldan na de dag la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed pa de ba
205a4(dkon brtsegs): du/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos bya dab brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub sems dpar ma gyu/ na de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed/
