205a5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi bdag rgyal po sras stong // 'ga' yang bu yi mtshan dong mi ldan na// de phyir de dag gces byed mi nus pas// de la mi mchog pu yi 'du shes med
205a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas zham ring byed pa mang // 'ga' yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin na// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' med phyir// de la bde gshegs sras su dgongs mi mdzad/ 
205a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas zhag bdun lon te 'byung ba chen po mer me
205a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'dug kyang / shin tu stobs dang ldan pas de la lha rnams rab bskyed kyi gzhon nu stobs tshil mgyogs po'i shugs dang ldan zhing mthu rnyed pa de dag la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 
205b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa/ dbang po yongasu ma smin pa nyon mongs pa'i nyon mongs
205b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa yong shin du stobs dang ldan pas de la sngon sangs rgyas mtho
205b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha rnams re ba bskyed kyi/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa de dag la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de
205b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ba tsun mo'i mchog/ de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags// stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re ba
205b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed gzhon nu mthu thob rnams la ma yin ltar// byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig sems gnas ni/ nga // 'khor bar gnas te byang chub tshol byed pa// de la lha dang / 
205b6(dkon brtsegs): klu rnams re ba bskyed// rnam thar brgyad dang bsam gtan byed la min// 'od srung 'di lta steng dper na nor bu rin po che bedUr+ya gcig gis 'ching bu'i nor bu'i phung po ri rab tsam zil gyis gan
205b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyod pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'od gsal rin chen
205b8(dkon brtsegs): bai dUR+Yas nga 'ching bu'i nor bu mang po zil gyis gnon// byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas// nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper byA ka la bang
206a1(dkon brtsegs): phrug gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa mig ma bye ba yang 'di lta ste// zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems
206a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis mig khebs pa yang 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu bsngo ba bsngo ba'i
206a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur/ 
206a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa btsas ma thag tu tsheng dpon dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad dang / rgyal phran tham ngas cad phyag 'tshal ba / 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dang/ 
206a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po bskyed pa la yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshalo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa ba da/ ga chen po rgyal po la// mtshan gyis lus spras bu zhig
206a6(dkon brtsegs): yod gyur na// gzhon nu de ni btsas par mthong ma thag/ grong khyer mi dang rgyal phan thams cad 'dud// de bzhin byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag/ mtshan ldan rgyal ba'i sras po de la ni// lha dang bcas
206a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal zhing dang po'i sems kyis shin tu bcas par 'dzin// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la sman gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med// ri su bcu
206a8(dkon brtsegs): pa med// rnam par rtog pa med de/ nad gang la btang yang nad de rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi sman gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnam par mi rtog/ 
206b1(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub cing / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis gso bar rab tu sbyor ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ri rgyal gangs kyi ri bo la// sman skyes de dag mi rtog ngar 'dzin med// 
206b2(dkon brtsegs): gang la btang ba de kun zhi bar byed// kha cig nad dang rga ba'ang sel bar byed// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po ye shes sman// yang dag sgrub pa'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas// sems cad thams cad
206b3(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir yang dag sgrub// snyom pa'i sems kyis sems can gso bar byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar nya ba la ni ma yin// 'od srung de bzhin du gang dag nga la
206b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no// de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ni de bzhin gshegs
206b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams byung // de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla ba chos la thams cad phyag 'tshal gyi// zla ba nyal de ltar phyag
206b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ de bzhin gang dag nga dang de dag gis// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' phyag 'tshal cig/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na yi ge'i phyi mo rnams ni bstan bcos thams cad 'dzin pa shes pa'i sngon du 'gro'o// 
206b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i sngon du 'gro'o// 'od srung 'di
206b8(dkon brtsegs): lha ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ su yang skar ma'i gzugs la nam yang sngon phyag ma byas// 'od srung de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la ngan
207a1(dkon brtsegs): pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa nga'i bslab pa la zhugs pa btang ste/ nyan thos la nam yang phyag mi 'tshalo// de la 'di skad ces pa ste/ sus kyang zla ba rnam par spangs na su// skar
207a2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshogs la nam yang phyag ma byas// de bzhin bslab la zhugs pa nam du yang // nga sras btang ste nyan thos phyag mi 'tshal// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'ching bu
207a3(dkon brtsegs): nor bu bi dor byas kyang // 'ching bu'i nor bu nam yang nor bu rin po che bai dUR+Yar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du nyan thos tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang spangs pa'i yon+tan dang yo byad sbyangs pa dang
207a4(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin thams cad dang ldan yang byang chub kyis snying por 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nam yang mi 'gyuraro// 
207a5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'ji/ ga rten gyis// 'ching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang ni/ 'ching bu dag ste bai dUR+Yar mi 'gyur// 'di 'dra de nyid de yi rang
207a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yin// de bzhin nyan thos khrims dang thos pa dang / bsam gtan ldan zhing sbyangs pa kun ldan yang // byang chub snying por 'dug ste bdud btul nas// byang chub reg ste bde gshegs/ 
207a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che bai daR+Ya byi dor byas na da kar sha pa ni brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yo n+dan gyi gyi
207a8(dkon brtsegs): byas na de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rin chen bai dUR+Ya ni sbyang byas nas// kar sha pa ni mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin
207b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras kyis sbyang byas na// nyan thos mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung yul gang du srin burnga mo
207b2(dkon brtsegs): dud ka zhes bya ba mgo nag gan rkyal du nyal ba byung na yul de 'dzi dang cas 'tsho dang bcas/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas/ 'khrug pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'od srung gal te yul der byang chub
207b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'byung na yul de 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyuraro// 'od srung de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi
207b4(dkon brtsegs): don la brtson pa ste/ des dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par ra bsgrubs par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas sems can tham cad la btar bya'o// ye shes kyi
207b5(dkon brtsegs): sman gang tshel ba des phyogs bzhir song ste sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso bar bya'o// yang dag pa'i gas/ bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od srung de la yang
207b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i gso ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / rtog/ 
207b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yid la byed pa thams cad la mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams ca
207b8(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa spangs pa'i phyir smon pa med pa dang / phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa la 'du byed thaMd mi rtag pa dang / 
208a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa la chos thams cad la bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa la
208a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bas gso ba dang / lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos la gnas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste/ de la lus la lus kyi rje su lta ba
208a3(dkon brtsegs): can du gnas kyang lus kyi rje su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjesu lta ba can gnas kyang tsher ba'i rje su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / sems
208a4(dkon brtsegs): la sems kyi rje su lta ba can du gnas kyang sems kyi rje su lta bas pabadag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / chos la chos kyi rje su lta ba can du gnas kyang chos kyi rje su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung
208a5(dkon brtsegs): bas gso ba dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhis ni mi dge ba/ 'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos tham/ sa cad yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
208a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhis ni lus dang sems la ril por 'dzin pa 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lngas ni ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes
208a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med pa rnams gso ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis ni chos la shin tu rmongs shing mi shes pa gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ni 'chal ba'i shes
208a8(dkon brtsegs): rab dang / phas kyis rgol ba thams cad dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams gso ba ste/ 'od srung 'di ni yang dag pa'i gso ba zhes bya'o// 'od srung byang chub sems dpas gsob 'di la bslab
208b1(dkon brtsegs): bar brtson par bya'o// 'od srung 'dzam+bu gling na sman pa dang sman pa'i slob ma ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'tsho byed ni mchog ces bya'o// 'od srung gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
208b2(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshe byed dang 'dra bar gyur kyang / de dag la la la zhig lta ba dang / 'gyod pa la gnas pa gso ba'i sman gang yin zhes dris na/ de dag
208b3(dkon brtsegs): gis shes pa 'am bstan pa 'am bskor bar mi nuso// 'od srung de la byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag ni 'jig rten gyi sman tsam gyis mchog par mi bya'i bdag gis 'jig rten las
208b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman yongasu btsal bar bya'o// dge ba/ 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang legs par yang dag par bsgrub pa ra bya'o snyam du btag par bya'o// de ltar brtags nas 'jig rten
208b5(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang tshel ba des phyogs bzhir song la/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya ste/ yang dag pa'i gso bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 
208b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgyu rkyen la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gsob med pa dang / gang
208b7(dkon brtsegs): zag med pa'i chos la mos pa'i shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la mi sdang ba dang / sems can yongasu tshol ba'i brtson 'gruso// de 'di ltar sems yongasu tshol te
208b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gti mug par 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ ci 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba zhig yin nam/ de la sems 'das pa gang yin
209a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni zad pa'o// 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa medo snga mo// 'od srung sems ni nang yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigaso
209a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sems ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa gnas med pa'o// 'od srung sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs
209a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// logs par zhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams 'byung ba ma gtogs par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi
209a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ba ci 'dra ba lta zhe na/ 'od srung se dmas ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtagus pas skye ba rnam pa mang po yongasasu 'dzin to// 'od srung sems
209a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'bab chu'i rgyun dang / mtshungs te mi gnas pa skyes nas 'jig cing 'ju ba'o// 'od srung sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o// 'od srung sem+ba ni
209a6(dkon brtsegs): mar me'i 'od 'pho ba dang mtshungs te rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'o// 'od srung sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te nye ba'i nyon mongs pa glo bur ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa'o// 'od srung sems
209a7(dkon brtsegs): ni glog dang mtshungs te skad cig tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o// 'od srung sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te yul thams cad 'dod pa'o// 'od srung sems ni las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed
209a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ri mo mkhan dang mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni nyon mongs pa tha dad pa 'byung ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'o// 'od srung sems ni gnyis pa mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyir gcig pu rgyu steganyi/ 
209b1(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'o// 'od srung sems ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir rgyal po dang mtshung so// 'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir mi mngal ba dang mtshung so// 'od srung
209b2(dkon brtsegs): sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir bye ma'i khang pa dang mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni mig yang 'du shes pa'i phyir zil pa dang mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni sdug
209b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir nya'i mchil ba dang mtshung so// 'od srung sems ni bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir rmi lam dang mchung 'o// 'od srung sems ni mi gtsang ba la gca
209b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir spang ma sngon po dang mtshung so// 'od srungs mas ni gnod pa rnam pa mang po byed pas phyir rgol ba dang mtshung so// 'od srung sems ni rtag tu glan ka tshol ba'i phyir
209b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrog pa dang mtshung so// 'od srung / sems ni rtag tu glags lta bas dgra dang mtshungs pa 'o// 'od srung sems ni rje su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang / 
209b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas rtag par mthon dman can no// 'od srung sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rkubs chom rkun dang mtshung so// 'od srung sems ni gzugs la dga' bas phyi bi sho la'i mig dang
209b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni sgra la dga' bas g.yul gyi rnga dang mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni phag mo gtsang ba'i dri la dga' ba bzhin du dri la dga'o// 'od srung sems ni rol
209b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i bran mo dang mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni reg pa la dga' bas spang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungaso// 'od srung sems ni kun tu btsal
210a1(dkon brtsegs): na mi rnyed do// gang mi rnyed pa de mi dmigs pa'o// gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// gang 'das pa yang ma yin/ 
210a2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin// da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin// 
210a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de la ngo bo nyid med do// gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do// gang 'byung ba med pa de la 'gag pa med// 
210a4(dkon brtsegs): ga'agag pa med pa de la 'bral ba med do// gang 'brel ba med pa de la 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba yang med do// 'chi 'pho yang med/ skye ba yang med do// gang la 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro
210a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yang med/ 'chi 'pho yang med/ skye ba yang med pa de la 'du byed gang yang medo// gang la 'du byed gang yang med pa/ de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags
210a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rig so// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de lo bslab pa me/ bslab pa las 'das pa yang med do// gang la bslab pa yang med/ bslabs pa las 'das pa yang med pa des
210a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba yang med// mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med// gang la rgyu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa de la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams
210a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang medado// gang la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang medo// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin
210b1(dkon brtsegs): yang med pa de la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang medo// gang la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang
210b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang medado// gang la las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med pa'i rigs de la ni lus kyis las byed pa med// ngag
210b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin no// rigs de la tha mo dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu rnam par bzhag pa yang medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// / 
210b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o// rang rigs de ni lus dang sems dben pa phyir be pa rigs de ni mya dun las 'das pa dang mthun pa'o// rigs de ni nyon mongs
210b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// rig/ sa de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa med pas nga yi ba med pa'o// rigs de ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
210b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa las byung ba ste mi mnyam pa med pa'o// rigs de ni don sa pa'i bden pa yin pas bden pa'o// rigs de ni gtan du mi skye ba'i phyir mi zad pa'o// rigs de ni rtag tu chos thams
210b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o// rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o// rigs de ni rnam pa thams cad du dri ma med pa'i phyir dge ba'o// rigs de ni bdag yongasu ba
210b8(dkon brtsegs): te ma rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o// rigs de ni rab tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// 'od srung nang du yongasu tshol la phyi rol tu ma rgyug cig/ 'od srung ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong khyi rdos
211a1(dkon brtsegs): snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od srung ji ltar na dge slong khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin zhe na/ 'od srung 'i nye dper na khyi ni rdos 'jigs la rdo de nyid kyi phyir
211a2(dkon brtsegs): stegs kyi/ rdo de sus 'phangs de la ni mi snyeg so// 'od srung de bzhin du 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg byas 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams
211a3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas shing // de dag de na gcig pu gnyi su med par lus rab tu dben par 'jug ste/ chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams snang bar gyur na/ de
211a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la btang snyoms 'jog cing bsod nams sbyor ba dang / da ldan par gnas kyi/ nang du so sor rtog pa la mngon par mi brtson te/ de dag gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa
211a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams las cis 'byung ba mi shes shing khong du mi chud do// de dag gis de ma shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / 
211a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu song na yang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams kyis gnod par 'gyur ro// gal te de dag dgon pa na gnas pa las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ 
211a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa de dag mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang de dag lha'i 'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga po dag gis gnod par 'gyur ro// de dag de nas shi
211a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas ngan song bzhi las yongasu ma grol bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lhas
211b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// 'od srung de ltar na dge slong khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin no// 'od srung ji ltar na khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'od srung gang gshe yang slar mi
211b2(dkon brtsegs): gshe/ khros kyang slar mi khro/ mtshangs drus kyang slar mtshangs mi 'dra/ brdeg kyang slar mi brdeg/ bsdigs kyang slar mi bsdigs/ smad kyang slar mi smod cing nang du so sor rtog/ 
211b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di la gshe ba 'am/ khros pa'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am/ smad pa 'am/ 'chang brus pa de dag gang yin snyam du so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srung de ltar na dge
211b4(dkon brtsegs): slong khyi rdo la bsnyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na khyi ni rdo bas skrag gyur kya dang // sus 'phangs mi sdigs rdo la bsnyegs par byed/ 
211b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag/ gzugs la sogs bas skrag nas dgon par gnas// de dag dgon pa de/ la gnas gyur kyang // gzugs la sogs pa sdug pa mthong
211b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ btang snyoms 'jog cing nang gyi tshul mi shes// de yi nyes las byung ba gang yin pa// mi shes pas na slang yang grong du gnas// gzugs la sogs pas der yang gnod par 'gyur/ 
211b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir yang lha yi longs spyod spyad gyur te// lha dang mi las kha cig shi 'phos nas// de dag ngan song sar ni ltung bar 'gyur// blun po de dag shi 'phos sdug bsngal 'gyur// de ltar
211b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal brgya ldan de dag ni// khyi rngo stegs pa 'dra zhes bde gshegs gsungs// sras kyang mig she brdeg kyang mi bajig dang // su zhig slad kyang spod par bya rnam
212a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dru mi byed dang // khros kyang des pa khro ba mi byed cing // nang gi sems kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag/ tshol zhing yid ni dran dang ldan gyur pa// de 'dra'i tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan/ 
212a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ rdo snyegs khyi mi 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rta'i 'dul sbyong la mkhas pas rta de gang dang gang du g.yo byed cing ma byang ba de dang de rab tu sbyong // 'od srung de bzhin du dge
212a3(dkon brtsegs): slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang gang du sems 'gyur bar mthong ba de dang der de rab tu sbyong ba 'jug ste/ de ci nas phyis 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems rab tu 'cho so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
212a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na rta yi 'dul sbyong mkhas pa zhig/ byang zhing g.yo med tshul du rab tu 'dul// rnal 'byor pa yang sems ni 'gyur/ mthong nas// ji ltar phyis 'khrug mi 'gyur de ltar 'chos// 
212a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na lkog nad lha gor gyi ni srog gi dang nga po 'gag par byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du lta bar/ gyur pa thams cad kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi srog
212a6(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha gor srog gi dbang po la// gnod cing de la bde ba sbyin pa min// de bzhin lta gyur nang na bdag lta ba// de ni chos
212a7(dkon brtsegs): srog rnam par 'jig par byed// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper mi ni gang dang gang du bcings pa de dang de nyid las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems gang
212a8(dkon brtsegs): dang gang la chags pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa// de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin// de bzhin sems rmongs gang
212b1(dkon brtsegs): dang gar chags pa// rnal 'byor pas ni de dang de las dgrol// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nam mkha' la yongasu chags pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jig rten rgyang ban pa'i gsang
212b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs yongasu tshol ba dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par 'chang ba ste 'di gnyis// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten rgyang pan goms byed brtson pa dang // lhung bzed chos gos
212b3(dkon brtsegs): lhag par 'chang byed pa// 'di gnyis na mkha' la ni chags pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam pa ste/ gnyis
212b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba dang / rnyed pa dang ba kur bsti dang tshig su bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste 'odadi gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lta gyur 'aci medas bkur bsti dang
212b5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yi// 'ching ba dam ni sa 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs// de dag rtag tu/ rab tu byung bas spang // 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung
212b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du gcod pa'i chos gnyis te// gnyis gang zhe na/ khyim pa phyogs la rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i phyogs la gnod par sems pa ste 'di gnyis// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khyim
212b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyogs la brten par byed pa dang // 'phags pa'i phyogs la rnam par slong byed pa// 'di gnyis rab byung bar chad bgegs byed pa// byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang / 
212b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa la mi mjed pa dang / 'ja' bo'i khyim dang zas ster ba'i khyim yongasu 'dzin pa ste 'di gnyis// de la 'a
213a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ rabang byung ba nyon mongs mi mjed dang // 'ja' bo'i khyim dang bras ster khyim bsnyen pa// de gnyis dri mar rgyal pa'i dbang pos gsungs/ 
213a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang // 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu 'byung ba'i ser ba 'bab pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / tshul khrims las
213a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yongasu spyod pa ste 'di gnyis// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dam pa'i chos ni spong ba dang // tshul khrims nyams kyang spyod pa ste// ser ba 'bab pa 'di
213a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni// rgyal sras rnams kyis spang bar bya/ 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i rma yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ pha rol gyi nyes pa la so sor rtog pa dang / bdag
213a5(dkon brtsegs): gi nyes pa 'chab pa ste 'di gnyis// de la 'di skad ce/ sa bya ste/ bdag gi skyon ni 'chab byed dang // pha rol nyes la rtog byed pa// 'di gnyis dug gi me dang
213a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra rtog pa rnams kyis rma 'di spang // 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i yongasu gdung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang
213a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon+tan dang ldan pa las bsnyen bkur dang rim gror bya ba bdag gir byed pa ste 'di gnyis// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyi
213a8(dkon brtsegs): dur smig 'chang ba dang // bsnyen bkur rim gro byed dang gus par smra ba dag/ tshul khrims ldan pa rnams las bsten par byed pa dang // chos gnyis 'di dag yongasu spang bar bya ba yin/ 
213b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i zug du ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal ba dang // snying po ma blangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa ste 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad
213b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal bar gyur pa dang // snying po ma blangs par ni dus byed pa// 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu zhes// lha mi ston pa thad mkhyen pas gsu
213b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nad gsor mi rung ba ste// gnyis gang zhe na/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sems nges par sems pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag
213b4(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bdun pa bzlog pa ste 'di gnyis// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon pa'i dang rgyal sems la nges sems dang // sangs rgyas theg
213b5(dkon brtsegs): ba las ni 'dun pa bzlog/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i nad yin zhes// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal ba sa gsungs// 'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ji tsam
213b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni dge sbyong dge sbyong zhi bya zhe na/ 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong bzhi gang zhe na/ kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong dang // cho ga srungs zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong
213b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshigasu bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang / yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo // 'od srung de la kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyogashe na/ 'od srungs 'di
213b8(dkon brtsegs): la dge sbyong kha cig khe dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs dang ldan par gyur te/ chos gos snam sbar gyon cing skra bregs te lag na lhung bzed thogs mod kyi/ de lus kyi las yongasu ma dag pa
214a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod ngag gi las yongasu ma dag par spyod/ yid kyi las yongasu ma dag par spyod cing / ma dul ba ma zhi ba/ ma srungs pa ma byang ba/ 'tsho ba yongasu ma
214a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ brkam pa/ le lo tsan/ tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig po'i chos can yin te/ 'od srung de ni kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la cho ga srung zhi/ 
214a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing spyod lam bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la/ zas da
214a4(dkon brtsegs): skom ngan pa za 'thung / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po ngag gis chog par 'dzin pos mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga'/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre/ 
214a5(dkon brtsegs): la tshig nyung zhing smra ba nyung mod kyi/ de'i spyod lam da dag kyang tshul 'chos pa dang / kha bsag gis ma/ ngasu rtags pa yin te/ sem yong su ga pa bya byi ma yin du sa bya ba'i byor ma
214a6(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas shing / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams lags
214a7(dkon brtsegs): sar 'du shes pa yin/ stong pa nyid smra ba'i dge slong rnams la yang dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/ 'od srung de ni cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung de la
214a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i sgra tshigasu bcad pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so so brtags nas tshul
214b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims srung / ji ltar mang du thos par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas thos pa 'dzin ji ltar gzhan bdag dgon par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor ba
214b2(dkon brtsegs): nas dgon pa la gnas shing / so sor brtags nas 'dod pa nyung la chog shes pa dang rab tu dben par gyur te/ 'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir yin gyis/ skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma
214b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gog par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ma yon// dge
214b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od su rang de ni brjod pa'i sgra tshigasu bcad pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 
214b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung gang lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin na// rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshig su bcad pa lta ci smos/ stong pa
214b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos na dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod pa med par spyad pa spyod na/ khams gsum pa la
214b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos// stong pa nyid du lta ba yang mi 'dod pa yin na/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu lta ba
214b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ci smos/ don la ton gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du tshol gyi phyi rol tu rgyug pa ma yin/ chos thams cad shin tu yongasu dag cing rang
215a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par mthong bas bdag nyid skyabs yin te/ gzhan skyabs ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid du yang mi lta na gzug
215a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skur lta ci smos/ chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lta na smra ba'i tshig gi lta ba nas brjod par lta ci smos// 'phag pa 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la yang rnam par mi
215a3(dkon brtsegs): rtog na mang po 'dus par lta ci smos/ chos gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'khor bar
215a4(dkon brtsegs): yang mi skye/ mya ngan sa 'ad pa las yang mngon par dga' dab ma yin/ thar pa yang mi dmigs/ bcings pa/ yang ma yin la/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
215a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu mya ngan las 'das par rigs nas/ kun du mi 'khru ra yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin te/ 'od srung de ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 
215a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar brtson par bya'i ming gis gnod par ni mi bya ste/ 'od srung dge sbyong ni bzhi po 'di dag go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig
215a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag/ mdul ma srung ma byang 'dod chen can// skra bregs chos gos lhung bzed lag na thogs/ de ni dbyibs rtags dge sbyong yin zhes bstan// cho ga skye/ 
215a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la sogs ldan gyur cing // kha zas ngan za tshul 'tshos la sogs bstan// 'du 'dzi rgyang ring yongasu spong byed cing // spyod lam 'phags pa'i rigs dang ldan gyur kyang // de yi de kun
215b1(dkon brtsegs): dul bar bya byir min// ni phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// stong pa mtshan med g.yang sar 'du shes pa// cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos gnyis pa yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs pa'i/ 
215b2(dkon brtsegs): yirten thos// gzhan dag ngo mtshar 'dzin du gzhug phyir byed// zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// brjod dang grags lang dge sbyong gsum pa yin// gang zhig lus srog don du mig / 
215b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / rnyed dang bkur sti la ni rgyab kyis phyogs// rnam par thar pa bskyed pa'i sgo thos nas// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer// chos rnams shin tu stong par yongs brtags
215b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong mi 'gyur// chos la 'dod chags bral bar rtag tu rtog/ ma byas chos rtogs rgya dngan 'das par 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi
215b5(dkon brtsegs): dbul po zhig la mdzod 'byor pa zhes ming gtags na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dbul po de dag ming de mthun pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a
215b6(dkon brtsegs): de na ma lags so// bcom lnga 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du gang dge sbyong batha bu sa dus de dag ni gsung rab 'di las mi dbul po zhes
215b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na dbul por gyur pa'i mi zhig la// mdzod ldan ming btags de la mdzes ma yin// dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong ming mi mdzes
215b8(dkon brtsegs): dbul la phyag ces btags pa'i dpe dang mtshungs// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la// chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin
216a1(dkon brtsegs): du 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig chos mang po blangs te/ kun chub par byas kyang 'dod chags la sred pa mi sel/ zhe sdang la sred pa mi sel/ gti mug
216a2(dkon brtsegs): la sred pa mi sel ba de dag chos kyi rgyu mtshos khyer la/ nyon mongs pa'i skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na
216a3(dkon brtsegs): mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chus khyer la// de ni skom zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur// de bzhin chos mang sred pas bag med pa// chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas kyang ngan song 'gro// 'od srung 'di lta ste
216a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na sman pa sman sgro thogs te phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su rgyu ba de nad cig gis btab nas nad de gso mi nus nu sman de ni don med pa yin no// 'od srung de bzhin du mang du/ 
216a5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du lta ste/ gang mang du thos pa des bdag nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso mi nus na// de'i mang du thos pa de ni don med pa yin no// de la'i / 
216a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ dper na sman pa'i sman sgor bcug pa'i sman// 'jig rten kun tu yongasu rgyu byed kyang // nad kyis btab pa bzlog par mi nus na// de yi sman de don med gyur pa yin/ 
216a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dge slong tshul khrims yon+tan ldan// thos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs byung ba'i nad ni mi sel na// de yi thos la brtson pa don med yin// 'od srung 'di
216a8(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na mi nad pa zhig la rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman btang la// cho ga bzhin ma byas pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung gang mi sdom pa 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de yang ma/ 
216b1(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du lta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po 'os pa'i sman btang nas// cho ga ma byas mi de shi bar 'gyur// de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir
216b2(dkon brtsegs): shi ba// de ni mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs nad// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung na smad par 'gyur zhing mkho bar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin
216b3(dkon brtsegs): du mang du thos pa rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti'i mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung bar lta ste/ ci yang med pa la ni lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rin che/ 
216b4(dkon brtsegs): mo gtsang lhung ba smad// ji ltar sngon bzhin de ni phyis ma yin// dge slong mang du thos par gyur pa yang / dbakur bsti'i mi gtsang lhung ba de 'drar bshad// 'od sra
216b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na me ro'i mgo la gser gyi phreng ba btags ba de bzhin du tshul khrims 'chal ba ngur smrig gyon ra blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi rol
216b6(dkon brtsegs): mgo la gser breng ngam// yang na me tog phreng ba gdugs byas pa// de bzhin khrims med ngur smrig gyon pa yang // mthong nas de la yid ni dad mi 'gyur// 'od srung 'di lta
216b7(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig legs par khrus byas te/ logs par rnam par byugs la skra dang sen mo bregs nas gos dkar po bgos te tsan+dan mchog gis bskus pa'i mag
216b8(dkon brtsegs): la tsam pa ka'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos pa ngur smig gyon pA lta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ legs bkrus legs pa
217a1(dkon brtsegs): byugs pa yi// tshong dpon bu yi mgo bo la// tsam pa ka yi me tog phreng // dri zhim yid 'ong btags pas mdzes// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan gyur cing / 
217a2(dkon brtsegs): mang thos tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// rgyal ba'i sras po yon+tan ldan// de la ngur smrig de bzhin mdzes// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims dang ldan par ltar/ 
217a3(dkon brtsegs): bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing gnas// cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa/ kha na
217a4(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba phra rab rnams la yang 'jigs par lta/ yang dag par blangs te bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bslob cing / da lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yong su dag pa dang / 
217a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gnas pas 'tsho ba yongasu dag kyang / de dag tu smra ba yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrim sa dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa dang po'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la
217a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong kha cig 'dul ba 'dzin cing 'dul ba la zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyed pa yin te/ 'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrim
217a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gnyis pa'o// 'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig byams pa la gnas pa la gnas pa yin te/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams nga ldan pa yin yang 'du
217a8(dkon brtsegs): byed thad la skye ba med pa thos na skrag ste kun tu dngang bar 'gyur zhing kun du rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ba de ni 'od srung tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gsum pa'o// 'di/ 
217b1(dkon brtsegs): srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig sbyangs pa'i yon+dan bcu gnyis yang dag par drungs kyang dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngang yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa de ni 'od srung tshul khrin
217b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcas pa bzhi pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims 'tshal ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srung tshul khrims shes bya ba ni gang la
217b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / mi bya ba yang med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / mi rgyu ba yang ma yin pa/ 
217b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin pa/ 
217b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa dang / rab tu ma zhi ba yang ma/ yin pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa yang ma yinapa
217b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can du 'dogs pa med pa dang / tshig med pa dang / tshigs tu 'dogs pa med pa dang / sems med pa dang / sems su 'dogs pa med pa dang
217b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang / rten med pa yang ma yin pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims la mi stong pa dang / gzhan gyi tshul khrims la mi smad/ 
217b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul khrims kyis rlom sems mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims la mi rtog pa yin te/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul khrims zag pa med pa/ rtog pa ma yin pa/ khams gsum pa dang / 
218a1(dkon brtsegs): drul ba/ rten thams cad med pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// tshul khrims ldan la dri ma med cing yang med// tshul khrims
218a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan la rgyags pa med de rten pa med// tshul khrim lnga la mun pa med cing 'ching ba med// tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa med// zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'i yid// rtog dang
218a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog dang bral zhing nyon mongs med// g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems kun dan bral bar// de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// lus la mi lta srog la phangs par 'dzin mi byed
218a4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnams skye ba kun la 'dod pa med// yang dag zhug ngas shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa// de ni 'od srungs ngas rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// 'jig rten ma gos
218a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag la gnas pa med// snang ba thob cing dri ngag gi med de ci yang med// bdag tu 'du shes mad cing gzhan du 'du shes med// 'du shes yong su shes pas tshul
218a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam par dag/ gang la tshu rol med cing pha rol dbus kyang med// pha rol tshu rol dag la nams kyang mi chags shing // bcings dang chags med tshul 'chos med cing zag pa med// de ni
218a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// ming dang gzugs rnams la ni chags pa med pa'i yid// de ni mnyam par bzhag cing shin tu dul ba'i sems// gang la bdag med
218a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa ni// de tsam gyis ni tshul khrims gnas zhes brjod pa yin// so sor thar pa slob pas rlom sems byed pa med// des ni 'di ni de la chags par mi 'gyur te// da yi dod
218b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags pa'i lam rnams tshol byed pa// de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma'o// tshul khrims gtso bor ma yin ting 'dzin der chags med// de yi gong du shes rab bsgoms pa mang/ 
218b2(dkon brtsegs): su tshol// dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs yin te// tshul khrims de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags// 'jig pa'i tshogs la lta las rnam par grol ba'i yid// 
218b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dir nga dang nga yi snyam du 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// de yi tshul khrims la ni mnyam pa med pa'o// tshul khrims la ni gnas nas ting 'dzin kyang
218b4(dkon brtsegs): thob/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas shes shes so// sa rnam par dag pa thob// ye shes rnam par dag pas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub
218b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di gsungs pa'i tshe/ dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo// srog chag sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang
218b6(dkon brtsegs): bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste// ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas
218b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 'od srung chen pos 'di dag ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya po 'di dag chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ 
218b8(dkon brtsegs): ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'di dag ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa zag
219a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa med pa 'dilas ma 'jug ste/ mi rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste kun du dadangs kun du bat+yA dang sa// 'od srung tshigasu bca pa mngon par bsgrub pa zab pa/ sangs / 
219a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub zab ste/ de la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongasu zin pa dang / mos pa mi mang bdag gi mos par minu so// 'od srung de/ 
219a3(dkon brtsegs): slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la mu sgeg can gyi nyan thos gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung las bskal ba'i bsam pas chos bstan
219a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig bris so// thos nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed/ dadzi nam du bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa sang nga/ dbar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las 'jas ning sa
219a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba ngo mtshar to snya mo// de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso// de dag nga nas shi 'phos nas 'dir
219a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes te rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ste/ 'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po lta bar bying ba'i dag ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste kun du
219a7(dkon brtsegs): sngangs kun du ra tu sdang so// yang 'di dag ni chos bstan pa 'dis yongasu sbyang ba bya ste/ phyis ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas
219a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod song la dge slong de dag kun shes par byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
219b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la bshad na yang mthun par mi bgyid na bdag la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas 'dong ba'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa/ 
219b2(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas 'dod pa'i lam der dong ste phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'dod de gnyis kyis
219b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas rnamasu bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas par bya bar 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa
219b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'i chos bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtog ni mos shing skrag ste/ kun du dang ngas kun du ba tu ngas par gyur nas/ kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnamasu bsam
219b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
219b6(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun du sngangs kun du rab tu spangs par gyur to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnasu bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gan+d+ha
219b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o// sprul pa dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o// rtsod par mi bya'o// rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa ni / 
219b8(dkon brtsegs): skyong gi chos so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya gang yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang / lus 'di la bdag gas// sems can nam
220a1(dkon brtsegs): srog gam/ skye ba po'am/ skyes bu 'am// gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu 'am/ gang yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ gang zad pas yongasu mya ngan
220a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'da'/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dod chags zad// zhe sdang zad/ gti mug zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
220a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug yod pa yin nam ci na de zad par bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ de dag ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med gnyi ga med pa la yang mi dmigs te/ de dag ni yongasu ma brtags pa las kyang mi
220a4(dkon brtsegs): skye'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag lta bas na ma rtog rnam par ma rtog shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nam mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de na/ chags par yang mi
220a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro// chags pa ma med cing chags pa dang bral ba yang med pa ga/ nga yin pa de zhi ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims
220a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi 'khor zhing yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang mi 'khor zhing yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'o// 
220a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag chos de dag gis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na/ chos de dag kyang stong pa dben pa gzung du med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes
220a8(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing / 'du shes pa yang 'du shes la/ yang 'du shes ma byed cig/ 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongasu shes par mi byed cing / gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongasu shes pa de ni der
220b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyis bcings pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i sdom par 'ju/ 
220b2(dkon brtsegs): pa las gong na bya ba medo zhes smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams la sems rnam par grolo// de dag sems rnam par grol
220b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong
220b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong / gang nas lhags/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun dpa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas kyang
220b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis ston pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang ma skyes shing yongs su
220b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las mi 'da'o// smras pa/ khyed kyis ji ltar chos thos/ smras pa/ bcing ba'i phyir yang ma yin// thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa/ khyed sus
220b7(dkon brtsegs): btu la/ smras pa/ su la lus med cing sems med paso// smras pa/ khyed ji ltar brtson/ smras pa/ ma rig pa spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ rig pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin pa'o// 
220b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khyed ji ltar grol/ smras pa/ sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin// spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin no// smras pa/ khyed su'i nyan thos/ smras pa/ gang gis thob pa med cing mngon
221a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas med pa'o// smras pa/ khyed kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang / smras pa/ gang dag khams gsum na mi rgyu ba rnam so// smras pa/ 
221a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid cig na yongasu mya ngan las 'da'/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba na'o// smras pa/ khyed kyis bya ba byas sam/ smras pa/ 
221a3(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa yong su shes pa so// smras pa/ khyed kyis nyon mongs pa zad dam/ smras pa/ chos thams cad gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ khyed kyis bdud
221a4(dkon brtsegs): btul tam/ smras pa/ phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir// smras pa/ khyed kyis ston pa bsnyen bkur byas sam/ smras pa/ lus kyis kyang ma byas/ ngag gis kyang ma byas/ sems kyi/ 
221a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma byaso// smras pa/ khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas kyis/ sbyangs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa me/ dab so// smras pa/ khyed 'khor ba las brgal tam/ 
221a6(dkon brtsegs): chad pa med cing rtag pa med cing phyir ro// smras pa/ khyed sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sar zhugs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
221a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gar 'gro/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud paro// de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongasu dris te/ dge slong de dag gis lan btab nas/ 'khor de'i dge slong
221a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo// srog cha gsum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo/ de nas byang
221b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dun de bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug/ 
221b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob
221b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu tshar bcad cing tshar bcad nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bslab pa bstan te/ 
221b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skyes bu dam pa nan tan snying por byed pa/ mas kyi don chen por 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig khams pa'i grur zhugs te/ gang+gA'i
221b5(dkon brtsegs): klung chen po brgyal bar 'dod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di/ ji snyam du sems// mi des ci 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gru de bsan par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
221b6(dkon brtsegs): stabs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni chu bo chen po'i nang du zhugs kyis bdag 'gram du ma phyin par bar ma dor gru zhig tu 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ 
221b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du snang ba de ltar byang chub sems dpas de bas kyang ches stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab par bya ste/ stobs / 
221b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ bdag gis snying por ma blangs par bar ma dor 'chi
222a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus byas 'ong ngo yid la byed pa de lta bus bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs kyis chu bo bzhir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i
222a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gru gang gis sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos khyer ba thams cad bsgril bar bya ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya'o// kun du snang ba de la byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi gru/ 
222a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po sbyar bar bya ba de ci 'dren na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa bsags pa/ tshul khrims kyi snam gyis sbyar ba/ sbyin te/ 
222a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i dbasam pa bcing ba srad bu dam par spel pa/ bzod pa dang des pa dang dran pa'i sbyor kas legs par sbyar ba/ byang chub kyi yon
222a5(dkon brtsegs): lags bdun gyi tshogs can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi shing gis yang dag par sbyar ba/ bas/ ma gtan gyi sems kyis las su rung bar byas pa/ dul ba dang
222a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang cing shes kyi dge ba'i cha zos legs par zin par byas pa/ shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can/ snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / dpa' bar 'gro bas
222a7(dkon brtsegs): bas rab shes rab dang ye shes kyis phyir rgol ba legs par rnam par zin par bsrungs pa/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par bsags pa/ legs par byas pa/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis
222a8(dkon brtsegs): legs par yongasu sbyangs pa// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhis legs par rnam par bsams pa'i lus kyis bsten pa/ yang dag par spong bas 'gro ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mgyogs pa'i
222b1(dkon brtsegs): shugs dang ldan pa/ dbang pos legs par brtags pas/ lta ba ngan pa'i shing yon po med pa/ stobs kyi shugs yang dag par byung bas// bar shag shig med pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gis
222b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba rnam par dag pa/ gcugs can dag nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi lam 'dor bar byed pa/ lam du 'jug par byed pa/ pha rol gyi ngog su phyin par byed pa/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i mu stegs 'dor bar
222b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ zhi gnas kyis nges par sems pa brtan pa/ lhag mthong gis sbyor ba/ mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jug pa/ rgyu'i chos dang yang dag par ldan pa/ sgra grags pa yangs shing rgya
222b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe la mi zad cing tshad pa/ chur shog dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen dbo mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba/ bde bar dgra 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba/ lam du 'gro ba/ 'jig tshogs
222b5(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba 'dor bar zhugs pa/ tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pa la gyi 'gram du lta ba thams cad sel ba/ gtse ba med pa mya ngan las 'das par myur du song shig ces phyogs bcur basmras
222b6(dkon brtsegs): go bar byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yid yongasu mi skyo bar byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po 'od 'dra ba
222b7(dkon brtsegs): de sbyar bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi gru 'dis chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can thaMd bsgral bar bya'o// kun du snang ba de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon pa shes pa myur ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di
222b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad las bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bsam pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / tshul bzhin
223a1(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas dge ba la 'dun pa dang / shes rab yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes brtan par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / yon+d+ran
223a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / lus dang sems dben par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / skye bo mi bsrung ba rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang / 
223a3(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa la rton pas chos don du gnyer ba dang / shin tu mi 'khrugs pas ye shes kyi don dang / ye shes kyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang / mi 'khrugs pas bden pa'i don dang / yang dag
223a4(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor bar byas pas stong pa nyid kyi don dang / shin tu teder zhi ba'i don yin pas dben pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes brgya
223a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar dkon mtsha ga brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen
223a6(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo 'tshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo 'tshar to// bcom ldan 'das dkon
223a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam bskyed par 'gyur/ 
223a8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'jig rten
223b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa/ 
223b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs
223b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dag la bskal baM gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
223b4(dkon brtsegs): du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das bdag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bas/ rigs kyi
223b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gzhan gang gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gra/ ngas 'di las tshigasu bcad pa gcig tsam lung mnos te/ 
223b6(dkon brtsegs): lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed// bud med gang zhig lung 'bog na/ de nam yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyis
223b7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi tha ma yin no// sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am/ bstan pa 'am/ yi ger 'bri ba 'am/ yi ger bris nas gle bam du byas te/ bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de
223b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyen pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am yi gor 'bri ba de la 'di lta sted bzhin ga / 
224a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du gus par bya'o// 'od srung rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang nig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la bkur bstir byed pa dang / btsun par byed/ 
224a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de la/ dabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tsho bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin
224a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthong nas kyang lus kyi las yongasu dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshor bas sems kun tu zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / de mig 'khrul par mi 'gyur/ 
224a4(dkon brtsegs): dang lag pa g.yo bar mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa dang / gcin mi stor ba dang / phyis mi 'byung ba dang / de'i snying khar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang / 
224a5(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la mi rigs pa dang / ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// ngag gi las yongasu
224a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gdangs snyan pa'i tshig dang / mnyen pa'i tshigs dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dga' ba'i tshogs dang / snum pa'i tshig dang / slar
224a7(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / btsun pa'i tshig dang / lha dang mis yongasu bzung ba'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongasasu bzung ba'i tshig ste/ ngag gi las yongs
224a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// yid kyi las yongasu dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab par mi
224b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang / nye ba la mi dgu' ba dang / khon bcugs la mi dga' ba dang / 'du shes byin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba dang / spong ba la bag yod par 'gyur ba dang / mthug/ 
224b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba ste/ yid
224b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi las yongasu dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tsher rabs nyen cing 'chi ba'i dus mi byed// de yi mig la 'khrul par 'gyur ba med// lag pa mi g.yo ba rkang pa
224b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phra mi 'gyur// de ni bshang gci stor bar yongs mi 'gyur// de yi snying khar rdul yang 'byung mi 'gyur// khu tshur mi 'chang na mkha' rnyebs mi 'gyur// 'dug bzhin bde bar
224b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byed de// lus las yongasu dag pa 'di bcu thob// gdangs snyan phun sum tshogs la 'jam ma nyen tshig/ snum zhing yid 'ong de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur// 
224b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis slar mi bzlog cing bzung 'os chog/ skye bos brdzun par bya ba'i tshig tu 'gyur// de yi tshig ni lha dang klu dag dang // mi 'am ci dang de bzhin rgyal bas bsngags// des bshad pa
224b7(dkon brtsegs): yi don kyang 'dzin byed de// des ni ngag las dag pa de dag 'thob// khro ba med cing khon du 'dzin pa med// brtan pa 'chab pa med cing 'tshig pa med// nyes la mi dga' 'khon gcugs// 
224b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba med// de yi 'du shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur// bslab pa yang dag blangs la sems mi zhum// spongs pa la ni bag med mi 'gyur te// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis zhing / 
225a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor byed// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas// ting 'dzin 'byor pa thams cad mngon bsgrubs nas// yid kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams
225a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/ chos rnams 'di dag ldan par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas dngos po dkon par mi 'gyur ro// 'od srung gang la bde ba'i yi byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur stir byed par 'dod pa dang // mche
225a3(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ yi ger bri bar ba/ bklag par bya/ bcang bar ba'o// 'od
225a4(dkon brtsegs): srung de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas por 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
225a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshog/ sa nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / 
225a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
225a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang shI lan tra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen
225a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar rabacad kyi kyang btsos nas gtan la pha' pa'o// / sho lo gadrug brgya bam gnyis/ @// rgya gar skad du/ 
225b1(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya rang na pa rA shi nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal/ 
225b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas
225b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa phyir mi ldog
225b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba ji tsam gyis
225b5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong
225b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu dag pa dang / ting 'dzin la 'jug pa shes pas dge sbyong zhes bya ste/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang
225b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i snying po lhur len pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la so ma nyi med cing the tsom mi za ba dang / 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la
225b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa bsgoms pa dang / dang ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / chos
226a1(dkon brtsegs): la dang pa mi byed pa dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i shes
226a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus btsams pa dang / srid pa bcom pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa
226a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis lha mthong la mkhas pa dang / stobs lnga dang ldan pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / chos rnams
226a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi brten pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lam shes pa dang / de lam la mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ya dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom
226a5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzha na gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi rnam
226a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mi rton pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la sngon gyi drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang bdud bzhi'i lam las shin tu 'das pa dang / 
226a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po yongasasu shes pa bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa gsal ba dang / tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal ba yang dag par yongs su
226a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjesu zhugs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong
226b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la bya ba byas pa dang / byed pa byas pa dang / zag pa zad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang / brgya byin dang tshang
226b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsu pa dang // sngon gyi spyod pa dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa dang / sbyangs/ 
226b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon+tan la gnas pa dang / blo gya gyu med pa dang / rab tu byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang mi 'dre ba dang / bse ru ltar gcig pur rgyu ba dang / 'dra 'dzis 'jigs skrag pa dang / khams gsum
226b4(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol ba dang / rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang lba na pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas pa dang / thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos
226b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags dang / ma grag sa pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bstod/ pa dang / smad pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sa dang
226b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'i sems kyi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjesu bsrung ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / na mkha' dang
226b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la de'i sems mi chags mi 'ching ste/ dper na na mkha' la lag mthil bzhin du mi chags/ mi 'ching ba
226b8(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'od srung dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu de dag dang ldan na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
227a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi yon+dan 'di dag yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ni ngo 'tshar
227a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grang ma mchis par rdzas par bsgrubs pa nub par bgyod pa/ dge sbyong ma lags pa la dge sbyong du mchid kyis
227a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe zhing / tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod par mchid kyis 'tshe ba'i dge slong la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
227a4(dkon brtsegs): nga dang khyod dang nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang yongasu mya ngan 'ang ngas shing / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong nas bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jig par
227a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni tshig gis bstan par mi nus so// 'od srung de la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma sgoms
227a6(dkon brtsegs): ba byis pa dman pa/ glen pa rmongs pa dang / rab tu ma zhi ba/ ma dul ba/ kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi g.yo dang / sgyu dang / mi drang ba dang / gya gyu dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi
227a7(dkon brtsegs): skyon rnams brjod par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang zhe na/ 'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// sum cu
227a8(dkon brtsegs): rtse gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang rnas 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la
227b1(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mi mthun pa'i rnyed pa kun tu tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dad pas
227b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pa chung son pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / khyim pa la brten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rab tu byung ba dang brtan pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'du 'dzil mngon
227b3(dkon brtsegs): par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pa yongasu ma grub por rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi rnyed pa dang / chog par mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol bsod nams kyi
227b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 
227b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongasu tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / sa sor thar pa dang 'dul ba mi srung ba dge sbyong gi dri mad nga / khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ma gus pa dang
227b6(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa dang khengs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 
227b7(dkon brtsegs): mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dga' dge sbyong gi dri ma
227b8(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten rkyang pa na pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / sgrib pas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge slong gi dri ma dang / 
228a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos zab mo spong ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog
228a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum la mi gus pa dge sbyong gi dri ma ste 'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srung brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi
228a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bla ma rnams la mi gus pa dang / chos rnams la rim gro med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba dang / 
228a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang srog med pa dang gang zag med pa'i chos kyis skrag pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos bstan pa la mi 'jug gi 'dus byas nyid kyi rjesu snyeg
228a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma skyes pa zhes thos nas skrag pa dang / chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa thos na g.yang sa chen por lhung ba bzhin du ltung ba ste/ 'od srung
228a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste rabatu byung bas de dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// 'od srung dge sbyong gi kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyis dge sbyong zhes nga mi 'chad kyi/ yon+dan gyi/ 
228a7(dkon brtsegs): chos la nan tan byed pa'i dge sbyong ni dge sbyong zhes ngas bshad do// 'od srung dge sbyong gis ni rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung
228a8(dkon brtsegs): rnyog pa med pa la ngas dur smig gnang gi/ 'od srung rnyog pa dang / bcas pa'i lus la dur smig dag 'chang ba de dag thams cad ni dur smig tshig pa'o zhes bshad/ bsam pas mos pa
228b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin pa'i phyir te/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams kyis gos 'di dag ni nye bar
228b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i rje su mthun pa byams pa'i rjesu zhugs pa'o// 'od srung de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gang zhe na/ 'od srung bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan
228b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'od srung tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan
228b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par grol ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bden pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams
228b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bsamaH/ tan bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / tshad med pa
228b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pa 'phag pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang
228b7(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ 'od srung bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no// 'od srung gang la la rgyal mtshan 'di dang ldan par 'phags
228b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs gos ngur smig dag 'chang ba de ni nor ba'i chos la zhugs pa'o zhes ngas bshad do// chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa zhes bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ring du/ 
229a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa zhes bshad// mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnas pa zhes bshad do// 'khor ba'i phyog dang mthun pa zhes bshad do// nga rgyal gyi
229a2(dkon brtsegs): mchil pas zin pa zhes bshad do// snying po ma blangs pa zhes bshad// chos las nyams pa zhes bshad do// nyam nga ba'i lam la gnas pa zhes bshad// 'od srung de lta bas na dge sbyong gi
229a3(dkon brtsegs): lus la ngur smig dag 'chang ba lta na rnyog pa med pa'i sems bya'o// gal te des 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na/ de la gus pa brgyad kyis lus la dur smrig dag bcang bar bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe/ 
229a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes da dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa'i 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas la gus pa'i 'du shes dang / ngo tsha shes
229a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes dang / khrel yod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnyog ba med par bya'o snya pa ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa 'i gus pa brgyad po de dag gis lus la ngur smrig dag
229a6(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya'o// 'od srung gang dag lhod cing yang dag par mi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon+dan gyi chos 'di dag las nyams par lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba rnams ni gus pa 'di dag mi
229a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// 'od srung dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs can la gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba yod de/ 'od srung nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba der dge sbyong gi gzugasu
