299b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi spyod pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pas rig par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongasasu dag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
299b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che/ 
299b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yong su dag pa'i dpe tsam chung zad cig/ 
300a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad// bcom ldan 'das legaso zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che bcom ldan 'das kyi skur nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ska
300a2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongasu dag ni 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag
300a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yong su dag pa ste/ rigs
300a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yod/ su dag pa ni kun du bsngo ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chu
300a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongasu dag ni lam smra ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chub pa/ bya'o// mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa ni
300a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la sems la su rung ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba spyod pa yongasu dag pa ni snying rje chen po lhag po'i bsam pa'i ye shes
300a7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa yongs
300a8(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'o// 'di lta ste sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnamaso// rigs kyi bu de la byangam/ 
300b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ser sna'i dri mas kun tu dkris pa'i sems sel ba dang / gtong ba'i rjesu 'jug pa'i sems 'phel bar
300b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / de ser sna'i dri ma bsal te gtong ba'i sems la gnas nas bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i sems la gnas so// de sbyin pa sbyin pa na tha dad pa bzhi med de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
300b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste sems can tha dad du mi byed pa dang / cho la dang pa dang / yong su sngo pa dang pa dang ngas pa tha dad du mi byed do// de la ji ltar na sems can tha dad du mi byed ce na/ 'di la ni mi sbyin/ 'di la ni mang du sbyin
300b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni nyung ngu sbyin/ 'od la ni bzang po sbyin/ 'di la ni ngan pa sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu mi sbyin/ 'di la ni sti stang du byas te spyon/ 'di
300b5(dkon brtsegs): la ni sti stang du byas te mi sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad mi sbyin/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa/ 'di ni sbyin
300b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin/ 'di la byin na sbyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/ 'dis ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur/ 'di ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'di ni log par zhug/ 
300b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'di lta bu'i sems 'phro ba spong zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / mi mtho mi dma' ba dang / sems can thaMd la sems mnyam pa dang
300b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mtshungs par sbyin pa dang / mtshungs par byams pa dang / mtshungs par snying rje ba dang / bye brag med pa dang / na mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de ni/ 
301a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thadad pa ma yin zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na chos thadad du mi byed ce na/ gang chos smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni sbyin// gang chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni mi sbyinan
301a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du de ltar sems mi bskyed do// de chos thad mnyam pa nyid thob nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ so so'i skye bo rnams ni dman pa'o snyam du sbyin pa mi sbyin/ 'phags pa rnams na rgya chen po'o zhes sbyin pa mi sbyin
301a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis mnyam ste/ bye brag med pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di ni chos tha dad pa ma yin zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na yongasu bsngo ba tha dad du mi byed ce na/ gang sbyin pa byin pa'i / 
301a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de brgya byin thob par mi bsngo// tshangs pa thob par na yin/ rgyal po'i srid dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim pa dag dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog
301a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod par ma yin/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thaMd du 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye kha'i gnas rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongasu mi bsngo/ nyan thos kyi theg par ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par
301a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du mi bsngo ba dan cwo lad pa yin pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ 
301a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mnyam pa/ sbyor ba mnyam pa/ rnam par sbyin pa la mi ri ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i lan re ba med pa/ g.yo med pa dang / sgra med pas sems thag pa nas shin du yongasu btang gyi
301a8(dkon brtsegs): blo/ sems 'gyod pa med pa/ gnas gsum du tha dad po thob ste/ sbyin no snyam pa dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / byin nas dad pa rab tu thob pa 'di ni bsam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// 
301b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa ni tha dad pa 'di bzhi mi byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongasu dag pa'i rkang pa dang po'o// de lta
301b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad yong su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ brgyad po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag tu lta ba yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta/ 
301b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yong su dag pa ste/ lte ba brgyad po de dag yongasu dag par sbyin pa skye
301b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// de bag la nyal ba bzhi yongasu spangs nas sbyin/ pa sbyin par byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ so so'i skye bo'i tshe das kyi bag la nyal ba dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal
301b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bag la nyal ba dang / bgo chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/ bag la nyal ba bzhi po de dag yongasu spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin pa/ 
301b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de 'du shes bzhi yongasu spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa
301b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'du shes bzhi po de dag yongasu spangs nas sbyin po sbyin par byed// de rnam pa bzhi yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongasu dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa
301b8(dkon brtsegs): dang sems yongasu dag pa dang / bsam pa yongasu dag pa ste// rnam pa bzhi po de dag yong su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de chagaso ba gsum las shin du 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ gsum gang zhe na/ 
302a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la chags pa dang / 'gyod pa la chags pa dang / theg pa dman pa la bsngo ba la chags pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byeda'o//  'jigs
302a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/ gsum
302a3(dkon brtsegs): po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / 
302a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ste// rgya bzhi po de dag gi/ btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed// de brtson 'grus rtsom pa
302a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi ga zhe na/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu
302a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ brtson 'grus
302a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma dral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de dran pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang / 
302a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po dran pa dang / son thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dran pa ste/ dran pa bzhi pa de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par bye'o// de 'i khor gsum yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsugs
302b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bdag gi 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub kyi 'khor yong su dag pa ste/ 'khor gsum po de dag yong su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de shes pa yongasu
302b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bzhis yong su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa shes pa yong su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa shes pa yongasu dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i chos so sor rtog
302b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yong su dag pa dang / bsngo ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yong su dag par sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i
302b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la zhugs pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa shin tu yong su dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi dbu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod
302b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems/ dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrim
302b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag po ni rnam pa gcig ste// rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum
302b7(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib/ 
302b8(dkon brtsegs): ba thaMd yongasu zad par byed pa'i sems/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yon+tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing bsrung ba dang / sbed pa dang / mi brjed pa sa
303a1(dkon brtsegs): / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa gcig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis
303a2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa gnyis ste/ rnam po gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam
303a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims la 'dzud pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na
303a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste lus kyi gnod pa thams cad gsal nas lus yongasu dag pa dang / kha bsag dang gzhog slong dang ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas ngag yongasu dag pa dang / 'dod pa
303a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongasu dag pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gsumo/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
303a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa yang dag par gzung ba ma nyams pa dang / sems can tshul khrim
303a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa yongasu smin par byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
303a8(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dog pa lnga ste/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas pa dang / nyan thos kyi sems
303b1(dkon brtsegs): la mi re ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa lnga'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa drug ste/ rnam pa drug
303b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pa'i chos rjesu dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta ba dge 'dun
303b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasu spong bas gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / skye ba thams cad mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rje
303b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas lha rjesu dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa drug/ rig das kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa
303b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha sa pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel
303b6(dkon brtsegs): yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems
303b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yongasu gdung pa nye bar zhi bas khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bdun no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de/ rnam pa
303b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha bsag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi
304a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon+dan dang yo byad bsrungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa rje su mi gtong bas lus la
304a2(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pas srog la mi lto ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pu na dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos dga' ba la mos pa ste/ 
304a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam pa brgyad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/ rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste kun nas mnar se
304a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dngos po dgu bo rnams 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi/ gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'du ba dang / maH/ ra gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dag po rnams kyi
304a5(dkon brtsegs): longs sbyong ba dang / yongasu gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang / sems la su rung ba zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun du la ba dang / cho ga dang tshul khrims dang lta ba nyams pa las shin
304a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg pa chen po yong su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas
304a7(dkon brtsegs): pas sems phyed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lu/ 
304a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi las rnam pa gsum yongasu dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yong su dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam pa gsum yongasu dag pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing 'tshes pa med pa dang / bsam
304b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjesu ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes pas sa'i phyir sems dmu rgod ma yin pa dang / 
304b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang / nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi 'jig rten
304b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ 
304b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mtshan ma dang bcas shi dang 'bad pa dang bcos pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir/ yang mi 'bral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i
304b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni chos thams cad la sgro mi 'dogs par slob pa ste/ 'di ni rnamapa gnyis// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
304b6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang rnam par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang / phyi rnam par dag pas lus thams cad spangs pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzha/ 
304b7(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongs su/ 
304b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis po de dag go/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa/ 
305a1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni ngag
305a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pas 'di ltar gshe yang slar mi shes/ lus yongasu dag pas brdegs kyang slar mi brdego/ sems yongasu dag pas khros kyang slar mi khre'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas 'tshig par
305a3(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang slar mi 'chi'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la blta ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam// ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam zas kyang mi gsher/ 
305a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pha rol la balnga ba'i phyir/ lag pa dang bong ba dang / dadabyug pas brdeg kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kun du bsrung ba'i phyir/ yan lag dang nying lag
305a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chu ba sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongasu 'dzin du phyir spong ba lo mi gshi'o// byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar brtan
305a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir de dag la byams pa nye bar bsgrub po// smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje bskyed do// bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ gang spong yang de la phan
305a7(dkon brtsegs): par sems shing snying rje chen po dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
305a8(dkon brtsegs): rjes dran zhing bzod do// stobs bcu meng su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub rjesu dran ning bzod do// dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes rjes
305b1(dkon brtsegs): dran zhing bzod do// byams pa chen po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phan par 'dod pa rjesu dran zhing bzod do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon/ 
305b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rje su dran zhing bzed do// mi 'jigs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir seng ge bsgyings pa rjesu dran zhing bzod do// sems can tha~Md la 'dud pa'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba rje su dran
305b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing bzod do// 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjesu dran zhing bzod do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
305b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs pa rjesu dran zhing bzod do// rigs kyi bu byang chubasems dpa' bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste so sor rtog pa'i stong/ 
305b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsgom pa'i stob so// de la gang lus dang sems la gnas/ te/ bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stob so// gang chos mas cad la gnas te 'od pani pa'i stob so// rigs kyi bu gzhan
305b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing / chos thams cad la bden par bzod de gang chos thams cad la mi/ 
305b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa de ni bzod pa yong su dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa'am mi bzod pa chos gang yang med de/ gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/ 
305b8(dkon brtsegs): chos khas len pa ni bzod pa yong su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa ni bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/ zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongasu dag pa gang yang mdo// gang
306a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/ 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yong su dag pa gang yang med do// gang la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / chos
306a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/ bdag dang sems can dang / chos la gnas pa ni bzod pa yong su dag pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
306a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongasasu dag pa'i rnam pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yong su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/ 
306a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po de dag go/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dang / de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
306a5(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa dang / rtsom pas mi ngal ba/ dge
306a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa la mi zhan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa/ chos thams cad ston par brtson pa/ chos thams cad
306a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin pa la spro ba/ mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa la yongasu mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba/ theg pa dman pa las
306a8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'das pa/ sngon dam bcas pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud mi gzon pa/ nga rgyal
306b1(dkon brtsegs): med pas sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o cog byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la mig yor dang / gzugs bsnyen du
306b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa/ tshig la brjod med par shes pa// sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa/ zad par shes pa rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa/ nges par rtogs pa'o// / 
306b3(dkon brtsegs): de rtsom pa la gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongasu rtog pa'i rtsom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// de la chags pa gsum la mi chags/ 
306b4(dkon brtsegs): par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mig dang / gzu gas dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sna dang
306b5(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lce dang / rod nga / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang / 
306b6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o// de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len/ ser sna mi 'dor/ tshul khrims mi len/ 'chal pa'i
306b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims mi 'dor/ bzod pa mi len/ gnod sems mi 'dor/ brtson 'grus mi len/ le lo mi 'dor/ bsam gtan mi len/ g.yeng ba mi 'dor/ shes rab mi len/ 'chal ba'i shes
306b8(dkon brtsegs): rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len/ mi dge ba mi 'dor/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro// de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas gnyis yongasu dag
307a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun tu ldang ba las/ dmigs pa kun tu ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang bar
307a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni gnyis zhes bya'o// de la gnyis yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros
307a3(dkon brtsegs): pa spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
307a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang bsam gtan gyi ya ngan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing yang dag par bsku dbas nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms
307a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa yin te/ de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs lag nas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang tshe/ ra ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams lam
307a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sna
307a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ yid la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed// de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed// sgra la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ 
307a8(dkon brtsegs): reg la ma yin/ chos la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed// de bsam gtan byed kyang lus la rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sems rnam par rtog pa la
307b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du tshu la ma yin/ me la ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ na mkha' la gnas te bsam gtan mi byedado// de bsam
307b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed kyang zla ba la ma yin/ nyi ma la ma yin/ brgya byin la ma yin/ tshangs pa la ma yin/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byedado// 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// gzug
307b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams la ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig rten pha rol tu gnas te bsam
307b4(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te mo g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do// bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam
307b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma/ yin/ srog la ma yin/ gso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ shed las skyes pa la ma yin/ shed bur nye bar
307b6(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta bar khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba la ma yin/ 'byung bar
307b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ma yin/ 'jig par lta bar khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med
307b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byedado// de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de stong pa nyid ting 'dzin 'dri/ 
308a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bas gtan mi byed do// de mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam
308a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed kyang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed// de smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin 'dris pa bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / sgom pa med pa'i ting
308a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de byang chub chen po'i go bgos/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sgo/ 
308a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi mchog mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do// de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa/ tshul khrims ma
308a5(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba med pa/ bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ brtson 'grus ma ma nga ba med pa/ bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa/ shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/ thabs ma tshang ba med pa/ byams pa
308a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po ma tshang ba med pa/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa 'jug pa la ma tshang ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa dang / 
308a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / byang ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pa ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa dang shes bzhin mi ldan pa med pa
308a8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma tshang ba
308b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ 
308b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgyun mi chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus pa/ dge
308b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi tshul yongasu sdud pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbang
308b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs
308b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang dag par gzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gan sa pa// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjes mthun pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
308b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/ seMn thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa/ rton pa bzhi thob pas 'jig
308b7(dkon brtsegs): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pas smras pa drang ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/ 
308b8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong ba/ chu bo las sgrol ba/ 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa/ rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ga las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zhi bar ma zhi ba/ chos nyid kyi btang snyoms
309a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems pa'o// byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/ rang gi ngang gis lung du ma bstan pa/ sa
309a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/ nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bad pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces/ 
309a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo
309a4(dkon brtsegs): tha dad par bslabs pa yan lag rnams rnam pa tha dad du bsla sa par gyur te/ de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'bri ba la mi mkhas// la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa/ 
309a5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas kyang yan lag dang rtsa nying lag la mi ma khas/ kha cig rkang lag 'bri ba la mkhas kyang mig nga mgo bo dang rna ba 'bri ba la mi mkhas pa dag yin la
309a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bslabs pa/ yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pas gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs smra
309a7(dkon brtsegs): bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te/ khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig/ khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mor bris shig/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag
309a8(dkon brtsegs): tshegs nas ras de brgyangs pa las/ ri mo mkhan de dag gis nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan cig tu song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i
309b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bris na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni snyam du sems/ ri mo mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
309b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don ci lta zhe na/ rigs kyi/ 
309b3(dkon brtsegs): bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed
309b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bsnan na yang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma
309b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun ni sa ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i spros pa thad
309b6(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no// bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
309b7(dkon brtsegs): stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob po// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs
309b8(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongasasu dag pa
310a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs
310a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes
310a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la yang
310a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gzo'i gnas dang la ngas kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong
310a5(dkon brtsegs): ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa medacing thogs pa med par 'jug
310a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes
310a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba chag pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam pa
310a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thegs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir/ rab dang 'bring
310b1(dkon brtsegs): tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang gas yi pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de yang
310b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rje su zhugs pa ni gting dpag dka' ste/ mthong / 
310b3(dkon brtsegs): bar dka' zhing zab la/ khong du chud par dka' ba bye brag phyed cing / nges par rtog palta ba dang ma bral ba/ bag chags bsal ba/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams
310b4(dkon brtsegs): cad stong pa nyid du rje su rtogs pa/ chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa don la nges par rtogs pa/ shin tu lcogs pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ ci yang snang ba med pa/ 'gal ba med
310b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa dus las mi 'da' ba skyon med pa/ legs par bsrung ba/ skyon med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du/ 
310b6(dkon brtsegs): chud pa 'gogs pa'i bden pa rje su rtogs pa/ shin tu brgal ba/ thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gcig pu spyod pa/ spyod pa med pa/ legs par spyod pa/ sems can thams
310b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa/ yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma
310b8(dkon brtsegs): log pa/ rtsom pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can yongasasu smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa
311a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad la shin tu 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ nye bar len pa spyod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba// 
311a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/ lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa'i rjesu zhugs pa'o// de'i shes rab de yang de
311a3(dkon brtsegs): ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud par dbang po smin par 'gyur ba/ yun ring por lta ba rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge
311a4(dkon brtsegs): ba sbyin pa spyod pa/ nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim hA
311a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ don thams cad rjesu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rom tshungs pa/ thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o// 
311a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams
311a7(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i shes rab yong su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis
311a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yong su dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yong su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yong su dag pa gnyisaso// gzhan yang yong su dag pa
311b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dmigs pa yongasu dag pa dang / lta ba yongasu dag pa ste/ de dag ni yong su dag pa gnyiso// de'i shes rab de yang thams cad kyi rjesu song ba/ sems can gyi rjesu song ga
311b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rjesu song ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi phyir mtshams sbyor ba'ang med la skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro// de'i shes rab de gnas pa yang med la yul
311b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la gnas so// de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la dbus la yang mi gnas pa'o// de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur rnam par blta ba'i
311b4(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yulo// 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba de'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed// de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// / 
311b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin te/ sbyor ba 'am/ mi sbyor ba 'am/ chos gang gis
311b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yi no// bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yin no// thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// 
311b7(dkon brtsegs): yo n+dan gyi 'byung gnas yin no// chos kyi 'byung gnas yin no// gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon+tan dang ye shes rnam pa
311b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasasu dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
312a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongasu dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi'i srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye so// byang chub sems
312a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol// lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig
312a3(dkon brtsegs): rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas/ de dag gi tshig 'di skad ces mdzer to// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos pa
312a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams/ da yongasu bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa/ dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 
312a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smraso// bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka/ 
312a6(dkon brtsegs): sul pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongasasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa
312a7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te/ lus la rnam pa gnyisu so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog/ rnam pa gnyisu so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor
312a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ rtsog pas yongasu gang ba
312b1(dkon brtsegs): yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yino zhes bya ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang lus mi gtsang ba grogs med
312b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ bsod nams kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi shig pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum la bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs mthong na sems can thad tshim par
312b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gnyis so sor rtog pa dang ldan par dran pa
312b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang ngachub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa ni chos gnyis yongasu sbyong ste/ 
312b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag/ po'i rnam pa'o// de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ni/ gang zhe/ na/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ ring por mi gnas
312b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas/ lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tshe ba mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to// snying po gsum lon te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi snying po dang / longs spyod kyi snying
312b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / 'tshe ba'i snying po'o// de la lus mi stag ge snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtago snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon
312b8(dkon brtsegs): po dang / g.yo dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do// lus mi rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed// lus mi rtago snyam nas long spyod la sred
313a1(dkon brtsegs): cing chags par mi byed/ bdogs pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas
313a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ de la yon+dan gyi phan yon rab tu thob bo// de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba ldan pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes skyes
313a3(dkon brtsegs): shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / sem can gyi khams mtha' dag yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir thams cad
313a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed/ pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa
313a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i da ge ba'i rtsa ba brlol pa thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'dus ma
313a6(dkon brtsegs): byas nyid du yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang / 
313a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pas nges par brtags pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ 
313a8(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtogs pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
313b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lus la lus kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa/ bdag gi lus de sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing / bdag gi sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi
313b2(dkon brtsegs): sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog go/ de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems/ 
313b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu sheso// de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do// zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid
313b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o// / de la 'dod pa'i zag pa yongasu shes pa dang ldan pas se/ dmas can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du 'dod
313b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khamasu skye'o// srid pa'i zag pa yongasu shes pa dang / ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongasasu 'dzin to// ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / 
313b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas 'don pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa de lus la sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang
313b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byung bar so sor rtog go// lus la phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho bar so sor rtog go/ lus la da ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so sor rtog go// de de ltar lus la lus kyi rje su
313b8(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing gnas pas las dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi bskyed do// 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / bral bas bdag gir mi byed do// bdag gir byed pa med pas yongasu
314a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa la yongasu mi 'dzin to// yongasu 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu thob bo// rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do// gnod sems med pas bzod
314a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu thob po// bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro// khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// chos nyid la
314a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ro// chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gro sa song ngo // chos kyi 'gro sa song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do// chos dang
314a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i grogs pos yongasu bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro// yul la bsru
314a5(dkon brtsegs): pas ting 'dzin sgrub po// mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// yang dag pa ji lta ba/ bzhin du rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do// rnam pa
314a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi byed do// rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur ro// mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed// rnam par mi byed do// nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin
314a7(dkon brtsegs): thob nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// rigs
314a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams
314b1(dkon brtsegs): la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa ni/ tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni
314b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yin zhes slob ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spangs pa'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom mo// de sems can
314b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir/ go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tsher ba yang 'gog par mi byed do// des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung zhing
314b4(dkon brtsegs): myong bar byed do// de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod cha dgas la spyod pa'i sems can rnams snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // 
314b5(dkon brtsegs): nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spyod do// nam bde ba yang
314b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de na gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // de bde ba'i tshor
314b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la rje su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rje su chags pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do// sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/ khong khro ba legs par 'joms par
314b8(dkon brtsegs): byed// sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma rigs pa legs par 'joms par yang byedado// des tshor ba gang ci myong yang de dag zad
315a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do// sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do// de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyu ro// sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la/ 
315a2(dkon brtsegs): ni zung rngur shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o// gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdu
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal nyid do// gang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjesu lta zhing gnas pa de
315a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad skyes pa dang / zhig pa dang / zhu ba dang / gnas pa med par sheso// chos thams cad la skye ba de dang / 'jig par yang so sor rtog go// so sor rtog pa na chos
315a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba de dag gang nas 'ongs/ 'gag pa rnams gang du sogs par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig/ yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // des chos rnams gang nas kyang
315a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par bsgrub po// bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par
315a7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi bdag 'ba' zhig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thabs mkha
315a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang snying rje chen pos yongasu zin pa'o// gang tshor ba 'gag pa yang rab tu shes la/ tsher po 'gag pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes lta ba'i dran pa
315b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhag pa bsgom pa la gnas pa de tshor ba rnams dben pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// 'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do// 'di la ni tshor
315b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa gang yang med do// chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o// byed pa po dang tsher ba po dang mi ldan pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o
315b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po med pa'o// nga'i ba med pa'o// yong su 'dzin pa med pa'o// des yang dag par rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmig so// des mi dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar
315b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o// snyam nas de stong pa nyid da kyis don rig pas lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / 
315b5(dkon brtsegs): don shes pa dang / chos rnams shes pa dang / ye she sa rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba 'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems
315b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye
315b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems nye
315b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste/ sems dran pa ye shes kyis sems kun tu 'tsho'o// de sems kun du tshol ba na sems nang na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / sems phyi rol na yang yang dag
316a1(dkon brtsegs): par rje su mi mthong / sems phyi dang nang na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / khams rnams la yang sems
316a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rje su mi mthong / skye mched rnams la yang dag par rje su mi mthong // des sems yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing de 'di snyam du
316a3(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyu ros mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan nam/ 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid som
316a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gal te dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems kyang gzha na na ni sems de gnyi su 'gyu ro// 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni/ sems kyis sems ji
316a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems mthong bar mi ru/ 'di lta ste dben ral gri so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so nyid bcad par mi rung ba dang / sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor ma/ 
316a6(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nuso snyam nas de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba la gang sems ma gnas/ chad pa ma yin pa/ rtag
316a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa/ ther zug tu mi gnas pa/ rgyu med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba/ de las kyang ma yin gzhan las kyang ma yin pa/ de nyid kyang ma yin gzhan na yang ma yin pa'i sems
316a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyud/ sems kyi mabri shing / sems kyi chos nyid/ sems mi gnas pa dang / sems rgyu ba med pa dang / sems snang ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang bzhin de nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid du 'bru/ 
316b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa de ltar shes so// de ltar mthong ngo // de bzhin nyid ji lta bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid du rab tu shes/ de bzhin nyid du mthong ba de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sem
316b2(dkon brtsegs): la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yong su dge pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong rnam par mi mthong / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
316b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yo med/ rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems
316b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus// byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o// / ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'das byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
316b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi sems yod su sngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o// ji ltar byang chub kyi se ma su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de
316b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gzugs med de/ de'i phyir sems ji ltar spyod pa yang de bzhi no// spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhi no// byang chub ji lta bar yongasu bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni
316b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub po// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de/ gang 'di ltar sems rab tu 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// rigs
316b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa dang / rab tu mgyogs pa/ mi gnas par rgyu ba/ spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/ 'bab chu'i rgyan dang / 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra brkyang ring por 'gro ba// lus med pa/ 
317a1(dkon brtsegs): yul la brkam pa/ skye mched drug la spyod yul ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa/ rtse gcig pa/ mi 'phro ba/ rnam par mi 'phro ba/ zhi gan
317a2(dkon brtsegs): la rtse gcig pa// g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o// de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongasu rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyi
317a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyingasu gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems kyi gnas par shes pa dang / sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta bzhin du shes pa dang / sems
317a4(dkon brtsegs): la mngon sum gyi shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho nar shes pa dang / sems la g.yo ba
317a5(dkon brtsegs): med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhi ga pa yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thad kyi sems kyi rang
317a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes// sems kyi rang bzhin de yongasu shes nas de bzhin du ston to// rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin/ 
317a7(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu sheso// sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab
317a8(dkon brtsegs): tu shes// sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so// sems de dag
317b1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// / 
317b2(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam nyid kyis chos tha~Md/ 
317b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing / sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de rnam par mi 'gyur ro// sems gnas pas
317b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings gnas par rjesu shes kyang / sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/ rigs kyi/ bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes
317b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub seseM pa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang
317b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/ chos
317b7(dkon brtsegs): kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam// srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skye bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shod bu 'am/ 
317b8(dkon brtsegs): gang skye ba 'am/ rga ba'am/ 'chi ba'am/ 'pho ba'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang medo// 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub/ gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi
318a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grub ste/ dge ba yang rung / mi dge ba yang rung / ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi chos rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med la/ chos rnams la rgyu ba med/ 
318a2(dkon brtsegs): par yang gang gi kyang mi skya'i snyam du nye bar brtags na/ 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsumo// / 
318a3(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o// 'di ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa/ mchog dam pa// rab/ khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyur ro bcu
318a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus yongasu dag pas mtsha na dang dpe byad bzang po dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa byas pa thams cad las shin tu 'das
318a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ga sung / sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ rnam pa drug cu shin tu yongasu rdzogs pa dang / sems yongasu dag
318a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tingange 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongasu dag pas/ don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i
318a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po yongasasu dag pas/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu 'god pa dang / snying rje chen po yong su dag pas
318a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa dpag tu med par 'kho yong dastos su mo ba rdzogs pas/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yong su rdzogs pas par du gcod/ 
318b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yong su rdzogs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum la mi chags
318b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogasu pas/ rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa bzang po/ 
318b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog rab bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur 'gyur ro// des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas/ bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa la cho ga mi shes par 'gyur ro// bsod nams
318b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par du mi byed pa'i phyir da ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi tham sra cad du bag chagasu yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson
318b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// de mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnam rab tu shes nas mi g.yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed kyang / ti de'/ dzin de la snying por 'du shes par yang mi 'gyur la/ ting 'dzi/ 
318b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khamasu yang skye'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar
318b7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas/ chos rnams la chos kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas shing byang chub tu sgrub pa'i cho ga yin pa de dag sgom la/ byang
318b8(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi mithun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang dge ba'i chos mngon par 'ang bad pas rtag par lta bar mi ltung / mi dge ba'i chos spong yang chad par lta bar yang mi ltung
319a1(dkon brtsegs): ste gang la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongasu spangs pa'i dbu ma'i la mo// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gang tshul bzhin
319a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ma rig pa de gnyi ka yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes pa'o// 
319a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ma rig pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs
319a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug med pa da dang / reg pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tsher ba dang / tshor ba med pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / 
319a5(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / rgashi dang / rga shi med pa dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'do/ 
319a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni gtags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di
319a7(dkon brtsegs): ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// chos rnams kyi dbu mo'i lam de ni 'di 'dra'o// de 'dra'o zhes bstan par mi rung ste/ dbu ma'i lam la ni btags pa med pa/ gdags par
319a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ gnas pa med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mda' gang na 'phags
319b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang gang du phog pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ gang phigs pa dang / phogs pa de ni dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ blta ba'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ 
319b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dmigs pa gang gis rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / gang du so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyis dbu mar bstan par mi nus pa ni
319b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu brda' tsam du dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'i don dam par ni ma yin no// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med de/ de la ni nyung ngu yang med mang po yang med do// gang la nyung ngu yang med
319b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po yang med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs kyi bu ga zhan yang bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ bdag dang bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag
319b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// srog dang gang zag ces bya ba de/ gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ srog dang gang zag gi ngo ba nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// mtshan pa dang / mtshags med
319b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rtog pa dang 'jig pa
319b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo// brdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// tshu rol dang pha rol ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang
319b8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ste/ 'jig tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'khor ba dang mya
320a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i la mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag
320a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar rab tu shes// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa
320a3(dkon brtsegs): de nyid sems can gyi khamaso// de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas sems can gyi khams dbyer med par khong du chud do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang sems can gyi khams gang yin/ 
320a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de gnyi ga yang na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu she ras so// des chos thams cad dbyings gcig tu shes na sa chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnas kyang chos la
320a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de nam mi mthong ba de na chos rnams la tha dad du mi byedo// des chos rnams la mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma
320a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i mig mtshan mor 'du shes pa ma yin te de'i phyir sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma
320a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par ltung ba ma yin te de'i phyir de lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de'i mig spros pa la spyod pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong
320a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas chos gang la yang mi gan so// de chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjesu
320b1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa des sngon gyi smon lam mi gtong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rje su dran pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'o// gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang / tha~Md mkhyen
320b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa de yang mi 'dor ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// dran pa
320b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhog pa bzhi po de dag la gnas pa de phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log
320b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spong ngo // tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing gnas pas sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // sems la sems kyi rje su lta zhing
320b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log ra tu spong ngo // chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnas tha bdag med pag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // de phyin
320b6(dkon brtsegs): ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid bsgrub po// yang dag pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
320b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su dag pa gang yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongasasu dag pa rab tu 'thob ste/ yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis
320b8(dkon brtsegs): grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems 'jug gi/ mi dge ba la ni ma yin no// de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sdig pa mi dge
321a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos
321a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi las
321a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa'o// rang gi ngang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te/ 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o// 
321a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams pa dar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di dag
321a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur gyi// brtson 'gru/ sa kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin// de dag pa/ dang / dri ma med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas
321a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug ste/ yang dag pa la zhugs pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la gnas pa zhes
321a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i spong ba mnyam pa nyid kyi mi mnyam pa ni ma yin no// de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi mi mnyam pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis
321a8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par bsgrub pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o// de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa'i de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs pa
321b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dun pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
321b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang sems kyi ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin stong 'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// de byang chub kyi sems
321b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i spong bas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas sems yang bar 'gyur ro// thabs mkhas
321b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu thob pas spyod pa yang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba/ bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs
321b5(dkon brtsegs): pas dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshil dbang ba thob po// tshal dbang pa des 'di da na sems can tshe thung ngu rnams kyi nang du tshe ring po yongasu
321b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing sems can de dag yongasu smin par byed pa dang / sems can tshe ring po chos bstan na yongasu skyo ba rnams la chos bstan pas yongasu tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshe thung ngu yongasu 'dzin pa dang / 
321b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'am mi gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du tshe'i tshad la dbang bsgyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang dang po 'di thob po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
321b8(dkon brtsegs): lus la dbang thob ste/ lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas lus ci 'dra ba dang / gzugs ci 'dra ba dang / kha dog dang mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang spyod lam ci 'dra
322a1(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can rnams yongasu smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang gzugs dang kha dog dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs dang spyod lam
322a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu ston te/ de 'dod na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang gzugs dang kha dog dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs dang spyod lam mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
322a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dbang gnyis pa 'di thob po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos la dbang thob ste/ chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton par 'gyur
322a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'jig rten gyi chos la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'dzi ngag rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton kyang 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du yang snang la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa
322a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes de las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / gang 'di shes rab dang ye shes chags pa med pa dang / rten cing 'brel ba ra 'byung ba zab mo dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid dang chos
322a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par byed cing / gang gis sems can tshad med pa rnams bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul bar 'gyur ba
322a7(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba'i chos kyi gtam byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dbang gsum pa 'di 'thob po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi brlabs kyi
322a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang thob ste/ byin gyi brlabs la dbang ba des gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang
322b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa med la/ spyod pa de yang kun du ston pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab de dag thams cad rigacig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang rgyal
322b2(dkon brtsegs): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phos par yang mi shes la/ spyod pa de yang kun tu ston pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
322b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa gzhi 'am/ tsan+dan gyi sa gzhi 'am/ spos kyi sa gzhi 'am/ me tog gi sa gzhi 'am/ na mkhar gyur pa 'am/ chus yongasu
322b4(dkon brtsegs): gang ba 'am/ mes yongasu gang ba 'am/ rin po che tha/ dmas cad kyi yongasu gang bar gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyi das brlabs na yang de 'dra bar gnas pa dang / de bzhin
322b5(dkon brtsegs): du byin gyis brlabs thams cad kyis gang ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de ltar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bskyed ma zag tu byin gyi brlabs thams cad de bzhin du kun tu
322b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dbang bzhi pa 'di 'thob po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa// phyogs bcu
322b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro// de bzhin du tshangs pa thams cad dang / brgya byin thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyongs
322b8(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ming mams
323a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dang ldan cig tu gnas shing 'dug ste gtam zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag shin tu yongasu spyang ba bya/ 
323a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongasu sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la ldang ba dang / rim gro byud pa dang / gus por/ 
323a3(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar cing mthun par byed pa dang / ngag yang bar bya ba'i phyir bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin te ji skadas pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sems pa
323a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med pa dang / bla ma la rim gro byed cing gus pa dang // rung ba dang / tu dung ba dang sems la su rung ba dang / sems la yongasu
323a5(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba med pa dang / spong ba rnams la brtson pa mi 'a rab dang / bden pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par byed/ pa dang / mi lhod par brtson pa dang / dgos pa grub par byed/ 
323a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang snyoms las mi byed pa dang / sems mi zhum pa dang / 'dod chags rnam par sel ba dang / zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa sel ba dang / 'dod pa
323a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna dang bral ba dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang / gzhan gyi dgos pa bsgrub cing khung khyer ba dang / nyams
323a8(dkon brtsegs): chung ba rnams kyi khur sgrol ba dang / 'das rdzab la stegs 'dogs pa dang / klung la zas pas sgrol ba dang / chubo lagru sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yong su rdzogs par byed pang/ 
323b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i tshig thos par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang / nyes pa byung ba rnams bso bar byed pa dang / 'gyod pa rnams sel ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams rnam par sel ba dang / 
323b2(dkon brtsegs): khams gang gis 'byung ba khong du chud pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang / byin nas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir bya/ 
323b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu bsngo ba dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / gzhan dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang / bde ba gzhan la stong pa dang / bang
323b4(dkon brtsegs): gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phra ga dog med pa dang / rab tu byung ba la gzhol ba da dang / gzhan dag kyang rab tu byung ba la mos par byed pa dang / byas
323b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / 'dza' bstan pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung sbyin pa dang /
