323b6(dkon brtsegs): ngal ba rnams yang dag par spro bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / bslabs pa rnams la ston pa tsam du 'phags par 'dzin pa dang / ma bslab
323b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la mi brnyas pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod 'gyed pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang/ sman sbyin pa dang / byas pa rnams la mi smod pa dang / dkon mchog/ 
323b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum la rim gro byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bsti stong mi byed pa rnams la btang snyoms dang / 'jig rten gyi chos las shin du 'da' ba dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / 
324a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos dang / yon+dan thams cad bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa mi nyams pa ste/ rigs kyi budi
324a2(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongasu sbyad ba'o// de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs sbyangs nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nyams par mi 'gyur/ yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur
324a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi 'phrogs
324a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dad pa'i dbang po dang / gzhan gyi dringal mo 'jog pa brtsa ngan 'grus kyi dbang po dang / byang chub kyi sems mi bsgo dad pa dran pa'i dbang po dang / snying rje chen po ma gtong ba'i ting
324a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / chos thams cad 'dzin par brtson pa shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos shing dang pa ni byang chub
324a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas yongasu mi skyo ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi brjed pa ni dran pa
324a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin thaMd mngon par bsgrub pa ni ting 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad par long su bsngos pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyibu
324a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang bsam pa mi byed par gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// yong su ba/ 
324b1(dkon brtsegs): ba la mkhas pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu shes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs
324b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang sems can thams cad chags pa las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thaMd chags pa las shin tu thar par byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang ba'o// 
324b3(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang mi chags pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thams cad kyi chags pa mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa ni ti nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang chags pa dang mi chags pa thams cad du shes pa
324b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rnyog pa med par gyur pa 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po'o// sems rnyog dpa can dang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po
324b5(dkon brtsegs): gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi dran pa mi 'dor ba de ni dran pa'i/ dbang po'o// gang sems rnyog pa med par ting 'dzin la ste/ mas par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa 'di ni ting 'dzin gyi dbang
324b6(dkon brtsegs): po'o/ gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos thos pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa rnams rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mi dge bI thams cad spong ba ni byang
324b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang ma bsgrubs pa rnams mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i
324b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'o// gang ti nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang bde ba mi 'dod cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa li ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chu/ 
325a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams mnyam pa nyid dus song gis shes pa 'drin shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi drug zhan sang byang chub sems dpa'adang bas ni 'dor ro// rtson 'grus kyis ni yang nga/ 
325a2(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub bo// dran pas ni chung mi gson to// ting nge 'dzin gyis ni bsrung ngo // shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang bas ni bdag tu 'dzin parab
325a3(dkon brtsegs): spong ngo ngor brtson 'grus kyis ni bdag tu 'dzin pa 'dor ro// dran pas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las shin tu 'anga'o// ting 'dzin gyis ni lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dor ro// shes rab kyis na
325a4(dkon brtsegs): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs par bya ba tu stong ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po da'i spyod pa yongs dgapa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
325a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ gang dbang pode dag gis nye bar bstan nas bdud thams cad kyis mi badz+rI ba 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis kyis
325a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi dam bcas pa la brtan par 'gyur ba dang / 
325a7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams sbed par 'gyur ba dang / dag rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi bskyod par 'gyur ba'o// rigs
325a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis bya ba ma yin pa mi byed do// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bya ba bye do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byas pa'i las chud mi gson to// ting 'dzin
325b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs kyis ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa rnams kyi rma mi 'byin to// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni 'gyod pa dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad las shin tu 'anga'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
325b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni yang gzhan la dad pas mi 'gro'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bar mdor zhum par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa'i ltos kyis ni gzungs dang speb pa rab tu thob pa/ 
325b3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mtshungs par chos ston to// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs
325b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni mos pa'i stobs yongasu rdzogs par byed do// brtso ngan 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rnam par
325b5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i stobs yongasu rdzogs par byed do// ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems dang bsam pa'i stobs yongasu rdzogs par byed do// shes rab kyi stobs
325b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshim pa byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni ser sna'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni
325b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ngo // dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mnyam pa'i sems kyis mi 'dor ro// shes rab kyi
325b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni rnamasar smin pa la re ba med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi
326a1(dkon brtsegs): ni bslab pa rnams las mi 'da'o// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongasu bsde'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes kyi sa la 'gro'o// shes rab
326a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs kyis ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshul khrims rab tu spong ngo // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni gnod sems kyi dri ma rab
326a3(dkon brtsegs): tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bzod pa bsgom mo// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad rnams rjes
326a4(dkon brtsegs): su bsrung ngo // shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni bdag dang / sems can dang bzod pa la rnam par rtog go/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs
326a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni le lo'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stong sa kyis ni rtsom pa thams cad nyam 'og tu chud par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongasu bsngo
326a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa bsgrub po// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mi byed rnam par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i
326a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni rnam par g.yeng ba'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub po dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rtse gcig tu yongs
326a8(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo'o// ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni tingange 'dzin las mi g.yo'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan de la chags rab tu spong ngo // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang
326b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i stobs kyis ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni zos pa yongasu tshol lo// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ro// ting 'dzin gyi sgong/ 
326b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni sems nges par sems pa rab tu 'thob po// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub po// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyis
326b3(dkon brtsegs): ni nor bdun rab tu 'thob bo// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob bo// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rjesu dran pa drug rab tu 'thob bo// ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni rnam par
326b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gan pa bdun las shin tu 'da'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni log pa nyid du nges pa brgyad las shin tu 'da'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mi phyed cing sems dang / bsam pa rnyeg
326b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang phyir mi ldog cing blang ba med 'do na ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// 
326b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dran pa sngon du 'gro la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa 'di ni dran pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang sems rab tu dul bas rang bzhin gyis ti nge 'dzin dang spobs pa la snyems par 'jug
326b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldang pa shes pa 'di ni ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang lta ba thams cad sel ba la mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dang bar byed/ 
326b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// mi brjed pa'i mtshan nyid ni dran pa'i
327a1(dkon brtsegs): bas byud pa yong mdag pa'o// rnam par g.yeng bamed pa sachumangan ting nge 'an kyi rmongs kyi spyod bsong dag par/ sa mar rtog padasacan nan shes
327a2(dkon brtsegs): [।] sto pa pa/ sras sasu 'dzin tu chu sems ngas pas ba pa/ gas med ku su ses pa kyi mu na
327a3(dkon brtsegs): sungag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba ni bdun/ ban gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste dran pa yang ngan byang chub kyilan lag
327a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pam byed pa yang byang chub kyi ni gA / sa sras sa nga khyed chu kyil na gang/ sa sa rgya chu dugyu
327a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin pa dag byang chub kyi yan lagadang / btang ma/ yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagan// de 'dran pa yang ngo// 
327a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag na gang byang chub kyis phyogs kyi chos bsngags shing bsags pa rnams chud mi brtson pa yin te/ 'don dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lags// chos rnam par 'byed/ 
327a7(dkon brtsegs): bi yang dag byang chub kyi yon log ni gang lhag mthong gi tshogs dang drung du brel bar gyur ba yin te/ 'din chos rnam par byed pa byang chub kyi lan lagaso/ brtson dgrus yang dag N+DI/ 
327a8(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sa rdo lagano gang spong ba khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'don na su dag byang chub kyi yan lags/ dag ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang mo dga' baphel / 
327b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang lus dang sems shin du byang bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni shin tu sbyangs/ 
327b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan log ni gang rnam par grol ba snying por 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub yan lag/ btang snyoms
327b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang byed pa byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi bsam pa mi
327b4(dkon brtsegs): brjed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la brtson pa 'di ni chos dernam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang
327b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongasu smin par byed pa yongasu mi skye ba 'di ni ba na 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ gang dam pa'i chos kun dga' la dga' bas gnas pa
327b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dag pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gshin tu sbyangs pa la sems can rnams 'god pa 'di ni shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang ting nge
327b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la sems can rnams 'god pa 'di ni ti nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lago/ gang mngon sum du shes pa btang snyems pa la sems can rab tu 'god pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byab
327b8(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis dran pa med pa yid la mi byed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa
328a1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa'o// gang chos thams cad kyi tshigs rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa
328a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa'o// gang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las brtul ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dge byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// gang rjes chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba 'dzin
328a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// gang bya ba byas pa dang byed pa byas pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// 
328a4(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes 'jug kyang ga/ gcig tu skams par zhugs par yang gyur pa 'di ni ti 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag
328a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gnyis su med pa'i chos la rab tu gnas te rtog pa nga sel ba med cing btang snyoms par kun tu sdang la sa/ mas can la yang lta ba 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi
328a6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad khong du chud par byed pa dang / rjesu rtog par byed pa dang / rab tu 'byed par
328a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nye bar rtog pa khong du chud cing sems can gyi spyod pa mtho ba dang dma' ba thams cad rtogs te/ de la gnas nas kyang ngan song du 'gyur ba'i
328a8(dkon brtsegs): lom bsgom pa dang / dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bag la nyal ba dang // kun nas dkris pa dang brel ba 'dini rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ste/ 
328b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 
328b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni nga rgyal can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma
328b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri
328b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ro dang reg dang chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// / 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tshor ba yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phag
328b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni sems dang yid rnam par shes pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phra gas pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang
328b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa dang rnam par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tha na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa
328b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yul yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad la rtog pa dang yongasu rtog pa'i spyod yul ma
328b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad kun nas mi ldang ba'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i spyod yul ni 'pha
329a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad rtsod pa med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags
329a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'phags pa'i spyod yul yongasu dag pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang
329a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang
329a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / @dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes smos pa de la
329a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad ma nyam pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste/ de bang gtu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / 
329a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can tu lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / stong pa nyid
329a7(dkon brtsegs): du lta ba de ni mtshungs// de chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta bo dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba
329a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni mtshungaso// 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba
329b1(dkon brtsegs): deni ma chung po// de 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / ngar 'dzin par lta ba dang / nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / 
329b2(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin par lta ba dang / nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs// de sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba
329b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs// rigs kyi bu de ltar na lta ba'i
329b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa ni ji tsam du chung na mya ngan las 'das pa la/ dpa'i dmigs pa yang rung ste/ de tsam du yang da/ dpa'i lta ba ma yin no// gang tha ma dang / rab dang / 'bring gi
329b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mnyam par lta'i mi mnyam par ma yin no// 
329b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na mnyam par lha'i mi mnyam par ma yin no zhe na// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni dman pa/ slob pa'i chos rnams ni dam pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi
329b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa mi slob po'i chos rnams ni zag pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i skye
329b8(dkon brtsegs): bo'i chos rnams ni zang zing dang bcas pa rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zang zing med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni nyon
330a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni
330a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas yin la sangs rgyas kyi rnams ni 'dus ma byas yin no snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o// nam so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad slob pa'i chos
330a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos stong pa nyid dang mi slob pa'i chos stong pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni
330a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rgyamanyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa mtshungs pa mnyam par
330a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos dben pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid du mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar la
330a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so skye bo'i chos yongasu grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta bani
330a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de'i phyir yang gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ gang gnyi su med par mthong ba de yang dag pa mthong po'o// gang mtshungs par mthong
330a8(dkon brtsegs): bde yang thad dang du mi byed// zad med pa mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// nga mtshungs par mthong ba de tham dang 'dri dang rab kyi chos rnam par rnyog pa ma skyid/ chos thams pa rnam par rtog pa/ 
330b1(dkon brtsegs): med par mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni mthong ba ci yang med do// mthong ba ci yang med pa ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni chos
330b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad snang ba med par mthong ba de ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos 'di dag de ltar mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// ji lta ba
330b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mthong ba dang mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni
330b4(dkon brtsegs): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro/ 'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang ba zhigadamanyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid la bzod pa skyes// rigs kyi bu
330b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rtog pa gang rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o// de yangag/ zhe na/ 'di lta ste zhi gnas kyis yongasu bsdus pa'i lhag
330b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong la mkhas pa ste/ de chos gang zhig chos gang dang ldan snyam du de chos de dag la rnam par lta'o// rnam par rtog go/ de chos thams cad phan tshun mi ldan pa dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin/ 
330b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ma 'dres par rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes nas mnyam par yang mi rtog na gang mi mnyam par rtog par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ni gnas ma yin no// de chos rtog pa dang yongasu rtog pa
330b8(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs te/ phyir yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ 
331a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis bdag la mi gdung la mi gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang / bdag kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed la gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang / bdag la yang ma
331a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod la gzhan la yang ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i tshig gis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du nges par rtog pa'o// de'i chos nges par rtog
331a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang chos nges pa'i tshig des 'byung ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni gang mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams la ngag mnyam pa dang / chos zad/ 
331a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad mtsha nam med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'o zhes
331a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag mnyam pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// chos thams cad bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes
331a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag dang bral ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang
331a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang rgyu ci 'dra ba 'bras bu yang de 'dra ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i
331a8(dkon brtsegs): ngag ces bya ba ni gang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag yang dag pa'i chos la 'dzud pa dang / byang chub kyang yang dag par rab tu 'dzin du 'jug pa yin te/ 'di ni yang
331b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i ngag yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ ngag thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang / 
331b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i ngag yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ las gang las zad par 'gyur gyi las mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa
331b3(dkon brtsegs): dang las gang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa skye ba'i phyir ma yin pa
331b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o// rig ras kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i la sa kyi mtha' ni gang chos 'di dag rab tu shes shing dge ba mngon
331b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba tham cad mngon par 'du byed kyang de mngon par/ 'du bya ba dag kyang gsob nyid du snang ba dang / gso ba nyi da dang / snying po med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du snang ba ste/ rig
331b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'ang ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba gang zhe na/ 'tshe ba gang
331b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur/ gzhal yang gnod par mi 'gyur/ gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i 'tshe
331b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'tshe ba gang nyon mongs pa thams cad mi sog pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba zhes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni gang sems can thaMd kyi 'tshe ba
332a1(dkon brtsegs): yong su dag par 'gyur ba ste// 'tsho ba yong su dag pa de la ha cang 'dud par yang mi byed mi 'dud par yang mi byed la/ 'tsho ba gang gis bdag ga don dang / gzhan gyi don dang chos
332a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'chaba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ gang dag zhing
332a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chas de dag la yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson pa dang / spro ba dang / rtsom pa dang / mi nus pa dang / yang dag pa'i rna
332a4(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi mngon du byed pa ste/ 'don yang dge pa'i rtsol /  zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni ga rang mnyam par rtsol gyi mi mnyam pa ni ma yin no// ji ltar namanya
332a5(dkon brtsegs): byar rdol gyi mi mnyam par ma yin zhe na/ gang chos rnams mnyam par yang mi byed mi mnyam par yang mi byed la/ byed pa med cing rnam par mi byed pa'o// chos dag gi
332a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang chos gnas pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol// chos de dag gi yang dag pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rtso lo// chos de dag gi mnyam pa nyid dang bye brag tu bya ba med pa ji lta ba bzhin
332a7(dkon brtsegs): du rnolo// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba de yang sems can thams cad kyi log pa'i rtsol ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen par yongasu bsngo ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
332a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sbyin pa dran pa dang / tshul khrims dran
332b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bzod pa dran pa dang / brtson 'grus dran pa dang / bsam gtan dran pa dang / shes rab dran pa dang byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dran pa ste/ 'di ni yang / 
332b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i dran pa ni yang dag pa'i dran pa gang gis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / dran
332b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / dran pa gang gis lam gol ba dang lam ngan par mi ltung ba dang / dran pa bsgom pa lta bur gyur pa gang gis sems dang
332b4(dkon brtsegs): sems las byung ba'i chos mi dge ba thams cad kyi skab das mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i da dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang
332b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa gang gis dran pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / skyon med pa'i rigs thob kyang 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
332b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang 'phags pa'i rnam par gyur pa'i ting 'dzin te/ sdug bsngal gyi
332b7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa yongasu shes pa dang / mthun pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang ba dang / mthun pa 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon du bya ba dang / mthun pa lam gyi bden pa bsgom pa dang mthun pa ste/ 
332b8(dkon brtsegs): 'don yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// bdag mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / bdag ste
333a1(dkon brtsegs): / panyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par skyems par 'jug la/ gang de ltar snyoms par 'jug cing yang dag pa nyid pa 'jug kyang nges pa ma
333a2(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis thams cad mkhyen pa
333a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'di ni bya
333a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongs dag pa'o// bya chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongasu drag po 'dis snyan pa na lha dang mi srog chags nyan thos kyi theg pa can
333a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa lam du zhugs pa khri drug song bla na med pa ma dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dgapa
333a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mag gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
333a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas snang ba thob pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par lta bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba de ni de'i lha'i mig
333b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'bo dang skye ba la yang dag par lta bas shin du nges par brtags pa de na de'i lha'i mig yin na// phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba dang/ 
333b2(dkon brtsegs): kha dag dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs la yang dag par lta bas shin du rgyan pa de ni de'i lha'i mogo yin no// rang gi gzi brjid grub pas mngon par 'dum byed pa'i mtshan nyid du lnga dang
333b3(dkon brtsegs): klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa de ni de'i lha'i mgo yin te/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa 'di lnga ni byang chub sems
333b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de'i lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga
333b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang gis mi'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / srin dmyal ba pa dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig na
333b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcu'i skad dang sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di
333b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa
333b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga gang zhe na/ gang gis lha dang mi dang sems can dmyal 'dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mthar sems skyes pa gang yin pa/ 
334a1(dkon brtsegs): de yang rab tu shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar sems skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na sems skye ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu
334a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang dmigs par ldan pa dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang log pa nyid du nges pa dang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa dang / 
334a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams dang zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams dang gti mug la spyod pa rnams dang cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rab tu shes te/ shes nas
334a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de kho na bzhin du de dang mthun par ches ston pa ste/ da rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyi sa dmas shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam
334a5(dkon brtsegs): ba lnga'o// de sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa'i mngon par shesapa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ sems gang 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung
334a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / zhe sdang gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongasu gzung ba de dag kyang rje su dran pa dang / sems gang sbyin pa'i
334a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / byams pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / ting 'dzin gyi rgyu las byung ba rnams
334a8(dkon brtsegs): dang de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yong su gzung ba de dag kyang rje su dran pa dang / sems gang rgyu dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / rkyen dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / dmigs pa dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / de dag gi
334b1(dkon brtsegs): lus ji 'dra ba rnams dang / de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag kyang rjesu dran pa dang / sems gang lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang / ma rig pa dang gti mug gis yang dag par bsdus pa rnams da
334b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongasu bzungs pa de dag kyang rje su dran pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang // kha dog dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid dang / g.yog dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / brjod pa dang / 
334b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug ci 'dra bar gyur pa de yang rjesu dran pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de rdzu 'phrul bya ba
334b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa lnga dang lnga na pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus dang / gzugs kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / tshig dang skad rnam/ 
334b5(dkon brtsegs): par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems dang yid mngon par 'du byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad du rnam par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / 
334b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par du mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ rdzu 'phrul bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa 'di lnga dang ldan pa yin no// rig kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
334b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shes rab kyi mig gis brtags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig go mngon par shes pa'i
334b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongasasu dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu gnas pa ni lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// rang bzhin gyis yong su dag par rab tu gnas pa ni pha rol gyi sems
335a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu gcod par rab tu gnas pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i mngon par
335a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o// mngon par 'du mi byed par rab tu gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya
335a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par rtsen cing zag pa zad pa'i ye shes la'ang gnas so// / 
335a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba ba dgrong dgos pa na grong khyer chen po zhig yod de/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam ni bgrod par dka' zhing ring la nyam nga ste
335a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dang bcas pa zas dang skom dang bza' ba yang med pa zhig na gang grong khyer chen po der phyin pa de'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba zhig yod pa dang / 
335a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas skyes bu la la zhig gis gleng khyer chen po de'i yang dag pa'i yon+tan dang bsngags pa thos nas skyes bu de la bu mthong na dga' ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i bu gcig kyang
335a7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa las/ des bu gcig pa de bor nas grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhugs te/ de stobs kyi shugs dang brtson 'grus thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad khyad par du bsad
335a8(dkon brtsegs): de lam ring po de 'das nas rkang pa ya gcig ni grong khyer chen po de'i sgo'i thim pa la bzhag/ rkang pa ya gcig ni phyi rol na 'dug pa las des bu gcig po de yid la dran par gyur nas de 'di snyam du
335b1(dkon brtsegs): sems te ma la skye ma'o// bdag gis bu gcig pa de 'dir khrid dem 'ongs pa lta zhig snyam nas/ bu gcig pa de sdug pas grong khyer chen po dar ma zhugs kyi/ phyir phyogs nas bu gcig bdeg
335b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par slar log pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'bad pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan/ 
335b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes pa lnga po rnams bskyed de/ sems kyis bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de la zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon sum du
335b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de snying rje chen po'i sems skyes nas sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i ye shes 'dris par byas pa las sems can rnams la la/ 
335b5(dkon brtsegs): bas phyir phyogs te/ slar log nas so so'i skye bo'i sa na ya/ nga kun du snang ngo // rigs kyi bu grong khyer zhes bya ba/ de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs bla dag so// 
335b6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod dgos po zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongasu 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgaso// bar du gcod pa mang po bgrod ces bya ba de ni bdud kyis 'dun pa
335b7(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa'i bar chad kyi tshig bla dag so// skyes bu zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dag so// rkang pa ya gcig ni grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la bzhag/ rkang pa yi gcig sgo'i phyiraro/ 
335b8(dkon brtsegs): du bzhag ces bya ba ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang 'dres pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'jug pa'o// bu gcig pa dran nas grong khyer che/ 
336a1(dkon brtsegs): bo der zhugs pa las phyir phyogs te slar log ces bya ba ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyu
336a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de zag pa zad pa'i spyi bor phyin kyang zag pa yang mi spong la sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyir phyogs shing ldog par yang 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
336a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ci 'dra ba'i thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad
336a4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar byang chub lag 'brel du thob pa yang mi 'tshal bar 'khor ba nyid kyi rjesu 'jug cing / sen
336a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bgyis pas yongasu mi skyo bo ni ngo mtshar to// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du zhig dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba lags
336a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi shu dang ldan na 'khor po na yongasu mi skyo ba yin te/ chos nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
336a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang / byams pa chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems can yongasu smin
336a8(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pas yang dag par zin pa'i brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam
336b1(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag par zin pa'i thabs dang thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyis yang dag
336b2(dkon brtsegs): par zin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes dang / ye shes kyis yang dag par zin pa'i brtul ba dang / brtul bas yang dag par
336b3(dkon brtsegs): zin pa'i dran pa dang / dran pas yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rtag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu ba'i
336b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dge ba dar zin pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrim das kyi sdom pas yang dag par zin pa'i thos pa'i nan tan
336b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i gzung sa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i spob sa pa dang / spobs pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsod nams
336b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na
336b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po chos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
336b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bsod nams
337a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa'i thos pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// thos pas brgyan pa'i sposal ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dran/ 
337a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams pa med pa thob pa'i gzugs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// lag na rin po che mi zad pa'i longs spyod kyis ni/ skye bo mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// 
337a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// chos ston pas yongasu mi skyo ba ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
337a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa ni 'a'akhor ba na mdzeso// ye shes kyis brgyan pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
337a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas 'khor ba na/ mdzes so// de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyang skye bo/ mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdeg
337a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongasu gtong bas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// so so ci rigs par chos sbyin pas ni skye bo mang po nyo bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshul
337a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims yong su dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// thos pa yongasu dag pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar bag yod pas byang chub
337a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de khyod kyis rnam grangs 'odas 'di ltar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa gras/ 
337b1(dkon brtsegs): med pas kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa dga' bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam
337b2(dkon brtsegs): par bltas pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ 
337b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kho lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
337b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir bskol pa de dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bskal pa de la sangs ngas stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur te/ de na gnas gtsang ma
337b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi lha dag gis kye ma'o// grogs po dag 'di ni barba la pa bzang po yin te/ skal pa 'di la sangs rgyas ste nga phrag drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur zhes dga' ba'i sgra bsgrags pa
337b6(dkon brtsegs): dang de na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang dad pa dang mos pa chen po skyes te/ de nas lha dang mi de dag gis kye ma'o bskal pa 'di ni dga'
337b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa'o zhes de skad smras pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dga' bar gyur pa zhes gtags so// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de lha thams cad kyis bltas brtags kyang de
337b8(dkon brtsegs): ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de tsam du lta na sdug cing / de tsam du nyams dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de lhas rnam par ltas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi
338a1(dkon brtsegs): khams lngas rnam par ltas pa de'i gzhi ni tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po sha stag ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po de phye ma khal gcig gi rin
338a2(dkon brtsegs): du yang mi bzod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas spos kyi ngad langs pa'i dris ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa khyab po// tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po la
338a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sa chen po de las 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+mo chen po sha stag byung bar gyur te/ pad+mo de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu snang bar gyur to// mi de dag
338a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa pu shu dang sgo khang dang khyams dang rta babs kyi legs par brgyan pa la longs spyod par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
338a5(dkon brtsegs): de na grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal gnas pa med do// mi de dag thams cad kyang na mkha' la 'gro'o// de dag mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nas na mkha'i dkyil na
338a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag gi nang du 'jug cing na mkha' la 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de na mngal na gnas pa yang med de/ mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skyes pa sha
338a7(dkon brtsegs): stag go/ de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag go/ ngan song rnams kyang mdo// ngan 'gro rnams kyang med do// sdug bsngal yang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas rags pa yang
338a8(dkon brtsegs): med do// mi de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa dang bsam gtan gyis dga' ba'i zas can no// mos pa rlabs po chas theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming
338b1(dkon brtsegs): yang med do// gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi cod pan thogs shing dpung rgyan dang rna chas brgyan pa lnga'i kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa sha stag go/ 
338b2(dkon brtsegs): gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid de dag gi rab tu byung ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gos ngur smrig tu bka' stsal pa
338b3(dkon brtsegs): yang med de 'di ltar sems la rnyog pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to// 
338b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu' phrul che ba de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs rab 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la blta ba dang / 
338b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kha/ mas lhas rnam par bltas pa der lhags te/ sang / sa rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon+tan bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du
338b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston pa de na/ 
338b7(dkon brtsegs): ta la brgyad bcu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ tshangs pa bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ji ltar da ltar nga/ 
338b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mang du spros te rnam par phye bas chos kyi gtam mi ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de tshig dang yi ge nyung ngus chos kyi gtam mdor ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa
339a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bur rtsam gyis go ba sha stag ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig brgya stong gi rjesu 'jug pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu
339a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa dang / 
339a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag nyid byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' las brtsams te yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
339a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chu da ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mangs 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
339a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye ba 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des tshigs de gnyis rgyas par rnam par phye ste/ bstan
339a6(dkon brtsegs): nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa ni skye bo mang po nye
339a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des bstan pa de lta bu bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu chos
339a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mthun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob bo// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
339b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mda' des yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por mdzes par bgyid pa lags/ de skad
339b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mnga' la 'di skad ces
339b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ ji tsam du chos rnams bsgrub pa'o// 
339b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams bsgrub pa yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya da'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag yodapa/ 
339b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di lta ste sbyor ba tshad med pa yongasu gtugs pas go cha rtsom pa tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad me dpe sdud pas sbyin pa mi zad pa tshad med pa dang / mi lhod cing
339b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rje su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims tshad med pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang // skyes bu dam pa'i las kyis brtson
339b7(dkon brtsegs): bgrus tshad med pa dang / ting 'dzin tshad med pa bsgrub pas bsam gtan tshad med pa dang / chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi shes rab tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad
339b8(dkon brtsegs): med pas byams pa tshad med pa dang / phan pa'i dngos pos snying rje tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrubs pas 'khor ba yongasu 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang / bdag
340a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba la mi chags pas sems can yong su smin par byed pa tshad med pa dang / brtson 'grus brtan pas dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang / yang
340a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par sbyor bas yon+tan yang dag par bsgrub cing sogs pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa tshad med pa dang / shes rab sbyong bas
340a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa yongasu tshol ba tshad med pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems la 'jug pa tshad med pa dang / byams pa nges pas sbyangs pa'i yon+tan dang / yo
340a4(dkon brtsegs): byang bsnyungs pa tshad med pa dang / sems 'dul ba das dgon pa na gnas pa'i yon+dan gyi tshogs tshad med/ dpa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu
340a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshog sa tshad med pa ste/ dkon mchog skar mda' chos 'di dag ni bag yod pa bsgrubs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang
340a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu dag yod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// bag yod pa ni ye shes bsgrub
340a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams kyi gnaso// bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos bsags shing bsags pa rnams so so yang dag par 'dzin pa'o// bag yod pa ni sngon thos pa'i chos rnams chud mi
340a8(dkon brtsegs): gson pa'o// bag yod pa ni sdu bar bya ba'i chos rnams sdud pa'o// bag yod pa ni sgrib pa'i chos rnams mi sdud pa'o// bag yod pa ni sgrib par mi 'gyur ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o// 
340b1(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa'o// bag yod pa ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa 'bar bar byed pa'o// bag yod pa ni dbang po rnams sdoms par byed pa'o// 
340b2(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa ni lam nyam nga ba las kun tu bsrung ba'o// bag yod pa ni dus dang dus ma yin par spyod pa las bskul ba'o// bag yod pa ni stobs te stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs par byed par
340b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni zil gyis mi non pa ste mi 'jigs pa yong su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni yon+tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas te sangs rgyas kyi
340b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// / bag yod pa ni spyi bor phyin pa ste thams cad mkhyen pa 'i ye shes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
340b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des/ 'di lta bu bstan pa dang / byang chub ses dpa' stong phrag cu gnyis mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur
340b6(dkon brtsegs): to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyisu gyur na yang de ltar mi
340b7(dkon brtsegs): lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' zhes bya bar gyur to/ rigs kyi bu khyod rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar bag
340b8(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
341a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub kyang bag yod pas thob par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi
341a2(dkon brtsegs): bu sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa yang mtha' yas bsam
341a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab po// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes nas sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sen
341a4(dkon brtsegs): la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongasu smin par 'gyur/ la la ni tshul khrims spang bas/ sems can la la tshig gis shin tu gdams pas yongasu smin par 'gyur/ la
341a5(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'jam pos/ la la ni tshig rtsub pos/ la la ni deg/ nyis kas/ la la ni 'jigs par byas pas/ la la ni 'jigs pa la yongasu thar par byas
341a6(dkon brtsegs): bas la la ni bslangs pas/ la la ni ma bslangs pas/ la la ni gnod pas ga la la ni mi gnod pas/ la la ni zil gyis mnan pas/ la la ni zil gyis ma mnan pas/ la la ni sbyang
341a7(dkon brtsegs): pas la la ni ma sbyangs pas/ la la ni tshar bcad pas// la la ni sbyin pa las phyir byin pas/ la la ni bslangs pas/ sems can la la ni gzugs yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pA/ 
341a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yong su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni gzugs yid du mi
341b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni hU~M
341b2(dkon brtsegs): pas yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni rtag tu mthong bas/ la la ni ma mthong bas/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sgras/ sems can la la ni chos kyi sgras/ sems can
341b3(dkon brtsegs): la la ni dge 'dun gyi sgras/ la la ni mi rtag pa'i sgras/ la la ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras/ la la ni bdag med pa'i sgras/ la la ni zhi ba'i sgras/ sems can la la ni sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
341b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sgras yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la/ lnga ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin
341b5(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal myongs par 'gyur ba'i sgras na/ ngasu smin par 'gyur ro// la la ni lha'i bde ba myong bar/ 'gyur ba'i sgras yongasu smin par 'gyur// son la la ni nyan thos
341b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyis la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyis/ la la ni theg pa chen po'i gtam gyis yongasu smin par 'gyuraro// sems can la la ni sbyin pas yong su smin par 'gyur
341b7(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra bas ma yin don spyod pas ma yin don mthun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni snyan par smra bas yongasu smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin don spyod pas ma yin don mthun pas ma
341b8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sems can la la ni don spyod pas yongasu smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyan par smra bas ma yin/ don 'thun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni don mthun pas yongasu smin par
342a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin snyan par smra bas ma yin don spyod pas yongasu smin par 'gyur ba ma yin/ sems can la la ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis yongasu/ 
342a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par 'gyuraro// sems can la la ni nang gi dngos po yongasu gtang bas/ la la ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yongasu gtong bas// la la ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongasu gtong bas/ sems can la la ni mung
342a3(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bu po dang bu mo kun tu gtong bas yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang mgo bo kun tu gtong bas yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni/ 
342a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang glu dang sil snyan gyis yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// la la ni gcig tu sdug bsngal bas/ la la ni de gnyis kas/ la la ni gnyis ka ma yin pas
342a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can la la ni dge slong du sprul pas 'dul bas/ seMn la la ni dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen da 8/ dge bsnyen mar sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can
342a6(dkon brtsegs): la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog gis 'dul ba yin te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku bstan pas 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
342a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs byed par shes nas sems can gyi bsam pa yongasu shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa las
342a8(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung bar gyur cing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yang bsdus par gyur te/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa la mkhas par gyur pa na de nas seMn yong su smin par byang nus pa'i
342b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa dang mthu yod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams yong su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yongasu mi skyo ba dang
342b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par bskul ba dang / bsam pa yongs su shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can
342b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams yongasasu smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bka' blo bde/ 
342b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / ngang tshul gyis 'jam pa dang / bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 
342b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi/ bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang / ldan na sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed nas/ 
342b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang / bdag shin du dul ba'i sems te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
342b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams
342b8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par byed nus so// bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / nye bar
343a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bzod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs smin par byed nus// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rnam grangs 'dis/ 
343a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di ltar gang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pas
343a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa dga' bad la 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
343a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang / 
343a5(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba de'ang 'byor pa rgyas pa
343a6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba lo legs pa nyams dga' ba lha dang mis rab tu gang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par snang
343a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i nyan thos kyang nyan thos chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'dus par gyur to// de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bya chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad
343a8(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par
343b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ btsas nas lo cu
343b2(dkon brtsegs): drug lon pa dang de gzugs bzang ba/ longs spyod dang skyid pas dregs shing nga rgyal skyes te rgyags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i gan du mi 'gro
343b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten par mi byed bsnyen par mi byed rim gro mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la rgyal bu gzhon nu na
343b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs para'atshang rgya ba'i skul ba yod na/ de gzugs dang longs spyod
343b5(dkon brtsegs): dang skyid pas rgyags dregs te nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i drung du yang mi 'ong na/ gal te rgyun mi 'chad bar bskul na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong yang srid
343b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bsdus so// bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis
343b7(dkon brtsegs): nas yid yongasu mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi steng gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing bde ba tham cad ni spangs sdug bsngal thams cad ni dang du blangs te/ de las than
343b8(dkon brtsegs): kun du smra ba 'am yang dag par smra ba 'am stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du/ gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub mo mi snyan par zer yang spro bar 'gyur ba su yod ces tshul shing brim so// rigs kyi bu
344a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar tshul shing brims kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' tsam yang spro bar ma gyur to// bcom ldan 'das nges
344a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul shing thogs te lan gnyis lan gsum du brims kyang sus kyang ma blangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang
344a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
344a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dri ma med par snang bag la ba de log su thal mo rab btud nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
344a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yongasu mi skyo ba ra bde ba thams cad ni spangs sdug bsngal thams cad ni rdza mi snyam par bgyis te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du mam
344a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu
344a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos nas/ lha'i bu brgyad stong gis kyang steng gi bar snang la kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bges pa 'di ni legaso legaso zhes
344a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byin no// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar de rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du song ste/ khyim gyi sgo drung na 'dug pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs
344b1(dkon brtsegs): chen pos mthong nas gshe rgya zhing ngan pa rtsub po sna tshogs kyang smras te de la sa dang rdul kyang gtor/ de la lag pa dang dbyig pa dang bong bas kyang brdeg so// de nas mthong zhing thos te lus la
344b2(dkon brtsegs): reg cing tsher bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar 'khrug pa'am gshe ba'am khong khro ba'am/ phyir log par ma gyur gyi steng du brtson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs rab tu
344b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas stobs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po yang bskyed de/ de la stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gcig tu zhugs te smad pa dang bsdigs pa dang brdeg pa thams cad
344b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang yongasu mi skyo bar de le khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i po dbrang gi sgo khang gnyis kyi nang du zhugs so// de lokhri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gsum pa'i nang du/ 
344b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa nas/ lo bdun khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i phra breng gi sgo khang drug pa'i nang du zhugs so// lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang bdun / 
344b6(dkon brtsegs): nang du zhugs pa dang / de nas gdod rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal des tshig ster te/ dge slong khyod ci 'dod ci zhig tshol khyod la ci dgos smos shig dang / ci nus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o// 
344b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu de dge slong de la ngo mtshar chen po'i 'du shes skyes nas ci tsam du dge slong des yongasu skyo ba mnags nus pa ni ngo mtshar ro snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chubo sems
344b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar des rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal de sems rab tu dang bar shes nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zos dang skom dang
345a1(dkon brtsegs): gos dang bza' ba rnams// gzhon nu bdag la dgos pa ci yang med// zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// bdag ni chos kyi pho nyar 'dir 'ongs// 
345a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che byung ba// mi mchog dri ma med par snang zhes bya// de ni sdug bsngal mthar 'byin chos ston to// sems can gang gis thos pa mi 'chi thob// bskal pa stong
345a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag bye ba grangs med na// sangs rgyas rnams ni rgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// da ltar 'jig rten mun gnag sgron gyur pa// yon+tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes nas// khyod ni 'di na 'dod pa'i
345a4(dkon brtsegs): yon+tan chags// gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rta dag tu myos// bskyed myos de bzhin rgyal srid myos pas na// chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yong mi 'gro/ longs spyod mi rtag de
345a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rgyal srid srog/ rtswa rtse'i zil thigs 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ra ba// de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi cha ma yin// khyod ni 'di na byang chub
345a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog zhugs la// sems can dag kyang gnyer te 'gro bar gyis// khyod bdag de ltar 'dod pa'i dran gyur na// ji ltar mos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur// nga rgyal spongs te nyon mongs rnams
345a7(dkon brtsegs): sol la nyid ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis// brtson 'grus bskyed de 'jig rten snying rtse gyis// phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar gyur ta re// rgyal bus tshigasu bcad pa 'di thos nas// nga rgyal spangs / 
345a8(dkon brtsegs): gus pa rab bskyed nas// brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal to// gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par gsol// bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spang bar bya// 'dod dang de bzhin long spyod
345b1(dkon brtsegs): kun ma tshol// nga rgyal tha ma'i skyon dang dregs spangs te// myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro// de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad bcus bskor// me tog na bza' spos dang gdug pa thog/ drim
345b2(dkon brtsegs): med par snang ba skyes bu'i mchog/ rgyal ba de yi drung du nye bar song // bde bar gshegs kyi gan du mchis nas kyang // zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa de/ 
345b3(dkon brtsegs): yi spyan sngar 'dug/ rgyal bu des ni tshig ni 'di smras so// gang phyir skyon med sems kyis bskul bas na// brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gi ston pa mgon// ji ltar de ni mchod pa'i 'os
345b4(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ de la lan du phan pa bya mi nus// bdag ni/ 'jig rten mgon la bzod par gsol// chos kyi// rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis// de dag thams cad de ring se/ 
345b5(dkon brtsegs): sor bshags// bdag ni nongs pa 'jig rten mgon ma khyen mdzod// sems can don du snying rje bskyed nas su// bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te// byang chub dam
345b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma thob par du ni// slan chad bag med spyod par mi bgyi'o// rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnam spangs te// sems can bye ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor// byang chub dam pa 'di ni
345b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs tshol zhing // sngon byung rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu byung // rgyal ba de dag gis ni bsam mkhyen nas// byang chub lam mchog rab tu bstan pas na// chos thos se na rtag
345b8(dkon brtsegs): tu dag pa rnams// thams cad kyis kyang rjes mthun bzod pa thob// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i
346a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yong su brjod kyang ma nan gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de/ 
346a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis gyur na yang de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
346a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du
346a4(dkon brtsegs): ngogs shing the tshom pa'am yid gnyi su gyur na yang de ltar mi lta// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor
346a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar sngon byang chubasems dpa' rnams sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la/ mi skyo zhing / 'di ltar shin tu stobs dang ldan te brtson
346a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus nye bar ston te// rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongasu smin par byed 'dod pas ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab/ 
346a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can yongasasu smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no// rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
346a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdud kyi las las shin du 'das pa byang chub sems
346b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / lus dang ngag dang yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
346b2(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par bsgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thad
346b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sem dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ 
346b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang / dbang po yongasu shes pa'i ye shes dang / nad thams ca da zhi bar byed pa'i sman sbyin pa'i ye shes dang / nyon mongs
346b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs
346b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs
346b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang bas kyang rin du mi bzod pa'i gtsug
346b8(dkon brtsegs): gi nor bu rin po ched/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gtsug na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba
347a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das bdag gi spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba thob pa dang bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur/ 
347a2(dkon brtsegs): cig de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgra nas
347a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi
347a4(dkon brtsegs): khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'a/ dgas te/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang gzi brjid
347a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongasu zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan ngas la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas byang chu
347a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
347a7(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog/ 
347a8(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i sras dbang po zhi zhing srid gsum dri ma spangs// mtshungs modo mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba ri rab bzhin/ ci slad 'dir 'dzum ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung
347b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan gsol// gya gu mi mnga' rab tu mnyen la shin du snyan pa'i gsung // skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs// bde gshegs mos pa'i mchog dang ldan pa lha/ 
347b2(dkon brtsegs): dang mis mchod pa// ci slad 'dzum pa 'di mad na mas bstan du gsol// stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge lta bur rab grags
347b3(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba bcom// thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med// chos kyi dbang phyug ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol// rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dges/ 
347b4(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu dri med zhal// zla ba lta bur na mkhar gshegs nas phyogasu lam me bar// mun pa btsam zhing rdul te bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pas// bde bar gshegs
347b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzum mdzad pan par mdzad pas bka' stsol cig/ gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub pa bsod nam/ sa ye shes 'phro// mkhas pas rta ga tu rab bsngags
347b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ngo mtshar mchod pa'i 'os// srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing // na mkha'i ngos rab snang bar shakya seng ge 'dzum pa bstan// lha dang mis mchod khyod
347b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra sa dang lha yul dag na'ang me// yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu rgyal// yon+tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa// bde gshegs 'dzum
347b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig/ kun du khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum chags pa med par 'jug/ sems dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsam pa gang // sems
348a1(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen// mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs// na mkhar gnas pa'i lha mang yid kyang rab
348a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dga'// mi tshigs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis// gang thos lha mi mun pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba// mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dbye bar gsol/ 
348a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'
348a4(dkon brtsegs): gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bar gyur dab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba mthong ngam/ 
348a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang na/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che
