348a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas/ bsti stang du byas brdzun par byas/ ri mor byas shing mchod nas thams cad du yang 'tshangs par spyod pa spyad
348a7(dkon brtsegs): de sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la yongasu smin par byaso// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya steng nag 'a / 
348a8(dkon brtsegs): pa na gyi la 'a du pa bzhin gshegag pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo// 
348b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi rin po che sna bdun du
348b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'od gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// 'od de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ro// sems can
348b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'od des reg par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa byang chub sems dpa'
348b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur ro// der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung ba/ rar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming ni rin
348b5(dkon brtsegs): bo che 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag tha/ mas cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyu/ ra ro// de dag gi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyang
348b6(dkon brtsegs): bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// de na mi khom pa
348b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ma togs par rgyal po gzhan 'byung bar
348b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yang med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams
349a1(dkon brtsegs): / de nas sems can long ba 'am zhar ba 'am zha bo 'am sgur po 'am yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de dag thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan
349a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// 
349a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/ theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam
349a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste zur tsam gyis go ba/ ra 'gyur ro// de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs
349a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjesu rtogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 
349a6(dkon brtsegs): de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o// tshig gcig po de yang gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste tshig mi zad pa'o// tshig mi zad pa/ 
349a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang gang zhe na/ tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed mi nus pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste a zhes bya ba de ni mi zad pa ste/ 
349a8(dkon brtsegs): a zhes bya ba la zhugs na yig 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de ltar na yi gau thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ yig 'bru gnyis snga phyi med pa thos par bya mi nus so// 
349b1(dkon brtsegs): yig 'bru re re nas brjod kyis yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de bas na tshig gcig pa de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshig ste/ gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam pa
349b2(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed rnam yos mi byed de// de ltar tshig de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o// 
349b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba med de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa
349b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags pa brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs rab dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
349b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de sa ngasu brjod kyang yon+ta na yongasu brjod pa zad par mi'/ gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam pa bkod/ 
349b6(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ 
349b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bskyed do// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// chos
349b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs// 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams thams cad las// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'das// ye shes chen po khyod re 'tshar// sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la/ 
350a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang // de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi// bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du// 
350a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen// thub pa ci 'dra de 'dra bar// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan// bdag ni the tshom yong ma
350a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis sa rnams thams cad 'gags kyang gda'// nyi zla mkha' las ltung yang gda' // bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas// phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung // ye shes ldan la
350a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab che// des ni bdag la bden tshig gis// byang chudab mchog tu lung bstan pas// sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur// thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na// bdag
350a5(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang / sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra ba// de 'dra nyid du kun bstan to// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sa/ sung thos nas// the tshom ma mchis dbang po tshim// sem
350a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur// mchog gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi// bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba// sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa// de bas shin tu dpag yas par// bdag gi spyod
350a7(dkon brtsegs): pa spyad par bgyi// 'di ni le los mi 'da' bas// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i spyod pa 'di// zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis// byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi// bdag ni byang chub
350a8(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni sprob su la// ji srid 'dren par ma gyur pa// de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo // rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te// sems can thams cad gnyer
350b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ byang chub dam pa don du btsal// de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshig su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pam srog chags
350b2(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon te/ tshig 'di skad ces
350b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyo bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de thams cad
350b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bsten to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang lnga na pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi/ 
350b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di zung shig chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag/ par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
350b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam klog pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
350b7(dkon brtsegs): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bo zhes ces sbyin pa byin pa bas// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi/ 
350b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te 'chang ngam klog gam de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste// tshad med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o// de nas
351a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na chos kyi rnam grang
351a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar bzang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
351a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang breng shig/ gtsug na rin po chas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shog/ bcom ldan 'das
351a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang
351a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yir/ sa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
351a6(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus
351a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban+de d+harma shI las zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / shu lo ka dgu
351a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya sa/ bam po gsum me// @#// rgya ger ska du/ Ar+ya shI mA la de bi sing hA nad/ nA mA ma hA yAn su tra/ bo sad du/ 'jigs pa
351b1(dkon brtsegs): mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos
351b2(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
351b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / btsun mo dam pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas lha mo dpal phreng chos rtogs nas ring po ma lon po'i bar skabasu gtam glengs pa/ rgyal po chen po kye ma khyod kyi sras mo lha mo dpal
351b4(dkon brtsegs): phreng ni mdzangs shing gsal la zab cing mkhas te ga dal te des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na tshegs chud dngus chos rtogs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yA
351b5(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas yul koHla'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so// phreng ldan ma'u bu cag gis lha
351b6(dkon brtsegs): mo dpal phreng la pho nya nus pa shig btang gor ma chagaso// de skad ces smras pa dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal po
351b7(dkon brtsegs): gsal rgyal dang btsun mo phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon+dan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te/ nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag tu phrin yig
351b8(dkon brtsegs): bskur nas de mthar gyis song ste grong khyer 'thab med du phyin nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/ lha mo dpal phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te/ lha mo
352a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal phreng gi lag tu 'phrin yig byin no// de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis phra ma la gus pas 'phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo bo la gtugs te da/ 
352a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'phrin yig bklags nas/ phrin yig gi don bzang po zhes nges par gzung ste don nges par bzung nas/ mgo bo lcogs te ya mtshan du gzung nas lha mo dpal phreng gi nang kor ma
352a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba lta bu la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras// sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni// 'jig rten dag na shin tu dkon// gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na// bdag gis khyod la bgo ba
352a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin/ gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de// 'jig rten don du byung gyur na// de ni bdag la thugs rje yis// bstan pa'i ched du 'di spyon cig/ de nas de'i skad cig la// 
352a5(dkon brtsegs): mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku// 'od zer 'gyed cing / bzhugs pa mthong // de nas de'i tshe lha me ni// gus pra
352a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bcas langs nas kyang // spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang // dpal dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis/ 
352a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i// 'gro mgon khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang // ye shes la yang bas ma mchis// khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas// des
352a8(dkon brtsegs): thub khyod skyabs kyang lags// bsam yas rtsa ldan khyod kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams gsal// nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'am/ 
352b1(dkon brtsegs): lo shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi// mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// gzhal las khyod la bya
352b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshalo// dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam yas chos khyod phyag 'tshalo// mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshalo// bdag nid ltar mgon pos skyabs// byang chub sa bon rnam par
352b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ slan chad srid pa gzhan dag tu// thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngon tshe rnamasu lha mo khyod// ngas ni byang chub sbyor bar byas// 
352b4(dkon brtsegs): phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu// ngas ni rjes su bzung bar bya// lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa// bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu// bsod nams gang dang gang
352b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa// bsod nams de yis mgon po khyod// rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog/ de nas lha mo dpal phreng dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
352b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha
352b7(dkon brtsegs): mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon+tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis// lha mo khyod bskal pa mad grangs
352b8(dkon brtsegs): med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te tshe rabs thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing // nga la mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pa
353a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nga phyin chad bskal pa brgya stong grangs
353a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyi shu na/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
353a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te// sems can de dag la nad kyang med rga ba yang med/ yid du mi
353a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med de mi dge ba'i las kyi lam/ mas kyi ming yang mi grags par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag byung ba de dag gis ni
353a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dpal dang / gzi brji da dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / 
353a6(dkon brtsegs): long spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de
353a7(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro// lha mo de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du
353a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyuraro// de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung bstan po phun sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab po// de dag zad/ 
353b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas thal mo
353b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te/ yid dam chen po bcu yang dag par blangaso// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das nga slan chad bdag gi tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi/ 
353b3(dkon brtsegs): sto/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par bla // bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bla ma dag las gus pa'i
353b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yod dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi dbar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan
353b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das da slan chad bdag gis gang du'ang sems can la khri kha dang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam gsum pa 'di yang byed
353b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phrag
353b7(dkon brtsegs): dog gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par bla // bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag
353b8(dkon brtsegs): gis tha na kham slad ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // 
354a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyad pa'i slad du nor yongasu bzung bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can dbul po sdug
354a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongasu bzung bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag
354a3(dkon brtsegs): gis yang dag 'abla // bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa na bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can bsdu bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom
354a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang chog pa ni 'dzin pa/ dang ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das yid dam bdun pa 'di yang byang chub
354a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang / ngo // bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis sems/ can mgon ma mchis pa dang / go rar stsal pa dang / bcings
354a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nad kyis nyams thag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po dang / phongs par gyur pa dang / tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba dag me thong na de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor
354a7(dkon brtsegs): bas bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa de dag mthong na sdug bsngal de dag las yongasu thar par bgyis la/ nor gyi bsdu bas bsgrubs nas
354a8(dkon brtsegs): slad kyis bdag mchi bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam brgyad pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de slan chad
354b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phag tshod dang bya la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i tshul can dag mthong na/ yal bar mi dor gyi/ 
354b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das grong ngam grong khyer dang grong brdal dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i phro brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gi mchid nyan pa'i de dang de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnams
354b3(dkon brtsegs): ni tshar dgum/ sman gdags pa'i rigs pa rnams ni sman gdags par 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshar dgum pa dang / sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos
354b4(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi lus rnam par 'a/ phel bar 'gyur zhing ngan song rnams yongasu 'grib par
354b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rma sa kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjesu bskor bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid dam dgu pa 'di yang
354b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das nga slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongasu bzungs pa las bskyed par bgyi ba'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed
354b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud na theg pa chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po bskyed na pha rol tu phyin
354b8(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyud par 'gyura'o// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed na theg pa chen po la mi 'dun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa chen po
355a1(dkon brtsegs): lam nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i ser mchi ba'i skal
355a2(dkon brtsegs): pa can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang gnod pa chen por mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa las ni bdag dang ma 'ongs
355a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don yongasu grub par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i yid dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i
355a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang // bcom lnga ngan 'das bdag gis yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni bco ma ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi
355a5(dkon brtsegs): rje nyid bdag gi dbang du gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur du lags kyang sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la la dag kye ma yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag
355a6(dkon brtsegs): ni lcogs par dka'o snyam du bdag la the tshom za'am yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan
355a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag nyid la phan gdags pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid dam chen po bcu po gang dag
355a8(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa'i yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag la bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ji skad smras pa bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ba lta na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyi
355b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig/ des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di len par gyur cig/ lha mo dpal phreng gis tshigs de skad
355b2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras ma thag tu// de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas bar snang la lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs te/ mnos nas lha mo de de bzhin no// ji ltar
355b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong lha'i sgra mnos pa de yang thos nas
355b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tshom med cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dpal phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon lam btab po// 'khor de tha
355b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis lung bstan to// de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi sa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam chen po gsum
355b6(dkon brtsegs): btab bo// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag la sman btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams
355b7(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam dang po lags
355b8(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob nas kyang ngal ba dang yongasu skyo ba ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ bcom ldan
356a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gnyis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'dag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba
356a2(dkon brtsegs): dang dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung bar 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag
356a3(dkon brtsegs): 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gi smon lam chen po yul che ba gsum po 'di dag lung bston pa mdzad de/ lha mo 'di lta ste dper na gzugasu gtogs pa thams
356a4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni nam mkha'i khams kyi khongasu 'das shing khongasu gtog sa la khongasu chud do// lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sem das dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang smon lam
356a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di gsum gyi nang du 'dus shing khongasu gtogs la khongasu chud de smon lam chen po gsum po de dag na de ltar yul che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal
356a6(dkon brtsegs): phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spob so// bcom ldan 'das
356a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
356a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i smon la chen po gcig gi khongasu
356b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus shing khongasu chud de/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul che ba lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la leg so zhes bya ba byin te leg so legs// 
356b2(dkon brtsegs): lha mo khyod ni shes rab zab ste thabs kyis yongasu bsgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no// lha mo sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te// yun ring
356b3(dkon brtsegs): po nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no// lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
356b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad de 'chad de 'chad par 'gyuraro// lha mong yang da ltar mngon par rdzog
356b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas dam pa'i chos yongasu gzungs pa bstan pa rnam pa du mar ston te/ lha mo/ da ltar dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa
356b6(dkon brtsegs): du mar bshad kyang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon+dan rnams kyi mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la yang mtha' 'am mu thug pa med do// 
356b7(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar phan yon che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis
356b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
357a1(dkon brtsegs): su mo de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces
357a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba la gso// bcom
357a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe sprin chen po ni kha dog mtha' stsa
357a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyun dang / rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i
357a5(dkon brtsegs): chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / ye shes rin po che rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper na 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe chab
357a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing
357a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi gling phran bye ba brgya phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa theg pa chen po la yang
357a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par grub pa'i 'byung khungs dang / skye gan su gyur pa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig te/ 
357b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams cad dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba lnga dang mi rnams kyi sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams
357b2(dkon brtsegs): cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni khur chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/ bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chab kyi phung po chen po rgya mtsho
357b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ri mang po thams cad dang / gnas pa dang rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang lo tog dang nags tshal thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshegs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/ 
357b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po khur chen po bzhi po 'di dag gi rten bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos
357b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'dzin pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po ban khyer ba lagaso// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i
357b6(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dang bral zhing thos pa dang mi ldan la/ chos can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la sbyor ba ni sa chen
357b7(dkon brtsegs): po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lagaso// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen
357b8(dkon brtsegs): po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba
358a1(dkon brtsegs): lag so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen po la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/ 
358a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te/ 
358a3(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po bas kyang ches rten du gyur pa dang / sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba dang / khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du
358a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / byams pa bgyis pa dang / sI dang rje can dang / sman par 'tshal ba dang / snying ba/ ra ba dang / chos kyi 'jig rten gyi ma zhes bgyi ba lagaso// 
358a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni rin po che sna bzhi 'i 'byung gnas lags te/ sna bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas
358a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas kyang chung ba dag gis 'byung gnas lags te/ 
358a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gan su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la
358a8(dkon brtsegs): brten nas sems can rnams kyi rin po che'i mchog chen po rin po che thams cad kyi mchog dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyuraro// gzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi
358b1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi khe rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg
358b2(dkon brtsegs): par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang
358b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ches mthon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
358b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyis rin po che thams cad kyi mtsho dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i khe rnyed
358b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas shes bgyi ba de ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgas lagaso// 
358b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la dam pa'i chos yongs
358b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos lag so// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan
358b8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lag so// bcom ldan
359a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni sems can gang sbyin pas yongasu smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongasu
359a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongasu gtong bas kyang yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas
359a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams
359a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongasu dag pas yo rang su smin par bgyi de/ tha na spyod lam gyis kyang de/ dag gi sems bsrung shing yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de dag de lta
359a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas/ par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzod
359a6(dkon brtsegs): pas yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni de dag gis de la spyos brgyad de gtses pa bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang / bzod pa'i
359a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongasu smin par bgyis
359a8(dkon brtsegs): pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i
359b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma mchis pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgrim
359b2(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
359b3(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang / 
359b4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yod/ su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bgyis nas yun ring du lags/ smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyed pas kyang
359b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid dede dag de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha
359b6(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la le lo ma mchis par
359b7(dkon brtsegs): lung ston pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas longasu smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzo gra'i gnas chen po dag tu
359b8(dkon brtsegs): yang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongasu smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongasu smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360a1(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te
360a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag
360a3(dkon brtsegs): gis spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gi
360a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa po/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'jinu ba po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos

360a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa des ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongasu gtong bar
360a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lus yongasu gtong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor
360a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang bral ba/ mi shigs pa rtag pa bstan pa zhi ba ther zug pa/ 'chi 'bo dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa yon+dan bsam gyis mi
360b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo srog yongasu gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul par gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha la
360b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa 'chi bo dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ rtag pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
360b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongasu gtong bas na sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma
360b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ bas par mi 'gyur ba rnam par rtog pa ma/ mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu gan das pa yon+ta na bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur
360b5(dkon brtsegs): ro bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yan lag gsu mo 'di dag yongasu gtong bas ni yon+tan shin tu rmad du byung ba
360b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung bston par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par
360b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma rnams bya zhing gnyisu gyur la sde sder chad de phyogs phyogasu gyes nas rtsod par gyur pa na/ g.yo
360b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shing gya gyu ma mchis la sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i chos yongasu gzungs pa'i slad du ches can gyi phyogs la 'jug par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 
361a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la su lung bstan pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs
361a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa ni de ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags pa snyam bdag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te ye shesu gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos
361a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis dam pa'i
361a4(dkon brtsegs): chos yongasu 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjesu yi rang ba mdzad do// lha mo de de bzhin te/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu dzin pa ni brtson 'grus chen po yi no// lha mo dper na mi stos
361a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas gnang du mi grags par bsnun du zin kyang snang par 'gyur zhing nad skyed par byed do// lha mo de bani na du dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni chung ngu zin kyang bdud
361a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan bskyed la smre sngags 'don par byed// lha mo ngas ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan
361a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed la smre sngags 'don par byed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar mya ngan bskyed pa dang / de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo // 
361a8(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dper na ba gleng gi khyu mchog gos ni 'di ltar 'phang mtho ba dang chu zheng gis pa glang gi tshog so thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mngon par brjid cing yang dag par mngon par brjod// lAm
361b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa yang chung ngu zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por rgyas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams
361b2(dkon brtsegs): cad zil gyis gnon to// lha mo dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang / rgya che bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon par lhag ger 'dug go// lha mod
361b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mo lta zhing phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas theg pa chen po
361b4(dkon brtsegs): ba theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyidage ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon na gzhan dag/ dgis lta ci smos te/ lha mo de bas na sems can
361b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba nyid yang dag par 'a dzin du gzhugs par bya/ yang dag par bsten pa bya/ yang dag pa gzengs bstod par bya/ 
361b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/ bzud par bya dgod par bya'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni don che'o// de ltar 'bras bu che'o// de ltar phan yon che'o// lha mo gal te bas
361b7(dkon brtsegs): pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon+dan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon+tan dang phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mthu
361b8(dkon brtsegs): ram mu thug par mi 'gyur ro// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon+tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad
362a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bzhed pangs ma bstan par khyod kyis bshad par spobs par gyis shig/ de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol nas bcom lnga 'das
362a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskul ba mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos shes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
362a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad
362a4(dkon brtsegs): du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na klung chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad
362a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang / 
362a6(dkon brtsegs): ci lags pa dag dang / rtsa dang shing dgyel pa dang sman dang nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten cing sa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
362a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa thams cad dang // de dag
362a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na theg pa chen po la brten cing theg pa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing theg
362b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po yong su gzung na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang brten cing gnas
362b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / 
362b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gnas drug po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing btags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags// de ci'i
362b4(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa che'i dgengs dpa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la
362b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos gnas pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhe sa bgyi ba'i btags pa de ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can
362b6(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig
362b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ yig 'bru ni tha dad lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi bslab pa lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
362b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di ltar dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang rab tu byung ba dang
363a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
363a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi/ bcom
363a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra
363a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la skyabasu mchi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs
363a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lagaso// / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra/ bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'du byed thams
363a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la mi zad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lagaso pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na bshed mos ral gri gzas pa bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de lto lags
363a7(dkon brtsegs): pas de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabasu gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
363a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sems can skyabs ma mchis pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs bsgrag pa'i de dang de las 'byung ba tshol ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la
363b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jigs pa de ma mchis te/ 'jigs pa des bsgrag pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu mchi bar khas len pa lag so// bco
363b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas
363b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye ba bra pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i lhag
363b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa lags te/ des na de dag ni dag pa ma la dgas/ las mthar phyin pa mo lags te/ de da ngag gi bgyi ba mang lagaso// de dag gi spang bar bgyi ba'i chos
363b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mang du mchis te/ de dag ma spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lagaso// bco
363b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
363b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa rnyed pas yon+dan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang
363b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyang yon+tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tha
364a1(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bsnyes pas/ 
364a2(dkon brtsegs): yon+tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon+dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags
364a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
364a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa rnyed pas spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shing mchog tu yongasu dag pa
364a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa/ rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag/ ma rnams dang / bcas pa yongasu ma dag pa'i chos can
364a6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i sla du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan la se 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
364a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa
364a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la so
364b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i ye shes mtha' dbugs phyin pa rjesu dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang // bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang lhag ma dang bcas pa dang drang ba'i don dang rnam par phye ste lung
364b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bgyi ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang yongasu bsngos pa bas// 
364b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ni nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lag so// bcom ldan 'das
364b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni dgra/ bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa
364b5(dkon brtsegs): dang yid kyi lus rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi sa nga po la thug gi bar du lag so// bcom ldan 'das de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ba'i
364b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye bzad snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lagaso// bcom ldan 'das da ltar lhag ma dang bcas
364b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa brten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lagaso// 
364b8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo dang lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba sngon ma bgyi/ 
365a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de spangs pa la brten nas bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'dis/ 
365a2(dkon brtsegs): bu nyid las gzhan mi sheso zhes bgyi ba ni dgra bcom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang srid par nyin mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas/ 'di lta bu nyid las
365a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mi shes so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan du mi sheso snyam pa'i shes pa
365a4(dkon brtsegs): de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ma lags skye ba thams cad yongasu 'tshal ba las byung ba da ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
365a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa dang / skye ba'i nyon me/ nges pa rnams yongasu ma 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i
365a6(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag gi rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnamaso// bcom ldan
365a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das gnas kyis yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lha gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa
365a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa te/ bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag gis nyon
365b1(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad bskyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang skad cig pa ste// sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs pa ldan pa lagaso// bcom ldan
365b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags
365b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa/ ma rigs pa'i gnas kyis stobs che ba'i grangs sam cha'am bgrang ba 'am dpe 'am rgyur yang mi bzod lags so// 
365b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rigs pa'i gnas kyi das ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes kyang bgyi'o// bcom
365b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dang dbyed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang 'di ltar gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / 
365b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang / dbang phyug gis gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gyis gnon to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyis srid pa'i dod chags la gnas pa'i
365b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa zhes bgyi bas kyang gnas kyis bzhi po 'di dag zil gyis gnon te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed kyi rten du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi dang yang
365b8(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pas mi brdzi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags te/ 
366a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni stobs che ba lagaso// bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na len pa'i rkyen gyis
366a2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i srid pa gsum 'byung ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rkyen gyis zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgra bco
366a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang thob pa rnams kyi yid kyi lus gsum 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma rigs pa'i gnas kyis ni sa
366a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum po 'di dag tu yid kyi lus gsum po 'di dag 'byung ba dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i las mngon par dbasgrub pa'i rten lagaso// bcom ldan 'das rkyen mchis
366a5(dkon brtsegs): na rkyen 'byung ste/ de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i ga nas kyis ni yid kyi lus gsum po rnams dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i wa kyi rkyen lags pa'i slad du srid pa'i 'dod
366a6(dkon brtsegs): chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang ming 'dra ba lagaso// de ltar lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang lus mthun mongs pa ni ma lags te/ bcom
366a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/ yongasu grol ba'i sa dang sangs rgyas kyi sas spang bar bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
366a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni gnas kyi sa bzhi spangs kyang / 
366b1(dkon brtsegs): zag ba zang pa la dbang ba'i stobs kyang mi thob mngon sum du yang mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das zag pa zad pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// 
366b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / srid pa tha mar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyisas
366b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs shing chod la yongasu dkris te ldongs par bgyis pas/ chos de dang de dag rab tu ma 'tshal cing mi rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das chos der dag la ma 'tshal cing ma mthong bas
366b4(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag mi spong shing byang bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i tshe/ da sa de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pas bcom ldan
366b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bca sa pa lags kyi skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rnam par
366b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon+tan dang ldan pa
366b7(dkon brtsegs): lags kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi skyon thams cad las rnam par
366b8(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ni ma lags pa dang / rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon+tan
367a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa lags kyi yonan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yong su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lag so// kun du/ 
367a2(dkon brtsegs): ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag mad bcas pa lag so// sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag ma
367a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal yongasu 'tshal ba lhag mang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal
367a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa dalhag ma dang bcas pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de'i yan
367a5(dkon brtsegs): lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu zhugs pa zhes
367a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum
367a7(dkon brtsegs): du bgyis pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas bcom zhing rtag tu na ba'i 'jig rten du rtag pa dang
367a8(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang / bsil ba'i dngos po'i mya ngan 'das pa thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni skyob pa ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang skyabs
367b1(dkon brtsegs): lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa dag gis mya/ 
367b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa thob pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam bdag
367b3(dkon brtsegs): gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni ro gcig ste/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ror ro
367b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang la la de dag ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ma spangs shing byong par ma bgyis pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i
367b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyingasu ro gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs pa ma lags so// de ci 'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis
367b6(dkon brtsegs): mo spangs shing ma sbyangs pa ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das spangs par bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i
367b7(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma las 'odas pa snyed de dag ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma thob cing / mngon sum du ma bgyis par gyur pa'i slad du'o// bcom
367b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de lta lags pas ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni bsgom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas lags te/ 
368a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de las ni sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / zhi gan gyisa'i nyon mongs pa dang / lhag mthong gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang // bsam gtan gyi
368a2(dkon brtsegs): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes pa'i nye ba'i
368a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / stobs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang
368a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung lagaso// bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongasapa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed da ba zhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi
368a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa las 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa/ 'i gnas kyi sa ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thaMd
368a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu dang gzhi dang rkyen lags so// bcom ldan 'das kun nas ldang ba gang lags pa de dag ni skad cig pa ste sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das
368a7(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang
368a8(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom zhing spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyi gzhi dang rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa gzhi lag so// bcom ldan
368b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nags 'tshal de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das sa la brten cing sa la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel
368b2(dkon brtsegs): la rgyas par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das sa chen po tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar gyur te ma mchis par gyur na ni/ sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang / rtsa dang shing gel
368b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang sman dang nags tshal de dag thams cad kyang tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i
368b4(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de da// / ga thams cad kyang / ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la brten cing ma
368b5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas/ par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das ma'i ga pa'iris kyis spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par gyur na ni spang hA
368b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi snying shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par 'gyur/ 
368b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mong pa de dag thaMd spa shing sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed brnyas pas de
368b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa bsnyes te/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams
369a1(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba'i sar gshegs nas/ 
369a2(dkon brtsegs): ngar skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyad pa bsten to// bya ba byas so// 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de lta lag/ 
369a3(dkon brtsegs): pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di ni nges po'i don lags te/ don 'di ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba yang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid
369a4(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la 'jug rnam pa gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga/ gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na ma
369a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i bdud bzhi bcom ste pham par mdzad nas che sa kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phag/ sa pa sems can thams cad kyis lta bar bgyi ba bsaM
369a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/ shes pa'i sa thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na 'di las lhag par bya ba'am rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang
369a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu po dag gi stobs dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshegs te/ shes bya thams cad la sgrib pa mi mang
369a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa
369b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las rgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba dag gis bde ba nyamasu myongs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams
369b2(dkon brtsegs): las yongasu grol gyis bdag gis ni phyin chad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du yang dag par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'di
369b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi bar rtogs nas dbugs phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la so sor rtogs go/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rtogs nas kyang sa de
369b4(dkon brtsegs): la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya dag gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag
369b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa gyur/ ra to snyam du 'tshalo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams
369b6(dkon brtsegs): ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dag so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na theg pa gsum
369b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangs su 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
369b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dag so// bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings shes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin
370a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i chog bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
370a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags kyi// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha/ 
370a3(dkon brtsegs): ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' lag so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gis mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dgas lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
370a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
370a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i/ mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa'i slad du'o// brtso ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten
370a6(dkon brtsegs): la sman pa'i slad du dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba ma lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par
370a7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi mtha' med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba
370a8(dkon brtsegs): lagaso kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos mi zad pa dang / chos rtags pa dang chos brtan pa dang / skyabs kyi sen a la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par
370b1(dkon brtsegs): smra bas smra ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skyabs ma mchis pa dang / skyob pa ma
370b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar thug par skyabs mi zad pa dang / skyabs rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das chos shes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam bstan
370b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig bla dgas lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan lag gi
370b4(dkon brtsegs): skyabs zhes bgyi ste/ skyabs kyi rab ma lag so// de nga'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha'
370b5(dkon brtsegs): legs te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i pha rol na theg pa gci ga gi lom bstan pa'i chos kyis ni bgyi ba ci yang ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs
370b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu 'chi ba dang / 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba dang / slob pa dang / bgyid pa dang / bcas pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
370b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na skyabasu 'di gnyis ni skyabs kyi la lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lag so// bcom ldan 'das
370b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas brtul bdes zhide bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu mchi ba ni/ chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang
371a1(dkon brtsegs): skyab su mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas skyab su mchi ba ni gnyis la skyabasu mchi bar bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
371a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la skyab su mche ba ni chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas mchi bar bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyab su mchi ba ni srub su mchi ba yang / 
371a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das skyabasu mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu mchi zhes bgyi ba'i mtha' lags par khong du chud par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad
371a4(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gan na ma lags/ skyabs nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum
371a5(dkon brtsegs): lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs
371a6(dkon brtsegs): pa seng ge'i sgra so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das mos pa ji lta ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis po thabs kyi bsgrub
371a7(dkon brtsegs): pas bsgrubs pa de dag kyang / theg pa chen po bdag nyid kyi slad du lagaso// bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di gnyis kyi ming ni ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par na 'di la theg
371a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig po ni theg pa yang dag pa lags te/ theg pa gsum yang yang dag par 'du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa thog mar
371b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig pus ni gnas kyis de snyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes pa de gcig pus yongasu 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i yonan bzhi po rnams mngon
371b2(dkon brtsegs): sum du bgyid par 'gyur zhing don bzhi po bdag nyid chos nyid kyis shin tu so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa la shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang / 
371b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa bzhi 'pho ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa shes pa rdo rje lta bu ni mi 'phro ba'i chos can lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs
371b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyis spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bde na pa shes pa dang po ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa shes
371b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa gnyis kyis gnas kyi spong ba ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni nyan thos
371b6(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi nyon mongs pa tha~Md kyi sbubs spong lag so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa'i
371b7(dkon brtsegs): sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i mthor phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa 'tshal ba dang po ni mthar phyin
371b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa ma lags te/ bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'i shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i don de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
372a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon na tshad mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lags
372a2(dkon brtsegs): gi yon+tan dang ldan pa'i slad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bgyi ba de dag ni nyan thos dang rang
372a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma lags// nyan thos dang sasangs rgyas rnams kyi yon+dan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
372a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sa ngas rgyas shing mngon par mkhyen la so sor rtogs nas ma 'angon par mkhyen pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
372a5(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbub su bcug pa'i 'jig rten la bstan cing btags te/ de ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i
372a6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i don bshad pa ni zab cing phra la brtag par bya ba ma yin/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 
372a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das zab mo bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan
372a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lags te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
372b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di'i gnas lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas zab pas na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yang zab
372b2(dkon brtsegs): cing phral rtags pa ste/ rtogs par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la rtog ge'i spyod yul ba ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun
372b3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nyon mongs pa thams cad sbubs kyi mthas dkris pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tshom ma mchis pa de ni nyon mongs pa tha~Md kyi sbub
372b4(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la yang the tshom ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom da ldan 'das gang gi yid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pa
372b5(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / sa sa rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
372b6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dang de mos pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam gnyis ni rig pa
372b7(dkon brtsegs): dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis
372b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis bstan pa dang / 
373a1(dkon brtsegs): btags pa tshad ma mchis pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal kyang sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu 'tshal ba dang / 
373a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thad bsgom par mi nus
373a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'khor ba la yang 'dus ma byas pa mchis// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa mchis// bcom ldan
373a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma dmachis pa gang lags pa ni bcom ldan 'das de la da'abigos pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang btags pa dag
373a5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyis brtsal kyang zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu 'tshal ba dang / 
373a6(dkon brtsegs): zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par
373a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par nus pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa de dag ni
373a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden
373b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don bstan par bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags so// nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lag so// de ci'i
373b2(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rtogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu rtogs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de
373b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i don bshad par bgyi ba ma mchis pa dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa las/ 
373b4(dkon brtsegs): she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi das ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongasu mkhyen// 
373b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'du ba'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad ni spang sa/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi phung po thams cad 'gog pa'i
373b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa ni mngon sum du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chud son pa ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
373b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi sku thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ma bgyis pa ma skyes pa mi bas pa/ bas pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa brtan pa rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa nyon mongs pa thams cad
373b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbubs nas nges par grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/ grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog
374a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyir/
