374a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
374a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sngon ma mthong ma rtogs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni/ 
374a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas
374a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rnams kyis stong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sangs rgyas kyis chos tha dad du mi gnas shing grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi
374a6(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dag gi mi stong pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la nyan thos chen po dag
374a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug pa rabs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
374a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jug la gso// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'gogs
374b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad sngon ma mthong sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni thugasu chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'joms pa sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i
374b2(dkon brtsegs): lam thams cad kyang bsgom so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsum ni mi rtag pa lagaso// bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
374b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gtogs pa de ni mi rtag pa lag so// gang mi rtag pa
374b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni brdzun pa sla ba'i chos can lagaso// bcom ldan 'a/ dus gang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can de ni mi bden pa dang mi rtag rapa lags te/ skyabs ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags
374b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang / sdug bsnga la kun 'byung ba dang bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yang dag par na mi
374b6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang mi rtags pa lags te skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa te/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi
374b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lag so// gang rtag pa de ni mi slu ba'i chos can lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang mi slu ba'i chos can de ni bden pa dang rtag pa dang skyabs lag so// 
374b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni sa dag pa na dang pang skyabs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa
375a1(dkon brtsegs): / sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i spyod yul ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ dmus yang / 
375a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la lha mi nus pa dang / bu btsa' ba'i gnas na mchis pa'i byis pa dgung bdun lags pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lta mi nus pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i
375a3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa yang bris pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul yang ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das byis pa
375a4(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ma tha' gnyis la lta ba zhes ci log pa rnams kyi tshig bla dwags lag so// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs
375a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni shes pa dag pa/ 'i tshig bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'as mtha'/ gnyi su lta ba zhes bgyi ba de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po dag
375a6(dkon brtsegs): la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo'i rtog ge pa dag gi tshigs bla dgas lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di gnyis ni mthar lta ba zhes bgyi ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chad par
375a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'du byed rnams la mi rtag par lta na de ni de'i chad par lta ba ma lags te de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lagaso// bcom ldan
375a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal te mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag par lta na/ de ni de'i rtag par lta ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rtog ge bdag gi
375b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ni 'di lta bu lags te/ lus dang dbang po dang tsher ba dang sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jig par mthong nas srid pa'i mtsham sbyor ba la 'jug par mi bgyid cing ma 'tshal bas ldongs par
375b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa skad de chad par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rtog ge ba dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la yang 'jug par mi bgyid la/ rnam par/ 
375b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa skad de rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtog ge bdag gi lta ba ni de lta bu dag lags pa skad de/ de dag ni don de las thal ba'i lta ba dang / don/ 
375b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tha chad kyi lta ba dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa da'i lta bas chad par rlom sems bgyid pa dang / rtag/ dar rlom sems bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das son/ 
375b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga po dag la phyin ci log par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang // 
375b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
375b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sku ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtag par 'du shes
375b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gtsang mar 'du shes pa'i sems can de dag ni bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
376a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol
376a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gtsang ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin
376a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag par mthong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mthong ba lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes
376a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang / chos kyi skulal chos kyi mgo skal la spyod pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan dus shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
376a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ 'di lta/ ra shes pa dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsnga la 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa de'i spyod yul yang ma lag
376a6(dkon brtsegs): yul yang mang lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rton pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags pa lta mos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
376a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don de kho du chud par 'gyur zhing don de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rton pa
376a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bshad cing btags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das rton pa gcig pu 'di lta ste sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni/ 
376b1(dkon brtsegs): rton pa thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang skyabs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor ba na rton/ 
376b2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do// zhes bshad cing btag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
376b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i snying po mchis na 'khor ba zhes mchi na ni tshig de rigs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams 'phos ma thag tu zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams
376b4(dkon brtsegs): len pa la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi mi dang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig bla dgas lagaso// 
376b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba dang skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten tha snyad lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po 'gags pa 'di lag so// bcom ldan
376b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das skyes shes bgyi ba ni dbang po sar pa rnams 'byung ba 'di lags te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni skye ba 'am 'gram pa 'am 'pho ba'am 'byung ba yang ma mchiso// bcom
376b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lagaso// bcom 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang brtan pa dang ther zug pa
376b8(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing 'brel la sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gi gzhi dang rten dang gnas lag so// bcom
377a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel pa ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi gzhi
377a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rten dang gnas kyang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa lo 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang // 
377a3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom
377a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang / skad cig pa dang sdug bsngal rnams myong ba ma lag das pas// chos de dag ni sdug bsngal la skyob dang / mya ngan las
377a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon par mi rig so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis
377a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi skye ba dang mi 'gag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal myong ba ma lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang
377a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par 'os so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gang zag ma lags te// 
377a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jig tshogs la lta bar ltung ba dag dang phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems g.yeng ba rnam
377b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lag so// chos kyi sku'i snying po lag so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying
377b2(dkon brtsegs): po lagaso// rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i chos kyi snying po lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa blo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar
377b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam bdag bgyid do// de ni'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems ni skad cig pa ste nyon mongs pa
377b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ bcom ldan// 'das mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags
377b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sem sa la mi reg/ sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ji ltar sems mi reg
377b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang mchis la sems nye bar nyon mongs pa yang mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis
377b7(dkon brtsegs): yong su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te ye shes gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
377b8(dkon brtsegs): ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags// bcom ldan 'das ni rton pa lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis rtogs par dka' ba'i/ 
378a1(dkon brtsegs): don bshad pa gas na nas rjes la rang bar mdzad de// lha me de de bzhin no// lha mo de de bzhin te/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongasu dgu ba/ rtogs par dkarab dang / sems
378a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o// lham chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyed dpa byang chub sems dpa'i chos chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag yin// lha ma nyan thos rnams ni chos 'di
378a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gre bar zad de/ lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas/ chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i
378a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro// lha me chos dang mthunapar sdud par shes pa zhes bya ba ni lha mo dbang po'i rnam pa darig pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang / lus kyi
378a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa mas kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang / sems la dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang bde ba la
378a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par lta ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba ste/ lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan na lha med ltar
378a7(dkon brtsegs): dngang 'das pa'i 'og/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis
378a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa dang / sems kyi nye bar nyon mongs pa la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo de dag go nges pa'i de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ lha mo de ltar na 'di la
378b1(dkon brtsegs): chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro ba ni phan pa mang po yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
378b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di la sman pa mang ba'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod spobs par gyis
378b3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma smas
378b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyams par bdag nyid la bsrung ba dang / bsod namaHkyang mang du bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par gyur pa lag so// gsum gang zhe na
378b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos dang
378b6(dkon brtsegs): mthun par sdud pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas 'di bdag gis
378b7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes te/ don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtod par bgyid de sems rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lag so// 
378b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma smras ma nyams par bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang / theg
379a1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i
379a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu gzung nas go lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te ston par bgyid kun tu smra bar bgyid do// bco
379a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / sa bon rul pa lags te rgyal po'i thad du'ang mchil brlag par bgyi'o zhes
379a4(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul par gyur pa de / ga ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar bcad par bgyi ba lag so// de nas
379a5(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dpal phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la
379a6(dkon brtsegs): leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo khyod kyis dus dang skabs chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyis don bstan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar bca
379a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bshad pa logaso legaso// lha mo khyed ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di las ngo mtshar che ba med do// de nas
379a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas ta la bdun srid tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ zhabs
379b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas blta bas chog mi shes shing
379b2(dkon brtsegs): mig mi 'dzum pas blta bas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi sleb par gyur pa de tshe lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang
379b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i gzhin dang ldan pas/ gcig gis gcig gi 'dan dud bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags shing sangs rgyas
379b4(dkon brtsegs): rje su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyer 'thab med da du dong ngo // de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal po grags pa'i gshes gnyen theg pa chen po la nges
379b5(dkon brtsegs): par bcug go/ grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu/ mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa che/ na po la btsud do// rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis
379b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun len pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar grong kyims cad theg pa chen po la mngon par phyogs par bya
379b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol du byon te nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o ba la yang bka' stsal cing lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongaso// de nas lha'i
379b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya
380a1(dkon brtsegs): / byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rje cher yang dag par bstan te/ ko shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'du khyod kyis rung shig/ kau shi ga chos kyin
380a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di khyod kyis sum nu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la shod cig/ kun dga' ba khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di zung shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
380a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma dag la shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
380a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lade ji ltar gzung bar ba kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'dim yon tan
380a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/ ko ru shi ka nyan thos dang rangs sa rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo 'di'i don thams/ pad ma lus par shes pa'am blta ba'am nye bar brtag pa
380a6(dkon brtsegs): mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/ ko'u shi ka de de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no// ko'u shi ka de'i chos kyi rnam grangs
380a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i yon+dan gyi ming yongasu brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// lha'i dbang po bad+ma byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun
380a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka 'di ni de bzhin go
380b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mnan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ ko'u shi ka 'ad ni yid dam chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ sgrom lam thams cad drung
380b2(dkon brtsegs): ba smon lam chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba
380b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 
380b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sku bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ stong pa nyid kyi don gyi dgengs pa yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bden pa gcig bstan pa
380b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rtag pa dang brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa dang skyabs gcig tu/ gyur po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ phyin ci log
380b6(dkon brtsegs): gis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i sems la dgengs pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang
380b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ko'u shi ka 'di ni lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ko'u shi ka mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag
380b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni rgyu ba bcod pa dang / nges pa'i don dang ston pa gcig pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ke'u shi ka lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
381a1(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyod kyis lag tu gtad kyis 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig/ 
381a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la legaso zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhing kun chub par byas nas/ lha'i dbang po
381a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / gzhan yang gang der 'dus par gyur pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang te/ bcom ldan
381a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags dpa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gra dngas le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa lha mo dpal
381a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi brtsa brgyad pa rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan pa rje na mi \u0f89\u0fa4 dang / su ra tsA ba d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba zhang ces
381a6(dkon brtsegs): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// she log drug brgya'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bas pa ri prots+tsha nA ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 
381a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis
381a8(dkon brtsegs): zas pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+ge'i klung gi 'gram pa rgal bar bya ba ma yin pa// khu zug dang / ni tso dang / bung ba dang / ngang pa'i rgyal ba dang / bya'i tshogs dum sgra snyan pa 'byin
381b1(dkon brtsegs): shing klag sha dang / n+ya gro dang / tsan+dan dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / sa la ka'i yal kas skyabs pa/ rtag tu me tog dri zhim po'i sil ma bkram pa de na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams
381b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rdul zad pa/ chos las mi bzlogs pa/ bsam gtan dang / kha ton la gnas pa 'chag sa dang khri'i stong na 'dug pa/ 
381b3(dkon brtsegs): ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar so'i phyogs der mdzes par byed pa sha stag la kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa/ kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
381b4(dkon brtsegs): kun 'gro bar byed pa/ cha byad dul zhing brtan pa/ spyod lan/ rab tu zhi ba/ 'dod pa la 'dod pa dang / gnod sem/ das dang snyom pa dang gnyid dang le lo dang bral ba sha stag dang thaH
381b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbyin pa byin cig bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig/ tshul khrims kyi sgo
381b6(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdam shing dbang po sbas la yid zhi bar gnas par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'od srung chen po
381b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / shA ri'i bu dang / ba ku la dang / nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ yang dag par dga'
381b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar gyur pa'i gtam mdzad do// de'i tshe nub phyogs logs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba zhig tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo // mthong nas/ 
382a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na 'bar zhing snang ba zhugs kyi 'od zer lta bur gda' ba 'di lags de skad ces
382a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo 'di ni dri gnag ma'i bu drang srong 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa
382a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang ldan pa/ drang srong rnams kyi mchog drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ drang srong dka' thub drag po la gnas pa bsnyen par gnas pa brgyad stong gis dub pa/ lus kyi mdzes pa med
382a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga brgya tsam phyi bzhin du 'breng ba la drang srong dkar men gtso na nu dang / me lha dang / rnam par bde srung gi bu dang ri dgas mo'i bu dang / sgra byed kyi bu dang / pur buH
382a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / me'i bu dang / rnam par rko ba'i bu dang / bsnyen parang ka' dang / de dag la sogs pas yongs su bskor na sa rje su 'chag pa'o// de nas de'i bar skabasu rgyas pas
382a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba bsam gtan gyi dben pa la dgyes pa/ shing ljon pa stug po'i nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong
382a7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang rgyas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'o ma la ngo mtshar te 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log pa gsung ba zhes 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin// 
382a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa las na 'di gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcom ldan
382b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spangs te/ bud med rin po ches 'tsho ma la sogs pa bud med/ 
382b2(dkon brtsegs): drug stong yang spangs nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi nang du gshegs te bzhugs pa 'di ni kye ma'o 'di ni 'jig rten na ngo mtshar slad du byung ba'o snyam du semaso// de nas drang srong me sbyin gyi
382b3(dkon brtsegs): bus kyang rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogasu ba
382b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// / shing ljon dag gi khrod dug cing // btso ma'i gse dar ltar ser bar snang // gzugs ni shin tu 'bar ba ste/ 
382b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo kun gyi dga' ba bskyed// bai DUR+Ya ni dri med brag/ stug na/ nga ri rab rtse gcig 'phags// ston gyi nyi ma rab lhan ltar// dpal gzugs 'bar ba 'di su zhig/ de nas drang srong
382b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag thams cad dga' ste mig phye thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dzam+bus
382b7(dkon brtsegs): gling pa'i drang srong me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba ral po'i cod pan can rgas pa rab tu rkam pa/ zas mi za zhing bsnyen par gnas pa/ shing shun dang g.yang gzhi gyon pa/ thal bas byugs pa/ 
382b8(dkon brtsegs): thang dang brag khrod na gnas pa/ bkres bkres ltar 'dug pa/ rlung 'gam pa/ zla ba phyed bsnyen gnas byas pa/ yan lag skem pa/ gcer bu pa dang / shing shun gyon pa/ a gcom
383a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sen mo dang spu ring ba/ bung ba'i kha dog lta bu/ dka' thub can/ bzlas brjod dang / sbyin bsreg dang / bsrung ba dang / bkra shis pa byas pa/ sa dang blag/ 
383a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa/ rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ba/ tseg tsog por 'dug pa chu'i nang du 'jug pa / me 'dag 'bar ba/ bsreg me rab tu 'bar ba dang / nyi mas lus shin
383a3(dkon brtsegs): tu gdungs pa/ dka' thub drag pos yongasu bskor ba/ bab bab tu gnas pa/ rigs tsam gyis yongasu dga' ba/ bla na med pa'i ye shes dang bral ba de dag la ltos// dge slong dag drang / 
383a4(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po 'di dag ni 'khor ba las byung ba mi shes pa dag/ dang ste/ 'di dag ni 'dod pa rgyags pas myos pa/ yang srid par skye ba yongasu 'dzin pa/ lta ba'i rgyu ba yongasu dag
383a5(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag go/ de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das/ la sems thag pa nas skyabasu dong nas 'di skad ce sa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni tshangs par
383a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshogs bsgrub pa ste/ de'i slad du bdag cag srid par skye ba mi 'dzin to// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas drang srong chen po de dag gi sems dang mi 'jigs pa dman zhing lta ba dman pa
383a7(dkon brtsegs): khad kyis khad kyis brtags nas gus pa skyes te/ zhe sa dang bcas par drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas ral pa mang po brjes te mchod phyir thog thogs pa/ sngo sangs po mig
383a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ser ba/ skra rtsub cing drug pa/ lag pa na dbyug gu gsum thogs pa/ gzugs rab tu mi sdug pa dang ldan pa/ na mkha'i ngos la 'gro ba/ gtam sna tshogs kyi gtam tshigs dang / 
383b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ga ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor 'di ni kun nas rmongs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas lag na bdag 'dir mchis par brtsa/ 
383b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po srid par skye ba thams cad kyang ngas shes te dngos po de yang rig// de nas tshe dang / 
383b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ gsal ba zur phyin pa zhi ba mkhas pa/ blo dang
383b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang ral bar bu'i cod pan can 'di su lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang/ kun dga' bo 'di ni drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ 
383b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs byed rnams byed pa/ nus pa can bu'i bstan bcos kyi 'tshe ba yi ge sna tshogs sdud pa'o// de nas dgra dum pa de dag thams cad kyis rgyas pa mthong nas bcom
383b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ma grol ba lags na/ dka' thub drag pos yongasu nyon mongs pa rnyed pa 'dis
383b7(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig thob/ dgra bcom pa de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la gtam gang bdag med pa'i gtama'am sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / rab tu
383b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i gtam 'am/ ci'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis gtam zhig zhu snyam mo// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba
384a1(dkon brtsegs): dang dang ltar drang srong chen po tshogs pa 'di ni shin tu rnyed pa dka' ba lag so// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dag la skabs phyen
384a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
384a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang dris pa de/ de lta de ltar lung bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
384a4(dkon brtsegs): la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi/ sbyin pa sngags pa'i don gang lags/ sbyin pa zheso gyi don ga sa/ sbyin bdag ji ltar
384a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'tshal bar bgyi/ ji ltar na gtong ba por 'gyur// ji ltar na sbyin bdag lags la gtong pa po ma la gas/ ji ltar sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i mthar 'gro ba zhes
384a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ spangs par gnas pa 'am/ brtsegs par gnas pa 'am ji ltar lta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na sbyin bdag len pa la mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin pa lags/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin
384a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji ltar lta bar bgyi// ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa lags/ bsod nams de'i rnam par smin par ji ltar lta bar bgyi/ bcom/ 
384a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das khyod yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas yongasu 'dzin par gyur ba gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang
384b1(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i gtam khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rtsing ngo // de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu smin ma ring ba gnyer ma can mgo skya bos lag pa g.yas pas smin ma
384b2(dkon brtsegs): gzar nas/ mig lpags bteg ste bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po rgyas pa 'di'i 'jig rten na grags pa yin na gtan tshigs kyi tshig pa mi shes pa'i byis pa rog
384b3(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa lta bur mkhas pa'i blo med de rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam spangs shing / bdag med pa'i gtam bor la lha yul pa'i rgyu'i gtam btang ste ci'i phyir sbyin pa'i gtam nyid zhus par gyur/ de
384b4(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zha dbas gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
384b5(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po 'di la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i sbyin pa'i bka' mchid bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
384b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi tshul ma yin te/ mi dgos kyis kun dga' bo de skad ma zer cig 'di ni gnas ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// / 
384b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis drang srong chen po rgyas pa ci dang ci 'tshal ba dris pa'i lan gdab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyang 'di skad
384b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshal bar ma zer/ nga'i mdun na nyan thos kyis the tshom bcad pa 'di ni mi rigs te nga la sems can gyi sems ma rangs par 'gyur ro// sems ma rengs nas 'di skad du gang gi
385a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgyas pas dris na/ nyan thos 'chang du bcug pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin du nges so// yang na ni sangs rgyas la
385a2(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa yod do// zhes zer bar 'gyur te sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
385a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po rgyas pa'i the tshom bsal ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang
385a4(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / sbyin pa'i bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang / sbyin pa zhes bya dpa'i don gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa bdag gis yongasu
385a5(dkon brtsegs): spyad na ji ltar sbyin pa sbyong ba dang / de dag la sbyin na bsod na mas kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar rab tu 'phel ba de nyon cig/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ba dang / sbyin pa zhes
385a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i don gang yin zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong chen po 'di la gtong ba pos sbyin pa'i dngos po yongasu btang ste dad pa bskyed nas gzhan byed du gtsug ste/ yul gzhan du song nas byed
385a7(dkon brtsegs): du bcug pa des kyang nor rnams rnam par gtong bar byed na/ nor gang gi yin pa de ni sbyin bdag yin no// byed du bcug pas sbyin pa ni gtong pa po yin gyi sbyin bdag ma yin no// 
385a8(dkon brtsegs): gang rang gi dngos po bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa de ni gtong pa po yang yin la sbyin bdag kyang yin no// drang srong chen po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sbyin pa yongasu ma dag par lta'o// rnam
385b1(dkon brtsegs): ba sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste drang srong chen po 'di la gtong ba po phyin ci log tu lta bar gyur cing ma dad pa dang ma dad pa mang la des sbyin pa byin na de'i sbyin pa de yongasu ma dag pa yin no// 
385b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po gzhan yang phan btags pa'i lam du phan 'dogs par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin na de yongasu ma dag pa yin no// des sman pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir gang 'di lta bu'i sems
385b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis me la sbyin pa sbyin no zhes 'am/ chu la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe'am/ des bdag yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa de yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang mi 'jigs pa
385b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir chom pa la sogs pa la sbyin pa byin te thun mongs ma yi na pa lnga byin na yeng sum dag pa yin no// dug sbyin pa/ dang / mtshon cha sbyin pa dang / srog chags bsad de sha
385b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / bag med pa rnams la chang sbyin pa dang / 'di dag ni bdag gir 'gyur te bdag gi rim gro dang mchod para'agyuraro snyam nas sems can bsdu ba dang / 'thob pa'i phyir
385b6(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba sbyin pa dang / gang brjod pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / gang gar dang glu dang gzhad gang dang rtsed mo dang // gtam dang dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan rnams
385b7(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin pa sbyin na/ sbyin pa des yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang zag gi mtshan ma'i phyir skar mkhan la sbyin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gang bzhan gyi nor mdza' bo la sbyin pa dang / gang gi
385b8(dkon brtsegs): khyi mo 'am zhing la gzhan gyi 'bru'i phung po 'am/ nas dang gre'i phung po la ri dgas dang bya za ba de de la dga' ba dang / mgu ba bskyed nas de yang sbyin pa yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang
386a1(dkon brtsegs): bzo'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / gang yang lus mi bde bas 'jigs pa'i phyir sman pa la sbyin pa dang / gang yang spong ba rnams la spros brgyad de tshig pa
386a2(dkon brtsegs): za bar byas nas sbyin pa byin na de yang yongasum dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin pa byin pa 'di'i rnam par smin pa yod dam med ces the tshom zan de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang
386a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin po byin nas gdung ba dang 'gyod pas/ gdungs na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang sbyin pa byin nas gang bdag las khyer ba thams cad kyis tshe phyi ma la slar sbyin par/ 
386a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// snyam du 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed na du yang yo du sum dag pa yin no// gang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis spyad kyi sems can gzhan
386a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems bskyed na de/ yang yong sum dag pa yin no// gang lang tshol bab/ bas sbyin pa byin pa dang / byis dang 'chi dang / rga ba'i/ 
386a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / na bas gzir ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnad du phog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang / snang ba dang 'chi ba'i mya ngan du gyur pa na sangs rgyas pa la dga' ba dang / dang
386a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med par rtsa lag rnams kyis byed du bcug ste/ sbyin gnas rnams la sbyin pa byin ni de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yul gzhan na gnas na yang yul dang gnas ga ge mo zhes
386a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba na bdag sbyin bdag tu grags par 'gyur ro snyam du grags pa'i rgyur sbyin pa byon na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang kha zas gtong mi phod pa la 'jig rten pa mi dga' bar
386b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas sbyin phod pa'i nyes pa ni 'jig rten gyis bzod do snyam ste sbyin pa byin na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang bud med snying du sdug ste chung mar blang ba'i 'brel ba dang / phyi
386b2(dkon brtsegs): byed par bya ba'i don du bud med kyi gzhi las mdza' bshes dang / gnyen 'dab dang brel ba'i phyogs la nor bu dang / gser dang dngul dang / rdo rje dang baiDUR+Wa dang / dar dang / byi ru dang / dukra
386b3(dkon brtsegs): la'i ras la sogs pas mgu bar byed na de yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang yang 'di ltar bdag la nor ni mang du yod na bdag la bud med de bdag gis rang rigs pa la btong bar
386b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// snyam ste sbyin pa byin nad yang yongasu ma dag pa yi na no// gang yang tshe 'dir byin pas 'jig rten pha rol tu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na
386b5(dkon brtsegs): do yang yongasu ma dag pa yin no// gang me tog dang 'bras bu dang zang zing 'dod pas dbul ba dang bkren pa dang sdug phongs pa gos gdengs shing dri ma can rnam bkol
386b6(dkon brtsegs): bor la/ phyug pa rgya chen po thob pa dag la sbyin pa byin pa de yang sbyin pa yongasu ma dag pa yin te/ drang srong chen po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni sbyin pa byin yang yongs
386b7(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pa yin par lta'o// drang srong chen po de dag gi rnam par smin po ni tsha rgo can gyi zhing la sa bon ngan pa btab pa'i myu gu skyes pa bzhin du lta ste/ sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa/ 
386b8(dkon brtsegs): ni med pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang zhing dang sa bon gyis nyes pas me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro// drang srong ches 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig gong 'dod pa'i sa bon khyer
387a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ ma rmos ma gsal ba'i zhing la btab na de'i sa bon sa la gnas pa de la char bab nas langs na gdon mi za bar myu gu skye nus par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang me tog dang 'bras bu/ 
387a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin pa de'i rnam par dbye ba de yang bsam pa dang sbyor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pas 'bras bu rnam par smin pa glang por mi 'gyur ro// 
387a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa dang mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa sa dgu'/ 
387a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sman pa skye dgu rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'byin ni bstan lag so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar tshul khrims 'chal ba dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal ni skye
387a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par smin pa che ba mi 'tshal ba lags/ bcom/ ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen pe khyod sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa nyon cig/ drang
387a6(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po dad pas gang cung zad ci byin pa de dag thams cad ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pas snod la mi rtog par ma bslangs par
387a7(dkon brtsegs): yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am ngan pa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa la dad pa bskyed nas mig phye ste/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa byin na drang srong chen po
387a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni sbyin bdag yin no/ drang srong chen po gzhan yang sbyin pa lnga yong su rdzogs par bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'gron po dang / nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang / chos smra ba dang / yul gzhan du
387b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba la dusu sbyin pa ste/ lnga po de dag go/ gzhan yang lnga ste/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa dang / gnas sbyin pa dang / mar me sbyin pa dang / spos dang phreng ba sbyin pa'o// 
387b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po rgyas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa yongasu dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dad pa bskyed de sems can thams cad la
387b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs shing byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gus par byas te/ dul bas sbyin pa byin pa thams cad ni yongasu dag pa yin no// thar par bsngos te byin pa ni yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// 
387b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sbyin pa bla na med pa lte ba lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa/ yin no// dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no// 
387b5(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no// nad pa la skye/ na pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no// pha ma la sbyin pa gyi na ba ni bla na med yin no// gzhan yang sbyin pa chen por 'gyur
387b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyal po rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no// rgyal pos mnar ba dang mgon med pa dang nad pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no// rgyal pos
387b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas gzhan na yang nyams nga zhing srog chad la khang 'chi la thug pa las gsos na sbyin pa chen po yin no// nab la sman byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no// tshul khrims phun sum
387b8(dkon brtsegs): tshegs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dus su sbyin pa byin na 'bras bu chen po yin no// ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs pa dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par grol ba/ 
388a1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin no// dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba pa rog
388a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'ug pa dang ri dgas la sogs pa la mi 'jigs pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no// gang la gang dgos pa dang mi bdog pa de'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin te/ 
388a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po de ltar na sbyin pa byin pas yongasasu dag pa dang sbyin pa chen po yin no// sbyin pa yong su dag pa 'di dag 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa yong su dag par bsgom par bya'o// sems can/ 
388a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gzhan dag gis de ltar bskul na dad pa dang / dang ba ba~M skyed de/ sbyin pa yongasu dag pa 'di la rje su yi dang rang bar 'gyur ba de dag mtshung bar bsod nams bskyed pa/ 
388a5(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / sbyin bdag tu 'gyur te/ de ltar na gang rjesu yi rang ba dang / gang bskul ba de dag thams cad bsod nams bskyed pa por mtshungs par 'gyur ro// 
388a6(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po gong sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa na bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i bsod nams zad par 'gyur zhes khyod
388a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis smras pa// drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// drang srong chen po gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 
388a8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs pa la mchod pa byed pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni mtshungs mnyam zhing 'dra'o// zhes nga 'chad de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gzugs chos kyi skus
388b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bye ba yin gyi/ chos gzugs kyi skus rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gang la la zhig nga 'dug pa 'am nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod na sems mtshungs pa'i phyir
388b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis la bsod nams kyi khyad par cung zad kyang med do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos ri su gtogs pa rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i gang gis kyang / 
388b3(dkon brtsegs): deng phyin chad srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig 'byin pa dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshogs khyal pa/ 
388b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par mi bya'o// brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya 'o zhes bsgo la/ de la mi la las rgyal pos bsgo ba de thos
388b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bsgo ba rnams rje su bsrungs na rgyal po de'i lus lam chod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi rgyal po ngos bsgo ba bzhin du de dag gis kyang byas so snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro// 
388b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba rab tu bsrung zhing srog gcod pa la sogs pa kun bsrung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
388b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba mi bsrung zhing mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dag mi dge ba'i las byed pas tshe 'di la rgyal po de las sdug bsngal rjesu 'thob par 'gyur/ 'di nas
388b8(dkon brtsegs): shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang dag gis nga la gzugs kyi skur mthong la bslab pa rnams rjes mi bsrung ba de dag gis
389a1(dkon brtsegs): ji 'tho par 'gyur zhe na/ de dag gis log par sgru ba bskyed nas lce sbyin bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dgang yongs su ngan las las
389a2(dkon brtsegs): pa na bslab pa rnams bsrung ba dang mchod pa yang byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni nges mchog dam par shes so// drang srong chen po ngad ltar mchog tu phyin te sems can thams cad las khyad pa
389a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags shing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas ma nges pa'i sems can rnams ming bsgrags pas kyang bslab pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o// drang srong chen po gang la la
389a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das te 'das pa'i 'og tu ma chod pa byed pa deng 'dug pa la mchod pa bzhin du 'gyurar ro// drang srong chen po sems can de dag bsod nams lhag
389a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba gang byed pa thams cad ni bsod nams chen po 'i 'phen pa byang chub tu 'gyur bar byas pa yin no// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na chu ngogs kyi 'dam bu stug
389a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i nang du me gtang na char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chus de zhi bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po sdud par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i tshigs
389a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la dad pa'i char pa bab na sbyin pa nyid kyi rgyud la sogs par 'gyur mod kyi/ sbyin pa byin pa de yang phung por gnas pa 'am spungs par gnas pa 'am phyogs na
389a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mi 'gyuraro// gang yang 'di ltar smin pa byin pa de ni sbyin pa po de la grib ma bzhin du rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de nas sbyin pa po des bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de mthong
389b1(dkon brtsegs): yang bsod nams de khong du mi chud ngo // drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na rgun rlon dang / bu ram shing ma btsir bde la khu ba mi dmigs kyi/ btsir nas dmigs te rgun 'bru dang / 
389b2(dkon brtsegs): shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa 'am spangs par gnas pa 'am phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo // khu ba de ni rgun 'bru re re dang bu ram shing gi dus bu re re'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma
389b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin pa byin pa de yang sbyin pa po'i lag pa'i rtse mo dang snying dang brang la rnam par mi gnas te/ sbyin pa de rnam par smin pa mi 'byin pa yang ma yin la
389b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag 'dor ba yang ma yin no// ji ltar rgunar bu ma dang bu ram shing bor na khu ba de dmigs par mi' gyur pa de bzhin du sbyin bdag med na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin
389b5(dkon brtsegs): por mi 'gyur te/ tshe'i 'du byed ma btang bar yang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa snang ba ma yin no// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper ni shing n+ya grong 'i sa ben kha ma 'bus par shin tu
389b6(dkon brtsegs): snang bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyin pa 'phel ba las 'bras bu grung por 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na chong pa la la zhig rdzas kyi phyogs nyung ngu zhig khyer te yul gzhan gyi
389b7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer du song nas/ tshong dus khyad par can du rang gi rdzas nor chen po rgyas par bsgrub te/ de'i nor de nyung ngu las mang por gyur pa dang / sbrang rtsi'i sbrang mas me tog ma rung bar byas pa
389b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar sprin bdag gi rnam par smin pa yang rgya cher sogs par 'gyur ro// dper na sprin ni ma 'ongs pa'i char pa'i chu rab tu 'dzin to// de bzhin du sbyin bdag kyang rnam par smin pa 'phen par
390a1(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ drang srong chen po dasgyur sbyin pa dag bsod nams 'phen par byed cing sbyin pa sbyin no// de'i 'bras bu la yang spyad do// de bas na len pas sbyin par shes par
390a2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// drang srong chen po bsod nams shes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol tu rdzogs par byed pa'am mthu rtsal thob pas bsrung ba ste de bas na bsod nams shes bya'o// 'jig rten pha rol nas
390a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig nas gcig tu lus dang longs spyod skyed par byed pas de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol gyi zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
390a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ni bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes dpa lus su ji ltar 'jug/ rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar
390a5(dkon brtsegs): na lus la chags pa bskyed// bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po grong khyer gyi dbus na 'dug na pha rol gyi
390a6(dkon brtsegs): dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pas thog ma nyid du 'obs rko zhong rdzas dang sman dang 'phong gi slob dpon dang skyes bu dpa'o sdud par byed cing rgyal mtshan sgreng nas gzhon nu smra'o// glang po che
390a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ba glang mo chang gis ra ro bar byed do// rigs dang gnas na gnas pa thams cad dang / zhang blon la sogs pa thams cad sdod do// dmag mi rnams kyang nor gyis bsdus nas/ 
390a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du thams cad kyang 'thab 'dod par gyis te so so'i lag cha thogs la ral gri phyung ste/ nyin mtshan ma nyal bar 'dug shig ces bsgos nas/ pha rol gyi dmag rta dang gang
390b1(dkon brtsegs): che dang mi 'dres pa 'ongs pa dang / 'di ltar rgyal po des bdag ging mag dbugs 'byin cing pha rol gyi dpung / rang gi bsod nams zad pa dang mthu rtsal zad pa dang / mtshon gyis smras pa
390b2(dkon brtsegs): dang pham par ma gyur gyi bar du 'khor la glags mi rnyed par bsrung bar byed// drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po lus kyi grong khyer du song nas/ skye mched kyi grong
390b3(dkon brtsegs): khyer la mi rtag pa'i ngo bor gnas par mthong nas de'i tshe dad pa'i 'obs rko bar byed do// brtson 'grus la gnas te 'dug bzod pa'i go cha gyon rnam pa chen po rtsom/ chos kyi glang po
390b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe rgyags par byed/ ye shes kyi rta la yang zhon zhing rgyug ste/ skye mched kyi grong khyer la 'di skad ce/ das bag yod par ci bya ba dus su gyis shig/ pha rol
390b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dmag tshogs kyi dpung thub par dka' ba mi rtag pa'i dmag dpag tu med pa 'ong gis da myur du sbyin pa'i cha gyon cig ye shes kyi mtshon cha thogs shig/ ngo tsha the
390b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang khrel yod pa'i sgyogs sbyor cig/ tshul khrims dang ting 'dzin dang gtong ba'i bsrungs ma zhog shog ces bskul lo// de dag kyang pha rol gyi dmag nye bar gnas pa
390b7(dkon brtsegs): de dang phan tshun mi mthun pas 'broso// de dag dang mi mthun pas skye mched kyi grong khyer de zhig nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po de lus kyi grong khyer bor te de yul la phyogs nas
390b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bres// rnam par shes pa bros nas lus dang dbang po'i tshogs khams kyi sbrul gyis gang bas skye mched drug zhig nas bdag po med pa yid gtan du mi rung ba'i lus kyi grong khyer
391a1(dkon brtsegs): // 'jig par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rgyal pos lus kyi grong khyer bor nas lus gzhan yongasu 'dzin par byed de de ltar na rnam par shes
391a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rgyal po ltar blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa bsod nam su nye bar mchi ba'am
391a3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma lags pa nye bar mchi ba'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar mchi ba'i lus ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/ rnam par shes pa 'di nyid kyis bdag gi lus 'di yongasu btang ngam mi
391a4(dkon brtsegs): btang snyam du ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dpe ran skyes bu rgya mtsho chen po rgal bar 'dod pas/ gzings
391a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i steng du 'dug nas chu'i nang du zhugs pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs rgyud mar 'byung bas da krugs pa mthon dman can kum b+hi ra ma rungs pa/ 'dzin
391a6(dkon brtsegs): khri dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / sbrel yod pa'i chu de'i tshu rol gyi 'gram nas rlung gis phul nas 'bad mi dgos shing / gnod pa med la bde bar gnas te pha rol gyi
391a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gram du phyin par gyur to// chu bo'i klung rab tu 'jigs pa de las thar nas gzings de la dga' ba bskyed nas/ gzings 'dis bdag mtsho chen po 'di las brgal to snyam bsam nas gzings
391a8(dkon brtsegs): de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ gzings de la rab tu mchod pa byaso// drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang bsod nams gang byas pa'i sems can 'di nas shi 'phos pa de'i rnam par shes pa de'i
391b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te lus 'dis bdag bde 'gro lha dang mir skye ba yongasu bzung ba dang ldan pas bdag don yod pa mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te/ lus 'dis bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho las
391b2(dkon brtsegs): brgal te/ 'dis lhar skye ba yongasu bzung ngo zhes 'di ltar lus de la dga' ba bskyed nas bdag gis 'di la mchod pa legs par bya'o snyamo// phyis lus de gzings bzhin du bor
391b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o// gang rang gi lus kyis bsod nams ma byas pa de'i rnam par shes pa de ni ji ltar skyes bu gzings rul bas mtsho chen po de'i nang du bying zhing zhig stem rung
391b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas skyes bu de yang nyams thag ste gzings zhig pa des 'jigs bzhin du 'gram du phyin nas kyang / seng ge dang stag yod pa'i 'jigs sar phyin par gyur nas de
391b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces zer ro// gzings rul pa nyon mongs kyi/ steng du log par songs nas mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs kyis dkrugs pa/ sbrul gyis glongs pa zhugs/ 
391b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes gzings de la de skad smra'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'di bsod nams ma yin pa byas pa'i lus la brten pas ngan song gi sar song nas lus de la 'di skad zer ro// 
391b7(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i lus 'dis ci zhig rnyed na sdig pa can gyi lus mngon par grub nas bdag khur lta bus non par gyur/ bdag lus rul pa 'di'i rgyus ngan song du mngon par phyogs shing zhugs
391b8(dkon brtsegs): te mchil pas nya zin pa bzhin no snyamo// de ltar rnam par shes pa de legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis gzings bzang po bzhin du 'khor ba las rgal bar byed do// bsod
392a1(dkon brtsegs): nams ma yin pas ni log par ltung bar byed do// de ltar na rnam par shes pas bsod nam su nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro
392a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus rnam pa 'di gnyis rab tu sheso// yang rnam par shes pas lus 'di yongasu btang nas gnas lus gnyis par 'gro zhing nye bar 'gro'o// de mngal na gnas pa'i tshe zhag bdun
392a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi bar du rnam par shes pas bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dir 'ongaso// las 'di byas// bdag gis las 'di byas so zhes dran nas/ de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dag
392a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'gro'o// de rum na gnas pa na de'i mal mtshan ma gsum 'byung ngo // gsum gang zhe/ na/ gzhin 'dzum zhing de bzhin rnyi ri bo ma yin pa dang / gzhin
392a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i kha dog lte bur 'gyur zhing rkang pa g.yas pa la ra tu gnod la dkugayas pa la lan du mar nyug pa dngade gos dkar po dang rab tu mdzes pa ste bsod namasu nye bar 'gro
392a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma ni gzugs de lta bur blta'o// drang srong chen po gang bsod nams ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed par gyur pa de nag bdun gyi bar du
392a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag de nas shing phos nas 'dir skyes// sdig pa'i las 'di byaso zhes de lta bu dran par 'gyuraro// de de lta bu dran nas yid mi bde ba skye'o// yid mi bde ba skyes pa de'i ma la lhas mang du byu
392a8(dkon brtsegs): lhaste/ yus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba dang / lus ring par 'gyur ba dang / lus la sems pas khyab par 'gyur ba dang / yang dang yang du gzhin khro gnyer sdud par 'gyur ba dang / 
392b1(dkon brtsegs): gang tshun chad sems can de mngal du skyes par gyur pa de tshun chad khyim der nyon mongs pa dang gnod pa dang na dmang por 'gyur ro// sems can de btsas pa'i tshe yang na ni ma 'chi ba'i dus byed pa
392b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang na ni bdag nyid mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma rungs par 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po de lta bu ni bsod nams ma yin pas nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can du la
392b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la rnam par shes pa de thog ma mngal du skyes pa'i tshe ci dran rnam par shes
392b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po 'di la rnam par shes pa thog ma skyes pa'i tshe/ 'di lta bu dran par 'gyur te kun dga'
392b5(dkon brtsegs): rab dang / bskyed mos chel dang / nags tshal dang / rdzing dang / lu ma dang / gser rgyu gzhal med khang mthong zhing 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di skye bo mdzub 'du bas
392b6(dkon brtsegs): gang ba dang // mchog tu yid du 'ong ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i sems can gyis gang bar mthong ngo // lha'i shes pa'i snang bas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma rje su dran no// rjesu dran zhing rjes
392b7(dkon brtsegs): su dran nas kyang dga' ba bskyed de/ 'di ni skye ba lnga brgyar bdag gi mar gyur to zhes de ltar rab tu shes te/ de ltar rje su dran nas ma de la chags par mi byed cing 'dod chags bral
392b8(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyed de/ kye ma'o 'di lhor yang skye ba dang 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal te 'khor bas ni chog go/ yongasu 'dzin pa 'dis kyang cho ga go snya mo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong
393a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can den ma chags na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
393a2(dkon brtsegs): ram bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po thams cad de lta bu ma yin te rnam par shes pa de ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa snang ba med pa'o// 
393a3(dkon brtsegs): gang rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa med par gyur pa/ 'khor bar mi skye ba de lta bu'i gnas med do// bsod nams nye bar 'gro ba dang / mi g.yo bar 'gro ba dang mya ngan
393a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'gyur/ drang srong chen po de dag ni 'di ltar lta ba ste/ rnam par shes pa gang de ltar sems pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i
393a5(dkon brtsegs): shas che bar lta ste/ lus kyi shas che bas ni mi nus so// rnam par shes pa ni tshor bar byed pa rnam par shes pa ni sems pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes
393a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// drang srong chen po khyod kyis rnam par shes pa de de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dgra rnams thad
393a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bsrung // nyon mongs sog par byed pa po// shes dang mi shes shes pa po// shes rab dang ni gti mug ldan// lha dang nga rgyal ma rig dang // rnam par shes pa kun la yo
393a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa med pa ni// gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa med par ni// de dag 'du bar mi 'gyur te// cig car gyur na 'du bar 'gyur// gcig ni 'khor lo
393b1(dkon brtsegs): shing rta bzhin/ skyes bu mnyam du 'du ba ni// nyid dang gzhan dang gnyis kas min// gcig gis ma yin gzhan gyis min rdza mangs ma ga shing sa byur tel ni/ 'khor lo gnyis/ 
393b2(dkon brtsegs): su ldan pa dang // theg pa dag gis bcing byas pa// shing rta zhes ni yongasu grags// de ltar lus kyi shing rta yang // khams kyi 'du 'dra rnams las 'byung // de las dbang po
393b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'gyur te// rnam par shes pas rab tu bstan// gnad dang mtshamasu sbyor ba dang // de ltar rtsa dang 'jing chu dang // skra dang rus pa so dang mgo// sen mo lpags pas mdogs byas
393b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgyu ma glo ba mkhal ma dang // snying dang 'tsher ba tshil bu dag/ thams cad mnyam du 'dus pa las// lus ni shin tu gnas pa yin// de la khams ni lus can
393b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems las dngos po kun 'byung bas// de phyirarnam par shes kyir 'dod// de ni 'khor los bsgyur/ bar 'dod// drang srong chen po gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i
393b6(dkon brtsegs): ni phra ba gzugs med pa bstan du med pa mi mngon pa ste/ 'di ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzugs kyi dbang po ma yin no// dbang po rags pa bor ba'i phyin rnam par shes par lta ba gzhan
393b7(dkon brtsegs): med de/ mi'i snying 'phar ba dang 'jigs pa gang las 'byung ba dang // rnam par rtogs pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che ba yin gyi lus
393b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi shas che ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi rang bzhin ji ltar blta ba
394a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi sems can dmyal bar nye bar mchi ba dang / yi dgas su nye bar mchi ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su nye bar mchi ba'i rang bzhin ji ltar bsnga
394a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar lhar nye bar mchi ba dang / ji ltar mi ra nye bar 'chi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang lags par lta bar bgyi// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis lnga
394a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mar skye bar 'gyur/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yid/ gsu skye bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol/ 
394a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen dpo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dang dge ba da'i rtsa ba rnams dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba nyon cig
394a5(dkon brtsegs): yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'di ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i yul ma yin no// 'di ni lha rnams dang tshad sa pa la sogs pa 'og min la thug pa rnams kyi ma yin
394a6(dkon brtsegs): te 'di ni nyan thos kyi skabs kyang ma yin na sems can gzhan rnams kyi lta ga la yin// drang srong chen po gang dri ma gsum spangs pa'i chos nyid dang po thob pa/ nga'i bstan pa
394a7(dkon brtsegs): la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul ni ma yin te/ lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis ni ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong chen po rgyas pas
394a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgas 'khogs gtugs pas da 'bras bu rnams la brtsal ba'i rngo mi thog go/ bdag khur chen po
394b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba'i rngo mo thog go// bdag da bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang tha ba thams cad spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// bdag deng slan chad slob ma dang bcas g.yog
394b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te gsum la skyabasu mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'jig rten nas shri 'phos nas 'gro ba gang du gyur pa de bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
394b3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po de'i phyir logs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / skas gang yin pa ngas bshad do// drang
394b4(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po 'di la me tog dang spros dang phreng ba sbyin pa dang // bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pa gdad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas na phreng
394b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// drang srong chen po de'/ chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de lus dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i me tog bzhin du snang ngo // drong srong chen
394b6(dkon brtsegs): po de la te me tog gi tsher mang po rab tu bab nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la me tog kha dog sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ de'i rtsa lag snying du sdug pa
394b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag kyang me tog thogs shing mya ngan byed par 'gyur// de bzhin mdog snum par 'gyur/ de'i mig ha cang btsums pa yang ma yin ha cang che ba yang ma yin par
394b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rkang lag legs par brkyang nas 'tsho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rtags 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'di lta bu'i ltas kyang mthong bar 'gyur
395a1(dkon brtsegs): ter khang pa brtsegs pa me tog sna tshogs rab tu sbyangs pa me tog tha dad pas mdzes par byas pa bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba mthong nas rtswa
395a2(dkon brtsegs): lag rnams la 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag gi rmi lam na khang pa brtsegs pa lnga'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lda ldi sbyangs pa/ lha'i me tog bkram pa bud med
395a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gis bskor ba de lta bu mthong ngo zhes bdag gis rtsa lag de dag la smras nas/ de dag gis kyang phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye bar rig go/ de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas phreng
395a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs kyi lnga'i nang du skye ba na pha dang ma 'dus par mthong nas skye ba yong su 'dzin to// phreng ba thogs pa de dag kyang gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis sprod par 'gyur te/ 
395a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na 'dzem+bu'i gling pa'i mi bzhin no// de la de dag gi rnam par shes pa phan tshun 'dres shing da ga' ba tsam gyis non pas 'jug par 'gyur gyi de dag
395a6(dkon brtsegs): khu ba 'byung ba ni ma yin no// drang srong chen po lha de dag ni lha mos mngal na zhag bdun du 'dzin to// zhag bdun 'das pa nas dku g.yas pa nas 'byung ngo // drang srong chen po de de'i/ 
395a7(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas byung nas lha'i me tog dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs brgyus pa'i phreng ba/ brang las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de'i phreng ba'i dri rab tu
395a8(dkon brtsegs): zhim pa'i ngad rlung gis bdas nas phyogs kun tu dpag tshad tsam du 'gro'o// phreng ba de kha dog bdun yod pa 'di lta ste dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / 
395b1(dkon brtsegs): baiDUn+da dang / rma dang / dad+ma rAg las lhag pa ste bltan sdug pa sna tshogs kyis phreng ba de dag de ma shi bar du ma rnyis par thogs par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir phreng thogs shes bya'o// 
395b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po phreng thogs kyi lha de dag gi gnas de na/ shing ldings pi ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung ba 'bras bu sna tshogs ha cang yang mi bsgyur/ ha cang yang mi dmar la/ bdud
395b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsi dang 'dra ba'i ro bro ba mang po bzang po lha'i ro bro ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag yod do// drang srong chen po shing sa 'i grang mas tshad ni shing tog bil po tsam mo// de dag gi nang nas lha rnams so/ 
395b4(dkon brtsegs): dang za bar 'dod pa'i zas de dang de dag la nye bar gnas te de da ngag ni 'bras bu za bar blta ba'i khams kyis za ba'i zas can ni ma yin no// drang srong chen po lha dag gi phyogs
395b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu rno ba'i tsher ma'i bag med pa/ me tog gis ma dzes par byas pa/ ne'u bsing gis khebs pa/ gser dang dngul gyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par
395b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ yid tsam ser ba lta bur snang ba'o// drang srong chen po gnas de ni phreng ba thogs pa'i lha de dag lha'i bu mchog tu 'bar ba'i gos dang rgyan can/ skar khung dang kha khyer dang / 
395b7(dkon brtsegs): pu shu'i ngos la/ bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan pa dag dang gnas so// de na de dag tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis stong thub po de nas tshe zad pa'i ltas 'byung ba ni shing gang gi drung na
395b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dug 'dug pa'i shing de lo rnyings pa dang / yal ga 'phyang ba dang / me tog dang dri yang med par 'gyur te/ sems can de yang shing drung de na mi dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur// ngo'i phreng
396a1(dkon brtsegs): ba sngon ma rnying pa de yang rnyings par 'gyur/ lha'i 'jig rten gyi rlung bsil zhing bde bar ldang ba de yang dro bar ldang bar 'gyur ba ste/ de'i gnas de dag mthong nas lha'i
396a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de dag nga ro gcig tu snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don to// sems can de yang mtho ris kyi grong khyer lha'i shing dang me tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa dang / lha'i bu mar
396a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang 'dre ba yongasu btang nas bsod nams zad par 'gyur ba 'di ni mtho ris kyi nyes pa'o// drang srong chen po de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis de'i mtha' bskor nas nyam thag pa
396a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i sgrar dus ste/ kyi hud mi rtag pa 'di ni snying rje med pa'o// 'di ltar snying la dga' ba skyes shing 'kho du 'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par mtho ris nas
396a5(dkon brtsegs): lhung ngam/ e ma ho lha gzhon nu dmyur du mi'i 'jig rte/ na du skye bar gyur cig ces mya ngan byed pa na rims drag pos btab nas de rims drag pos non te/ de'i lus gcig
396a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lus 'bar bas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'bar ba de khar zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas pha dang ma 'dus pa mthong bas skye ba yongasu
396a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to// drang srong chen po phreng thog su nye bar 'gro ba'i lha'i bu de 'di ltar skye bar lta ste/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ltas 'byung ba ni mngal na gnas pa na me tog dang spos dang phreng
396a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod pa dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs la 'dod pa dang / nags tshal sna tshogs stug po nyams dga' ba 'dod par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus la na ba
396b1(dkon brtsegs): med par mngal na 'dzin par 'gyur/ rmi lam na bsod nams sna tshogs kyi tshong 'das me tog gi phreng ba sbyangs pa'i grong khyer mthong ste 'di dag ni de'i mas ltas mthong ba'o// 
396b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po gzhan yang lha gzhon nu de btsas nas phreng ba thogs pa'i lha las shi 'phos pas shin tu dgo' ba chen po skye'o// gos dkar po la dga' bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa
396b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur/ shes pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur/ 'dod pa la rab tu mapa 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba 'byar bag can dang / dus ston dang / lhad mo dang / phra ba'i gos
396b4(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ kun dga'i ra ba la da dga' ba dang / pha rol 'byor pa mthong ba na 'dod pa ste/ drang srong chen po 'di dag ni phreng thogs kyi lha las mir
396b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i lnga ltas su blta ba dag go// / bam pa gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// drang srong chen po gzhan yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'i ltas dang 'chi 'pho ba'i
396b6(dkon brtsegs): lte su blta ba ni/ drang srong chen po 'di la dman pa dang / mgon med pa la zas bzang po dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang kun 'thung ba'i chu grang mo dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / 
396b7(dkon brtsegs): lteng ka dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / khron chu byin nas dad pa dang yid rab tu dga' zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba med pa'i lus su gyur/ de'i lus ring par mi 'gyur
396b8(dkon brtsegs): mdog ngan par mi 'gyur/ rdul dang dri ma chags par mi 'gyur/ de'i lus la nyam nga ba'i tshor ba mi 'byung / skad dman pa dang / rtsa lag dang bral zhing gdung ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ 
397a1(dkon brtsegs): de bkres pa dang skom pas nyen par mi 'gyur/ de'i lus bskum pa dang spyang pa la sogs pas sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyuraro// ba shang gci 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ yul
397a2(dkon brtsegs): las yongasu nyams pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ de'i dbang po zhum par mi 'gyur ba ste/ de lta bu ni mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyuraro// de'i lus yongasu
397a3(dkon brtsegs): btang nas rnam par shes pa de rab tu dga' bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du bskyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal stug po'i nang du gnas par 'gyur ro// de 'chi kar lha'i ris mthong
397a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bzhin me tog pad+ma lta bur 'gyur/ de'i kha nas dri zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la me tog sna tshogs ra dri dang ldan pa'i rlung rjesu mthun pa ldang bar 'gyur/ de shi nas
397a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du pha ma 'dus nas bskyed mos tshal na rtse zhing 'dod pa myeng bas rgya gas dregs nas lag pa g.yas pas lha mo'i lte ba la reg
397a6(dkon brtsegs): par mthong nas de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa lha mo'i phang par skye ba yongasu 'dzin to// de zhag bdun 'das nas dri ma med pa'i rna cha mgul pa'i mgo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nur mdo
397a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'grub ste/ rgod pa dang gar byed pa dang glu len pa dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod bskyed nuso// drang srong chen po de la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis phyogs ni dngul dang ldong ros rnam par
397a8(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba sna tshogs kyis spras shing mdzes par byas pa/ lha mo brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa lha'i gnas mtho ba rang bzhin gyis mdzes pa/ rig na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba'o// 
397b1(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi bskyed mos tshal dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gru bzhi lham pa nor bu'i sgron mas snang bar byas pa/ shing gi yal ga dang rtse mo la/ 
397b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag bsam gyi shing gi ras bcos bu dang rgya dar wa'i lnga ldi sbyangs pa/ nags tshal gyi bar 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba khyim gyi bar na rtag tu pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / ma
397b3(dkon brtsegs): rnga'i sgra 'byung ba'o// drang srong chen po lci'i gnas na gnas po de dag zas kham gyi zas can de/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang / kha dog dang / ro dang reg pa dang / yon+tan phun sum tshogs par
397b4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o// de dag re re la yang gser gzhong gnyis gnyis yod de/ de na kha zas gang 'dod pa de'i de phun sum tshogs pa gzhong ba de las 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
397b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog gi khu ba ro dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub ste/ de ni me tog gi chang zhes bya'o// drang srong chen po chang de ni dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu bde ba/ bsil ba dris
397b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ra ro ba mngon par 'grub na mthungs pas ji lta ci smos te/ de na lha gzhon nur ro bar 'gyur ro// drang srong che rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi gzhal med
397b7(dkon brtsegs): khang ni mdzes byed ces bya ste/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa'i 'khri shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gser dang dngul dang rdo rje 'bar ba'i ka ba brgya stong gis phyogs phyogs shin tu
397b8(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa/ lho'i mal tshe dang gding ba bting bas phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba/ lha mo bzor byas pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyad par ldan pa/ steg cing 'jo ba'i rjes
398a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa/ lnga'i gos 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pas/ spud spud pa/ ka la bing ka dang / bung ba'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ gzugs ra
398a2(dkon brtsegs): tu che zhing shin tu gzhon sha chags pa/ glu dang gar dang sil snyan dang 'jam zhing rtse bas rgyags pa'i shas tshe rab tu sgeg pa sha stag gis bskor cing gang ba ste/ gnas de'i ka
398a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gser chu dang dngul chus rnam pa bris pa/ dar gyi rgyal mtshan sbyangs pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan bsgreng pa'o// gzhal med khang de dag ni 'di lta ste yul 'khor
398a4(dkon brtsegs): bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi ga zang dang / lus ngan po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag lha'i 'dod pa dang bde ba dang rtse ba myong
398a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing rab tu dag ste/ dga' bo dang bde ba dang ldan la g+ha/ dag dang stanangs te kha zas za bas dbang po tshim ni nga bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas so// drang
398a6(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i ris de na lha gzhonu de dag lag pa ring zhing shas rgyas pa glang po rgyags pa'i tshul du 'gro ba/ skyes bu stong gi stobs dang rtsal yod
398a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i lus shin tu 'jam pa sha stag go// de dag gi dri chang gi shas che bas dpag chad khor yug chang drir phyogs par byed do// lhong de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi
398a8(dkon brtsegs): stong thub ste bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus mi byed do// de dag thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba dang dga' bar gnas so// lha'i ris de na bskal pa bzang po
398b1(dkon brtsegs): gser dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis brgyan pa dag nags kyi phreng bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ dga' ba bskyed pa la sogs pa'i bskyed mos chal bzang po dring ba med pa rnams na snying
398b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so// de dag de na gnas pa na me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing nor bu gser gyis mdzes par bya/ shin tu rnam par phye ba gru bzhi pa/ nor bu'i them
398b3(dkon brtsegs): skas kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu snyan pa len pa/ nor bu'i snod rnams bdag nyid sgra 'byin pa'i rje su tshogs pa na de dag gnas gnas pa las de dag bsod
398b4(dkon brtsegs): nams zad pa sa tshe zad par 'gyur ba'i ltas gnyis 'byung ste/ de thog mar grib ma mi snang bar 'gyur zhing me tog las dri mi 'byung ba dang / lha'i bu mo dang kun
398b5(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i sgra snyan pa mi thos pa'o// yang lha gzhon nu/ de lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas rnams su 'du zhing mi/ 'gro ste/ lha'i gnas lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis gang
398b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yal ge'i rtse mo la do shal dang se mo do dang me tog gi phreng ba sbyangs pa nags tshal gyi bar gyi bya khu byug rgya gos pa'i sgra 'byin pa de dag na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs ngu zhing gas
398b7(dkon brtsegs): dri ma can gyon nas sa'i steng na 'dre ldog cing snying rje rje ltar lta ste/ sa'i steng de na 'dre ldog pas me tog gi bla res brgyan pa'i sa phyogs dag na yang dga' ba mi rnyed de/ de
398b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi lus la rdul 'byung zhing de dag mig mi 'dzums pa las mig 'dzums par 'gyur te/ nya chu'i gnas nas phyung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pa bzhin du phan tshu
399a1(dkon brtsegs): du 'dre ldog cing gcig pu sa la gnas par mthong nas lha'i bu mo do dag gis bskor te/ snying rje rje ltar lta zhing skad mthun par du ste/ 'di skad ces kyi hud re sdug kyi hud re/ 
399a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug/ kyi hud gzhon nu'i mchog de phyogs gang du song lus che la rgyan sna tshogs kyis brlan pa/ 'gram pa che la mdzes pa brang shin tu rgyas pa bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi bar na rgyus
